column3: 'A systematic close-range scan revealed a battlefield with clouds of technical debris remaining of the battleship and its attackers. No survivors were found.

column2: 'A systematic close-range scan revealed a dead Rat marine. It seems they exited the exploding ship without a lifepod and died from lack of oxygen soon after.
column3: 'A systematic close-range scan revealed a dead Rat marine. It seems they exited the exploding ship without a lifepod and died from lack of oxygen soon after.

column2: 'A systematic close-range scan revealed a battlefield with clouds of debris remaining of the battleship and its attackers.
column3: 'A systematic close-range scan revealed a battlefield with clouds of debris remaining of the battleship and its attackers.

column2: 'A systematic close-range scanning revealed a few Credits of metal and nothing else.
column3: 'A systematic close-range scanning revealed a few Credits of metal and nothing else.

column2: 'A systematic close-range scan revealed a cloud of technical debris remaining of the battleship, including a functional module.
column3: 'A systematic close-range scan revealed a cloud of technical debris remaining of the battleship, including a functional module.

column2: '"/.../ and I am the last surivor. The virus has infected me, and I will be dead within hours. If you can cure me, I will serve your noble cause to death"
column3: '"/.../ und ich bin der letzte Überlebende. Der Virus hat mich infiziert, und ich werde innerhalb von Stunden tot sein. Wenn Sie mich heilen können, werde ich Ihrer edlen Sache bis zum Tod dienen"

column2: 'we'll decontaminate & cure you if we can [needs medbay & 50 organics]
column3: 'wir werden Sie dekontaminieren und heilen, wenn wir können [benötigt Medbay und 50 organische Substanzen]
'Sorry, wir können im Moment nicht helfen

column2: 'We don't have a mebay, but we could easily craft a DIY medbay into an empty internal slot, if we have the resources.
column3: 'Wir haben keine Medbay, aber wir könnten leicht eine DIY-Medbay in einen leeren internen Slot einbauen, wenn wir die Ressourcen haben.

column2: 'There were no survivors despite the SOS signal and a few low-power systems being still active. We salvaged everything.
column3: 'Es gab keine Überlebenden, obwohl das SOS-Signal und ein paar Systeme mit geringer Leistung noch aktiv waren. Wir haben alles geborgen.

column2: 'The operation went without complications, and the individual joined our crew after having a private conversation with our ship AI. His ship remains yielded some additional salvage value.
column3: 'Die Operation verlief ohne Komplikationen, und das Individuum schloss sich unserer Crew an, nachdem es ein privates Gespräch mit unserer Schiffs-KI geführt hatte. Seine Schiffsüberreste erbrachten einen zusätzlichen Bergungswert.

column2: 'A lizardfolk solider rescued from a shipwreck.
column3: 'Ein Echsenvolk-Soldat, der aus einem Schiffswrack gerettet wurde.

column2: 'Complications during the operation increased the overall costs, but everything went well in the end. The individual joined our crew after having a private conversation with our ship AI. The wreckage itself yielded some salvage as well.
column3: 'Komplikationen während der Operation erhöhten die Gesamtkosten, aber am Ende ging alles gut. Die Person schloss sich unserer Crew an, nachdem sie ein privates Gespräch mit unserer Schiffs-KI geführt hatte. Das Wrack selbst lieferte auch einiges an Bergungsgut.

column2: 'We don't have enough resources to help this individual.
column3: 'Wir haben nicht genug Ressourcen, um dieser Person zu helfen.

column2: '"Hello, this is captain of the Insectoid Alliance civilian transport. We have miscalculated our fuel costs and become stranded here. Can you help us?"
column3: '"Hallo, hier spricht der Captain des zivilen Transporters der Insektoiden-Allianz. Wir haben uns bei den Treibstoffkosten verrechnet und sind hier gestrandet. Können Sie uns helfen?"

column2: 'Sorry, we cannot help at the moment
column3: 'Tut uns leid, wir können im Moment nicht helfen

column2: 'After their ship has been refuelled, the captain sends us a small wooden box, containing the famous Insectoidian elixir of life. This exotic and mysterious drink is said to regenerate and enhance any carbon organism who consumes it. We divide it between the entire crew.
column3: 'Nachdem ihr Schiff aufgetankt wurde, schickt uns der Kapitän eine kleine Holzkiste, die das berühmte Lebenselixier der Insektoiden enthält. Dieses exotische und geheimnisvolle Getränk soll jeden Kohlenstofforganismus, der es konsumiert, regenerieren und verbessern. Wir teilen es unter der gesamten Besatzung auf.

column2: 'We do not have enough fuel. We can return later if we have more.
column3: 'Wir haben nicht genug Kraftstoff. Wir können später zurückkehren, wenn wir mehr haben.

column2: 'After the Insectoid Alliance ship has been refuelled, the captain expresses his gratitude by giving us one of their light internal security drones, plus some Credits donated by the passengers of his ship.
column3: 'Nachdem das Schiff der Insektoiden-Allianz aufgetankt wurde, bedankt sich der Kapitän, indem er uns eine ihrer leichten internen Sicherheitsdrohnen schenkt, sowie einige Credits, die von den Passagieren seines Schiffes gespendet wurden.

column1: 'SOS4 exo, gitchanki miners broken warp and packs.prefab

column2: '"The central crystal of our ship warpdrive has broken and we need exotics to make a new one. Can you help us? We will reward you, of course."
column3: '"Der zentrale Kristall unseres Schiffswarpdrives ist zerbrochen und wir brauchen Exoten, um einen neuen herzustellen. Können Sie uns helfen? Wir werden Sie natürlich belohnen."

column2: 'After they have built a new warpdrive with our help, the Gitchanki miners send us several crates of high quality metal, plus their original warpdrive which they won't be using any more.
column3: 'Nachdem sie mit unserer Hilfe einen neuen Warp-Antrieb gebaut haben, schicken uns die Gitchanki-Bergleute mehrere Kisten mit hochwertigem Metall sowie ihren ursprünglichen Warp-Antrieb, den sie nicht mehr benutzen werden.

column2: 'We do not have enough exotics. We may return later if we have more.
column3: 'We do not have enough exotics. We may return later if we have more.

column2: 'After they have built a new warpdrive with our help, the Gitchanki miners send us several crates of high quality fuel, plus their original warpdrive which they won't be using any more.
column3: 'Nachdem sie mit unserer Hilfe einen neuen Warp-Antrieb gebaut haben, schicken uns die Gitchanki-Bergleute mehrere Kisten mit hochwertigem Treibstoff sowie ihren ursprünglichen Warp-Antrieb, den sie nicht mehr benutzen werden.

column2: '"I've just fought a fleet of slavers, and desperately need synthetics for repairs. Can you help me?"
column3: '"Ich habe gerade gegen eine Flotte von Sklavenhaltern gekämpft und brauche dringend Kunststoffe für Reparaturen. Können Sie mir helfen?"

column2: 'After repairing his ship, the captain sends us a giant natural artifact as expression of gratitude, along with some fine exotic consumables.
column3: 'Nachdem er sein Schiff repariert hat, schickt uns der Kapitän als Dankeschön ein riesiges Naturartefakt, zusammen mit einigen feinen exotischen Verbrauchsgütern.

column2: 'We do not have enough synthethics. We may return later if we have more.
column3: 'Wir haben nicht genug Synthethika. Wir können später zurückkehren, wenn wir mehr haben.

column2: 'Only the SOS signal was still active, everything else had broken down long ago. We salvaged everything.
column3: 'Nur das SOS-Signal war noch aktiv, alles andere war schon längst ausgefallen. Wir haben alles geborgen.

column2: 'After repairing his ship, the captain expresses his gratitude by sending us a pair of capital missiles!
column3: 'Nach der Reparatur seines Schiffes bedankt sich der Kapitän, indem er uns ein Paar Großraumraketen schickt!

column2: '"I HAVE MADE MISTAKES, NEED EMERGENCY REPAIRS. PLEASE HELP?"
column3: '"ICH HABE FEHLER GEMACHT, BRAUCHE NOTREPARATUREN. BITTE HELFEN?"

column2: 'Sorry, we cannot help at this moment
column3: 'Tut uns leid, wir können im Moment nicht helfen

column2: 'After repairing his ship, the captain sends us a "THANK YOU SKELETON APE!" and a beautiful giant flower. It's some kind of advanced biotech reactor.
column3: 'Nachdem er sein Schiff repariert hat, schickt uns der Kapitän ein "DANKE SKELETON APE!" und eine wunderschöne Riesenblume. Es ist eine Art fortschrittlicher Biotech-Reaktor.

column2: 'The SOS signal was still active, everything else broke down long ago. We salvaged everything.
column3: 'Das SOS-Signal war noch aktiv, alles andere ist längst ausgefallen. Wir haben alles geborgen.

column2: 'After repairing his ship, the captain sends us a "THANK YOU WAR SKELETON APE!" message plus a nuke and several tons of sugar.
column3: 'Nachdem er sein Schiff repariert hat, schickt uns der Kapitän eine "DANKE KRIEGSSKELETON APE!"-Nachricht sowie eine Atombombe und mehrere Tonnen Zucker.

column2: '"Our exotic reactor has become unstable, but the only drone that is capable of repairing it is broken as well. Can you help us?"
column3: '"Unser exotischer Reaktor ist instabil geworden, aber die einzige Drohne, die in der Lage ist, ihn zu reparieren, ist ebenfalls kaputt. Können Sie uns helfen?"

column2: 'we can repair your drone [needs the drone repair bay]
column3: 'wir können Ihre Drohne reparieren [benötigt die Drohnen-Reparaturbucht]

column2: 'We don't have the necessary technology. We may return later.
column3: 'Wir haben nicht die notwendige Technologie. Wir können später zurückkehren.

column2: 'Feeling thankful, the captain gave us one of his nukes, along with a crate of ammo.
column3: 'Aus Dankbarkeit gab uns der Kapitän eine seiner Atombomben, zusammen mit einer Kiste Munition.

column2: 'The ship was transporting weapons. The captain offered us a pair of loaded cannons to express his gratitude.
column3: 'Das Schiff transportierte Waffen. Der Kapitän bot uns ein Paar geladene Kanonen an, um seine Dankbarkeit auszudrücken.

column2: 'The ship was transporting weapons. The captain gave us the biggest gun to express his gratitude.
column3: 'Das Schiff transportierte Waffen. Der Kapitän schenkte uns die größte Waffe, um seine Dankbarkeit auszudrücken.

column2: 'What you need is a lesson [prepare for battle]
column3: 'Was Sie brauchen, ist eine Lektion [Vorbereitung auf den Kampf]

column2: '"This is nothing personal. We just need to feed our families."
column3: '"Das ist nichts Persönliches. Wir müssen nur unsere Familien ernähren."

column2: 'There are no wreckages to salvage, but the memory of this battle will stay with us for a long time.
column3: 'Es gibt keine Wrackteile zu bergen, aber die Erinnerung an diese Schlacht wird uns noch lange erhalten bleiben.

column2: 'We've found primitive life, accustomed to thriving in the extremely acidic environment of this planet. We need to print ceramic armor for our operatives to work in here.
column3: 'Wir haben primitives Leben gefunden, das daran gewöhnt ist, in der extrem sauren Umgebung dieses Planeten zu gedeihen. Wir müssen Keramik-Rüstungen für unsere Agenten drucken, damit sie hier arbeiten können..
'Erforschen & ernten wir organische Stoffe [-50 Synthetik, senden Sie die Mannschaft]

column2: 'Research only. Leave this planet otherwise untouched [send bots]
column3: 'Nur Forschung. Lassen Wir diesen Planeten ansonsten unberührt [send bots]

column2: 'A few bots were lost to acid attacks from the local plants during the research.
column3: 'Ein paar Bots wurden während der Forschung durch Säureangriffe der lokalen Pflanzen verloren.

column2: 'Harvesting of organics proved more difficult than expected... The local plants have evolved various ways of protecting themselves with extremely corrosive molecular acid. We lost some bots despite their freshly printed ceramic armor.
column3: 'Die Ernte der organischen Stoffe erwies sich als schwieriger als erwartet... Die einheimischen Pflanzen haben verschiedene Möglichkeiten entwickelt, sich mit extrem ätzender Molekularsäure zu schützen. Wir haben einige Bots verloren, trotz ihrer frisch gedruckten Keramikpanzerung.

column2: 'Our sensors cannot penetrate the thick atmosphere of the planet. Initial data suggests highly corrosive environment and a fair chance of life.
column3: 'Unsere Sensoren können die dichte Atmosphäre des Planeten nicht durchdringen. Erste Daten deuten auf eine hochkorrosive Umgebung und eine gute Chance auf Leben hin.

column2: 'Harvesting of organics proved more difficult than expected... The local plants have evolved various ways of protecting themselves with extremely corrosive molecular acid. One of our operatives researching the local flora was careless and got sprayed over with acid.
column3: 'Die Ernte der organischen Stoffe erwies sich als schwieriger als erwartet... Die einheimischen Pflanzen haben verschiedene Möglichkeiten entwickelt, sich mit extrem ätzender Molekularsäure zu schützen. Einer unserer Mitarbeiter, der die lokale Flora erforschte, war unvorsichtig und wurde mit Säure übersprüht.

column1: '1 P big precursor robot helps with free Repair or Fuel.prefab

column2: 'The warp energy comes from a large, very advanced robot. It hacks one of our bots to communicate "SAFETY" and then releases it.
column3: 'Die Warpenergie kommt von einem großen, sehr fortschrittlichen Roboter. Er hackt einen unserer Bots, um "SAFETY" zu kommunizieren und setzt ihn dann frei.

column2: 'This lifeless planet has a definite warp energy source on its surface. It could be precursor technology, or possibly a warp animal.
column3: 'Dieser leblose Planet hat eine eindeutige Warpenergiequelle auf seiner Oberfläche. Es könnte sich um Vorläufertechnologie handeln, oder möglicherweise um ein Warptier.

column2: 'As our crew approaches, they get an unnerving feeling that somebody is reading their minds. "YOU NEED HELP" the robot states coldly. It looks at our ship and we see pieces of ground rising up in the air around it. The dirt transforms into metal Credits, which attach themselves to the ship's hull. The robot then falls silent.
column3: 'Als sich unsere Crew nähert, bekommen sie das beunruhigende Gefühl, dass jemand ihre Gedanken liest. "IHR BRAUCHT HILFE", sagt der Roboter kalt. Er blickt auf unser Schiff und wir sehen, wie um ihn herum Stücke von Erde in die Luft steigen. Der Schmutz verwandelt sich in metallische Credits, die sich an der Schiffshülle festsetzen. Dann verstummt der Roboter..

column2: 'As our crew approaches, they get an unnerving feeling that somebody is reading their minds. "YOU NEED HELP" the robot states coldly. It looks at our ship and we see pieces of ground rising up in the air around it. The dirt transforms into liquid starfuel which floats, hovering inside some kind of invisible force field, into our fuel tank.
column3: 'Als sich unsere Crew nähert, bekommen sie das beunruhigende Gefühl, dass jemand ihre Gedanken liest. "IHR BRAUCHT HILFE", sagt der Roboter kalt. Er schaut auf unser Schiff und wir sehen, wie um ihn herum Stücke von Erde in die Luft aufsteigen. Der Schmutz verwandelt sich in flüssigen Sternentreibstoff, der in einer Art unsichtbarem Kraftfeld schwebend in unseren Treibstofftank fließt.

column2: 'Without wasting too much time on an introduction, the robot tells us a metaphorical story about Precursors. Apparently, they left because it was too hard for them to witness our misery. It seems the robot was left behind only to tell this story.
column3: 'Ohne zu viel Zeit für eine Einführung zu verschwenden, erzählt uns der Roboter eine metaphorische Geschichte über Precursors. Anscheinend sind sie gegangen, weil es für sie zu hart war, unser Elend mit anzusehen. Es scheint, der Roboter wurde nur zurückgelassen, um diese Geschichte zu erzählen.

column2: 'The warp energy comes from a very large advanced robot. As we approach, it starts to play a recording of a techno-telepathic song that all our crew can hear in their minds. The song seems to be about compassionate and less compassionate precursors, but it's too metaphorical to draw any specific conclusions. It seems the giant robot was left behind only to share this song.
column3: 'Die Warpenergie kommt von einem sehr großen fortschrittlichen Roboter. Als wir uns nähern, fängt er an, eine Aufnahme eines techno-telepathischen Liedes zu spielen, das alle unsere Crewmitglieder in ihren Köpfen hören können. Das Lied scheint von barmherzigen und weniger barmherzigen Vorgängern zu handeln, aber es ist zu metaphorisch, um konkrete Schlüsse zu ziehen. Es scheint, dass der Riesenroboter nur zurückgelassen wurde, um dieses Lied zu teilen.

column2: 'Extraction operation completed without incident. We were able to recover most of the resources used in the operation.
column3: 'Die Extraktionsoperation wurde ohne Zwischenfälle abgeschlossen. Wir konnten die meisten der bei der Operation verwendeten Ressourcen wiederherstellen.

column2: 'The local rainbow soup is a viable resource that contains only microbial organisms with extremely low sentience index. We could easily set up some extraction & processing facilities here. Some of the materials can be recovered after the operation.
column3: 'Die lokale Regenbogensuppe ist eine brauchbare Ressource, die nur mikrobielle Organismen mit extrem niedrigem Empfindungsindex enthält. Wir könnten hier leicht einige Extraktions- und Verarbeitungsanlagen einrichten. Einige der Materialien können nach dem Betrieb zurückgewonnen werden.

column2: 'Extraction operation completed without incident. We were able to recover most of the metal used in the operation.
column3: 'Die Extraktionsoperation wurde ohne Zwischenfälle abgeschlossen. Wir konnten den größten Teil des bei der Operation verwendeten Metalls zurückgewinnen.

column2: 'Unexplainable chemical processes within the freshly extracted explosive elements caused them to erupt in a corrosive ball of airborne molecular acid, resulting in serious damage to the metal parts of our facilities. We may have another attempt.
column3: 'Unerklärliche chemische Prozesse innerhalb der frisch extrahierten explosiven Elemente führten dazu, dass diese in einem korrosiven Ball aus luftgetragener molekularer Säure ausbrachen, was zu schweren Schäden an den Metallteilen unserer Anlagen führte. Möglicherweise gibt es einen weiteren Versuch.

column2: 'Strong electromagnetic interference and massive storms prevent us from scanning the planet's surface from orbit. We cannot see what's down there without entering the atmosphere.
column3: 'Starke elektromagnetische Störungen und massive Stürme verhindern, dass wir die Planetenoberfläche aus dem Orbit abtasten können. Wir können nicht sehen, was dort unten ist, ohne in die Atmosphäre einzutreten.

column2: 'This is one of the famous rainbow worlds, covered in super-active semibiological 'soup' of various rare chemicals. Seems like a good spot for harvesting organics, and possibly more.
column3: 'Dies ist eine der berühmten Regenbogenwelten, bedeckt mit einer superaktiven semibiologischen "Suppe" aus verschiedenen seltenen Chemikalien. Scheint ein guter Ort zu sein, um organische Stoffe zu ernten, und möglicherweise noch mehr.

column2: 'Research local life and prospect for resources [send crew]
column3: 'Erforschen Sie das Leben vor Ort und suchen Sie nach Ressourcen [Crew senden].

column2: 'Leave this planet untouched. Send bots for scientific samples and move on.
column3: 'Lassen Sie den Planeten unangetastet. Schicken Sie Bots für wissenschaftliche Proben und ziehen Sie weiter.

column2: 'Extraction operation completed without incident. We were able to recover some of the resources used in the operation.
column3: 'Die Extraktionsoperation wurde ohne Zwischenfälle abgeschlossen. Wir konnten einige der bei der Operation verwendeten Ressourcen wiederherstellen.

column2: 'Research operation completed without incident. The crew also recorded some beautiful views.
column3: 'Der Forschungseinsatz wurde ohne Zwischenfälle abgeschlossen. Die Crew nahm auch einige schöne Ansichten auf.

column2: 'Research operation completed without incidents. The crew also recorded some beautiful views of the local scenery.
column3: 'Der Forschungseinsatz verlief ohne Zwischenfälle. Die Crew nahm auch einige schöne Ansichten der lokalen Landschaft auf.

column2: 'Magnetic storms in the atmosphere were too powerful and damaged our ship. We decided its not worth the risk to try again.
column3: 'Die magnetischen Stürme in der Atmosphäre waren zu stark und beschädigten unser Schiff. Wir haben beschlossen, dass es das Risiko nicht wert ist, es noch einmal zu versuchen.

column1: '1 P cloning facility Co, possibly defsatellites.prefab

column2: 'The machine made unstable noises but completed the process. We see a confused human exiting the machine. Some basic neural teaching systems have given them a basic intellect, otherwise we'd have to deal with the mind of a newborn. We take the human aboard and our AI promises to teach them further skills on how to cope with existing. We also scavenge the cloning facility itself.
column3: 'Die Maschine machte instabile Geräusche, beendete aber den Vorgang. Wir sehen einen verwirrten Menschen, der die Maschine verlässt. Einige grundlegende neuronale Lehrsysteme haben ihm einen Grundintellekt gegeben, sonst hätten wir es mit dem Verstand eines Neugeborenen zu tun. Wir nehmen den Menschen an Bord und unsere KI verspricht, ihm weitere Fähigkeiten beizubringen, wie man mit dem Bestehenden umgeht. Wir plündern auch die Klonanlage selbst.

column2: 'Freshly spawned human clone with some pre-existing neural training. Childlike personality.
column3: 'Frisch gezüchteter menschlicher Klon mit etwas vorbestehendem neuronalen Training. Kindliche Persönlichkeit.

column2: 'The cloning machine does its thing and then stops. We hear a loud screech from inside the facility. Something breaks out from the cloning container and attacks our crew! It's a monstrous crab-like invertebrate.
column3: 'Die Klonmaschine macht ihr Ding und hält dann an. Wir hören ein lautes Kreischen aus dem Inneren der Anlage. Etwas bricht aus dem Klon-Container aus und greift unsere Crew an! Es ist ein monströses, krabbenähnliches Wirbelloses.

column2: 'We find a single large facility on the planet's surface. Closer inspection reveals it contains a single rapid cloning tube. And there's still some nutrients and target genotype blueprints inside its tank... unfortunately the blueprints are classified and encrypted. We could activate the facility to print a clone of some organism, but we won't know what comes out of this.
column3: 'Wir finden eine einzelne große Anlage auf der Oberfläche des Planeten. Eine genauere Untersuchung zeigt, dass sie eine einzelne Schnellklonröhre enthält. Und in ihrem Tank befinden sich noch einige Nährstoffe und Blaupausen des Zielgenotyps... leider sind die Blaupausen geheim und verschlüsselt. Wir könnten die Anlage aktivieren, um einen Klon irgendeines Organismus zu drucken, aber wir werden nicht wissen, was dabei herauskommt.

column2: 'The machine makes unstable noises but completes the process. We see a confused alien exiting the machine. Luckily, some basic neural teaching systems have given the person a basic level intellect, otherwise we'd have to deal with the mind of a newborn. The ship AI promises to teach them further skills on how to cope with existing. We also scavenge the cloning facility itself.
column3: 'aber den Vorgang. Wir sehen einen verwirrten Außerirdischen, der die Maschine verlässt. Glücklicherweise haben einige grundlegende neuronale Lehrsysteme der Person einen Basis-Intellekt gegeben, sonst hätten wir es mit dem Verstand eines Neugeborenen zu tun. Die Schiffs-KI verspricht, ihnen weitere Fähigkeiten beizubringen, wie man mit der Existenz zurechtkommt. Wir plündern auch die Klonanlage selbst.

column2: 'Freshly spawned clone with some pre-existing neural training. Childlike personality.
column3: 'Freshly spawned clone with some pre-existing neural training. Childlike personality.

column2: 'Much confusion and chaos ensued. The creature's outer shell was protected by some kind of reflective biotech coating, directing some of our handgun rays back to the crew themselves. Finally, a precision shot from our ship killed the creature. We later used materials salvaged from its biotech coating to improve subskin armor implants of our crew.
column3: 'Es herrschte große Verwirrung und Chaos. Die äußere Hülle der Kreatur war durch eine Art reflektierende Biotech-Beschichtung geschützt, die einige unserer Handfeuerwaffenstrahlen zurück auf die Crew selbst lenkte. Schließlich tötete ein Präzisionsschuss von unserem Schiff die Kreatur. Später benutzten wir die Materialien der Biotech-Beschichtung, um die Unterhaut-Panzerungsimplantate unserer Crew zu verbessern.

column2: 'After the machine stops, a pair of combat animals exit the facility, attacking our nearby bots and operatives...
column3: 'Nachdem die Maschine angehalten hat, verlassen ein paar Kampftiere die Anlage und greifen unsere Bots und Mitarbeiter in der Nähe an...

column2: 'One of these artificial combat animals died during the fight, but we subdued the other one. After a bit of neuro-wizardry from our ship AI, we restored control of the creature. We also salvaged the facility.
column3: 'Eines dieser künstlichen Kampftiere starb während des Kampfes, aber wir konnten das andere überwältigen. Nach ein wenig Neurozauberei durch unsere Schiffs-KI konnten wir die Kontrolle über die Kreatur wiederherstellen. Wir haben auch die Anlage geborgen.

column2: 'The cloning machine makes unstable noises but finally completes the process. We find some green goo in its cloning containers. It seems the facility was cloning edible biomass. We scoop it all up. We also scavenge the structure itself.
column3: 'Die Klonmaschine macht instabile Geräusche, schließt aber schließlich den Prozess ab. Wir finden etwas grünen Glibber in den Klonbehältern. Es scheint, dass die Anlage essbare Biomasse geklont hat. Wir schaufeln alles auf. Wir plündern auch die Struktur selbst.

column2: '"Warning. Access to this planet is restricted to GalProspect Incorporated only. Failure to respect property borders results in attack by orbital defences."
column3: '"Warnung. Der Zugang zu diesem Planeten ist nur der GalProspect Incorporated gestattet. Die Nichteinhaltung der Eigentumsgrenzen führt zu einem Angriff der orbitalen Verteidigungsanlagen."

column2: 'Print long-range missiles to neutralize the satellites from a safe distance [-20 explosives]
column3: 'Langstreckenraketen drucken, um die Satelliten aus sicherer Entfernung zu neutralisieren [-20 Sprengstoff]

column2: 'We send a swarm of printed missiles towards the satellite network. Their weapons are too short-ranged for effective counterfire, but their point-defences manage to pick off some of our missiles before they reach the target.
column3: 'Wir schicken einen Schwarm gedruckter Raketen in Richtung des Satellitennetzwerks. Ihre Waffen haben eine zu kurze Reichweite für ein effektives Gegenfeuer, aber ihre Punktverteidigung schafft es, einige unserer Raketen abzuschießen, bevor sie das Ziel erreichen.

column2: 'A number of defence satellites remain intact. Next action?
column3: 'Eine Reihe von Verteidigungssatelliten bleibt intakt. Nächste Aktion?

column2: 'We close in on the planet, shooting with everything we've got. We receive some counterfire but manage to destroy all the satellites. The remains scattered too far and wide to salvage anything.
column3: 'Wir nähern uns dem Planeten und schießen mit allem, was wir haben. Wir erhalten etwas Gegenfeuer, schaffen es aber, alle Satelliten zu zerstören. Die Überreste sind zu weit verstreut, um etwas zu bergen.

column2: 'It is an ancient, autonomous library built by the Cussians. Their long-disappeared civilization is infamous for its cruelty, but also love of knowledge. The library might contain both traps and valuable data. It would be unwise to attempt dismantling the entire tower... the Cussians had access to terrible weapons, including warp rays that disrupt minds.
column3: 'Es ist eine uralte, autonome Bibliothek, die von den Cussianern gebaut wurde. Ihre längst verschwundene Zivilisation ist berüchtigt für ihre Grausamkeit, aber auch für ihre Liebe zum Wissen. Die Bibliothek könnte sowohl Fallen als auch wertvolle Daten enthalten. Es wäre unklug, zu versuchen, den gesamten Turm zu demontieren... die Cussianer hatten Zugang zu schrecklichen Waffen, einschließlich Warp-Strahlen, die den Verstand stören.

column2: 'Explore library, consume exotics for mental fortitude [send crew, -1 exotics]
column3: 'Bibliothek erforschen, Exoten für mentale Stärke verbrauchen [Mannschaft schicken, -1 Exoten]

column2: 'The corridors of the library were packed full of warp ray traps designed to permanently injure visitors. Our crew was protected from the worst warp traps due to consumed exotics. The library administration AI offered us highly valuable data for free, including maps of faraway star systems, anatomical charts of rare alien species and other technical literature.
column3: 'Die Korridore der Bibliothek waren voll mit Warpstrahlfallen, die darauf ausgelegt waren, Besucher dauerhaft zu verletzen. Unsere Crew war durch verbrauchte Exoten vor den schlimmsten Warp-Fallen geschützt. Die KI der Bibliotheksverwaltung bot uns kostenlos höchst wertvolle Daten an, darunter Karten von fernen Sternensystemen, anatomische Diagramme von seltenen Alien-Spezies und andere Fachliteratur.

column2: 'The library contained a single severe trap- a warp ray effector hidden in a wall. One our crewmembers took a hit and survived due to exotics consumed earlier.The library administration AI offered us highly valuable data for free.
column3: 'Die Bibliothek enthielt eine einzige schwere Falle - einen Warpstrahleffektor, der in einer Wand versteckt war. Eines unserer Crewmitglieder wurde getroffen und überlebte dank der zuvor konsumierten Exoten. Die KI der Bibliotheksverwaltung bot uns sehr wertvolle Daten kostenlos an.

column2: 'We investigated the halls and corridors of the library without finding any traps. Perhaps somebody benevolent has disabled all of them? The library administration AI offered us highly valuable data for free, including maps of faraway star systems, anatomical charts of rare alien species and other technical literature.
column3: 'Wir haben die Hallen und Gänge der Bibliothek untersucht, ohne irgendwelche Fallen zu finden. Vielleicht hat jemand Wohlwollendes sie alle ausgeschaltet? Die KI der Bibliotheksverwaltung bot uns kostenlos höchst wertvolle Daten an, darunter Karten von fernen Sternensystemen, anatomische Karten von seltenen Alien-Spezies und andere Fachliteratur.

column2: 'A structure on the planet's surface is emitting some kind of uknown signal. The planet itself is uninteresting and lacks significant vegetation.
column3: 'Eine Struktur auf der Oberfläche des Planeten sendet eine Art unbekanntes Signal aus. Der Planet selbst ist uninteressant und hat keine nennenswerte Vegetation.

column2: 'The halls and corridors of the library were packed full of traps designed to permanently injure visitors, so that they would remember their quest for knowledge forever. The library administration AI offered us highly valuable data for free, including maps of faraway star systems, anatomical charts of rare alien species and other technical literature.
column3: 'Die Hallen und Gänge der Bibliothek waren voll mit Fallen, die darauf ausgelegt waren, die Besucher dauerhaft zu verletzen, damit sie sich für immer an ihre Suche nach Wissen erinnern würden. Die KI der Bibliotheksverwaltung bot uns kostenlos höchst wertvolle Daten an, darunter Karten von fernen Sternensystemen, anatomische Diagramme von seltenen Alien-Spezies und andere Fachliteratur.

column1: '1 P dome city broken advanced MT.prefab

column2: 'Ruins of advanced urban landscapes can be seen from orbit. It looks like a warzone between some of the elder species. No signs of life detected. Immense size gives the planet a high-gravity field.
column3: 'Aus dem Orbit sind Ruinen von hochentwickelten Stadtlandschaften zu sehen. Es sieht aus wie ein Kriegsgebiet zwischen einigen der älteren Spezies. Keine Anzeichen von Leben entdeckt. Die enorme Größe verleiht dem Planeten ein hohes Schwerefeld.

column2: 'The urban ruins were full of mines, automated defence turrets and partially active warbots. Fortunately, we had no casualties and our operatives hauled back two pieces of technology. Further exploration was deemed too dangerous and we've decided to move on.
column3: 'Die städtischen Ruinen waren voll mit Minen, automatisierten Verteidigungstürmen und teilweise aktiven Warbots. Glücklicherweise gab es keine Verluste und unsere Agenten konnten zwei Teile der Technologie zurückholen. Eine weitere Erkundung wurde als zu gefährlich erachtet und wir haben beschlossen, weiterzuziehen.

column2: 'Our scavengers were ambushed by advanced war bots hiding in the ruins. We decided to leave this planet after recovering the surviving operatives and what little they gathered.
column3: 'Unsere Plünderer gerieten in einen Hinterhalt von fortschrittlichen War Bots, die sich in den Ruinen versteckten. Wir beschlossen, diesen Planeten zu verlassen, nachdem wir die überlebenden Agenten und das Wenige, was sie gesammelt hatten, geborgen hatten.

column2: 'Broken habitation domes dot the landscape. Signs of thermonuclear and heavy energy warfare are visible everywhere. This place could be full of hazardous conflict remains. Unknown urban technology patterns require the presence of crew for a successful salvage mission.
column3: 'Zerstörte Wohnkuppeln übersäen die Landschaft. Zeichen der thermonuklearen und schweren Energie Kriegsführung sind überall sichtbar. Dieser Ort könnte voll von gefährlichen Konfliktresten sein. Unbekannte urbane Technologiemuster erfordern die Anwesenheit einer Besatzung für eine erfolgreiche Bergungsmission.

column2: 'We were ambushed by advanced war bots hiding in the ruins. Our scavenger team received multiple hits before neutralizing the threat. We decided the planet was too dangerous to continue the operation.
column3: 'Wir gerieten in einen Hinterhalt von fortschrittlichen War Bots, die sich in den Ruinen versteckten. Unser Scavenger-Team erhielt mehrere Treffer, bevor wir die Bedrohung neutralisieren konnten. Wir entschieden, dass der Planet zu gefährlich war, um die Operation fortzusetzen.

column2: 'It seems this planet has been looted countless times in the past, as valuable materials seem to be scavenged from almost every object of interest we spotted. There was little left to take.
column3: 'Es scheint, als wäre dieser Planet in der Vergangenheit unzählige Male geplündert worden, denn von fast jedem Objekt von Interesse, das wir entdeckten, scheinen wertvolle Materialien erbeutet worden zu sein. Es gab nur noch wenig, was wir mitnehmen konnten.

column1: '1 P exotics mine, guarded by satellites M.prefab

column2: 'We successfully detonate the security gates of the mine. It seems mining was temporarily put on hold here and never resumed. There were several exotic mineral seams exposed and our bots mined from there until they no longer could. The operation was a big success.
column3: 'Wir sprengen erfolgreich die Sicherheitstore der Mine. Es scheint, dass der Bergbau hier vorübergehend eingestellt und nie wieder aufgenommen wurde. Es wurden mehrere exotische Mineralienflöze freigelegt und unsere Bots bauten dort ab, bis sie nicht mehr konnten. Die Operation war ein großer Erfolg.

column2: 'The mining site is a mountain of hardstone with a tunnel going in. Markings indicate it's an exotics mine. The tunnel leads to a thick crysteel security door within the tunnel. We need to get it open before proceeding.
column3: 'Die Abbaustelle ist ein Berg aus Hartgestein mit einem Tunnel, der hineinführt. Markierungen weisen darauf hin, dass es sich um eine Exoten-Mine handelt. Der Tunnel führt zu einer dicken Sicherheitstür aus Kristallstahl im Tunnel. Wir müssen sie öffnen, bevor wir weitergehen.

column2: '"We do not have enough resources needed for the task."
column3: '"Wir haben nicht genügend Ressourcen, die für die Aufgabe benötigt werden."

column2: 'We successfully cut through the security door. It seems mining was temporarily put on hold here and never resumed. There were several exposed seams of exotic minerals and our bots mined from there until they no longer could. The operation was a big success.
column3: 'Wir haben die Sicherheitstür erfolgreich durchbrochen. Es scheint, dass der Bergbau hier vorübergehend unterbrochen und nie wieder aufgenommen wurde. Es gab mehrere freiliegende Flöze mit exotischen Mineralien und unsere Bots bauten dort ab, bis sie nicht mehr konnten. Die Operation war ein großer Erfolg.

column2: '"Warning. Access to this mining planet is restricted to Intelligent Banks TM authorized vessels. Failure to respect property borders will result in attack by orbital defences."
column3: '"Warnung. Der Zugang zu diesem Bergbauplaneten ist auf von Intelligent Banks TM autorisierte Schiffe beschränkt. Die Nichteinhaltung der Eigentumsgrenzen führt zu einem Angriff der orbitalen Verteidigung."

column2: 'We managed to destroy the defence satellites. Their weapons were too short-ranged to reach us.
column3: 'Es gelang uns, die Verteidigungssatelliten zu zerstören. Ihre Waffen hatten eine zu kurze Reichweite, um uns zu erreichen.

column2: 'We send a swarm of cheaply printed long-range missiles towards the planet. The satellites prove to be equipped with point-defences, picking off some of our missiles before they reach the target.
column3: 'Wir schicken einen Schwarm billig gedruckter Langstreckenraketen in Richtung des Planeten. Es stellt sich heraus, dass die Satelliten mit Punktabwehrsystemen ausgestattet sind und einige unserer Raketen abschießen, bevor sie das Ziel erreichen.

column2: 'We were able to destroy some of the satellites, but a number of them remain functional. Next action?
column3: 'Wir konnten einige der Satelliten zerstören, aber eine Reihe von ihnen bleibt funktionsfähig. Nächste Aktion?

column2: 'We close in on the planet, shooting the remaining defence satellites with everything we've got. We manage to destroy all the satellites despite counterfire.
column3: 'Wir nähern uns dem Planeten und beschießen die verbliebenen Verteidigungssatelliten mit allem, was wir haben. Trotz Gegenfeuer gelingt es uns, alle Satelliten zu zerstören.

column2: 'We close in on the planet, shooting the remaining defence satellites with everything we've got. We receive minor counterfire but manage to destroy all satellites.
column3: 'Wir nähern uns dem Planeten und beschießen die verbliebenen Verteidigungssatelliten mit allem, was wir haben. Wir erhalten geringen Gegenbeschuss, schaffen es aber, alle Satelliten zu zerstören.

column2: 'Our demolition experts misjudged the optimal placement of explosives, failing to crack the tough armor of the outpost. We may try again.
column3: 'Unsere Sprengstoffexperten haben die optimale Platzierung der Sprengladungen falsch eingeschätzt und es nicht geschafft, die harte Panzerung des Außenpostens zu knacken. Wir versuchen es vielleicht noch einmal.

column2: 'The hardness of the mountain stone proved to be slightly different than expected, resulting in total collapse of the tunnel and a large part of the mountain. The mine has become inacessible so we at least scavenged the door.
column3: 'Die Härte des Berggesteins erwies sich als etwas anders als erwartet, was zu einem totalen Einsturz des Tunnels und eines großen Teils des Berges führte. Die Mine ist unzugänglich geworden, so dass wir zumindest die Tür zurechtgeschliffen  haben.

column2: 'The dominating plants on this planet grow enormous pods filled with oily substance as fruit. Analysis indicates the fruit oil can be processed into starfuel, as it carries a small warp charge. Harvest the starfuel fruits?
column3: 'Die vorherrschenden Pflanzen auf diesem Planeten bilden riesige Schoten aus, die mit einer öligen Substanz als Frucht gefüllt sind. Die Analyse zeigt, dass das Fruchtöl zu Sternentreibstoff verarbeitet werden kann, da es eine kleine Warp-Ladung trägt. Die Sternentreibstoff-Früchte ernten?

column2: 'Research & Mass harvest [ecological damage to planet expected]
column3: 'Forschung & Massenernte [ökologische Schäden auf dem Planeten erwartet]

column2: 'Research only, leave this beautiful world untouched
column3: 'Nur Forschung, lassen wir diese schöne Welt unangetastet

column2: 'Disengage and come back later, our resource containers are too full
column3: 'Lösen Sie sich ab und kommen Sie später wieder, unsere Ressourcenbehälter sind zu voll

column2: 'Research, harvest and processing of organics completed. Natural life that grows abundant FTL fuel elements are almost groundbreaking, and could one day revolutionize fuel production. Research data from here is very valuable.
column3: 'organischen Stoffen abgeschlossen. Natürliches Leben, das reichlich FTL-Brennelemente wächst, sind fast bahnbrechend und könnten eines Tages die Brennstoffproduktion revolutionieren. Forschungsdaten von hier sind sehr wertvoll.

column2: 'Harvesting completed successfully, and we discovered something interesting during the operation.
column3: 'Wir haben die Ernte erfolgreich abgeschlossen, und wir haben während des Betriebs etwas Interessantes entdeckt.

column2: 'We leave the ecosystem of this planet untouched. Natural life that grows abundant FTL fuel elements are almost groundbreaking, and could one day revolutionize fuel production. Research data from here is very valuable.
column3: 'Wir lassen das Ökosystem dieses Planeten unangetastet. Natürliches Leben, das reichlich FTL-Treibstoffelemente wachsen lässt, sind geradezu bahnbrechend und könnten eines Tages die Treibstoffproduktion revolutionieren. Forschungsdaten von hier sind sehr wertvoll.

column2: 'We spotted a small warp animal hovering above a local forest. We could try to kill it, in order to analyze and scavenge its remains. All warp animals are dangerous, but this one is alone and probably young, judging from its small size.
column3: 'Wir entdeckten ein kleines Warptier, das über einem örtlichen Wald schwebte. Wir könnten versuchen, es zu töten, um seine Überreste zu analysieren und zu plündern. Alle Warptiere sind gefährlich, aber dieses ist allein und wahrscheinlich jung, wenn man nach seiner geringen Größe urteilt.

column2: 'The warp animal put up a tough fight. It critically damaged our ship and caused internal bleeding to numerous crewmembers. The creature's belly contained half-digested metal.
column3: 'Das Warptier hat einen harten Kampf geliefert. Es beschädigte unser Schiff schwer und verursachte bei zahlreichen Crewmitgliedern innere Blutungen. Der Bauch der Kreatur enthielt halb verdautes Metall.

column2: 'The animal fought back with invisible warp energies that paralyzed or fried our missiles and other advanced equipment. It even tried to somehow remotely hack our AI, at which point we decided it was time to leave.
column3: 'Das Tier schlug mit unsichtbaren Warpenergien zurück, die unsere Raketen und andere fortschrittliche Ausrüstung lähmten oder froren. Es versuchte sogar, irgendwie unsere KI aus der Ferne zu hacken, woraufhin wir beschlossen, dass es Zeit war zu gehen.

column2: 'Local ecosystem is full of strange plants. The entire planet seems to carry faint traces of warp energy. Researching the ecosystem will likely generate some value in data creds.
column3: 'Das lokale Ökosystem ist voll von seltsamen Pflanzen. Der gesamte Planet scheint schwache Spuren von Warpenergie zu tragen. Die Erforschung des Ökosystems wird wahrscheinlich einen gewissen Wert an Daten-Credits generieren.

column2: 'Send bots for scientific samples and leave this planet untouched.
column3: 'Schicken Sie Bots für wissenschaftliche Proben und lassen Sie den Planeten unberührt.

column2: 'Research, harvest and processing of organics completed. Natural FTL fuel element ecology is very rare, and could revolutionize fuel production one day. Research data from here is very valuable. Our operation accidentally killed innumerable individual organisms inhabiting the fruitpod forests, but the total ecosystem of the planet will probably shrug it off.
column3: 'Forschung, Ernte und Verarbeitung von organischen Stoffen abgeschlossen. Natürliche FTL-Brennelement-Ökologie ist sehr selten und könnte eines Tages die Brennstoffproduktion revolutionieren. Die Forschungsdaten von hier sind sehr wertvoll. Unsere Operation tötete versehentlich unzählige einzelne Organismen, die die Fruitpod-Wälder bewohnen, aber das Gesamtökosystem des Planeten wird es wohl verschmerzen können.

column2: 'Our operation was attacked by a swarm of warp animals emerging from the forest. They destroyed all our equipment and even damaged the ship, at which point we decided it was time to leave the planet.
column3: 'Unsere Operation wurde von einem Schwarm von Warptieren angegriffen, die aus dem Wald kamen. Sie zerstörten unsere gesamte Ausrüstung und beschädigten sogar das Schiff, woraufhin wir beschlossen, dass es Zeit war, den Planeten zu verlassen.

column2: 'We do not have enough resources needed for this operation.
column3: 'Wir haben nicht genügend Ressourcen, die für diese Operation benötigt werden.600

column1: '1 P Noncarbon life, metal mining and animal attacks.prefab

column2: 'Orbital scans reveal presence of vegetation. Strangely, the atmosphere contains only trace amounts of oxygen.
column3: 'Orbital-Scans zeigen das Vorhandensein von Vegetation. Seltsamerweise enthält die Atmosphäre nur Spuren von Sauerstoff.

column2: 'Local predators attacked our installations numerous times. The architecture was too strong for them to cause significant damage.
column3: 'Lokale Raubtiere griffen unsere Anlagen mehrfach an. Die Architektur war zu stark, als dass sie nennenswerten Schaden anrichten konnten.

column2: 'The planet hosts exclusively non-carbon life (including primitive animals), unsuitable for our purposes. However, we may set up temporary mining facilities to exploit titanium mineral seams near the surface. Keeping the operation ecological comes with a cost increase.
column3: 'Der Planet beherbergt ausschließlich kohlenstofffreies Leben (einschließlich primitiver Tiere), das für unsere Zwecke nicht geeignet ist. Wir können jedoch temporäre Bergbauanlagen errichten, um Titanmineralien nahe der Oberfläche abzubauen. Die Aufrechterhaltung des ökologischen Betriebs ist mit einem Kostenanstieg verbunden.

column2: 'Local animals attacked our installations numerous times. They managed to damage a mining drill which later malfunctioned and caused an injury to one of our engineers checking the device. Our research of the local life generated some xenodata.
column3: 'Einheimische Tiere griffen unsere Anlagen mehrfach an. Es gelang ihnen, einen Minenbohrer zu beschädigen, der später eine Fehlfunktion hatte und einen unserer Ingenieure, der das Gerät überprüfte, verletzte. Unsere Forschung des lokalen Lebens generierte einige Xenodaten.

column2: 'We mined as much as we can, given the circumstances. We may now recover most of the mining technology. However this would be an energy-intensive operation, and cost additional fuel.
column3: 'Wir haben so viel abgebaut, wie wir unter den gegebenen Umständen können. Wir können nun den größten Teil der Bergbautechnik zurückgewinnen. Dies wäre jedoch ein energieintensiver Vorgang und würde zusätzlichen Treibstoff kosten.

column2: 'We do not have the necessary resources to recover our equipment. We leave our printed tech deep in the ground, which may soon collapsepse - perhaps to be puzzled over by alien archeologists, thousands of years from now.
column3: 'Wir haben nicht die notwendigen Ressourcen, um unsere Ausrüstung zu bergen. Wir lassen unsere gedruckte Technologie tief in der Erde, die vielleicht schon bald zusammenbricht - vielleicht, um in Tausenden von Jahren von außerirdischen Archäologen erforscht zu werden.

column1: '1 P nuclear war ruins MFt, moonTm.prefab

column2: 'The planet is covered with ruins of primitive, probably digital-age civilization. Particular craters on the surface indicate the possibility that this civilization might have wiped themselves out in a nuclear war.
column3: 'Der Planet ist mit Ruinen einer primitiven, wahrscheinlich im digitalen Zeitalter lebenden Zivilisation bedeckt. Besondere Krater auf der Oberfläche deuten darauf hin, dass sich diese Zivilisation in einem Atomkrieg ausgelöscht haben könnte.

column2: 'One of our salvage crew somehow triggered an ancient atomic bomb during the operation. The person vaporized instantly, and others received serious injuries. We decided to move on and not take any further risks here.  'Einer unserer Bergungstrupps hat während des Einsatzes irgendwie eine alte Atombombe ausgelöst. Die Person verdampfte auf der Stelle, und andere erlitten schwere Verletzungen. Wir beschlossen, weiterzuziehen und hier keine weiteren Risiken einzugehen.
'We found an old nuke! Perhaps it is still functional?...
column3: 'Wir haben eine alte Atombombe gefunden! Vielleicht ist sie noch funktionstüchtig?...

column2: 'All remains of the past civilization were heavily degraded by time.
column3: 'Alle Überreste der vergangenen Zivilisation wurden durch die Zeit stark zersetzt.

column2: 'The structure was an automated military complex researching exotic weapons. It attacked us as we approached, but our counterfire destroyed all it's weapons. The remaining ruins yielded considerable salvage.
column3: 'Die Struktur war ein automatisierter Militärkomplex, der exotische Waffen erforschte. Es griff uns an, als wir uns näherten, aber unser Gegenfeuer zerstörte alle Waffen. Die verbleibenden Ruinen lieferten beträchtlichen Bergungsstoff.

column2: 'While leaving the planet, one of our intersystem exploration bots discovered that the nearby moon has an artificial structure.
column3: 'Beim Verlassen des Planeten entdeckte einer unserer Intersystem-Erkundungsbots, dass der nahe gelegene Mond eine künstliche Struktur hat.

column2: 'The structure proved to be a storage facility containing disassembled modular technology and numerous small containers of some kind of intoxicating brew.
column3: 'Die Struktur erwies sich als ein Lager, das zerlegte modulare Technik und zahlreiche kleine Behälter mit einer Art berauschendem Gebräu enthielt.

column2: 'The structure is an automated military complex with nuclear missile defences. Fortunately, its sensors are too primitive to detect us at this distance. We could send hackers down to the moon to try to take over all the assets in the base.
column3: 'Die Struktur ist ein automatisierter Militärkomplex mit nuklearen Raketenabwehrsystemen. Zum Glück sind seine Sensoren zu primitiv, um uns auf diese Entfernung zu entdecken. Wir könnten Hacker auf den Mond schicken, die versuchen, alle Anlagen der Basis zu übernehmen.

column2: 'Leave, this is not worth the risk
column3: 'Gehen Wir, das ist das Risiko nicht wert

column2: '"We do not have enough crew needed for the task."
column3: '"Wir haben nicht genug Personal für diese Aufgabe."

column2: 'The hackers were able to disable all facility defences, making the structure ready for scavenging. One of the salvaged memory cores contained data about the station executing orders to bombard the nearby planet to neutralize "lokale politische Bedrohungen" vor ein paar hundert Jahren.
column3: Die Hacker waren in der Lage, alle Verteidigungseinrichtungen der Anlage zu deaktivieren, so dass die Struktur für die Plünderung bereit war. Einer der geborgenen Speicherkerne enthielt Daten über die Station, die vor ein paar hundert Jahren den Befehl ausführte, den nahegelegenen Planeten zu bombardieren, um "lokale politische Bedrohungen" zu neutralisieren.

column2: 'Should we send a search & rescue operation for the missing crewmembers, most likely dead?
column3: 'Sollten wir eine Such- und Rettungsaktion für die vermissten, höchstwahrscheinlich toten Crewmitglieder starten?

column2: 'Leave. The missing crewmembers are most likely dead.
column3: 'Gehen Sie. Die vermissten Crewmitglieder sind höchstwahrscheinlich tot.

column2: 'We were able to locate and rescue one of the stranded crewmembers without losses. The other was found severely wounded. A few of our utility bots were also tactically sacrificed during the operation.
column3: 'Wir konnten eines der gestrandeten Besatzungsmitglieder ohne Verluste lokalisieren und retten. Das andere wurde schwer verwundet aufgefunden. Ein paar unserer Utility Bots wurden bei der Operation ebenfalls taktisch geopfert.

column2: 'Evac volunteers received serious damage, but were able to rescue the lost crewmembers without casualties.
column3: 'Die Evac-Freiwilligen wurden schwer beschädigt, konnten aber die verlorenen Besatzungsmitglieder ohne Verletzte retten.

column2: 'Should we disengage the military base? Some of the more emotional crewmembers suggest we annihilate the base with long-range weaponry.
column3: 'Sollen wir die Militärbasis auflösen? Einige der emotionaleren Crew-Mitglieder schlagen vor, die Basis mit Langstreckenwaffen zu vernichten.

column2: 'Destroy the base armaments with long-range weapons [-x explosives]
column3: 'Zerstören Sie die Basisbewaffnung mit Langstreckenwaffen [-x Sprengstoff]

column2: 'The military base activated its own long-range weaponry and started a fierce duel with our ship. Our superior technology allowed us to pick the base's defensive measures apart while receiving limited counterfire.
column3: 'Die Militärbasis aktivierte ihre eigenen Langstreckenwaffen und lieferte sich ein heftiges Duell mit unserem Schiff. Unsere überlegene Technologie erlaubte es uns, die Verteidigungsmaßnahmen der Basis zu zerpflücken und gleichzeitig begrenztes Gegenfeuer zu erhalten.

column2: 'Our hackers were ambushed by automated guardian bots of the facility! Contact was lost with the team while they were under direct heavy fire, sustaining multiple wounds.
column3: 'Unsere Hacker wurden von automatisierten Wächter-Bots der Anlage in einen Hinterhalt gelockt! Der Kontakt mit dem Team ging verloren, während sie direkt unter schwerem Beschuss standen und mehrere Wunden erlitten.

column2: 'Our crew found an ancient capital missile amongst the debris, but it was damaged beyond repair and had to be scrapped.
column3: 'Unsere Crew fand unter den Trümmern eine alte  Rakete, die jedoch irreparabel beschädigt war und verschrottet werden musste.

column2: 'All the crew that was left behind had preagreed that we should have the freedom to cut our losses in the face of high risks. We move on.
column3: 'Die gesamte zurückgebliebene Crew hatte sich darauf geeinigt, dass wir die Freiheit haben sollten, angesichts des hohen Risikos unsere Verluste zu begrenzen. Wir ziehen weiter.

column2: 'One of the salvaged memory cores contained data about the station executing orders to bombard the nearby planet to neutralize "local political threats" a few hundred years ago.
column3: 'Einer der geborgenen Speicherkerne enthielt Daten über die Station, die vor ein paar hundert Jahren den Befehl ausführte, den nahegelegenen Planeten zu bombardieren, um "lokale politische Bedrohungen" zu neutralisieren.

column2: 'Our crew found an ancient capital missile amongst the debris.
column3: 'Unsere Crew fand eine antike Langstreckenrakete unter den Trümmern...

column2: 'Incredibly, there is only a single organism on this planet. It is a strikingly beautiful giant tree that survives the desolate conditions by somehow drawing extra nutrients from the seam of exotic minerals under it. What should we do here?
column3: 'Incredibly, there is only a single organism on this planet. It is a strikingly beautiful giant tree that survives the desolate conditions by somehow drawing extra nutrients from the seam of exotic minerals under it. What should we do here?

column2: 'Research & replant tree, mine exotics [-25 fuel, send crew]
column3: 'Research & replant tree, mine exotics [-25 fuel, send crew]

column2: 'Research & harvest tree as organics, mine exotics [send crew]
column3: 'Research & harvest tree as organics, mine exotics [send crew]

column2: 'A small sample with research value was obtained from the tree. We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet otherwise untouched. Who knows what the tree will become, perhaps a heart to a tree civilization? Time will tell...
column3: 'A small sample with research value was obtained from the tree. We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet otherwise untouched. Who knows what the tree will become, perhaps a heart to a tree civilization? Time will tell...

column2: 'Despite some objections from the crew, the tree has been cut down, researched, and then processed into quality organics. We installed mining equipment in its place and mined all the acessible nanochromium. Others have died so that we may live.
column3: 'Despite some objections from the crew, the tree has been cut down, researched, and then processed into quality organics. We installed mining equipment in its place and mined all the acessible nanochromium. Others have died so that we may live.

column2: 'When our harvestor bots approached the tree, an unusually large warp worm emerged from underground and destroyed them with a single swipe of its tail. It then attacked our operatives surveying the operation. A shuttle was damaged and some of the crewmembers received critical injuries. This was a disaster and we aborted the mission after presence of several other worms was detected in the planet's atmosphere.
column3: 'When our harvestor bots approached the tree, an unusually large warp worm emerged from underground and destroyed them with a single swipe of its tail. It then attacked our operatives surveying the operation. A shuttle was damaged and some of the crewmembers received critical injuries. This was a disaster and we aborted the mission after presence of several other worms was detected in the planet's atmosphere.

column2: 'Our engineers constructed a huge device to dig out and replant the whole tree along with its major roots. We could not guarantee the tree surviving without access to exotic deposits, so we left some under its roots. A sample with research value was obtained from the tree.
column3: 'Our engineers constructed a huge device to dig out and replant the whole tree along with its major roots. We could not guarantee the tree surviving without access to exotic deposits, so we left some under its roots. A sample with research value was obtained from the tree.

column2: 'During the digging operations, an unusually large warp worm emerged from underground and destroyed most of the mining and replanting equipment. Our operatives were lucky to escape without significant injuries. Presence of several other worms was detected and we decided to move on without taking further risks.
column3: 'During the digging operations, an unusually large warp worm emerged from underground and destroyed most of the mining and replanting equipment. Our operatives were lucky to escape without significant injuries. Presence of several other worms was detected and we decided to move on without taking further risks.

column2: 'Strong electromagnetic interference prevents us from scanning the planet surface from orbit. We cannot see what's down there without entering the atmosphere.
column3: 'Strong electromagnetic interference prevents us from scanning the planet surface from orbit. We cannot see what's down there without entering the atmosphere.

column2: 'It seems somebody has strip-mined and mass-harvested this planet recently, leaving occasional Credits of dead vegetation behind. A full-scale operation here wouldn't be worth the cost.
column3: 'It seems somebody has strip-mined and mass-harvested this planet recently, leaving occasional Credits of dead vegetation behind. A full-scale operation here wouldn't be worth the cost.

column1: '1 P shipwreck in sand 2mt orbital mines.prefab

column2: 'This planet is a desolate ball of sand. But we've located a military shipwreck.
column3: 'This planet is a desolate ball of sand. But we've located a military shipwreck.

column2: 'We were able to scavenge some materials off the wreckage.
column3: 'We were able to scavenge some materials off the wreckage.

column2: 'One of the modules within the ship can be restored to working order. The ship's warpdrive, broken beyond repair, contained a large exotic crystal.
column3: 'One of the modules within the ship can be restored to working order. The ship's warpdrive, broken beyond repair, contained a large exotic crystal.

column2: 'Shortly after entering the atmosphere, we encountered a cloud of orbital mines, receiving minor damage. Probably forgotten remnants of an ancient battle.
column3: 'Shortly after entering the atmosphere, we encountered a cloud of orbital mines, receiving minor damage. Probably forgotten remnants of an ancient battle.

column2: 'This planet features extreme temperatures and intense volcanic activity. Initial scans suggest possibility of valuable minerals.
column3: 'This planet features extreme temperatures and intense volcanic activity. Initial scans suggest possibility of valuable minerals.

column2: 'Our bots discovered the atmospheric activity is too unpredictable to start a mining operation on this planet. However, they found a small crash-landed civilian ship which our engineers quickly scavenged. Incredibly, some of its technology is still usable.
column3: 'Our bots discovered the atmospheric activity is too unpredictable to start a mining operation on this planet. However, they found a small crash-landed civilian ship which our engineers quickly scavenged. Incredibly, some of its technology is still usable.

column2: 'During the operation, crystalline life forms emerged from the ground and destroyed our mining facilities. We've decided to move on.
column3: 'During the operation, crystalline life forms emerged from the ground and destroyed our mining facilities. We've decided to move on.

column2: 'Further analysis revealed that atmospheric activity is too unpredictable to start a mining operation on this planet. But it seems somebody has used the cover of the hostile atmosphere to hide a warehouse here. It was full of valuable metals, most likely stolen and stashed away by pirates.
column3: 'Further analysis revealed that atmospheric activity is too unpredictable to start a mining operation on this planet. But it seems somebody has used the cover of the hostile atmosphere to hide a warehouse here. It was full of valuable metals, most likely stolen and stashed away by pirates.

column2: 'We only found aestethical value on this planet. One of the crewmembers who coordinated the prospector bots later wrote a metaphorical poem about her burning desire for more sex. Others found it not metaphorical enough.
column3: 'We only found aestethical value on this planet. One of the crewmembers who coordinated the prospector bots later wrote a metaphorical poem about her burning desire for more sex. Others found it not metaphorical enough.

column1: '1 Pi Contemplator colony, INFINI autotrade C.prefab

column2: 'The Contemplators told us they've decided collectively to not answer any questions asked by their visitors. Instead, they shared with us two of the absolutely most interesting existential questions they had discovered, without giving any answers.
column3: 'The Contemplators told us they've decided collectively to not answer any questions asked by their visitors. Instead, they shared with us two of the absolutely most interesting existential questions they had discovered, without giving any answers.

column2: 'Automated bots meet us at the landing to give us an overview of our options. They explain that the dominant philosophical policy allows us to meet the locals only once. Interaction with the automated trade platform will remain open.
column3: 'Automated bots meet us at the landing to give us an overview of our options. They explain that the dominant philosophical policy allows us to meet the locals only once. Interaction with the automated trade platform will remain open.

column2: 'Some of our crew started to bleed a little from their eyes, but the Contemplators assured this is completely normal. The Hall of Questions left our representatives with profound new ways to realize they were fools on so many levels.
column3: 'Some of our crew started to bleed a little from their eyes, but the Contemplators assured this is completely normal. The Hall of Questions left our representatives with profound new ways to realize they were fools on so many levels.

column2: 'The Contemplators have collectively decided to not answer any questions asked by the visitors. Instead, our crew is invited to a poetry event. We hear some truly fine existential poetry and consume many exotic drugs. As we prepare to leave the next day, we are given a trained space pet and supplies as a gift.
column3: 'The Contemplators have collectively decided to not answer any questions asked by the visitors. Instead, our crew is invited to a poetry event. We hear some truly fine existential poetry and consume many exotic drugs. As we prepare to leave the next day, we are given a trained space pet and supplies as a gift.

column2: 'Trained space pet, gifted by the Contemplators. The creature deeply enjoys watering the flowers.
column3: 'Trained space pet, gifted by the Contemplators. The creature deeply enjoys watering the flowers.

column2: 'The locals invite us to try the Hall of Questions as part of their hospitality session. It is a techno-telepathic psychedelic learning machine...
column3: 'The locals invite us to try the Hall of Questions as part of their hospitality session. It is a techno-telepathic psychedelic learning machine...

column2: 'The Contemplators shared with us some of the existential questions they had arrived at, but spoke little of answers. As we were leaving, A group of locals approached us.
column3: 'The Contemplators shared with us some of the existential questions they had arrived at, but spoke little of answers. As we were leaving, A group of locals approached us.

column2: '"Thank you for participating. Your answer is cool. You focused on what's important instead of taking risks." The individual waves his staff, and we see a swarm of some kind of nanofoam bots landing our ship and repairing damage. We thank the locals and continue our journey.
column3: '"Thank you for participating. Your answer is cool. You focused on what's important instead of taking risks." The individual waves his staff, and we see a swarm of some kind of nanofoam bots landing our ship and repairing damage. We thank the locals and continue our journey.

column2: 'This planet is colonized by an advanced civilization, a multispecies community of philosophers calling themselves "The Contemplators". The galactic joke is that the Contemplators are in deep thought all the time because they do not know what they really want.
column3: 'This planet is colonized by an advanced civilization, a multispecies community of philosophers calling themselves "The Contemplators". The galactic joke is that the Contemplators are in deep thought all the time because they do not know what they really want.

column2: '"We are running a philosophical (completely ethical) experiment here with some of our visitors. Would you like to participate? If yes, then simply tell us if you would prefer a gift of information or matter. We will give you the gift. There is no hidden catch."
column3: '"We are running a philosophical (completely ethical) experiment here with some of our visitors. Would you like to participate? If yes, then simply tell us if you would prefer a gift of information or matter. We will give you the gift. There is no hidden catch."

column2: 'Our ship is broken, would you help us with this instead?
column3: 'Our ship is broken, would you help us with this instead?

column2: '"I knew it!" says one of the Contemplators to the others and they start making a funny noise, most likely the equivalent of laughing. They give us a package and leave.
column3: '"I knew it!" says one of the Contemplators to the others and they start making a funny noise, most likely the equivalent of laughing. They give us a package and leave.

column2: '"Wow, you're right!" says one of the Contemplators to the others and they start making a funny noise, most likely the equivalent of laughing. They present us a storage device the size of a rice grain, packed full of valuable xenodata.
column3: '"Wow, you're right!" says one of the Contemplators to the others and they start making a funny noise, most likely the equivalent of laughing. They present us a storage device the size of a rice grain, packed full of valuable xenodata.

column2: 'Respecting our choice, the Contemplators lead our ambassadors to a poetry event instead. We hear some truly fine existential poetry and consume many exotic substances. As we prepare to leave the next day, we are given a generous farewell gift.
column3: 'Respecting our choice, the Contemplators lead our ambassadors to a poetry event instead. We hear some truly fine existential poetry and consume many exotic substances. As we prepare to leave the next day, we are given a generous farewell gift.

column2: 'As we prepare to leave the next day, we are given a generous farewell gift.
column3: 'As we prepare to leave the next day, we are given a generous farewell gift.

column2: 'This planet is a colony of the Playii, a species of fairly advanced humanoids.\nThe Playii are famous because apparently, their entire population is playing or watching some kind of virtual multiplayer game. The game is so interesting they have lost all of their ambitions to achieve anything outside of their domed cities. They are taken care of by various robots and AIs.
column3: 'This planet is a colony of the Playii, a species of fairly advanced humanoids.\nThe Playii are famous because apparently, their entire population is playing or watching some kind of virtual multiplayer game. The game is so interesting they have lost all of their ambitions to achieve anything outside of their domed cities. They are taken care of by various robots and AIs.

column2: '"Sorry, but all locals are busy at the moment. I have been instructed to let you know we are currently not interested in any outside contact. Not respecting our expressed borders will trigger planetary defences. As a token of hospitality, we have prepared you a cargo container filled with local food and drugs. Have a good day."
column3: '"Sorry, but all locals are busy at the moment. I have been instructed to let you know we are currently not interested in any outside contact. Not respecting our expressed borders will trigger planetary defences. As a token of hospitality, we have prepared you a cargo container filled with local food and drugs. Have a good day."

column2: '"Sorry, but all locals are busy at the moment. Any interaction beyond this conversation is only possible if you participate in one of our games for guests. It is a very simple game."
column3: '"Sorry, but all locals are busy at the moment. Any interaction beyond this conversation is only possible if you participate in one of our games for guests. It is a very simple game."

column2: 'The game is about awareness. One of your people will land on our planet, they are given a briefing and then connected to an illusionary reality designed by our best artists. If they remember or figure out it's a game and not reality, they are sent back to you with gifts from our people who watched them play. If not, they get to play forever. We keep players alive for thousands of years.
column3: 'The game is about awareness. One of your people will land on our planet, they are given a briefing and then connected to an illusionary reality designed by our best artists. If they remember or figure out it's a game and not reality, they are sent back to you with gifts from our people who watched them play. If not, they get to play forever. We keep players alive for thousands of years.

column2: 'Somebody has to stay onboard while the other is away, so you need at least 2 crew for this operation. But you are alone in the ship. We may return if we have more crew, but we cannot do anything else here at the moment.
column3: 'Somebody has to stay onboard while the other is away, so you need at least 2 crew for this operation. But you are alone in the ship. We may return if we have more crew, but we cannot do anything else here at the moment.

column2: 'The Playii AI does not open a live commchannel, but sends you a short message: "The player has forgotten that they are in a game. The illusionary reality seemed too real and pleasant, so it might take them years or thousands of years to become aware that it's a play-reality. There's nothing more you can do here. We will take good care of the player. Have a safe journey."
column3: 'The Playii AI does not open a live commchannel, but sends you a short message: "The player has forgotten that they are in a game. The illusionary reality seemed too real and pleasant, so it might take them years or thousands of years to become aware that it's a play-reality. There's nothing more you can do here. We will take good care of the player. Have a safe journey."

column2: '{0} is in a more pleasant, but less real place now.
column3: '{0} is in a more pleasant, but less real place now.

column2: 'Our crewmember is with the Playii now.
column3: 'Our crewmember is with the Playii now.

column2: 'The Playii sends us a short message: "Your player did not forget that it's a game, but they requested to be returned into the illusionary reality because it was so pleasant. We have honoured their wish. There's nothing more you can do here. We will take good care of the player. Have a safe journey."
column3: 'The Playii sends us a short message: "Your player did not forget that it's a game, but they requested to be returned into the illusionary reality because it was so pleasant. We have honoured their wish. There's nothing more you can do here. We will take good care of the player. Have a safe journey."

column2: 'After waiting for a couple of hours, the crewmember is returned to our ship safely. The player is still in somewhat of a shock, because the experience seemingly lasted several years. The locals gave the player a container full of food as a reward - as a metaphor to reflect the player's hunger for pleasure they observed during the game.
column3: 'After waiting for a couple of hours, the crewmember is returned to our ship safely. The player is still in somewhat of a shock, because the experience seemingly lasted several years. The locals gave the player a container full of food as a reward - as a metaphor to reflect the player's hunger for pleasure they observed during the game.

column2: 'After waiting for a few hours, the crewmember is returned to our ship safely. The player is still in somewhat of a shock, because the experience seemingly lasted several years. The locals rewarded the player with a container full of gold - as a metaphor to reflect the player's greed they observed during the game.
column3: 'After waiting for a few hours, the crewmember is returned to our ship safely. The player is still in somewhat of a shock, because the experience seemingly lasted several years. The locals rewarded the player with a container full of gold - as a metaphor to reflect the player's greed they observed during the game.

column2: 'After waiting for a few hours, the crewmember is returned to our ship safely. The player is still in somewhat of a shock, because the experience seemingly lasted over ten years. The locals rewarded us with a piece of technology - as a metaphor to reflect the player's quest for knowledge observed during the game.
column3: 'After waiting for a few hours, the crewmember is returned to our ship safely. The player is still in somewhat of a shock, because the experience seemingly lasted over ten years. The locals rewarded us with a piece of technology - as a metaphor to reflect the player's quest for knowledge observed during the game.

column2: 'An alien shuttle approaches our ship and our volunteer goes aboard. We observe the shuttle leaving and soon entering atmosphere of the Playii planet. After a while, we get a message from our operative, informing us that they've ageed to all the rules and will start playing shortly. We must now wait.
column3: 'An alien shuttle approaches our ship and our volunteer goes aboard. We observe the shuttle leaving and soon entering atmosphere of the Playii planet. After a while, we get a message from our operative, informing us that they've ageed to all the rules and will start playing shortly. We must now wait.

column1: '1 Pi int fishermen, OR orbital mines.prefab

column2: 'The planet is completely covered with water, and is probably home to a lush ecosytem. Presence of sentients is likely due to ship-like objects spotted in the ocean. Send shuttles into atmosphere for a closer look?
column3: 'The planet is completely covered with water, and is probably home to a lush ecosytem. Presence of sentients is likely due to ship-like objects spotted in the ocean. Send shuttles into atmosphere for a closer look?

column2: 'After modelling their language and basic customs, our explorers make themselves known to the fishermen. It turns out they call themselves the Freemen, and hold freedom of each to choose their own companions in highest regard. They bring us cultural and edible gifts and offer a chance to catch some fish from their ocean.
column3: 'After modelling their language and basic customs, our explorers make themselves known to the fishermen. It turns out they call themselves the Freemen, and hold freedom of each to choose their own companions in highest regard. They bring us cultural and edible gifts and offer a chance to catch some fish from their ocean.

column2: 'Exploration team has verified the presence of an early civilization. It is divided into small tribes who spend only a fraction of their time fishing. Most of the life revolves around who shares a boat with whom and how tribes are formed. Surprisingly, the entire civilization seems to lack weapons or any notion of war. We might consider leaving such a rare Peace Culture undisturbed.
column3: 'Exploration team has verified the presence of an early civilization. It is divided into small tribes who spend only a fraction of their time fishing. Most of the life revolves around who shares a boat with whom and how tribes are formed. Surprisingly, the entire civilization seems to lack weapons or any notion of war. We might consider leaving such a rare Peace Culture undisturbed.

column2: 'There are no guaranteed best practices on how to deal with undeveloped civilizations. But one which has reached such a harmonious style of life in so early a level of technological development shows great potential. We can only guess to what level of grandeur this civilization might evolve when left to themselves.
column3: 'There are no guaranteed best practices on how to deal with undeveloped civilizations. But one which has reached such a harmonious style of life in so early a level of technological development shows great potential. We can only guess to what level of grandeur this civilization might evolve when left to themselves.
