column2: 'Our operatives carefully and ecologically harvest some plant parts and sea animal eggs, without disturbing the local biodiversity balance or killing any fully developed organisms. Research on the local civilization created much xenodata.
column3: 'Our operatives carefully and ecologically harvest some plant parts and sea animal eggs, without disturbing the local biodiversity balance or killing any fully developed organisms. Research on the local civilization created much xenodata.

column2: 'Large-scale biomass harvesting results in considerable yields. The Freemen hold a ritual of compassion to commemorate all the killed sea animals. Researching the local civilization creates much valuable xenodata.
column3: 'Large-scale biomass harvesting results in considerable yields. The Freemen hold a ritual of compassion to commemorate all the killed sea animals. Researching the local civilization creates much valuable xenodata.

column2: 'As our expedition was setting up facilities for large-scale biomass harvesting, an ancient warp animal emerged from the depths. It produced an energy beam which first destroyed all the harvesting equipment we set up, and then targeted our Mothership in orbit. We escaped in a hurry, leaving Freemen to attempt communication with the animal.
column3: 'As our expedition was setting up facilities for large-scale biomass harvesting, an ancient warp animal emerged from the depths. It produced an energy beam which first destroyed all the harvesting equipment we set up, and then targeted our Mothership in orbit. We escaped in a hurry, leaving Freemen to attempt communication with the animal.

column2: 'Shortly after entering the atmosphere, we encountered a swarm of mines that attached themselves to our ship hull and exploded, causing minor damage. Perhaps somebody is trying to protect this planet?
column3: 'Shortly after entering the atmosphere, we encountered a swarm of mines that attached themselves to our ship hull and exploded, causing minor damage. Perhaps somebody is trying to protect this planet?

column2: 'Closer inspection proved the objects to be giant, majestic animals swimming near the surface. Though not sentient, killing developed animals for food is generally not accepted in advanced cultures due to easily available and high quality artificially grown or printed food. However, we could easily send our bots into the ocean to eco-harvest plant seeds and animal eggs.
column3: 'Closer inspection proved the objects to be giant, majestic animals swimming near the surface. Though not sentient, killing developed animals for food is generally not accepted in advanced cultures due to easily available and high quality artificially grown or printed food. However, we could easily send our bots into the ocean to eco-harvest plant seeds and animal eggs.

column2: 'Hunt the giant serpents, they look tasty [send crew]
column3: 'Hunt the giant serpents, they look tasty [send crew]

column2: 'Further research uncovered that the giant creatures are approaching presentience. They have a complex communication system that uses swimming patterns as language, and they are already using primitive tools (skulls of dead serpents as helmets). We also uncovered a valuable artifact from the sea bottom.
column3: 'Further research uncovered that the giant creatures are approaching presentience. They have a complex communication system that uses swimming patterns as language, and they are already using primitive tools (skulls of dead serpents as helmets). We also uncovered a valuable artifact from the sea bottom.

column2: 'As our crew was midway through hunting the serpents with shuttles and bots, a warp animal appeared from the depths of the ocean. The energy beam it produced targeted our shuttles, bots and even the ship itself orbiting the planet. We stopped the operation midway and evacuated, leaving the killed serpents behind.
column3: 'As our crew was midway through hunting the serpents with shuttles and bots, a warp animal appeared from the depths of the ocean. The energy beam it produced targeted our shuttles, bots and even the ship itself orbiting the planet. We stopped the operation midway and evacuated, leaving the killed serpents behind.

column2: 'Some of the team expressed contempt at your choice and refused to participate in the hunt. The serpents tried to escape by submerging into the depths, but your team was still able to kill and bring back several smaller and slower individuals.
column3: 'Some of the team expressed contempt at your choice and refused to participate in the hunt. The serpents tried to escape by submerging into the depths, but your team was still able to kill and bring back several smaller and slower individuals.

column2: 'Your crew collectively votes against the decision. They refuse to hunt the majestic creatures, even if it means spending the next weeks hungry.
column3: 'Your crew collectively votes against the decision. They refuse to hunt the majestic creatures, even if it means spending the next weeks hungry.

column2: 'We discovered the floating objects to be giant exotic creatures! With immense invisible bubbles of warp null charge around them, approach with digital technology was impossible. We carried out remote research and attempted contact, but the creatures did not respond. Our crew thinks they might have evolved from settled warp animals.
column3: 'We discovered the floating objects to be giant exotic creatures! With immense invisible bubbles of warp null charge around them, approach with digital technology was impossible. We carried out remote research and attempted contact, but the creatures did not respond. Our crew thinks they might have evolved from settled warp animals.

column2: 'Further research uncovered that the giant creatures are approaching presentience. They have a complex communication system that uses swimming patterns as language, and they are already using primitive tools (skulls of dead serpents as helmets, worn in their mating rituals).
column3: 'Further research uncovered that the giant creatures are approaching presentience. They have a complex communication system that uses swimming patterns as language, and they are already using primitive tools (skulls of dead serpents as helmets, worn in their mating rituals).

column2: 'The planet surface is almost exclusively covered with lifeless deserts and dangerous sand storms. Some structures seem to be artificially made, suggesting a possibility of hidden intelligent life. Enter the atmosphere to find the local sentients?
column3: 'The planet surface is almost exclusively covered with lifeless deserts and dangerous sand storms. Some structures seem to be artificially made, suggesting a possibility of hidden intelligent life. Enter the atmosphere to find the local sentients?

column2: 'The locals celebrate their newfound freedom to roam the planet surface, and bring us many edible maggots as a gift. We spend some more time to research their civilization before moving on.
column3: 'The locals celebrate their newfound freedom to roam the planet surface, and bring us many edible maggots as a gift. We spend some more time to research their civilization before moving on.

column2: 'After our ambassadors ask if the locals need any help, they explain that they've been forced to live underground for generations because a giant monster regularly appears and kills anybody on the surface. They ask us to kill the monster, which lives somewhere in the mountains.
column3: 'After our ambassadors ask if the locals need any help, they explain that they've been forced to live underground for generations because a giant monster regularly appears and kills anybody on the surface. They ask us to kill the monster, which lives somewhere in the mountains.

column2: 'Send a hunter-killer team into the mountains [at least 3 crew required]
column3: 'Send a hunter-killer team into the mountains [at least 3 crew required]

column2: '"We do not have enough explosives needed for this operation."
column3: '"We do not have enough explosives needed for this operation."

column2: 'Tarny bots of our hunting party are lucky to discover the entity. It is an ancient autonomous military robot, seemingly in active combat mode. It has not discovered us yet.
column3: 'Tarny bots of our hunting party are lucky to discover the entity. It is an ancient autonomous military robot, seemingly in active combat mode. It has not discovered us yet.

column2: 'Recall team, precision-bomb robot from orbit [-40 explosives]
column3: 'Recall team, precision-bomb robot from orbit [-40 explosives]

column2: 'Maximize salvaged tech and engage with assault team
column3: 'Maximize salvaged tech and engage with assault team

column2: 'Maximize salvaged tech and engage with ship weapons from tactical distance
column3: 'Maximize salvaged tech and engage with ship weapons from tactical distance

column2: 'Mothership prints and expels a rain of munitions on the robot, but it is able to intercept all attacks with its powerful energy weapons.
column3: 'Mothership prints and expels a rain of munitions on the robot, but it is able to intercept all attacks with its powerful energy weapons.

column2: 'We were able to destroy the robot and leave its weapons intact, but we took critical damage. The locals reward us with a small pile of their most popular food, insect cakes.
column3: 'We were able to destroy the robot and leave its weapons intact, but we took critical damage. The locals reward us with a small pile of their most popular food, insect cakes.

column2: 'We were able to destroy the robot while leaving some of its technology intact. Most importantly, we lost nothing but bots and equipment. The locals reward us with their most popular food, insect cakes.
column3: 'We were able to destroy the robot while leaving some of its technology intact. Most importantly, we lost nothing but bots and equipment. The locals reward us with their most popular food, insect cakes.

column2: 'We were able to destroy the robot without casualties. The locals reward us with their most healthy food, dried mind-enhancing mushrooms.
column3: 'We were able to destroy the robot without casualties. The locals reward us with their most healthy food, dried mind-enhancing mushrooms.

column2: '"We do not have enough crew needed for this operation."
column3: '"We do not have enough crew needed for this operation."

column2: 'Our ship engages the robot at a cautious distance but the bot is able to fire back even from maximum range. In the end, all its advanced armor proved no match for ship-class tactical firepower. Its technology was reduced to unidentifiable Credits in the process.
column3: 'Our ship engages the robot at a cautious distance but the bot is able to fire back even from maximum range. In the end, all its advanced armor proved no match for ship-class tactical firepower. Its technology was reduced to unidentifiable Credits in the process.

column2: 'The locals can now start rediscovering the surface world. They give us a hundred pots of their "most magic" delicacy, dried and heavily spiced sandworms. Later analysis proves the spicy food had exotic properties, permanently increasing health, appetite and sexual drive of the crew.
column3: 'The locals can now start rediscovering the surface world. They give us a hundred pots of their "most magic" delicacy, dried and heavily spiced sandworms. Later analysis proves the spicy food had exotic properties, permanently increasing health, appetite and sexual drive of the crew.

column2: 'Orbital precision bombardment managed to overwhelm the robot's interception capacity and destroy it. We salvaged some valuable materials from the remains.
column3: 'Orbital precision bombardment managed to overwhelm the robot's interception capacity and destroy it. We salvaged some valuable materials from the remains.

column2: 'The robot intercepted some of our ordinance, but was eventually overwhelmed and reduced to unrecognizeable pieces.
column3: 'The robot intercepted some of our ordinance, but was eventually overwhelmed and reduced to unrecognizeable pieces.

column2: 'Extensive orbital bombardment has reduced the target mountains and any of its inhabitants to rubble and molten minerals. Our scans find no trace of any hostiles and we deem the operation a success.
column3: 'Extensive orbital bombardment has reduced the target mountains and any of its inhabitants to rubble and molten minerals. Our scans find no trace of any hostiles and we deem the operation a success.

column2: 'Our operatives take positions and attack. During the battle, one of the crewmembers communicated with another using outdated encryption codes, resulting in the robot discovering the operatives and killing both of them seconds later.
column3: 'Our operatives take positions and attack. During the battle, one of the crewmembers communicated with another using outdated encryption codes, resulting in the robot discovering the operatives and killing both of them seconds later.

column2: 'Our operatives take positions and attack. During the battle, one of the crewmembers communicated with others using outdated encryption codes, resulting in the robot discovering the operative, killing him seconds later.
column3: 'Our operatives take positions and attack. During the battle, one of the crewmembers communicated with others using outdated encryption codes, resulting in the robot discovering the operative, killing him seconds later.

column2: 'Our operatives take defensive positions and launch an attack against the robot, assisted by scouting bots and remote equipment.
column3: 'Our operatives take defensive positions and launch an attack against the robot, assisted by scouting bots and remote equipment.

column2: 'One of the sand structures proved indeed to be artificial - it's a hidden entrance to a network of underground caves.
column3: 'One of the sand structures proved indeed to be artificial - it's a hidden entrance to a network of underground caves.

column2: 'We've found the locals - a primitive civilization of underground maggot farmers. After analyzing their culture, our team decided to contact them. Everything went smoothly and the locals held a welcoming ceremony for us.
column3: 'We've found the locals - a primitive civilization of underground maggot farmers. After analyzing their culture, our team decided to contact them. Everything went smoothly and the locals held a welcoming ceremony for us.

column2: 'Our slow utility bots are not suitable to engage predators in caves and we must send an assault team to clear out the animals - if we want to explore these caves deeper. The animals probably wouldn't be able to penetrate the armored suits of our crew.
column3: 'Our slow utility bots are not suitable to engage predators in caves and we must send an assault team to clear out the animals - if we want to explore these caves deeper. The animals probably wouldn't be able to penetrate the armored suits of our crew.

column2: 'Our recon bots have been attacked by local cave life. These unknown tentacled predators managed to grab and crush a few before the bots managed to exit the cave.
column3: 'Our recon bots have been attacked by local cave life. These unknown tentacled predators managed to grab and crush a few before the bots managed to exit the cave.

column2: 'Our operatives managed to track down the pack of aggressive predators. The animals were powerful and Tarny, but ultimately proved no match for the advanced sensor and weapon systems of our operatives. We collected their remains for research & processing.
column3: 'Our operatives managed to track down the pack of aggressive predators. The animals were powerful and Tarny, but ultimately proved no match for the advanced sensor and weapon systems of our operatives. We collected their remains for research & processing.

column2: 'The sandstone structures proved to be just sediment. Our ship AI happens to collect grains of sand as a hobby, and got a new one for her collection.
column3: 'The sandstone structures proved to be just sediment. Our ship AI happens to collect grains of sand as a hobby, and got a new one for her collection.

column2: 'The sandstone structures proved to be ruins of a primitive civilization long gone. Their pictographic writings talk about an ecological catastrophy, but most of their writing has been eroded by time and sand.
column3: 'The sandstone structures proved to be ruins of a primitive civilization long gone. Their pictographic writings talk about an ecological catastrophy, but most of their writing has been eroded by time and sand.

column2: 'The underground cave complex led to a survival facility full of dead humanoids. Unfortunately, the bunker has been overrun by the predators we met earlier, and no survivors remain. We scavenge everything of value.
column3: 'The underground cave complex led to a survival facility full of dead humanoids. Unfortunately, the bunker has been overrun by the predators we met earlier, and no survivors remain. We scavenge everything of value.

column2: 'After our ambassadors ask if the locals need any help, the Jen-Bau explain they have, as a civilization, finally reached the pinnacle of their development, growing maggots underground and experiencing true peace. So no help needed.
column3: 'After our ambassadors ask if the locals need any help, the Jen-Bau explain they have, as a civilization, finally reached the pinnacle of their development, growing maggots underground and experiencing true peace. So no help needed.

column2: 'The sandstone structures prove to be ruins of a primitive civilization long gone. Their pictographic writings talk about an ecological catastrophe, but most of the writing has been eroded by time.
column3: 'The sandstone structures prove to be ruins of a primitive civilization long gone. Their pictographic writings talk about an ecological catastrophe, but most of the writing has been eroded by time.

column2: 'It seems somebody dropped a known bioweapon on the planet a few hundred years ago, perhaps to wipe out the local sentients. The weapon is called "Stone Lisk", and it is a colossal biotech lizard with mineral armor, making it almost impervious to primitive weapons. Fortunately, it did not have a chance against our ship weapons.
column3: 'It seems somebody dropped a known bioweapon on the planet a few hundred years ago, perhaps to wipe out the local sentients. The weapon is called "Stone Lisk", and it is a colossal biotech lizard with mineral armor, making it almost impervious to primitive weapons. Fortunately, it did not have a chance against our ship weapons.

column2: 'The planet is inhabited by a highly militarized industrial-era insectoid civilization, covered in cities and industrial areas. We are still in scanning when the locals send a warning to stay away from their property or else.
column3: 'The planet is inhabited by a highly militarized industrial-era insectoid civilization, covered in cities and industrial areas. We are still in scanning when the locals send a warning to stay away from their property or else.

column2: 'Disengage, but send Tarn bots to scout the planet
column3: 'Disengage, but send Tarn bots to scout the planet

column2: 'Disengage. This species has yet much to learn.
column3: 'Disengage. This species has yet much to learn.

column2: 'The local civilization is more advanced than we thought. They discovered & destroyed our scouting bots despite the Tarn technology we used.
column3: 'The local civilization is more advanced than we thought. They discovered & destroyed our scouting bots despite the Tarn technology we used.

column2: 'We commenced orbital bombardment of known leader locations, prompting the remaining warlords to capitulate. The rebuilding can start but much of the planet is now a nuclear wasteland. We confiscate their remaining nuclear stockpiles and worthy military technology.
column3: 'We commenced orbital bombardment of known leader locations, prompting the remaining warlords to capitulate. The rebuilding can start but much of the planet is now a nuclear wasteland. We confiscate their remaining nuclear stockpiles and worthy military technology.

column2: 'We underestimated the size of the planetary nuclear arsenals and accidentally caused a nuclear winter with our retaliation against them. Only a few pockets of survivors remain now and the planet's ecosystem, along with the entire civilization, is expected to undergo a major extinction event. We also received some damage ourselves. This is a disaster. At least it's kind of a good campfire story.
column3: 'We underestimated the size of the planetary nuclear arsenals and accidentally caused a nuclear winter with our retaliation against them. Only a few pockets of survivors remain now and the planet's ecosystem, along with the entire civilization, is expected to undergo a major extinction event. We also received some damage ourselves. This is a disaster. At least it's kind of a good campfire story.

column2: 'Our operatives successfully infiltrated the society of the militaristic insectoids. They were horrified to see the level of suffering that such a violence-based leadership produces in a civilization. At least now these poor fools have less nukes for killing each other.
column3: 'Our operatives successfully infiltrated the society of the militaristic insectoids. They were horrified to see the level of suffering that such a violence-based leadership produces in a civilization. At least now these poor fools have less nukes for killing each other.

column2: 'Many of our external bots and other rapidly printed tech was destroyed, but we were able to catch one of the larger nukes launched at us.
column3: 'Many of our external bots and other rapidly printed tech was destroyed, but we were able to catch one of the larger nukes launched at us.

column2: 'The local military leaders lose their cool, fearing that we are trying to manipulate them via communication. They shut all commchannels and launch primitive nuclear missiles against us from their ground bases.
column3: 'The local military leaders lose their cool, fearing that we are trying to manipulate them via communication. They shut all commchannels and launch primitive nuclear missiles against us from their ground bases.

column2: 'Leave this planet of fools, these slow nukes won't catch us
column3: 'Leave this planet of fools, these slow nukes won't catch us

column2: 'Attempt to hack and catch the nuclear missiles with printed bots & tech
column3: 'Attempt to hack and catch the nuclear missiles with printed bots & tech

column2: 'Military intervention, force local warlords to disarm
column3: 'Military intervention, force local warlords to disarm

column2: 'Their technology was better than expected and possibly even disguised to look more primitive. The rockets managed to destroy many of the bots sent to catch them, and one even reached our Mothership.
column3: 'Their technology was better than expected and possibly even disguised to look more primitive. The rockets managed to destroy many of the bots sent to catch them, and one even reached our Mothership.

column2: 'The locals launch a planetwide nuclear attack against our ship from their ground bases.
column3: 'The locals launch a planetwide nuclear attack against our ship from their ground bases.

column2: 'Leave this planet of fools, these slow missiles won't catch us
column3: 'Leave this planet of fools, these slow missiles won't catch us

column2: 'Try to catch some of the primitive missiles launched at us
column3: 'Try to catch some of the primitive missiles launched at us

column2: 'Annihilate the missile bases from orbit, force locals to disarm [-resources, +resources?]
column3: 'Annihilate the missile bases from orbit, force locals to disarm [-resources, +resources?]

column2: 'The local primitives are a bit more advanced than we thought, having reached an early digital era in the evolution of their civilization. Planetary defence bases are everywhere. Paranoid military leaders are typical for younger species. We could try to steal some of their nuclear weapons, but such an extensive operation requires crew to be sent to the planet.
column3: 'The local primitives are a bit more advanced than we thought, having reached an early digital era in the evolution of their civilization. Planetary defence bases are everywhere. Paranoid military leaders are typical for younger species. We could try to steal some of their nuclear weapons, but such an extensive operation requires crew to be sent to the planet.

column2: 'Send covert operatives to steal nuclear weapons [3 crew]
column3: 'Send covert operatives to steal nuclear weapons [3 crew]

column2: 'Our operatives were discovered and attacked in the final stages of the operation. Fortunately, advanced suits and a security bot protected them from the primitive projectile weapons of the attackers. Mission was aborted while some resources had already been smuggled out of the planet.
column3: 'Our operatives were discovered and attacked in the final stages of the operation. Fortunately, advanced suits and a security bot protected them from the primitive projectile weapons of the attackers. Mission was aborted while some resources had already been smuggled out of the planet.

column2: 'Our team was ambushed by the local forces during the operation. The attackers used anti-tank weaponry, causing critical injuries.
column3: 'Our team was ambushed by the local forces during the operation. The attackers used anti-tank weaponry, causing critical injuries.

column2: 'It turns out the locals have been attacked by aliens before. The military leaders remain unchanged and start a countdown to launching a nuclear attack against us. We decide to leave.
column3: 'It turns out the locals have been attacked by aliens before. The military leaders remain unchanged and start a countdown to launching a nuclear attack against us. We decide to leave.

column2: 'The locals proved to be friendly and ready to share various sensual pleasures. They did not want anything from us, except to hear our opinions and talk about life. Everybody felt energized by the visit, many decided they would like to return some day. The locals gave us a package of edibles plus some local fruits as a farewell gift.
column3: 'The locals proved to be friendly and ready to share various sensual pleasures. They did not want anything from us, except to hear our opinions and talk about life. Everybody felt energized by the visit, many decided they would like to return some day. The locals gave us a package of edibles plus some local fruits as a farewell gift.

column2: 'We land at the visitor center of the colony. Their representative welcomes us to freely explore the colony and meet their tree. The ancient organism is estimated to be about eighty thousand years old.
column3: 'We land at the visitor center of the colony. Their representative welcomes us to freely explore the colony and meet their tree. The ancient organism is estimated to be about eighty thousand years old.

column2: 'The locals were friendly and ready to share various sensual pleasures during the welcoming celebrations. One of the locals enjoyed the company of our crew so much that in the end, it was agreed the Tree Friend will join our mission. The locals gave us many farewell gifts.
column3: 'The locals were friendly and ready to share various sensual pleasures during the welcoming celebrations. One of the locals enjoyed the company of our crew so much that in the end, it was agreed the Tree Friend will join our mission. The locals gave us many farewell gifts.

column2: 'Ex-inhabitant of the Tree Friend colony. Claims a personal relationship with all plant life. Very peaceful.
column3: 'Ex-inhabitant of the Tree Friend colony. Claims a personal relationship with all plant life. Very peaceful.

column2: 'This planet is a colony of the "Tree Friends", a philosophic society comprised of various species joined by reverence of plant life and trees. The galactic community tends to make sexual jokes about them and plants.
column3: 'This planet is a colony of the "Tree Friends", a philosophic society comprised of various species joined by reverence of plant life and trees. The galactic community tends to make sexual jokes about them and plants.

column2: 'The locals proved to be friendly and ready to share various sensual pleasures. They gave us a self-contained package of organics as a farewell gift.
column3: 'The locals proved to be friendly and ready to share various sensual pleasures. They gave us a self-contained package of organics as a farewell gift.

column2: 'The Tree Friends proved to be ready to share various sensual pleasures with us. A local community leader invites anybody who wants to stay with them- everything necessary for life is free for all inhabitants and doing any work is completely voluntary - the usual arrangement for advanced societies.
column3: 'The Tree Friends proved to be ready to share various sensual pleasures with us. A local community leader invites anybody who wants to stay with them- everything necessary for life is free for all inhabitants and doing any work is completely voluntary - the usual arrangement for advanced societies.

column2: 'Ask supportively if any of our crew prefers to stay behind
column3: 'Ask supportively if any of our crew prefers to stay behind

column2: 'One of our crew indeed wanted to stay behind. The Tree Friends gave us a casket of edible fruits and seeds in support of our quest.
column3: 'One of our crew indeed wanted to stay behind. The Tree Friends gave us a casket of edible fruits and seeds in support of our quest.

column2: '{0} chose to stay with the Tree Friends.
column3: '{0} chose to stay with the Tree Friends.

column2: 'Your crew appreciated the opportunity, but everybody wanted to stay with the ship. The Tree friends provided us with a container full of dried mushrooms as a farewell gift.
column3: 'Your crew appreciated the opportunity, but everybody wanted to stay with the ship. The Tree friends provided us with a container full of dried mushrooms as a farewell gift.

column2: 'The welcoming celebrations surpassed our expectations. A variety of pleasures were deeply enjoyed by everyone, and one of our crew insisted on staying with the Tree Friends. The locals gave us some kind of secret "fruits of life" before we moved on, permanently boosting our immune systems and increasing physical endurance.
column3: 'The welcoming celebrations surpassed our expectations. A variety of pleasures were deeply enjoyed by everyone, and one of our crew insisted on staying with the Tree Friends. The locals gave us some kind of secret "fruits of life" before we moved on, permanently boosting our immune systems and increasing physical endurance.

column2: '{0} now lives amongst the Tree Friends.
column3: '{0} now lives amongst the Tree Friends.

column2: 'The locals were very open and ready to share various sensual pleasures during the welcoming celebrations. They gave us many farewell gifts, including a pet.
column3: 'The locals were very open and ready to share various sensual pleasures during the welcoming celebrations. They gave us many farewell gifts, including a pet.

column2: 'A gift from Tree friends. Understands how to water the flowers.
column3: 'A gift from Tree friends. Understands how to water the flowers.

column2: 'There is a very small station on the orbit of this otherwise uninteresting planet. It is sending a trader signal, but its credentials are unknown. This could be a trap or a meeting place for criminals.
column3: 'There is a very small station on the orbit of this otherwise uninteresting planet. It is sending a trader signal, but its credentials are unknown. This could be a trap or a meeting place for criminals.

column2: 'The station seems to be selling exclusively worthless junk, except for a shady pair of Gitchankis. They offer a five-barreled mystery mining laser for dirt cheap. No refunds, of course.
column3: 'The station seems to be selling exclusively worthless junk, except for a shady pair of Gitchankis. They offer a five-barreled mystery mining laser for dirt cheap. No refunds, of course.

column2: 'The module is delivered to Mothership cargo bay. It has five barrels as promised... but the fifth one doesn't do anything except increase power consumption. It seems somebody has partially repaired the broken barrel with explosive plastics... We remove that part.
column3: 'The module is delivered to Mothership cargo bay. It has five barrels as promised... but the fifth one doesn't do anything except increase power consumption. It seems somebody has partially repaired the broken barrel with explosive plastics... We remove that part.

column2: 'There is a very small station on the orbit of this otherwise uninteresting planet. It is sending a crude "DRONES FOR SALE" signal, but it's credentials are unknown.
column3: 'There is a very small station on the orbit of this otherwise uninteresting planet. It is sending a crude "DRONES FOR SALE" signal, but it's credentials are unknown.

column2: 'The station seems to be selling exclusively worthless junk, except for a shady pair of Gor-Mor. They offer us a mystery "biotech combat drone". No refunds, of course.
column3: 'The station seems to be selling exclusively worthless junk, except for a shady pair of Gor-Mor. They offer us a mystery "biotech combat drone". No refunds, of course.

column2: 'The station replica has exploded due to an internal self-destruct system triggered by our ship's recon bots. The techno-junk inside the replica scattered in all directions as shrapnel, causing minor damage to our ship and yielding salvage.
column3: 'The station replica has exploded due to an internal self-destruct system triggered by our ship's recon bots. The techno-junk inside the replica scattered in all directions as shrapnel, causing minor damage to our ship and yielding salvage.

column2: 'The weapon is delivered as promised. Closer inspection reveals a ripped off insectoid limb stuck in the weapon rotation machinery.
column3: 'The weapon is delivered as promised. Closer inspection reveals a ripped off insectoid limb stuck in the weapon rotation machinery.

column2: 'The drone proves to be a primitive combat animal capable of spitting acid.
column3: 'The drone proves to be a primitive combat animal capable of spitting acid.

column2: 'The entire structure proves to be a hollow plastic replica of a station filled with junk, to trick our sensors. Several boarding bots been detected landing on our ship's hull...
column3: 'The entire structure proves to be a hollow plastic replica of a station filled with junk, to trick our sensors. Several boarding bots been detected landing on our ship's hull...

column2: 'The "drone" proves to be just a pet slime. At least it does not eat much.
column3: 'The "drone" proves to be just a pet slime. At least it does not eat much.

column1: '1 wr. ancient unknown ship offline M.prefab

column2: 'The shipwreck is damaged beyond repair, no active systems or activity detected. Preliminary analysis suggests it is several thousand years old. Allow scavenging engineers to board the ship?
column3: 'The shipwreck is damaged beyond repair, no active systems or activity detected. Preliminary analysis suggests it is several thousand years old. Allow scavenging engineers to board the ship?

column2: 'Against all odds, one of the central components is not completely broken.
column3: 'Against all odds, one of the central components is not completely broken.

column2: 'Against all odds, a small Moleculaati was found aboard the vessel. Moleculaatis are intelligent, easily befriendable non-carbon creatures. It looks like this one could have been here for at least centuries, eating a chair or a lamp once every few years.
column3: 'Against all odds, a small Moleculaati was found aboard the vessel. Moleculaatis are intelligent, easily befriendable non-carbon creatures. It looks like this one could have been here for at least centuries, eating a chair or a lamp once every few years.

column2: 'Something exploded in the wreckage during the operation, probably an unused munition.
column3: 'Something exploded in the wreckage during the operation, probably an unused munition.

column1: '1 wr. online ship, turrets PD terran3, PD G1, combatsensor2.prefab

column2: 'Our sensors detect active technology within the wreckage but no life. The active systems could be automated defences.
column3: 'Our sensors detect active technology within the wreckage but no life. The active systems could be automated defences.

column2: 'Print disposable bots for a closer look [-20 synthethics]
column3: 'Print disposable bots for a closer look [-20 synthethics]

column2: 'Our hackers were launched at the ship aboard heavily armoured boarding shuttles and survived the point defence crossfire while approaching. Once inside, they discovered the ship was rather primitive and were able to disable it with little effort.
column3: 'Our hackers were launched at the ship aboard heavily armoured boarding shuttles and survived the point defence crossfire while approaching. Once inside, they discovered the ship was rather primitive and were able to disable it with little effort.

column2: 'We do not have the necessary crew for this operation. We will attempt disabling the defences from afar.
column3: 'We do not have the necessary crew for this operation. We will attempt disabling the defences from afar.

column2: 'Our hackers were launched at the ship on heavily armoured boarding shuttles. Despite this, one of them got critically hit during the approach. We lost contact with another soon after they entered the wreckage. We are sending rescue bots to see if we can save the lost operative.
column3: 'Our hackers were launched at the ship on heavily armoured boarding shuttles. Despite this, one of them got critically hit during the approach. We lost contact with another soon after they entered the wreckage. We are sending rescue bots to see if we can save the lost operative.

column2: 'We neutralized all of the ships point defence weapons with ranged precision fire. Something else exploded in the ship as well, unfortunately, reducing the ship to dispersed clouds of scrap.
column3: 'We neutralized all of the ships point defence weapons with ranged precision fire. Something else exploded in the ship as well, unfortunately, reducing the ship to dispersed clouds of scrap.

column2: 'We destroyed all of the ship's point defence weapons with ranged precision fire. Scavenging operation revelead an intact module inside the ship.
column3: 'We destroyed all of the ship's point defence weapons with ranged precision fire. Scavenging operation revelead an intact module inside the ship.

column2: 'The crewmember was discovered dead. A loss for the entire crew, but no time for mourning at the moment. We could try sending new hackers or just destroy the ship's weapons from a distance.
column3: 'The crewmember was discovered dead. A loss for the entire crew, but no time for mourning at the moment. We could try sending new hackers or just destroy the ship's weapons from a distance.

column2: 'Ask for 2 more volunteers to hack the ship
column3: 'Ask for 2 more volunteers to hack the ship

column2: 'Attempt to destroy remaining weapons from afar
column3: 'Attempt to destroy remaining weapons from afar

column2: 'Nobody volunteers for another hacking operation. We will attempt disabling the ship weapons from afar.
column3: 'Nobody volunteers for another hacking operation. We will attempt disabling the ship weapons from afar.

column2: 'The ship has a few defensive systems online, and they have opened fire at our bots. We may try to neutralize the automated weapons from afar, and risk breaking the entire vessel. Or we could risk sending a few crewmembers to hack the ship and get all its technology, without the danger of breaking it.
column3: 'The ship has a few defensive systems online, and they have opened fire at our bots. We may try to neutralize the automated weapons from afar, and risk breaking the entire vessel. Or we could risk sending a few crewmembers to hack the ship and get all its technology, without the danger of breaking it.

column2: 'Our bots were able to rescue the crewmember, despite point-defence crossfire. Since nobody else volunteered to hack the ship, our only option remains destroying its defensive systems with our ship weapons, and risking collateral damage to salvageable parts.
column3: 'Our bots were able to rescue the crewmember, despite point-defence crossfire. Since nobody else volunteered to hack the ship, our only option remains destroying its defensive systems with our ship weapons, and risking collateral damage to salvageable parts.

column2: 'The active technology was just backup memory systems running at minimal capacity. Two of the ship's modules are completely intact, no bodies discovered. We scrapped the entire vessel, and recovered our printed disposable bots as well.
column3: 'The active technology was just backup memory systems running at minimal capacity. Two of the ship's modules are completely intact, no bodies discovered. We scrapped the entire vessel, and recovered our printed disposable bots as well.

column2: 'The active technology was just backup memory systems running at minimal capacity. Two of the ship's modules are completely intact, no bodies discovered. We scrapped the entire vessel, and recovered our printed disposable bot as well.
column3: 'The active technology was just backup memory systems running at minimal capacity. Two of the ship's modules are completely intact, no bodies discovered. We scrapped the entire vessel, and recovered our printed disposable bot as well.

column2: 'Enemy automated defences opened fire when our ship approached. We returned fire...
column3: 'Enemy automated defences opened fire when our ship approached. We returned fire...

column2: 'Nobody volunteers for the operation. We will attempt disabling the defences from afar.
column3: 'Nobody volunteers for the operation. We will attempt disabling the defences from afar.

column2: 'It is a wrecked fuel tanker, looted of all valuable materials. The remaining metals and synthetics of the ship frame were too cheap to justify looting. However, a small cloud of leaked starfuel has been detected nearby.
column3: 'It is a wrecked fuel tanker, looted of all valuable materials. The remaining metals and synthetics of the ship frame were too cheap to justify looting. However, a small cloud of leaked starfuel has been detected nearby.

column2: 'No significant events. One crewmember felt a bit lonely during the operation, but that wasn't a big issue.
column3: 'No significant events. One crewmember felt a bit lonely during the operation, but that wasn't a big issue.

column2: 'We discovered a number of dead bodies during the operation. Probably pirate victims, as they were stripped of all valuables and implants. We gave them the recycling ritual.
column3: 'We discovered a number of dead bodies during the operation. Probably pirate victims, as they were stripped of all valuables and implants. We gave them the recycling ritual.

column2: 'There was something very wrong with the fuel, as it started melting our fueltanks from inside out, despite passing decontamination filters. We had to dump all of it, along with some of our own resources.
column3: 'There was something very wrong with the fuel, as it started melting our fueltanks from inside out, despite passing decontamination filters. We had to dump all of it, along with some of our own resources.

column1: '1 wr. stationx4 commercial, defectve mlaserx2, M.prefab

column2: 'It seems to be a wrecked commercial space station, no active systems detected.
column3: 'It seems to be a wrecked commercial space station, no active systems detected.

column2: 'Data records show armed pirate boarders forced their way into the station, killed everyone and looted the remains. Our scavenger team found only objects of low value.
column3: 'Data records show armed pirate boarders forced their way into the station, killed everyone and looted the remains. Our scavenger team found only objects of low value.

column2: 'The wreckage has been looted clean of all valuables by previous plunderers, however the structure itself was made of decent quality alloys. We took time to cut it up, leaving no trace of the wreckage.
column3: 'The wreckage has been looted clean of all valuables by previous plunderers, however the structure itself was made of decent quality alloys. We took time to cut it up, leaving no trace of the wreckage.

column2: 'It seems this was a commercial pleasure station, as we found an intact synthetics cooker, with recipes for several interesting recreational consumables in its databanks (which we will be soon testing out). The cause of the station's destruction remains a mystery.
column3: 'It seems this was a commercial pleasure station, as we found an intact synthetics cooker, with recipes for several interesting recreational consumables in its databanks (which we will be soon testing out). The cause of the station's destruction remains a mystery.

column2: 'Closer inspection reveals that the station used to be the headquarters of a civilian mining company. Several of its defensive lasers prove to be still functional, though irreversibly damaged.
column3: 'Closer inspection reveals that the station used to be the headquarters of a civilian mining company. Several of its defensive lasers prove to be still functional, though irreversibly damaged.

column2: 'It seems to be a wrecked space station, no active systems detected.
column3: 'It seems to be a wrecked space station, no active systems detected.

column2: 'It is an ancient residential station, destroyed long ago. The station has been probably looted a number of times, there was not much left to take.
column3: 'It is an ancient residential station, destroyed long ago. The station has been probably looted a number of times, there was not much left to take.

column2: 'It is an ancient residential station, destroyed long ago. All its databases are corrupted, so its impossible to know what happened here exactly. The station has been looted clean of all resources by previous plunderers, however the structure itself was made of decent quality metals. We cut it to pieces, leaving no trace of the wreckage.
column3: 'It is an ancient residential station, destroyed long ago. All its databases are corrupted, so its impossible to know what happened here exactly. The station has been looted clean of all resources by previous plunderers, however the structure itself was made of decent quality metals. We cut it to pieces, leaving no trace of the wreckage.

column2: 'It is an ancient residential station, destroyed long ago. All its databases are corrupted, so its impossible to know what happened here exactly. While scouting the proximity of the base, we found one of its defence turrets floating in space, propelled away from the station when it exploded.
column3: 'It is an ancient residential station, destroyed long ago. All its databases are corrupted, so its impossible to know what happened here exactly. While scouting the proximity of the base, we found one of its defence turrets floating in space, propelled away from the station when it exploded.

column2: 'Something went wrong during the retrieval and the station reactor exploded, vaporizing nearby bots & equipment.
column3: 'Something went wrong during the retrieval and the station reactor exploded, vaporizing nearby bots & equipment.

column2: 'We have found an ancient reactor in the station, probably left behind because extensive damage has made it somewhat unstable. Minor risk of nuclear explosion.
column3: 'We have found an ancient reactor in the station, probably left behind because extensive damage has made it somewhat unstable. Minor risk of nuclear explosion.

column2: 'Leave the reactor, but finish cutting up the station
column3: 'Leave the reactor, but finish cutting up the station

column2: 'Operation successfully completed. We left behind the riskier Credits around the reactor. The bots were ordered to give the remaining wreckage a gentle nudge so it would drift towards the closest star.
column3: 'Operation successfully completed. We left behind the riskier Credits around the reactor. The bots were ordered to give the remaining wreckage a gentle nudge so it would drift towards the closest star.

column2: 'Our bots were succesful in stabilising and retrieving the reactor. We cut rest of the station into pieces for easier scavenging.
column3: 'Unseren Bots ist es gelungen, den Reaktor zu stabilisieren und zurückzuholen. Den Rest der Station haben wir zur leichteren Durchsuchung in Stücke geschnitten..

column2: 'Few bots are used and most of the works are carried out manually in the scrapyard. After several days work, the module is finished. The workers give us extra food and a reduced final price, stating they ended up leaving in a few minor scratches here and there.
column3: 'Few bots are used and most of the works are carried out manually in the scrapyard. After several days work, the module is finished. The workers give us extra food and a reduced final price, stating they ended up leaving in a few minor scratches here and there.

column2: 'The planet has a lone ship service station, specialized in building custom integrity modules from recycled local materials. The service includes free food.
column3: 'The planet has a lone ship service station, specialized in building custom integrity modules from recycled local materials. The service includes free food.

column2: 'The workers analyze the standard module blueprints of our ship. They take time to scutter through various junk found in their yard, and bit by bit, start to assemble an integrity module. Few bots are used and most of the works are carried out manually. Finally, after several days work, the module is finished. It looks robust.
column3: 'The workers analyze the standard module blueprints of our ship. They take time to scutter through various junk found in their yard, and bit by bit, start to assemble an integrity module. Few bots are used and most of the works are carried out manually. Finally, after several days work, the module is finished. It looks robust.

column2: 'The planet is covered with endless deserts, but we've found what looks like an abandoned primitive fortess.
column3: 'The planet is covered with endless deserts, but we've found what looks like an abandoned primitive fortess.

column2: 'The fortress was abandoned centuries ago, but some of its weapons can be restored to working condition.
column3: 'The fortress was abandoned centuries ago, but some of its weapons can be restored to working condition.

column2: 'The fortress was welded shut from inside centuries ago. It seems the entire structure was a home to a central brain controlling the building, and living in virtual reality. We find a pictographic recording, a book written by the brain, telling his entire story. We scavenge everything of value.
column3: 'The fortress was welded shut from inside centuries ago. It seems the entire structure was a home to a central brain controlling the building, and living in virtual reality. We find a pictographic recording, a book written by the brain, telling his entire story. We scavenge everything of value.

column2: 'This centuries-old fortress used to be controlled by a central AI core attached to a massive datachip. The entire fortress is now offline and it looks like the AI core probably died of old age, in the form of accumulating microdamage. We scavenge everything.
column3: 'This centuries-old fortress used to be controlled by a central AI core attached to a massive datachip. The entire fortress is now offline and it looks like the AI core probably died of old age, in the form of accumulating microdamage. We scavenge everything.

column2: 'The planet is covered with ecosystem of easily easily ecoharvestable organics. No signs of developed sentience. The place looks pretty nice.
column3: 'The planet is covered with ecosystem of easily easily ecoharvestable organics. No signs of developed sentience. The place looks pretty nice.

column2: 'Carbon ecosystem detected. Possibility to eco-harvest organics. Commence operation?
column3: 'Carbon ecosystem detected. Possibility to eco-harvest organics. Commence operation?

column1: '2 P abandoned industrial wasteland with ship carcass M.prefab

column2: 'Machinery on the planet was made of exclusively low-quality materials. Long days of exploration and scavenging resulted in moderate amounts of salvage.
column3: 'Machinery on the planet was made of exclusively low-quality materials. Long days of exploration and scavenging resulted in moderate amounts of salvage.

column2: 'The planet is covered in extensive industrial-age ruins, but all activities have long since ceased. It seems the industrial activities have destroyed the ecosystem of the planet. There's so much to check out that a salvage operation would need considerable time.
column3: 'The planet is covered in extensive industrial-age ruins, but all activities have long since ceased. It seems the industrial activities have destroyed the ecosystem of the planet. There's so much to check out that a salvage operation would need considerable time.

column2: 'Machinery on the planet was made of exclusively low-quality materials. The most valuable object we found was a half-complete ship carcass.
column3: 'Machinery on the planet was made of exclusively low-quality materials. The most valuable object we found was a half-complete ship carcass.

column2: 'Indirect records of this planet exist in our database. It used to be a hotspot for mining of silver and other precious minerals. No recent records exist, but it's probably been shut down due to negative profit outlook already years ago. We could still send crew down to check it out for anything valuable left behind.
column3: 'Indirect records of this planet exist in our database. It used to be a hotspot for mining of silver and other precious minerals. No recent records exist, but it's probably been shut down due to negative profit outlook already years ago. We could still send crew down to check it out for anything valuable left behind.

column2: 'As expected, the planet has been stripped of valuable minerals. Most of the mine entrances were collapsed due to erosion and time, but the largest facility still stood. Our crew scavenged some of the broken mining equipment left behind, not to return completely empty handed.
column3: 'As expected, the planet has been stripped of valuable minerals. Most of the mine entrances were collapsed due to erosion and time, but the largest facility still stood. Our crew scavenged some of the broken mining equipment left behind, not to return completely empty handed.

column2: 'As expected, the planet was stripped of valuable minerals long ago. The prospecting crew still enjoyed the trip and took the chance to admire the scenery.
column3: 'As expected, the planet was stripped of valuable minerals long ago. The prospecting crew still enjoyed the trip and took the chance to admire the scenery.

column2: 'During the operation, one of our intersystem exploration bots discovered that a nearby asteroid has an artificial structure which seems to contain active technology, including automated defenses.
column3: 'During the operation, one of our intersystem exploration bots discovered that a nearby asteroid has an artificial structure which seems to contain active technology, including automated defenses.

column2: 'The structure proved to be an ancient military complex with nuclear missile defences but no shields. Its AI woke up when we approached and launched a full attack on us with all its armaments. We retaliated and destroyed the base. The salvaged remains indicated that this was an automated military reseach base, researching exotics.
column3: 'The structure proved to be an ancient military complex with nuclear missile defences but no shields. Its AI woke up when we approached and launched a full attack on us with all its armaments. We retaliated and destroyed the base. The salvaged remains indicated that this was an automated military reseach base, researching exotics.

column2: 'The structure proved to be a storage facility containing dismantled ship parts and a small power-generator.
column3: 'The structure proved to be a storage facility containing dismantled ship parts and a small power-generator.

column2: 'The structure is an automated military complex with nuclear missile defences. Fortunately, it's sensors are too primitive to detect us at this distance. We could send hackers down to the moon to try to take over all the assets in the base.
column3: 'The structure is an automated military complex with nuclear missile defences. Fortunately, it's sensors are too primitive to detect us at this distance. We could send hackers down to the moon to try to take over all the assets in the base.

column2: 'The hackers were able to disable all facility defences, making the huge complex ready for scavenging. A good amount of resources and technology was obtained.
column3: 'The hackers were able to disable all facility defences, making the huge complex ready for scavenging. A good amount of resources and technology was obtained.

column2: 'Should we send a search & rescue operation for the missing crew, most likely dead?
column3: 'Should we send a search & rescue operation for the missing crew, most likely dead?

column2: 'The missing crewmembers are most likely dead. Destroy the station with long-ranged fire.
column3: 'The missing crewmembers are most likely dead. Destroy the station with long-ranged fire.

column2: 'We were able to locate and rescue one of the stranded crewmembers. The other had died of their wounds before we arrived.
column3: 'We were able to locate and rescue one of the stranded crewmembers. The other had died of their wounds before we arrived.

column2: 'The brave volunteers who went to look for their friends got locked into a heavy firefight with security bots. Eventually, we were able to evacuate all of the crew, despite critical injuries.
column3: 'The brave volunteers who went to look for their friends got locked into a heavy firefight with security bots. Eventually, we were able to evacuate all of the crew, despite critical injuries.

column2: 'Should we disengage the military base? Some of the more emotional crewmembers suggest to annihilate the base with long-range weaponry.
column3: 'Should we disengage the military base? Some of the more emotional crewmembers suggest to annihilate the base with long-range weaponry.

column2: 'The military base activated its own long-range weaponry and started a fierce duel with our ship. Our superior technology allowed us to pick the base's defensive measures apart while receiving minimal damage.
column3: 'The military base activated its own long-range weaponry and started a fierce duel with our ship. Our superior technology allowed us to pick the base's defensive measures apart while receiving minimal damage.

column2: 'Our hackers were ambushed by automated guardian bots inside the facility! Contact was lost with the team while they were wounded and retreating under heavy fire.
column3: 'Our hackers were ambushed by automated guardian bots inside the facility! Contact was lost with the team while they were wounded and retreating under heavy fire.

column2: 'It was highly unlikely our crew would be alive. We tried destroying the building with long-range fire, but the defences were too strong. We decided to move on after using considerable amount of resources with little effect.
column3: 'It was highly unlikely our crew would be alive. We tried destroying the building with long-range fire, but the defences were too strong. We decided to move on after using considerable amount of resources with little effect.

column1: '2 P abandoned mine, metallic dust storms ME.prefab

column2: 'Something on this planet broadcasts a repeated message: "Planet owned by BangMine Corporation. Automated defences will shoot any trespassers." The planet's thin atmosphere is ravaged by metallic dust storms, making orbital observations difficult without entering the atmosphere.
column3: 'Something on this planet broadcasts a repeated message: "Planet owned by BangMine Corporation. Automated defences will shoot any trespassers." The planet's thin atmosphere is ravaged by metallic dust storms, making orbital observations difficult without entering the atmosphere.

column2: 'All of our reconaissance bots were unexpectedly caught in a metallic dust storm and we lost contact with them. We may send new bots.
column3: 'All of our reconaissance bots were unexpectedly caught in a metallic dust storm and we lost contact with them. We may send new bots.

column2: 'Our ship entered the atmosphere at full combat readiness, but no threats emerged. Perhaps the orbital warning is outdated. The mining sites on the ground are abandoned, but our sensors clearly show there is metal ore left in the mine.
column3: 'Our ship entered the atmosphere at full combat readiness, but no threats emerged. Perhaps the orbital warning is outdated. The mining sites on the ground are abandoned, but our sensors clearly show there is metal ore left in the mine.

column2: 'We lost contact with one of our bots that was caught in a strong duststorm. Others returned and reported no threats. Several large but abandoned mining sites were observed.
column3: 'We lost contact with one of our bots that was caught in a strong duststorm. Others returned and reported no threats. Several large but abandoned mining sites were observed.

column2: 'The mining equipment left behind was almost worthless, but the shafts yielded a considerable amount of titanium ore.
column3: 'The mining equipment left behind was almost worthless, but the shafts yielded a considerable amount of titanium ore.

column2: 'Our sensors detect a lightning storm forming within the metal dust cloud. The Mothership is built to withstand heavy damage, but it is impossible to estimate how dangerous this phenomenon is.
column3: 'Our sensors detect a lightning storm forming within the metal dust cloud. The Mothership is built to withstand heavy damage, but it is impossible to estimate how dangerous this phenomenon is.

column2: 'We made it through the lightning storm unharmed and no other threats emerged. Perhaps the orbital warning is outdated. The mining sites on the ground are abandoned, but our sensors clearly show there is metal ore left in the mine.
column3: 'We made it through the lightning storm unharmed and no other threats emerged. Perhaps the orbital warning is outdated. The mining sites on the ground are abandoned, but our sensors clearly show there is metal ore left in the mine.

column2: 'While surveying the mine shafts as part of operation preparations, our bots discovered the shafts were infested with the Tentaculaati. These vicious and clever biotech monsters were specifically designed by the Emperor-Banks to infiltrate, neutralize and hold enemy resource mines. A few utility bots were lost and we aborted the operation.
column3: 'While surveying the mine shafts as part of operation preparations, our bots discovered the shafts were infested with the Tentaculaati. These vicious and clever biotech monsters were specifically designed by the Emperor-Banks to infiltrate, neutralize and hold enemy resource mines. A few utility bots were lost and we aborted the operation.

column1: '2 P armored station TM orbital mines.prefab

column2: 'There is an abandoned outpost on this otherwise desolate planet. It is covered with extremely resistant armor. To get inside, we can either try sustained fire from ray weapons (costing a lot of energy) or blow up the entrance with explosives.
column3: 'There is an abandoned outpost on this otherwise desolate planet. It is covered with extremely resistant armor. To get inside, we can either try sustained fire from ray weapons (costing a lot of energy) or blow up the entrance with explosives.

column2: 'Let's see if we can scrap anything for needed resources
column3: 'Let's see if we can scrap anything for needed resources

column2: 'After burning through quite a lot of fuel to sustain fire from small energy cutters, we were able to penetrate the armor and get to the resources inside. We also obtained valuable information from the central data core.
column3: 'After burning through quite a lot of fuel to sustain fire from small energy cutters, we were able to penetrate the armor and get to the resources inside. We also obtained valuable information from the central data core.

column2: 'After several hours of sustained fire from custom energy cutters (and burning through quite a bit of fuel), we were able to penetrate the armor and get inside the outpost. It contained a small stock of supplies and materials.
column3: 'After several hours of sustained fire from custom energy cutters (and burning through quite a bit of fuel), we were able to penetrate the armor and get inside the outpost. It contained a small stock of supplies and materials.

column2: 'We were able to succesfully blast the entrance and get inside the outpost.
column3: 'We were able to succesfully blast the entrance and get inside the outpost.

column2: 'Our demolition experts misjudged the optimal placement of explosives, failing to crack the main armor of the outpost. The blast broke some external technology and created a bit of scrap in the process. We may try again.
column3: 'Our demolition experts misjudged the optimal placement of explosives, failing to crack the main armor of the outpost. The blast broke some external technology and created a bit of scrap in the process. We may try again.

column2: 'Our demolition experts misjudged the optimal placement of explosives resulting in the total collapse of the outpost. Excavating the rubble took extra resources, but we were able to recover most of the valuables.
column3: 'Our demolition experts misjudged the optimal placement of explosives resulting in the total collapse of the outpost. Excavating the rubble took extra resources, but we were able to recover most of the valuables.

column2: 'Shortly after entering the atmosphere, we encountered a cloud of ancient anti-bot mines. Their explosions were too weak to damage our ship's hull, but a fair amount of external utility equipment was destroyed.
column3: 'Shortly after entering the atmosphere, we encountered a cloud of ancient anti-bot mines. Their explosions were too weak to damage our ship's hull, but a fair amount of external utility equipment was destroyed.

column2: 'We burned through several layers of the heavy armor, but we still can't get through. At least got some scrap metal from external layers. We may expel more fuel or use explosives instead.
column3: 'We burned through several layers of the heavy armor, but we still can't get through. At least got some scrap metal from external layers. We may expel more fuel or use explosives instead.

column1: '2 P big precursor robot makes gift resources.prefab

column2: 'Incredibly, the warp energy emanates from a large robot. It's unusual design suggests precursor technology and it doesn't seem to be a military unit. You send bots to investigate and the robot effortlessly hacks one of them to communicate "SAFETY" to your ship. It then releases the bot.
column3: 'Incredibly, the warp energy emanates from a large robot. It's unusual design suggests precursor technology and it doesn't seem to be a military unit. You send bots to investigate and the robot effortlessly hacks one of them to communicate "SAFETY" to your ship. It then releases the bot.

column2: 'This lifeless planet has a definite warp energy source on its surface. It could be precursor technology, or possibly a warp animal, although they usually do not land on planets.
column3: 'This lifeless planet has a definite warp energy source on its surface. It could be precursor technology, or possibly a warp animal, although they usually do not land on planets.

column2: 'As your crew approaches in a shuttle, they suddenly get an unnerving feeling that somebody is actively reading their minds. "YOU NEED HELP" the robot states coldly in your mind, "MAKE A CHOICE". You feel as if somebody is poking five mental concepts in your head.
column3: 'As your crew approaches in a shuttle, they suddenly get an unnerving feeling that somebody is actively reading their minds. "YOU NEED HELP" the robot states coldly in your mind, "MAKE A CHOICE". You feel as if somebody is poking five mental concepts in your head.

column2: 'The robot nods and looks intensely at the ground in front of it. Pieces of planet surface come adrift and start to transform. In a few minutes, they become an enormous ball of starfuel, hovering mid-air inside an invisible force field. "TAKE, GO" the robot says and falls silent.
column3: 'The robot nods and looks intensely at the ground in front of it. Pieces of planet surface come adrift and start to transform. In a few minutes, they become an enormous ball of starfuel, hovering mid-air inside an invisible force field. "TAKE, GO" the robot says and falls silent.

column2: 'When you order your transporters to pick up the piece, they discover it's made of sugar! What?\n"DESTRUCTION TRICK QUESTION. NO HELP TO DESTRUCTION" The robot communicates and becomes silent. There is nothing else for us to do on this lifeless planet. Somebody suggests we could try destroying and scavenging the robot.
column3: 'When you order your transporters to pick up the piece, they discover it's made of sugar! What?\n"DESTRUCTION TRICK QUESTION. NO HELP TO DESTRUCTION" The robot communicates and becomes silent. There is nothing else for us to do on this lifeless planet. Somebody suggests we could try destroying and scavenging the robot.

column2: 'The robot nods simply and looks intensely at the ground in front of it. Pieces of planet surface come adrift and start to transform, organizing into a huge weapon module. This is the most badass weapon you have ever seen.
column3: 'The robot nods simply and looks intensely at the ground in front of it. Pieces of planet surface come adrift and start to transform, organizing into a huge weapon module. This is the most badass weapon you have ever seen.

column2: '"May I remind you of rumors that entire stellar empires have been destroyed by singular Precursor ships. Attacking a Precursor robot would likely be suicide." the Mothership AI notes. You don't know however if this is a true Precursor robot. It certainly has advanced technology. But perhaps it's not even military-capable?
column3: '"May I remind you of rumors that entire stellar empires have been destroyed by singular Precursor ships. Attacking a Precursor robot would likely be suicide." the Mothership AI notes. You don't know however if this is a true Precursor robot. It certainly has advanced technology. But perhaps it's not even military-capable?

column2: 'Attack from max distance with everything we have
column3: 'Attack from max distance with everything we have

column2: 'As soon as you mentally make the decision to try and attack the robot, something strange happens. The entire Mothership, its shuttles, bots and landing crew are taken hold of by an invisble, gravity-like force. The force levitates all of this stuff at terrifying speed until it reaches orbit. Luckily all of the crew had suits on, but some of our bots broke during lift-off.
column3: 'As soon as you mentally make the decision to try and attack the robot, something strange happens. The entire Mothership, its shuttles, bots and landing crew are taken hold of by an invisble, gravity-like force. The force levitates all of this stuff at terrifying speed until it reaches orbit. Luckily all of the crew had suits on, but some of our bots broke during lift-off.

column2: 'The robot nods and looks intensely at the ground in front of it. Pieces of planet surface start to gather into a hovering ball of dirt. In a few minutes, they start transforming, and slowly turn into an enormous hovering ball of rainbow colors. "TAKE, GO" the robot says and goes silent.
column3: 'The robot nods and looks intensely at the ground in front of it. Pieces of planet surface start to gather into a hovering ball of dirt. In a few minutes, they start transforming, and slowly turn into an enormous hovering ball of rainbow colors. "TAKE, GO" the robot says and goes silent.

column2: 'The robot nods and looks intensely at the ground in front of it. Pieces of planet surface start to gather into a hovering ball of dirt. In a few minutes, they start transforming, and slowly turn into an enormous pear-shaped pink object. Your sensors report it is living plant tissue. "TAKE FRUIT, GO" the robot says and goes silent. The fruit seeds contain exotic substances.
column3: 'The robot nods and looks intensely at the ground in front of it. Pieces of planet surface start to gather into a hovering ball of dirt. In a few minutes, they start transforming, and slowly turn into an enormous pear-shaped pink object. Your sensors report it is living plant tissue. "TAKE FRUIT, GO" the robot says and goes silent. The fruit seeds contain exotic substances.

column2: 'The robot nods and looks intensely at the ground in front of it. Pieces of planet surface come adrift and start to transform. They become what appears to be a tiny crystal. "TAKE, GO" the robot says and goes silent. The crystal proves to be an exotic data container filled with valuable information.
column3: 'The robot nods and looks intensely at the ground in front of it. Pieces of planet surface come adrift and start to transform. They become what appears to be a tiny crystal. "TAKE, GO" the robot says and goes silent. The crystal proves to be an exotic data container filled with valuable information.

column2: 'A small patch on the surface of this otherwise lifeless planet seems to seep out fossilized organics with versatile properties. We could extract this substance for research and process it into starfuel or explosives. Conversion process requires setting up a few dedicated facilities.
column3: 'A small patch on the surface of this otherwise lifeless planet seems to seep out fossilized organics with versatile properties. We could extract this substance for research and process it into starfuel or explosives. Conversion process requires setting up a few dedicated facilities.

column2: 'Research & processing completed successfully, no accidents reported.
column3: 'Research & processing completed successfully, no accidents reported.

column2: 'Something went wrong during the processing - the conversion facility exploded, damaging equipment brought to the planet and igniting the whole patch of black goo. We were lucky that nobody got hurt and decided to abort the operation after finishing research.
column3: 'Something went wrong during the processing - the conversion facility exploded, damaging equipment brought to the planet and igniting the whole patch of black goo. We were lucky that nobody got hurt and decided to abort the operation after finishing research.

column2: 'We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched. Our utility bots bring back samples of the mucus for research.
column3: 'We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched. Our utility bots bring back samples of the mucus for research.

column1: '2 P commercial outpost, sells dual old ATK cannon.prefab

column2: 'Somebody has set up a small commercial outpost on this otherwise barren planet.
column3: 'Somebody has set up a small commercial outpost on this otherwise barren planet.

column2: 'After exploring the market, we are invited to meet the owner of the establishment. He explains that he wants to sell one of his outpost defences. An old but powerful dual cannon with truly historic value. Apparently, It was once used to cover the evacuation of the planet Ur-Quanor II.
column3: 'After exploring the market, we are invited to meet the owner of the establishment. He explains that he wants to sell one of his outpost defences. An old but powerful dual cannon with truly historic value. Apparently, It was once used to cover the evacuation of the planet Ur-Quanor II.

column2: 'The weapons are delivered to Mothership cargo bay as promised. Along with the cannon, we are delivered a small crate of munitions, a very generous bonus indeed.
column3: 'The weapons are delivered to Mothership cargo bay as promised. Along with the cannon, we are delivered a small crate of munitions, a very generous bonus indeed.

column2: 'The station sells mostly low-tech industrial or agricultural machinery and self-contained food. A pair of locals are also willing to pay a good price for exotics.
column3: 'The station sells mostly low-tech industrial or agricultural machinery and self-contained food. A pair of locals are also willing to pay a good price for exotics.

column2: 'Buy a self-contained pack of 100 organics [-125 Credits]
column3: 'Buy a self-contained pack of 100 organics [-125 Credits]

column2: 'The market is full of junk, but its owner wants to update the outpost defences and is willing to sell us one of their old but powerful triple cannons, with truly historic value. Apparently, It was once used to cover the evacuation of the planet Gohr-Argh II.
column3: 'The market is full of junk, but its owner wants to update the outpost defences and is willing to sell us one of their old but powerful triple cannons, with truly historic value. Apparently, It was once used to cover the evacuation of the planet Gohr-Argh II.

column2: 'The locals gave us a small dead animal as a bonus. They promise to kill another animal for us if we sell more exotics.
column3: 'The locals gave us a small dead animal as a bonus. They promise to kill another animal for us if we sell more exotics.

column2: 'Operation completed. The traders gave us a small dead animal as a bonus.
column3: 'Operation completed. The traders gave us a small dead animal as a bonus.

column2: '"Thank you! In addition to the agreed price, we've sent you a large vase, plus an animal we recently killed just for you. Knowing the importance of these things for skeleton apes like yourself, we promise to continue giving you beautiful vases and dead animals as long as you keep selling us exotics. May you find much protein, sugar and plastics in your life!"
column3: '"Thank you! In addition to the agreed price, we've sent you a large vase, plus an animal we recently killed just for you. Knowing the importance of these things for skeleton apes like yourself, we promise to continue giving you beautiful vases and dead animals as long as you keep selling us exotics. May you find much protein, sugar and plastics in your life!"

column1: '2 P green forest OR, moon ET good nonweapons.prefab

column2: 'Planetwide biomass harvesting operations completed. Some local species underwent a small-scale extinction event due to our activities, but we did not cause irreversible damage to the ecosystem as a whole.
column3: 'Planetwide biomass harvesting operations completed. Some local species underwent a small-scale extinction event due to our activities, but we did not cause irreversible damage to the ecosystem as a whole.

column2: 'The planet is covered with green forests full of primitive mammals. No signs of sentient life encountered. We could harvest some of these ripe organics for ourselves.
