column3: 'The planet is covered with green forests full of primitive mammals. No signs of sentient life encountered. We could harvest some of these ripe organics for ourselves.

column2: 'Research & Biomass harvest [-20 fuel, harms local ecosystem]
column3: 'Research & Biomass harvest [-20 fuel, harms local ecosystem]

column2: 'Research only. This unique ecosystem is worth leaving untouched.
column3: 'Research only. This unique ecosystem is worth leaving untouched.

column2: 'Ecological harvesting operations completed. Not a single animal or plant was killed. Only select fruits, seeds, and parts of plants and dead animals were harvested. We also collected valuable research data.
column3: 'Ecological harvesting operations completed. Not a single animal or plant was killed. Only select fruits, seeds, and parts of plants and dead animals were harvested. We also collected valuable research data.

column2: 'You leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched after collecting a selection of research samples.
column3: 'You leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched after collecting a selection of research samples.

column2: 'Ecological harvesting operations completed. Some of our harvester bots mysteriously malfunctioned and got lost during the operation. Our crew also collected valuable research data.
column3: 'Ecological harvesting operations completed. Some of our harvester bots mysteriously malfunctioned and got lost during the operation. Our crew also collected valuable research data.

column2: 'During the massive harvesting operation, a warp animal appeared from nowhere and started emittting unknown warp energies which completely disabled our harvester bots and other mission equipment. We decided to cut our losses and abort the mission.
column3: 'During the massive harvesting operation, a warp animal appeared from nowhere and started emittting unknown warp energies which completely disabled our harvester bots and other mission equipment. We decided to cut our losses and abort the mission.

column2: 'During the operation, one of our intersystem exploration bots discovered that a nearby moon has an artificial structure.
column3: 'During the operation, one of our intersystem exploration bots discovered that a nearby moon has an artificial structure.

column2: 'The structure is an element of a gigantic ship. Seems it broke and was discarded on the moon's surface.
column3: 'The structure is an element of a gigantic ship. Seems it broke and was discarded on the moon's surface.

column2: 'This chemically active moon is home to a form of crystalline life that slowly grows into geometrcially shaped city-like colonies. They live so slowly that they were thought to be just sediments and not "real" lifeforms in the past. We could easily take some with us to be used as explosives... although they probably wouldn't survive the experience.
column3: 'This chemically active moon is home to a form of crystalline life that slowly grows into geometrcially shaped city-like colonies. They live so slowly that they were thought to be just sediments and not "real" lifeforms in the past. We could easily take some with us to be used as explosives... although they probably wouldn't survive the experience.

column2: 'Reseach only, do not harm the locals
column3: 'Reseach only, do not harm the locals

column2: 'Our minerbots collected some sulphurids that contained the purest volatile chemicals. The crystalline creatures were then processed into quality explosives. Others have died so that we may live.
column3: 'Our minerbots collected some sulphurids that contained the purest volatile chemicals. The crystalline creatures were then processed into quality explosives. Others have died so that we may live.

column2: 'There was an unexplained chemical reaction after storing the newly processed explosives. It seems some kind of nanobot or defensive chemical pattern inside the sulphurid crystals avoided our decontamination procedures and started eating stored explosives, reducing them to organic waste. The malicious colony of bots was cleansed at the expense of our explosive reserves.
column3: 'There was an unexplained chemical reaction after storing the newly processed explosives. It seems some kind of nanobot or defensive chemical pattern inside the sulphurid crystals avoided our decontamination procedures and started eating stored explosives, reducing them to organic waste. The malicious colony of bots was cleansed at the expense of our explosive reserves.

column2: 'Our crew carried out a comprehensive research on the Sulphurid colony, being careful not to break any of the brittle creatures.
column3: 'Our crew carried out a comprehensive research on the Sulphurid colony, being careful not to break any of the brittle creatures.

column1: '2 P guard drone TM, combat sensor4, medbay4.prefab

column2: 'The active technology seems to be an advanced bot, possibly of precursor origin. Our sensors show it is armed with energy weapons. We could either attack it with the Mothership or try to send hackers into its vicinity to try to deactivate its security systems remotely.
column3: 'The active technology seems to be an advanced bot, possibly of precursor origin. Our sensors show it is armed with energy weapons. We could either attack it with the Mothership or try to send hackers into its vicinity to try to deactivate its security systems remotely.

column2: 'The bot shot back at our ship with its tiny energy weapons, causing more damage than expected. Luckily, the bot itself was not shielded and died after a single volley of fire from our ship.
column3: 'The bot shot back at our ship with its tiny energy weapons, causing more damage than expected. Luckily, the bot itself was not shielded and died after a single volley of fire from our ship.

column2: 'The bot returned fire with its tiny energy weapons, causing more damage than expected. Luckily, it was not well-shielded and exploded after a single volley of fire. Unfortunately, its valuable technology was destroyed as well.
column3: 'The bot returned fire with its tiny energy weapons, causing more damage than expected. Luckily, it was not well-shielded and exploded after a single volley of fire. Unfortunately, its valuable technology was destroyed as well.

column2: 'The resupply station was hidden underground in a totally indistinguishable spot. We managed to get its contents without further incident. Together with the bot remains, this is a real treasure trove.
column3: 'The resupply station was hidden underground in a totally indistinguishable spot. We managed to get its contents without further incident. Together with the bot remains, this is a real treasure trove.

column2: 'Our hackers were directed by our ship AI. For a moment, they were successful and turned off the alien bot, releasing a cheer from all of the crew watching from the ship. Unfortunately, the bot then turned back on and killed one of the hackers with a single swipe of its energy ray, severely burning the other one.
column3: 'Our hackers were directed by our ship AI. For a moment, they were successful and turned off the alien bot, releasing a cheer from all of the crew watching from the ship. Unfortunately, the bot then turned back on and killed one of the hackers with a single swipe of its energy ray, severely burning the other one.

column2: 'Nobody volunteered to try more hacking. We could either attack the bot with our ship or just move on and not take further risks.
column3: 'Nobody volunteered to try more hacking. We could either attack the bot with our ship or just move on and not take further risks.

column2: 'We do not have the necessary crew for this operation.
column3: 'We do not have the necessary crew for this operation.

column2: 'Our hackers were directed by Mothership AI and gave their best effort, but they were unable to understand the alien bot enough to safely hack it. They aborted the operation because they were afraid that the bot was getting suspicious.
column3: 'Our hackers were directed by Mothership AI and gave their best effort, but they were unable to understand the alien bot enough to safely hack it. They aborted the operation because they were afraid that the bot was getting suspicious.

column2: 'Our crew (guided by ship AI) managed to hack the drone and shut it down remotely. Information from its memory core revealed it was guarding a nearby resupply site...
column3: 'Our crew (guided by ship AI) managed to hack the drone and shut it down remotely. Information from its memory core revealed it was guarding a nearby resupply site...

column2: 'Our crew (guided by ship AI) managed to hack the drone and shut it down remotely. The inert but physically intact bot was disassembled, yielding valuable tech and research data.
column3: 'Our crew (guided by ship AI) managed to hack the drone and shut it down remotely. The inert but physically intact bot was disassembled, yielding valuable tech and research data.

column2: 'The ancient cities are in complete state of decay, and we find no sign of survivors. The lack of significant plant life suggests the civilization might have wiped itself out with chemical or biological warfare. They seemed to reach the early digital era just before extinction. Any tech remains would be too primitive for us, but we might scavenge valuable resources.
column3: 'The ancient cities are in complete state of decay, and we find no sign of survivors. The lack of significant plant life suggests the civilization might have wiped itself out with chemical or biological warfare. They seemed to reach the early digital era just before extinction. Any tech remains would be too primitive for us, but we might scavenge valuable resources.

column2: 'Scavenge everything, and focus on finding high-quality metal [send crew]
column3: 'Scavenge everything, and focus on finding high-quality metal [send crew]

column2: 'Something exploded in a bunker which our operatives were checking. Their injuries are nonlethal, thanks to our highly armored environmental suits. We decided to end the operation early and move on.
column3: 'Something exploded in a bunker which our operatives were checking. Their injuries are nonlethal, thanks to our highly armored environmental suits. We decided to end the operation early and move on.

column2: 'While accidents with our default environmental suits are extremely rare, one of the crew reported a critical suit malfunction during the operation. The crewmember was quarantined and our AI is currently testing them for contamination.
column3: 'While accidents with our default environmental suits are extremely rare, one of the crew reported a critical suit malfunction during the operation. The crewmember was quarantined and our AI is currently testing them for contamination.

column2: 'Our scavenger engineers spent time in the cities to look for resources. Most of the local buildings and tech was constructed from low-quality materials and plastics of little value. However, they did find numerous stockpiles of military munitions, typical of primitive civilizations.
column3: 'Our scavenger engineers spent time in the cities to look for resources. Most of the local buildings and tech was constructed from low-quality materials and plastics of little value. However, they did find numerous stockpiles of military munitions, typical of primitive civilizations.

column2: 'Extensive industrial-age ruins cover this planet. No vegetation spotted anywhere.
column3: 'Extensive industrial-age ruins cover this planet. No vegetation spotted anywhere.

column2: 'Most of the local buildings were constructed from low-quality plastics of little value. After days of scavenging, however, our crew found a giant metal structure, seemingly a sculpture of some sort. We scrapped the entire thing.
column3: 'Most of the local buildings were constructed from low-quality plastics of little value. After days of scavenging, however, our crew found a giant metal structure, seemingly a sculpture of some sort. We scrapped the entire thing.

column2: 'Our scavenger engineers spent time in the cities to look for valuables. Most of the local buildings and tech was constructed from low-quality materials and plastics of little value.
column3: 'Our scavenger engineers spent time in the cities to look for valuables. Most of the local buildings and tech was constructed from low-quality materials and plastics of little value.

column2: 'Our crewmember indeed contracted some kind of agressive flesh-eating microorganism... Fortunately, our ship AI had no trouble researching & printing the medicine to cure it. The disease left a nasty wound though.
column3: 'Our crewmember indeed contracted some kind of agressive flesh-eating microorganism... Fortunately, our ship AI had no trouble researching & printing the medicine to cure it. The disease left a nasty wound though.

column1: '2 P insectoid war ruins FME, moonFE and good nonweapons.prefab

column2: 'The planet is covered with the remains of an ancient civilization, and signs of large-scale warfare. No signs of intelligent life or active technology spotted. Battleground planets are historically risky sites due to potential of encountering automated defence systems.
column3: 'The planet is covered with the remains of an ancient civilization, and signs of large-scale warfare. No signs of intelligent life or active technology spotted. Battleground planets are historically risky sites due to potential of encountering automated defence systems.

column2: 'Possible dangers, send probes to explore the surface
column3: 'Possible dangers, send probes to explore the surface

column2: 'It turns out some local insectoids survived by living underground. A group of such survivors ambushed our explorers with primitive weapons. Our crew neutralized them without losses and took the bodies back for research & recycling, along with some salvaged resources.
column3: 'It turns out some local insectoids survived by living underground. A group of such survivors ambushed our explorers with primitive weapons. Our crew neutralized them without losses and took the bodies back for research & recycling, along with some salvaged resources.

column2: 'Apart from the automated technology, the planet seems completely dead. 99% of local life forms seem to have died due to chemical warfare, the rest are mostly microorganisms or moss. Preliminary analysis indicates the planet was dominated by fairly advanced militaristic insectoids. There's a possibility to scavenge some materials and explosives.
column3: 'Apart from the automated technology, the planet seems completely dead. 99% of local life forms seem to have died due to chemical warfare, the rest are mostly microorganisms or moss. Preliminary analysis indicates the planet was dominated by fairly advanced militaristic insectoids. There's a possibility to scavenge some materials and explosives.

column2: 'It turns out some local insectoids survived the war by living underground. A group of such survivors ambushed our explorers with primitive weapons, losing many but killing one of ours, using an ancient anti-armor cannon. We decided to cut our losses and leave.
column3: 'It turns out some local insectoids survived the war by living underground. A group of such survivors ambushed our explorers with primitive weapons, losing many but killing one of ours, using an ancient anti-armor cannon. We decided to cut our losses and leave.

column2: 'Our exploration probes were intercepted by ancient rockets from an automated installation. We returned fire and destroyed the site. There could be more defences down there, but they don't seem to be too dangerous.
column3: 'Our exploration probes were intercepted by ancient rockets from an automated installation. We returned fire and destroyed the site. There could be more defences down there, but they don't seem to be too dangerous.

column2: 'The structure was a seemingly abandoned storage building, full of old explosives and fuel.
column3: 'The structure was a seemingly abandoned storage building, full of old explosives and fuel.

column2: 'The structure was a part of some kind of immense ship, left behind for unknown reasons.
column3: 'The structure was a part of some kind of immense ship, left behind for unknown reasons.

column2: 'Our ship was attacked by another set of automated defences while in the atmosphere. The threats were neutralized, but we took some losses.
column3: 'Our ship was attacked by another set of automated defences while in the atmosphere. The threats were neutralized, but we took some losses.

column1: '2 P mineral surface outcrops2 M, maybe junksatellites m.prefab

column2: 'This lifeless planet is covered with abundant outcroppings of valuable mineral ore. It could be easily processed into duranite metal. Inititate surface mining operation?
column3: 'This lifeless planet is covered with abundant outcroppings of valuable mineral ore. It could be easily processed into duranite metal. Inititate surface mining operation?

column2: 'Disengage for now, we might not have enough cargo space
column3: 'Disengage for now, we might not have enough cargo space

column2: 'Mining and processing completed successfully, no accidents.
column3: 'Mining and processing completed successfully, no accidents.

column2: 'We discovered there are a few inactive satellites in the planet's orbit. Scavenging revealed that their data cores contain valuable information.
column3: 'We discovered there are a few inactive satellites in the planet's orbit. Scavenging revealed that their data cores contain valuable information.

column2: 'Harvesting operations completed. Most of the local species will probably undergo extinction events due to our activities and we might have caused irreversible damage to the ecosystem as a whole. On the positive side, an exposed seam of gold was discovered by one of our harvester bots.
column3: 'Harvesting operations completed. Most of the local species will probably undergo extinction events due to our activities and we might have caused irreversible damage to the ecosystem as a whole. On the positive side, an exposed seam of gold was discovered by one of our harvester bots.

column2: 'The ecosystem on this planet seems to be a very young one. The soil does not have much nutrient value and supports only minimal variety of small plants. We could harvest some organics from here, but it might damage the already fragile ecosystem.
column3: 'The ecosystem on this planet seems to be a very young one. The soil does not have much nutrient value and supports only minimal variety of small plants. We could harvest some organics from here, but it might damage the already fragile ecosystem.

column2: 'Research only. This unique ecosystem is worth preserving [send crew]
column3: 'Research only. This unique ecosystem is worth preserving [send crew]

column2: '"Are you seeing this? Very zen here..."
column3: '"Are you seeing this? Very zen here..."

column2: 'We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched after collecting a few scientific samples. It might evolve into something truly special one day.
column3: 'We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched after collecting a few scientific samples. It might evolve into something truly special one day.

column2: 'During the harvesting operation, a warp animal appeared from underground and attacked one of our printed shuttles. We evacuated the survivors and retreated after detecting other warp worms closing in on the location. We had to leave equipment and dead crew behind.
column3: 'During the harvesting operation, a warp animal appeared from underground and attacked one of our printed shuttles. We evacuated the survivors and retreated after detecting other warp worms closing in on the location. We had to leave equipment and dead crew behind.

column2: 'The planet features a thin atmosphere ravaged by powerful storms of superfine granite sand. Our sensors pick up a faint SOS signal from an unknown location on the planet surface, even though it's heavily garbled by the sandstorms. Search for the signal source?
column3: 'The planet features a thin atmosphere ravaged by powerful storms of superfine granite sand. Our sensors pick up a faint SOS signal from an unknown location on the planet surface, even though it's heavily garbled by the sandstorms. Search for the signal source?

column2: 'We located a crashed exploration vehicle. A pair of scientists cryofroze themselves inside the vehicle's crisis unit and have been asleep for years. After a private briefing by our AI, they decide to join our crew. The machine is scrapped and its remains taken to the Mothership.
column3: 'We located a crashed exploration vehicle. A pair of scientists cryofroze themselves inside the vehicle's crisis unit and have been asleep for years. After a private briefing by our AI, they decide to join our crew. The machine is scrapped and its remains taken to the Mothership.

column2: 'After long search efforts, we located a crashed exploration vehicle. It contained bodies of dead scientists from the base. We couldn't think of anything better to do than to give them a proper ceremony of recycling them into organics. Our engineers also scrapped the vehicle to gain at least something out of this operation.
column3: 'After long search efforts, we located a crashed exploration vehicle. It contained bodies of dead scientists from the base. We couldn't think of anything better to do than to give them a proper ceremony of recycling them into organics. Our engineers also scrapped the vehicle to gain at least something out of this operation.

column2: 'Our expedition failed to find any trace of the missing scientists with this sweep. Perhaps their remains disintegrated in the sand, or perhaps we just didn't look well enough.
column3: 'Our expedition failed to find any trace of the missing scientists with this sweep. Perhaps their remains disintegrated in the sand, or perhaps we just didn't look well enough.

column2: 'We could try searching more or leave this forsaken planet and move on.
column3: 'We could try searching more or leave this forsaken planet and move on.

column2: 'We weren't able to locate the signal source. We could try searching more, or move on.
column3: 'We weren't able to locate the signal source. We could try searching more, or move on.

column2: 'Our team has located a scientific outpost, devoid of both people and resources. Outpost interior has been so heavily degraded by the sand that no technology remains intact, apart from the SOS-signal transmitter. It seems the people have left the base in some kind of ground vehicle. Should we look for survivors on the planet surface?
column3: 'Our team has located a scientific outpost, devoid of both people and resources. Outpost interior has been so heavily degraded by the sand that no technology remains intact, apart from the SOS-signal transmitter. It seems the people have left the base in some kind of ground vehicle. Should we look for survivors on the planet surface?

column2: 'We scavenged everything of value. Miraculously, the ship contained a piece of usable technology.
column3: 'We scavenged everything of value. Miraculously, the ship contained a piece of usable technology.

column2: 'We've located some undersea wreckage, degraded but made of valuable materials. The sea itself is filled with life. Eco-harvesting organics here seems quite easy.
column3: 'We've located some undersea wreckage, degraded but made of valuable materials. The sea itself is filled with life. Eco-harvesting organics here seems quite easy.

column2: 'Halfway through the operation, a warp worm living in the ocean attacked our harvesting & storage equipment, destroying it along with all the collected organics. We detected several other worms approaching and decided to leave, managing to bring back only a piece of the ship's wreckage.
column3: 'Halfway through the operation, a warp worm living in the ocean attacked our harvesting & storage equipment, destroying it along with all the collected organics. We detected several other worms approaching and decided to leave, managing to bring back only a piece of the ship's wreckage.

column2: 'The volatile elements in these particular sulphurids proved to be too insignificant to use them for our purposes. However, we discovered that some of the central sulphurids of the colony have formed into an obelisk-like structure. Harvesting this would yield a lot of explosives and possibly exotics if we ignored the ethical aspects.
column3: 'The volatile elements in these particular sulphurids proved to be too insignificant to use them for our purposes. However, we discovered that some of the central sulphurids of the colony have formed into an obelisk-like structure. Harvesting this would yield a lot of explosives and possibly exotics if we ignored the ethical aspects.

column2: 'You leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched. This kind of crystalline life is truly rare and worth preserving. The sulphurid obelisk seems happy.
column3: 'You leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched. This kind of crystalline life is truly rare and worth preserving. The sulphurid obelisk seems happy.

column2: 'After the first minerbot had cut the obelisk, the structure let out some sort of EMP wave, damaging nearby electronics and shutting off all digital technology in the vicinity. After restoring everything to order, our crew hauled the minerals back in manual carts.
column3: 'After the first minerbot had cut the obelisk, the structure let out some sort of EMP wave, damaging nearby electronics and shutting off all digital technology in the vicinity. After restoring everything to order, our crew hauled the minerals back in manual carts.

column2: 'This planet features extreme temperatures and intense volcanic activity. Initial scans suggest possibility of valuable minerals. Prospect for mining opportunities?
column3: 'This planet features extreme temperatures and intense volcanic activity. Initial scans suggest possibility of valuable minerals. Prospect for mining opportunities?

column2: 'This chemically active planet is home to a form of crystalline life that slowly grows into geometrically shaped city-like colonies. They live so slowly that they were thought to be just sediments and not "real" lifeforms in the past. We could easily take some with us to be used as explosives... although they probably wouldn't survive the experience.
column3: 'This chemically active planet is home to a form of crystalline life that slowly grows into geometrically shaped city-like colonies. They live so slowly that they were thought to be just sediments and not "real" lifeforms in the past. We could easily take some with us to be used as explosives... although they probably wouldn't survive the experience.

column2: 'There was an unexplained chemical reaction after storing the newly processed explosives. It seems some kind of advanced chemical fractal, part of the sulphurid crystal structure, avoided our decontamination procedures and started dissolving stored explosives, reducing them to organic waste. \nThe destructive chempattern was cleansed at the expense of our explosives. At least we gained some valuable data on the Suphurid chemistry.
column3: 'There was an unexplained chemical reaction after storing the newly processed explosives. It seems some kind of advanced chemical fractal, part of the sulphurid crystal structure, avoided our decontamination procedures and started dissolving stored explosives, reducing them to organic waste. \nThe destructive chempattern was cleansed at the expense of our explosives. At least we gained some valuable data on the Suphurid chemistry.

column2: 'Our crew carried out a comprehensive research on the colony, being careful not to break any of the brittle beings.
column3: 'Our crew carried out a comprehensive research on the colony, being careful not to break any of the brittle beings.

column2: 'After the first minerbot had touched the obelisk, the structure let out some sort of EMP wave which corrupted or hacked all our utility bots, sending them to ram our ship. We received a small crack from this meagre attack, but decided to abort the operation and leave.
column3: 'After the first minerbot had touched the obelisk, the structure let out some sort of EMP wave which corrupted or hacked all our utility bots, sending them to ram our ship. We received a small crack from this meagre attack, but decided to abort the operation and leave.

column2: 'The brigands had collected quite a stash of local resources over the years. We returned most of these primitive materials to the Ctulufants, but kept the rest to boost our mission. The Ctulufants offer us a mountain of food to express their gratitude.
column3: 'The brigands had collected quite a stash of local resources over the years. We returned most of these primitive materials to the Ctulufants, but kept the rest to boost our mission. The Ctulufants offer us a mountain of food to express their gratitude.

column2: 'The locals call themselves the Ctulufants. After meeting with our ambassadors, they ask for our help. There is a group of alien pirates on the planet who regularly raid the Ctulufants. The pirates are in underground caves, and can only be attacked in close combat.
column3: 'The locals call themselves the Ctulufants. After meeting with our ambassadors, they ask for our help. There is a group of alien pirates on the planet who regularly raid the Ctulufants. The pirates are in underground caves, and can only be attacked in close combat.

column2: 'The primitive weapons of the pirate gang are more dangerous than we thought. Despite scores of pirates being annihilated with our advanced weapons, they manage to critically hurt our crew and destroy a number of bots. Our operatives fall back to regroup.
column3: 'The primitive weapons of the pirate gang are more dangerous than we thought. Despite scores of pirates being annihilated with our advanced weapons, they manage to critically hurt our crew and destroy a number of bots. Our operatives fall back to regroup.

column2: 'The Ctulufants, after hearing of our loss, promise to give one of their "secret magic artifacts" if we defeat the pirates. Description of the artifact suggests it's alien technology. We should consider healing our crew before we resume the attack.
column3: 'The Ctulufants, after hearing of our loss, promise to give one of their "secret magic artifacts" if we defeat the pirates. Description of the artifact suggests it's alien technology. We should consider healing our crew before we resume the attack.

column2: 'Attack the pirates again, with more resources [send crew]
column3: 'Attack the pirates again, with more resources [send crew]

column2: 'The Ctulufants express infinite gratitude and give us the promised artifact. It's a piece of technology salvaged from a crash-landed intergalactic ship. The newfound freedom of the entire Ctulufant civilization is later celebrated with a grand feast.
column3: 'The Ctulufants express infinite gratitude and give us the promised artifact. It's a piece of technology salvaged from a crash-landed intergalactic ship. The newfound freedom of the entire Ctulufant civilization is later celebrated with a grand feast.

column2: 'The Ctulufants are overjoyed to see us return. They plead for us to rid them of their cruel oppressors.
column3: 'The Ctulufants are overjoyed to see us return. They plead for us to rid them of their cruel oppressors.

column2: 'Attack the pirates again with more resources [send crew, requires 30 explosives]
column3: 'Attack the pirates again with more resources [send crew, requires 30 explosives]

column2: 'Leave the planet again, promise to return if possible
column3: 'Leave the planet again, promise to return if possible

column2: 'We've discovered a primitive civilization. These intelligent mammals seem to be hard ethical by even our advanced standards. Extensive hidden observations reveals an egalitarian society based on respect and trust.
column3: 'We've discovered a primitive civilization. These intelligent mammals seem to be hard ethical by even our advanced standards. Extensive hidden observations reveals an egalitarian society based on respect and trust.

column2: 'Our operatives were better prepared this time. More explosives and bots were used to attack the pirate hideout. Unfortunately, the pirates had also prepared, and our crew received multiple direct hits from portable rocket launchers during the encounter. Scavenging reveals the thugs had collected quite a stash of resources over the years.
column3: 'Our operatives were better prepared this time. More explosives and bots were used to attack the pirate hideout. Unfortunately, the pirates had also prepared, and our crew received multiple direct hits from portable rocket launchers during the encounter. Scavenging reveals the thugs had collected quite a stash of resources over the years.

column2: 'Our operatives were better prepared this time, using more resources in the attack. The pirates exhausted all their explosive ammunition during the fight, but ultimately lost due to inferior technology. Scavenging their base revealed the criminals had collected quite a stash of resources over the years.
column3: 'Our operatives were better prepared this time, using more resources in the attack. The pirates exhausted all their explosive ammunition during the fight, but ultimately lost due to inferior technology. Scavenging their base revealed the criminals had collected quite a stash of resources over the years.

column2: 'Somebody has to stay onboard while the others are away, so we need at least 3 crew for this operation. We may return if we have more crew, but we cannot do anything else here at the moment.
column3: 'Somebody has to stay onboard while the others are away, so we need at least 3 crew for this operation. We may return if we have more crew, but we cannot do anything else here at the moment.

column2: 'The Ctulufants express infinite gratitude and give us the promised artifact. It's a small container filled with advanced biotech nanobots that permanently boost drinkers' health. We let the crew divide it between themselves.
column3: 'The Ctulufants express infinite gratitude and give us the promised artifact. It's a small container filled with advanced biotech nanobots that permanently boost drinkers' health. We let the crew divide it between themselves.

column2: 'The operation needs explosives to get through the main security gate of the pirate hideout. We may return if we have enough.
column3: 'The operation needs explosives to get through the main security gate of the pirate hideout. We may return if we have enough.

column2: 'The planet features ruins of a primitive civilization, long gone. Their pictographic writings refer to an ecological catastrophe, but most of the writing has been erased by time.
column3: 'The planet features ruins of a primitive civilization, long gone. Their pictographic writings refer to an ecological catastrophe, but most of the writing has been erased by time.

column2: 'After heavy fighting with interplanetary pirates not from this world, our operatives are able to neutralize the thugs without casualties, thanks to their heavily armored environmental suits.
column3: 'After heavy fighting with interplanetary pirates not from this world, our operatives are able to neutralize the thugs without casualties, thanks to their heavily armored environmental suits.

column1: '2 Pi digital-era militarized, sensor disruptors MFE.prefab

column2: 'The planet's orbit is jammed with primitive but powerful sensor-disruptors. Intercepted local comm signals suggest the local inhabitants belong to a primitive digital-era civilization, seemingly highly militarized. We must enter the atmosphere to contact or observe the locals.
column3: 'The planet's orbit is jammed with primitive but powerful sensor-disruptors. Intercepted local comm signals suggest the local inhabitants belong to a primitive digital-era civilization, seemingly highly militarized. We must enter the atmosphere to contact or observe the locals.

column2: 'The local leaders mistook our ship for the advanced military technology of their political enemies. Before we could explain ourselves, the warlords chose to launch a pre-emptive nuclear attack on our ship and all enemy factions. We have received damage and triggered planetwide nuclear war...
column3: 'The local leaders mistook our ship for the advanced military technology of their political enemies. Before we could explain ourselves, the warlords chose to launch a pre-emptive nuclear attack on our ship and all enemy factions. We have received damage and triggered planetwide nuclear war...

column2: 'We could leave the planet and have the locals sort out their differences. Then again, we could try to mitigate the fresh humanitarian catastrophe with a strategic military intervention. If we can force the warlords to demilitarize or exhaust their stockpiles into space, perhaps this civilization still has a chance?
column3: 'We could leave the planet and have the locals sort out their differences. Then again, we could try to mitigate the fresh humanitarian catastrophe with a strategic military intervention. If we can force the warlords to demilitarize or exhaust their stockpiles into space, perhaps this civilization still has a chance?

column2: 'Leave the locals to sort out their differences
column3: 'Leave the locals to sort out their differences

column2: 'The locals prove to be super xenophobic. Armed to the teeth with nuclear and conventional weapons, their leaders have adopted a policy of avoiding contact with aliens (including us). We are politely told to "get off their planet and leave them alone". We could send covert operatives to investigate the planet for covert possibilities.
column3: 'The locals prove to be super xenophobic. Armed to the teeth with nuclear and conventional weapons, their leaders have adopted a policy of avoiding contact with aliens (including us). We are politely told to "get off their planet and leave them alone". We could send covert operatives to investigate the planet for covert possibilities.

column2: 'Leave the locals, they obviously need time to evolve
column3: 'Leave the locals, they obviously need time to evolve

column2: 'As we leave the planet, we see more and more nuclear explosions erupting on the surface. Everybody onboard feels sorry for the primitives. A few of the crew discuss the existentialist question of xenointervention until the early morning hours.
column3: 'As we leave the planet, we see more and more nuclear explosions erupting on the surface. Everybody onboard feels sorry for the primitives. A few of the crew discuss the existentialist question of xenointervention until the early morning hours.

column2: 'After orbital bombardment, the local warlords were ultimately forced to capitulate and disarm. The rebuilding can start but much of the planet is now a nuclear wasteland. We confiscate their remaining nuclear stockpiles and heavy military technology. We leave behind some printed tech to help the survivors.
column3: 'After orbital bombardment, the local warlords were ultimately forced to capitulate and disarm. The rebuilding can start but much of the planet is now a nuclear wasteland. We confiscate their remaining nuclear stockpiles and heavy military technology. We leave behind some printed tech to help the survivors.

column2: 'The enemy proved to be more resilient and narrow-mined than we estimated. Our intervention did not help to de-escalate the war. The factions fought until the exhaustion of their nuclear stockpiles, releasing a nuclear winter. This is a disaster and we left the planet feeling truly sorry for the poor fools.
column3: 'The enemy proved to be more resilient and narrow-mined than we estimated. Our intervention did not help to de-escalate the war. The factions fought until the exhaustion of their nuclear stockpiles, releasing a nuclear winter. This is a disaster and we left the planet feeling truly sorry for the poor fools.

column2: 'Our operatives have infiltrated the local civilization, a truly barbarian society ruled by fear and violence. Our crew could take over some local warlords assets and smuggle them out of the planet.
column3: 'Our operatives have infiltrated the local civilization, a truly barbarian society ruled by fear and violence. Our crew could take over some local warlords assets and smuggle them out of the planet.

column2: 'The local primitive financial system was helpless against our digital warfare, and we managed to seemingly legally acquire immense assets across the globe, including a nuke. We redistributed a majority of the assets towards the seemingly most benevolent local organisations and smuggled many munitions out of the planet, replacing them with plastic replicas.
column3: 'The local primitive financial system was helpless against our digital warfare, and we managed to seemingly legally acquire immense assets across the globe, including a nuke. We redistributed a majority of the assets towards the seemingly most benevolent local organisations and smuggled many munitions out of the planet, replacing them with plastic replicas.

column2: 'The local primitive financial system was helpless against our digital warfare, and we managed to seemingly legally acquire a large stockpile of nuclear fuel and other resources. Smuggling it out from the planet along with our operatives was a bit more difficult, but ultimately successful.
column3: 'The local primitive financial system was helpless against our digital warfare, and we managed to seemingly legally acquire a large stockpile of nuclear fuel and other resources. Smuggling it out from the planet along with our operatives was a bit more difficult, but ultimately successful.

column2: 'The local factions discovered our smuggler shuttles and mistook them for the advanced military technology of their local enemies. Before we could do anything, the local leaders chose to launch a pre-emptive nuclear attack on all enemy factions. We have received critical damage and started a nuclear war.
column3: 'The local factions discovered our smuggler shuttles and mistook them for the advanced military technology of their local enemies. Before we could do anything, the local leaders chose to launch a pre-emptive nuclear attack on all enemy factions. We have received critical damage and started a nuclear war.

column2: 'The local leaders mistook our ship for a new generation of military technology of their political enemies. Before we could explain ourselves, the warlords chose to launch an attack on our ship (and all neighbouring enemy factions for good measure). We neutralized the missiles aimed at us, but have triggered a small war involving millions of individuals. We chose to leave.
column3: 'The local leaders mistook our ship for a new generation of military technology of their political enemies. Before we could explain ourselves, the warlords chose to launch an attack on our ship (and all neighbouring enemy factions for good measure). We neutralized the missiles aimed at us, but have triggered a small war involving millions of individuals. We chose to leave.

column2: 'The local primitive financial system was helpless against our digital warfare, and we acquired a large stockpile of resources. However, our operatives were ambushed by local special forces as they were trying to leave the planet. The crew received light wounds and evacuated, leaving most of the loot behind.
column3: 'The local primitive financial system was helpless against our digital warfare, and we acquired a large stockpile of resources. However, our operatives were ambushed by local special forces as they were trying to leave the planet. The crew received light wounds and evacuated, leaving most of the loot behind.

column1: '2 Pi Freetravellers colony, FORCT, trader w engineL4.prefab

column2: 'The Freetravellers find our mission important, but with too specific goals for their taste. We hear many personal stories about the existential value of free exploration, without any specific goal other than discovering new information by movement. They give us supplies for our journey.
column3: 'The Freetravellers find our mission important, but with too specific goals for their taste. We hear many personal stories about the existential value of free exploration, without any specific goal other than discovering new information by movement. They give us supplies for our journey.

column2: 'This is a colony of an advanced civilization, a multispecies community of "Freetravellers".\nThey are united in their love of travel and are one of the most well-spread factions. \nVisitors like us are a regular thing for the locals and we are nonchalantly given access to their city. Local tourist information tells us that the colony is built on ancient Precursor ruins.
column3: 'This is a colony of an advanced civilization, a multispecies community of "Freetravellers".\nThey are united in their love of travel and are one of the most well-spread factions. \nVisitors like us are a regular thing for the locals and we are nonchalantly given access to their city. Local tourist information tells us that the colony is built on ancient Precursor ruins.

column2: 'The psychedelic trip left our representatives with a profound new understanding that they were fools on so many levels. The experience was deeply enjoyable.
column3: 'The psychedelic trip left our representatives with a profound new understanding that they were fools on so many levels. The experience was deeply enjoyable.

column2: 'The Freetravellers find our mission exciting, and some even decided to join us! The AI heartily welcomed the new crewmembers and we threw a small party aboard our ship. The crew felt super satisfied when we left the planet.
column3: 'The Freetravellers find our mission exciting, and some even decided to join us! The AI heartily welcomed the new crewmembers and we threw a small party aboard our ship. The crew felt super satisfied when we left the planet.

column2: 'The local Freetravellers inform us that we have arrived at a most suitable time, as their whole population is about to embark on a psychedelic trip to some other reality (which somehow is connected to the warp dimension). They invite us to participate in the experience.
column3: 'The local Freetravellers inform us that we have arrived at a most suitable time, as their whole population is about to embark on a psychedelic trip to some other reality (which somehow is connected to the warp dimension). They invite us to participate in the experience.

column2: 'The Freetravellers held celebrations for our visit and also invited us to an ancient-style camping trip into untamed nature. The locals shared a psychedelic journey with us, providing our ambassadors with great insight into the nature of reality. The crew felt super satisfied as we left the planet, receiving many gifts.
column3: 'The Freetravellers held celebrations for our visit and also invited us to an ancient-style camping trip into untamed nature. The locals shared a psychedelic journey with us, providing our ambassadors with great insight into the nature of reality. The crew felt super satisfied as we left the planet, receiving many gifts.

column2: 'During urban exploration, our team meets a pair of Freetravellers from to the Yu-Ee species. They need exotics right now for some kind of very exclusive party. They are willing to trade away their super-advanced ship engine if we have what they need.
column3: 'During urban exploration, our team meets a pair of Freetravellers from to the Yu-Ee species. They need exotics right now for some kind of very exclusive party. They are willing to trade away their super-advanced ship engine if we have what they need.

column2: 'Buy the engine, now or never [-7 exotics]
column3: 'Buy the engine, now or never [-7 exotics]

column2: 'The engine is delivered as promised. The traders have included a symbolic bonus with the delivery, some fuel "to help us keep moving against the currents of existential static".
column3: 'The engine is delivered as promised. The traders have included a symbolic bonus with the delivery, some fuel "to help us keep moving against the currents of existential static".

column2: 'The planet is inhabited by a primitive, digital-era civilization which seems to be currently engaged in a global military conflict. We could remotely hook into their communications network and see what this is about.
column3: 'The planet is inhabited by a primitive, digital-era civilization which seems to be currently engaged in a global military conflict. We could remotely hook into their communications network and see what this is about.

column2: 'After orbital bombardment and destroying a few important military command centers, the biggest factions on the planet agree on planetwide peace and removal of borders. The planet has become a wasteland but the survivors have started rebuilding their world. We confiscate some local weapons of mass destruction, scrapping them for resources.
column3: 'After orbital bombardment and destroying a few important military command centers, the biggest factions on the planet agree on planetwide peace and removal of borders. The planet has become a wasteland but the survivors have started rebuilding their world. We confiscate some local weapons of mass destruction, scrapping them for resources.

column2: 'The local favourite technology is chemical weaponry due to biochemical vulnerabilities of local life. Most of the planet's ecology seems to be already destroyed as collateral damage and the planetwide war is only escalating. The entire population of the planet has been militarized.
column3: 'The local favourite technology is chemical weaponry due to biochemical vulnerabilities of local life. Most of the planet's ecology seems to be already destroyed as collateral damage and the planetwide war is only escalating. The entire population of the planet has been militarized.

column2: 'Attempt to convince the locals to stop fighting
column3: 'Attempt to convince the locals to stop fighting

column2: 'Our interference only escalates the conflict, and the locals seem to be more ingenious than thought. They are able to survive our show of force and even hit us with a massive swarm of cruise missiles. We abort the mission and leave the locals to their own fate.
column3: 'Our interference only escalates the conflict, and the locals seem to be more ingenious than thought. They are able to survive our show of force and even hit us with a massive swarm of cruise missiles. We abort the mission and leave the locals to their own fate.

column2: 'We leave. Getting rid of militaristic leaders is the responsibility of the people who follow them, it's just a challenge every civilization needs to learn.
column3: 'We leave. Getting rid of militaristic leaders is the responsibility of the people who follow them, it's just a challenge every civilization needs to learn.

column2: 'After orbital bombardment and destroying a few important military command centers, the biggest factions on the planet agree on planetwide peace and removal of borders. The planet has become a wasteland but the survivors have started rebuilding their world. We confiscate some local weapons of mass destruction, scrapping them for resources (and some organics).
column3: 'After orbital bombardment and destroying a few important military command centers, the biggest factions on the planet agree on planetwide peace and removal of borders. The planet has become a wasteland but the survivors have started rebuilding their world. We confiscate some local weapons of mass destruction, scrapping them for resources (and some organics).

column2: 'The local leaders do not want to end the war. They use planetwide deep propaganda to make sure the population thinks nothing good comes out of us, or other planetary factions. We could try forcing the war to stop with our superior military technology, but going to war against the entire planet obviously carries some risks.
column3: 'The local leaders do not want to end the war. They use planetwide deep propaganda to make sure the population thinks nothing good comes out of us, or other planetary factions. We could try forcing the war to stop with our superior military technology, but going to war against the entire planet obviously carries some risks.

column2: 'Interfere with conflict from orbit, force local leaders to disarm
column3: 'Interfere with conflict from orbit, force local leaders to disarm

column2: 'The local leaders are not very skilled at communication, and remain resolute to continue the war until victory or death. Getting rid of militaristic leaders is the responsibility of the people who follow them, it's just a challenge every civilization needs to learn.
column3: 'The local leaders are not very skilled at communication, and remain resolute to continue the war until victory or death. Getting rid of militaristic leaders is the responsibility of the people who follow them, it's just a challenge every civilization needs to learn.

column2: 'We are able to convince the largest warring factions to hold temporary ceasefires in order to assess colletaral damage to the planet's ecosystem. The leaders do not realize they are already too late and 90% of all local life will perish in the coming years due to the ecological damage the planet has suffered.
column3: 'We are able to convince the largest warring factions to hold temporary ceasefires in order to assess colletaral damage to the planet's ecosystem. The leaders do not realize they are already too late and 90% of all local life will perish in the coming years due to the ecological damage the planet has suffered.

column1: '2 Pi pyramid refugee colony FOC trade mlaser4, stinger2.prefab

column2: 'After hearing of our journey across the galaxy, some locals ask to join us. They bring some life supplies with them.
column3: 'After hearing of our journey across the galaxy, some locals ask to join us. They bring some life supplies with them.

column2: 'Adventurer from a planet of refugees rescued from primitive tyrants. Wanted to see the big world.
column3: 'Adventurer from a planet of refugees rescued from primitive tyrants. Wanted to see the big world.

column2: 'The module is delivered to Mothership cargo bay as promised. The trader has included a symbolic bonus with the delivery, a silver sculpture depicting group sex of warp animals.
column3: 'The module is delivered to Mothership cargo bay as promised. The trader has included a symbolic bonus with the delivery, a silver sculpture depicting group sex of warp animals.

column2: 'The colony representatives have a chat with our AI and decide to support our cause. They add starfuel to our tanks and give us some locally produced food.
column3: 'The colony representatives have a chat with our AI and decide to support our cause. They add starfuel to our tanks and give us some locally produced food.

column2: 'The locals lead our ambassadors to a guest area and provide access to modest life-support facilities, including free food.
column3: 'The locals lead our ambassadors to a guest area and provide access to modest life-support facilities, including free food.

column2: '"We do not have the tools to continue repairing your ship. The damage is more extensive than I originally estimated. However, we also spent less metal than expected."
column3: '"We do not have the tools to continue repairing your ship. The damage is more extensive than I originally estimated. However, we also spent less metal than expected."

column2: 'Before we leave, the local representatives bring us a minor gift from their community.
column3: 'Before we leave, the local representatives bring us a minor gift from their community.

column2: 'We are approached by a pair of local asteroid miners. Hearing of our quest, they ask if we are interested in buying a set of 3 mining lasers. One of their mining ships crashed recently and will be decommissioned, but all of its weapons should be still functional. The weapons should also provide much synthethics if scrapped, they explain.
column3: 'We are approached by a pair of local asteroid miners. Hearing of our quest, they ask if we are interested in buying a set of 3 mining lasers. One of their mining ships crashed recently and will be decommissioned, but all of its weapons should be still functional. The weapons should also provide much synthethics if scrapped, they explain.

column2: '"Sorry, not enough Credits for this operation."
column3: '"Sorry, not enough Credits for this operation."

column2: 'The modules are delivered to Mothership cargo bay as promised. The traders have included a symbolic bonus with the delivery, a container of psychedelic honey produced by local insects.
column3: 'The modules are delivered to Mothership cargo bay as promised. The traders have included a symbolic bonus with the delivery, a container of psychedelic honey produced by local insects.

column2: 'The anti-tyranny fund representative gives you a formal blessing and promises to make the universe a better place with the resources. Your reputation increases considerably.
column3: 'The anti-tyranny fund representative gives you a formal blessing and promises to make the universe a better place with the resources. Your reputation increases considerably.

column2: 'One of the locals requests a formal audience. She explains that she is from a planet ruled by violent tyrants, not much better than the slavers. She is raising a fund to create an army of bots that would liberate the planet and guard the population from violence. She asks if you can support her noble cause.
column3: 'One of the locals requests a formal audience. She explains that she is from a planet ruled by violent tyrants, not much better than the slavers. She is raising a fund to create an army of bots that would liberate the planet and guard the population from violence. She asks if you can support her noble cause.

column2: 'This is a multispecies refugee colony. Visitor info suggests that an alliance of benevolent advanced civilizations rescued many individuals from various violence-ruled planets, and donated this desert planet as a new home, so that they may live in peace.
column3: 'This is a multispecies refugee colony. Visitor info suggests that an alliance of benevolent advanced civilizations rescued many individuals from various violence-ruled planets, and donated this desert planet as a new home, so that they may live in peace.

column2: 'One of the local refugees, seeing our ship, offers to try to repair some of the damage. He represents a group of freelancer engineers. Their service costs 100 Credits per order plus metals, and he cannot give any guarantees.
column3: 'One of the local refugees, seeing our ship, offers to try to repair some of the damage. He represents a group of freelancer engineers. Their service costs 100 Credits per order plus metals, and he cannot give any guarantees.

column2: 'The freelancer engineers seem to enjoy manual work. They use metal and locally recycled scrap alloys to restore our ship's integrity. After a while, we are informed that the work is finished. The result looks satisfactory.
column3: 'The freelancer engineers seem to enjoy manual work. They use metal and locally recycled scrap alloys to restore our ship's integrity. After a while, we are informed that the work is finished. The result looks satisfactory.

column2: 'Our crew takes time to look around the planet and its various commercial venues aimed at culture-visitors. Eventually we are approached by a pair of traders. They offer us a rapid-fire cannon. "SUPERIOR QUALITY" they claim.
column3: 'Our crew takes time to look around the planet and its various commercial venues aimed at culture-visitors. Eventually we are approached by a pair of traders. They offer us a rapid-fire cannon. "SUPERIOR QUALITY" they claim.

column1: '2 Pi Trader planet x3, PECM2or3, warp3, LRsensor3.prefab

column2: 'There is a small colony of tech traders on this otherwise desolate planet. The colony demands a small "parking fee" for landing on the planet and being able to shop here.
column3: 'There is a small colony of tech traders on this otherwise desolate planet. The colony demands a small "parking fee" for landing on the planet and being able to shop here.

column2: 'After exploring the wares, a pair of self-contained resource packs catch your attention. The Gitchankis salesmen ask an extremely modest price. Additionally, they point out, the organics in the package are harvested with highest environmental protection standards.
column3: 'After exploring the wares, a pair of self-contained resource packs catch your attention. The Gitchankis salesmen ask an extremely modest price. Additionally, they point out, the organics in the package are harvested with highest environmental protection standards.

column2: 'The module is delivered to the Mothership cargo bay as promised. The trader has included a bonus to the delivery, a small amount of fungus brew.
column3: 'The module is delivered to the Mothership cargo bay as promised. The trader has included a bonus to the delivery, a small amount of fungus brew.

column2: 'After inspecting the wares, you find an advanced warpdrive for sale. The Gor-Mor salesmen claim it's a very high quality device. Additionally, they point out, it is made according to high environmental protection standards.
column3: 'After inspecting the wares, you find an advanced warpdrive for sale. The Gor-Mor salesmen claim it's a very high quality device. Additionally, they point out, it is made according to high environmental protection standards.

column2: 'The module is delivered to the Mothership cargo bay as promised. The trader has included a bonus to the delivery, a small amount of fuel and a box of exotic fruits.
column3: 'The module is delivered to the Mothership cargo bay as promised. The trader has included a bonus to the delivery, a small amount of fuel and a box of exotic fruits.

column2: 'After inspecting the wares, you find an advanced long range sensor for sale. The Yu-Ee salesmen claim its a very high quality device. Additionally, they point out, it is made according to high environmental protection standards.
column3: 'After inspecting the wares, you find an advanced long range sensor for sale. The Yu-Ee salesmen claim its a very high quality device. Additionally, they point out, it is made according to high environmental protection standards.

column2: 'The module is delivered to the Mothership cargo bay as promised. The trader has included a symbolic bonus to the delivery, a barrel of mildly intoxicating beverage.
column3: 'The module is delivered to the Mothership cargo bay as promised. The trader has included a symbolic bonus to the delivery, a barrel of mildly intoxicating beverage.

column1: '2 Pi white cavepeople M, want fuel.prefab

column2: 'After delivering a volume of organics, we are directed to a field of large crystals, which the Absorbers have collected as beauty objects to be watched under the stars. As a gift, our AI additionally gives the locals exact replicas of the crystals (made of plastic), so they can continue to admire them under starry nights.
column3: 'After delivering a volume of organics, we are directed to a field of large crystals, which the Absorbers have collected as beauty objects to be watched under the stars. As a gift, our AI additionally gives the locals exact replicas of the crystals (made of plastic), so they can continue to admire them under starry nights.

column2: 'We've discovered and contacted a primitive civilization. The humanoids call themselves Absorbers. Their body contains a microorganism which allows them to consume a variety of chemicals by absorbing them through their skin. After a long conversation with our AI, they propose a trade. They want some of our organics and are willing to sell their rarest crystals.
column3: 'We've discovered and contacted a primitive civilization. The humanoids call themselves Absorbers. Their body contains a microorganism which allows them to consume a variety of chemicals by absorbing them through their skin. After a long conversation with our AI, they propose a trade. They want some of our organics and are willing to sell their rarest crystals.

column2: 'After delivering a volume of organics, we are directed to a field of large crystals, which the Absorbers have collected as beauty objects to be watched under the stars. They gave us the biggest one.
column3: 'After delivering a volume of organics, we are directed to a field of large crystals, which the Absorbers have collected as beauty objects to be watched under the stars. They gave us the biggest one.

column2: 'We have found a truly anomalous planet. Instead of a sphere, it is an empty shell. This is most likely the result of a mega-anomaly. The rumors say some of them eat planet cores. We could take a closer look inside, scientific data on this place is probably worth something.
column3: 'We have found a truly anomalous planet. Instead of a sphere, it is an empty shell. This is most likely the result of a mega-anomaly. The rumors say some of them eat planet cores. We could take a closer look inside, scientific data on this place is probably worth something.

column2: 'As we expected, the planet has been wiped clean of more valuable minerals. The visuals were interesting though, and we documented the phenomenon for scientific research.
column3: 'As we expected, the planet has been wiped clean of more valuable minerals. The visuals were interesting though, and we documented the phenomenon for scientific research.

column2: 'Exploring the planet insides provided valuable scientific data and revealed a few mineral concentrations, metals from inside the now cool planet core.
column3: 'Exploring the planet insides provided valuable scientific data and revealed a few mineral concentrations, metals from inside the now cool planet core.

column2: 'As we are preparing to leave, a large warp worm emerges from within the planet's crust and attacks us! These creatures are known to swallow smaller spacecraft whole. We could either attempt to kill it or overburn the engines to attempt conventional escape.
column3: 'As we are preparing to leave, a large warp worm emerges from within the planet's crust and attacks us! These creatures are known to swallow smaller spacecraft whole. We could either attempt to kill it or overburn the engines to attempt conventional escape.

column2: 'The warp animal used personal Warptunnel to get into biting range of our ship, ripping off a large part of the ship just before we were able to kill it. There was partially digested technology inside the animal remains, but we had already received critical damage by the time the creature died.
column3: 'The warp animal used personal Warptunnel to get into biting range of our ship, ripping off a large part of the ship just before we were able to kill it. There was partially digested technology inside the animal remains, but we had already received critical damage by the time the creature died.

column2: 'The warp animal used personal Warptunnel to get into biting range of our ship. It ripped off a part of the ship and sizzled back into warpspace before we could deal a fatal attack, leaving behind a piece of its tail.
column3: 'The warp animal used personal Warptunnel to get into biting range of our ship. It ripped off a part of the ship and sizzled back into warpspace before we could deal a fatal attack, leaving behind a piece of its tail.

column2: 'The warp animal used personal Warptunnel to get into biting range of our ship. It ripped off external parts and then curled itself around the ship, crushing it. Finally, overburning the engines allowed us to escape the situation, but the ship had already received critical damage.
column3: 'The warp animal used personal Warptunnel to get into biting range of our ship. It ripped off external parts and then curled itself around the ship, crushing it. Finally, overburning the engines allowed us to escape the situation, but the ship had already received critical damage.

column2: 'As we expected, the planet has been wiped clean of more valuable minerals. The visuals were interesting though, and documenting the phenomenon has some scientific value.
column3: 'As we expected, the planet has been wiped clean of more valuable minerals. The visuals were interesting though, and documenting the phenomenon has some scientific value.

column2: 'We are unable to lose it, as it keeps following and attacking our ship using personal Warptunnel. It is trying to appear in the biting range and also takes huge swings at us with its giant tail. We cannot avoid fighting any longer.
column3: 'We are unable to lose it, as it keeps following and attacking our ship using personal Warptunnel. It is trying to appear in the biting range and also takes huge swings at us with its giant tail. We cannot avoid fighting any longer.

column2: 'Overburning the engines allowed us to escape the creature, but we suffered multiple malfunctions and leaks during the escape attempt.
column3: 'Overburning the engines allowed us to escape the creature, but we suffered multiple malfunctions and leaks during the escape attempt.

column2: 'The planet is covered in ice but shows no signs of life despite abundant water reserves. Send explorers into atmosphere?
column3: 'The planet is covered in ice but shows no signs of life despite abundant water reserves. Send explorers into atmosphere?

column2: 'The planet featured truly beautiful scenery of ice and rocks, but nothing useful was found. Some of the crew took time to play with snow.
column3: 'The planet featured truly beautiful scenery of ice and rocks, but nothing useful was found. Some of the crew took time to play with snow.

column2: 'A giant piece of a ship or a building was found under the snow. It's thousands of years old and all the finer details have degraded beyond recognition.
column3: 'A giant piece of a ship or a building was found under the snow. It's thousands of years old and all the finer details have degraded beyond recognition.

column2: 'The planet was covered in desolate deserts of snow. Our exploration team had a long conversation about death.
column3: 'The planet was covered in desolate deserts of snow. Our exploration team had a long conversation about death.

column2: 'A spaceship wreck was located on one of the polar caps. Ship logs were intact and showed it was a private ship that had to make an emergency landing after being attacked by space life. The crew was rescued by somebody before us. We salvaged the whole vessel.
column3: 'A spaceship wreck was located on one of the polar caps. Ship logs were intact and showed it was a private ship that had to make an emergency landing after being attacked by space life. The crew was rescued by somebody before us. We salvaged the whole vessel.

column2: 'A spaceship wreck was located on one of the polar caps. Ship logs were intact and showed it was a private ship that had to make an emergency landing after wardrive malfunction. To our surprise, we found the crew sleeping in cryosleep and enjoying artificial dreams. They decided to join us after a private chat with our AI.
column3: 'A spaceship wreck was located on one of the polar caps. Ship logs were intact and showed it was a private ship that had to make an emergency landing after wardrive malfunction. To our surprise, we found the crew sleeping in cryosleep and enjoying artificial dreams. They decided to join us after a private chat with our AI.

column2: 'We found an abandoned communications station at one of the planet's polar caps. It had run out of fuel but is otherwise completely intact. We also recovered valuable xenodata during salvage operations.
column3: 'We found an abandoned communications station at one of the planet's polar caps. It had run out of fuel but is otherwise completely intact. We also recovered valuable xenodata during salvage operations.

column2: 'The wreckage is damaged beyond repair and all systems seem to be offline. Allow scavenging engineers to board the ship?
column3: 'The wreckage is damaged beyond repair and all systems seem to be offline. Allow scavenging engineers to board the ship?

column2: 'Scavenging operation completed. All fine technology inside the wreckage has degraded beyond saving, so we scrapped everything for useful materials. The ship's core vault contained a bag of hermetically sealed Cranch-Ung snacks and a giant crystal.
column3: 'Scavenging operation completed. All fine technology inside the wreckage has degraded beyond saving, so we scrapped everything for useful materials. The ship's core vault contained a bag of hermetically sealed Cranch-Ung snacks and a giant crystal.

column2: 'Scavenging operation completed. The ship contained an almost intact piece of technology.
column3: 'Scavenging operation completed. The ship contained an almost intact piece of technology.

column2: 'Scavenging operation completed. Somehow, a particularly insidious nanobot from the scavenged ship materials avoided our decontamination procedures and got aboard our ship. Their colony started to eat away some of the Mothership tech parts and grow rapidly. Large sections of the ship had to be destroyed to stop the infestation.
column3: 'Scavenging operation completed. Somehow, a particularly insidious nanobot from the scavenged ship materials avoided our decontamination procedures and got aboard our ship. Their colony started to eat away some of the Mothership tech parts and grow rapidly. Large sections of the ship had to be destroyed to stop the infestation.

column2: 'Taking a look inside the wreckage, our engineers found an armored cryopod containing a frozen terran cat. She passed all decontamination procedures and is now an important member of the crew.
column3: 'Taking a look inside the wreckage, our engineers found an armored cryopod containing a frozen terran cat. She passed all decontamination procedures and is now an important member of the crew.

column2: 'Taking a look inside the wreckage, our engineers found an armored cryopod containing a frozen Moleculaati. These rare noncarbon creatures are scattered throughout space, without a hint to their origin.
column3: 'Taking a look inside the wreckage, our engineers found an armored cryopod containing a frozen Moleculaati. These rare noncarbon creatures are scattered throughout space, without a hint to their origin.

column2: 'This refueling outpost is offline. Closer inspection reveals the station systems have broken down due to a series of malfunctions, accumulating over the years. There's still some fuel inside the station tanks. The Earth Alliance crew who built it will probably want to repair the station later on.
column3: 'This refueling outpost is offline. Closer inspection reveals the station systems have broken down due to a series of malfunctions, accumulating over the years. There's still some fuel inside the station tanks. The Earth Alliance crew who built it will probably want to repair the station later on.

column2: 'Our fuel tanks are too full. We can return later when we have greater fuel capacity.
column3: 'Our fuel tanks are too full. We can return later when we have greater fuel capacity.

column2: 'There's no fuel left to collect. We've obtained all the fuel.
column3: 'There's no fuel left to collect. We've obtained all the fuel.

column2: 'This refueling outpost is offline, and there's a cloud of dispersed starfuel around it. Looks like an accident.
column3: 'This refueling outpost is offline, and there's a cloud of dispersed starfuel around it. Looks like an accident.

column2: 'There's no fuel left to collect, we've taken everything.
column3: 'There's no fuel left to collect, we've taken everything.

column2: '"Hello, I have fresh, well-kept starfuel, ready to serve your surely-benevolent purposes!" says the minor AI managing the outpost.
column3: '"Hello, I have fresh, well-kept starfuel, ready to serve your surely-benevolent purposes!" says the minor AI managing the outpost.

column2: 'The station AI reports having exactly {0} units of fuel left.
column3: 'The station AI reports having exactly {0} units of fuel left.

column2: '"Most respected visitor, I must regrettably inform you that I have run out of fuel. Please return when I have resupplied (resupply date unpredictable). Thank you and have a merry existence!"
column3: '"Most respected visitor, I must regrettably inform you that I have run out of fuel. Please return when I have resupplied (resupply date unpredictable). Thank you and have a merry existence!"

column2: 'We safely passed the superlight warp storm, and we've found truly alien life. These non-carbon plant-like organisms seem to filtrate exotic matter from the atmosphere. A harvesting operation here might yield spectacular results. Harvesting the exotic gases would need a significant recalibration of our harvester technology.
column3: 'We safely passed the superlight warp storm, and we've found truly alien life. These non-carbon plant-like organisms seem to filtrate exotic matter from the atmosphere. A harvesting operation here might yield spectacular results. Harvesting the exotic gases would need a significant recalibration of our harvester technology.

column2: 'Our bots take some samples and we move on, leaving this planet completely intact from our "external" influence. The scientific data of this ecosystem is worth a small fortune. The sanity of our crew was protected by the effect of exotics consumed before the operation.
column3: 'Our bots take some samples and we move on, leaving this planet completely intact from our "external" influence. The scientific data of this ecosystem is worth a small fortune. The sanity of our crew was protected by the effect of exotics consumed before the operation.

column2: 'We are witnessing a rare anomaly only few have ever seen. We could fly through the storm and investigate what might be causing it, as the storm is too weak to harm our ship. However the crew should consume exotics to prevent the warpfield from endangering their minds.
column3: 'We are witnessing a rare anomaly only few have ever seen. We could fly through the storm and investigate what might be causing it, as the storm is too weak to harm our ship. However the crew should consume exotics to prevent the warpfield from endangering their minds.

column2: 'Since the organisms were unconsumable as organics, our harvesters tried to leave them intact and only collect the gas inside.
column3: 'Since the organisms were unconsumable as organics, our harvesters tried to leave them intact and only collect the gas inside.

column2: 'We safely passed the superlight warp storm, and we've found truly alien life. These non-carbon organisms seem to draw exotic matter from the environment and store it in giant, moving tentacles. A research & harvesting mission might yield spectacular results.
column3: 'We safely passed the superlight warp storm, and we've found truly alien life. These non-carbon organisms seem to draw exotic matter from the environment and store it in giant, moving tentacles. A research & harvesting mission might yield spectacular results.

column2: 'Let's see if we can scrap anything for the necessary resources
column3: 'Let's see if we can scrap anything for the necessary resources

column2: 'The operation yields significant results. We were able to recover & recycle some of the resources spent installing mining equipment.
