column3: 'The operation yields significant results. We were able to recover & recycle some of the resources spent installing mining equipment.

column2: 'we may scrap modules now to gain needed resources..%
column3: 'we may scrap modules now to gain needed resources..%

column2: 'Mining operations completed without incident. Unfortunately, most of the exotic minerals were located too deep in the ground for us to reach them.
column3: 'Mining operations completed without incident. Unfortunately, most of the exotic minerals were located too deep in the ground for us to reach them.

column2: 'Geological scan revealed a particularly large abyss leading to exposed veins of metallic minerals, possibly including exotics. The planet is seismically moderately active. Mining from the abyss needs installation of some dedicated equipment.
column3: 'Geological scan revealed a particularly large abyss leading to exposed veins of metallic minerals, possibly including exotics. The planet is seismically moderately active. Mining from the abyss needs installation of some dedicated equipment.

column2: 'The abyss was shining with exotic minerals and our bots mined as much as was accessible. No wonder the owners of this planet didn't want to share the local resources.
column3: 'The abyss was shining with exotic minerals and our bots mined as much as was accessible. No wonder the owners of this planet didn't want to share the local resources.

column2: 'Seismic activity increased rapidly during the operation, turning quickly into a full-blown earthquake. Most of the technology printed for this mission got trapped undergound, and we lost access to the mineral seam.
column3: 'Seismic activity increased rapidly during the operation, turning quickly into a full-blown earthquake. Most of the technology printed for this mission got trapped undergound, and we lost access to the mineral seam.

column2: 'Print long-range missiles, neutralize satellites from distance [-30 explosives]
column3: 'Print long-range missiles, neutralize satellites from distance [-30 explosives]

column2: 'Leave this planet, it's not worth the risk
column3: 'Leave this planet, it's not worth the risk

column2: 'We were able to slip past the orbital defences thanks to electronic countermeasures.
column3: 'We were able to slip past the orbital defences thanks to electronic countermeasures.

column2: 'We managed to destroy all the defence satellites. Their remains scattered too far and wide to salvage anything.
column3: 'We managed to destroy all the defence satellites. Their remains scattered too far and wide to salvage anything.

column2: 'We tried to slip past the orbital defences using various electronic countermeasures, but were still discovered. Our counter-fire destroyed most of the defence satellites.
column3: 'We tried to slip past the orbital defences using various electronic countermeasures, but were still discovered. Our counter-fire destroyed most of the defence satellites.

column2: 'We sent a swarm of missiles at the satellites, but some of them remain intact.
column3: 'We sent a swarm of missiles at the satellites, but some of them remain intact.

column1: '3 P ancient medbay, stone age civ.prefab

column2: 'It seems somebody has left an active regeneration module on this planet and the local primitives are using it. \nThe locals seem to be barely intelligent, capable of using only the most primitive mechanical tools. The healer module works automatically when anybody steps in.
column3: 'It seems somebody has left an active regeneration module on this planet and the local primitives are using it. \nThe locals seem to be barely intelligent, capable of using only the most primitive mechanical tools. The healer module works automatically when anybody steps in.

column2: 'Presence of such supertechnology will surely have an interesting effect on the evolution of the local presentients. We record some of the local evolutionary xenodata and leave this planet otherwise untouched.
column3: 'Presence of such supertechnology will surely have an interesting effect on the evolution of the local presentients. We record some of the local evolutionary xenodata and leave this planet otherwise untouched.

column2: 'The local creatures clumsily run away when we land near the module. We disassemble it and transport it back to the Mothership, all in a days work. The local animals must unfortunately now suffer disease and mortality as the rest of the primitives in the galaxy.
column3: 'The local creatures clumsily run away when we land near the module. We disassemble it and transport it back to the Mothership, all in a days work. The local animals must unfortunately now suffer disease and mortality as the rest of the primitives in the galaxy.

column2: 'We are in the middle of disassembling the module when a ball of fire appears in the sky. It then scorches our operation with some kind of orbital beam weapon. One of our crew was critically wounded, multiple bots explode and our ship gets fried as well. We retreat at max speed
column3: 'We are in the middle of disassembling the module when a ball of fire appears in the sky. It then scorches our operation with some kind of orbital beam weapon. One of our crew was critically wounded, multiple bots explode and our ship gets fried as well. We retreat at max speed

column2: 'The local animals surprised us mid-operation by attacking the site in organized swarms. They weren't able to penetrate our crew armor, but broke a few bones and damaged equipment before being scared away.
column3: 'The local animals surprised us mid-operation by attacking the site in organized swarms. They weren't able to penetrate our crew armor, but broke a few bones and damaged equipment before being scared away.

column2: 'We manage to mine the minerals and leave the planet just in time. As soon as we have left the planet, the anomaly "swallows" the entirety of it, disappearing soon after, leaving no trace of the planet. We have witnessed one of the infamous mega-anomalies having a meal.
column3: 'We manage to mine the minerals and leave the planet just in time. As soon as we have left the planet, the anomaly "swallows" the entirety of it, disappearing soon after, leaving no trace of the planet. We have witnessed one of the infamous mega-anomalies having a meal.

column2: 'As we arrive in the vicinity of the planet, a large white cloud forms around it. The cloud starts to slowly circle the planet.
column3: 'As we arrive in the vicinity of the planet, a large white cloud forms around it. The cloud starts to slowly circle the planet.

column2: 'The white cloud extends a tongue-like tentacle from its center and "scoops up" part of the planet, drawing it back into its center. The anomaly then creates a tiny Warpausgang and flows into it like water leaving a sink. We have witnessed one of the infamous Mega-Anomalies eating a planet core.
column3: 'The white cloud extends a tongue-like tentacle from its center and "scoops up" part of the planet, drawing it back into its center. The anomaly then creates a tiny Warpausgang and flows into it like water leaving a sink. We have witnessed one of the infamous Mega-Anomalies eating a planet core.

column2: 'We prospect the inside the planet shell and find a large cloud of broken planet pieces. Some of them contain valuable minerals. Xenodata on the anomaly is worth almost as much as the metal.
column3: 'We prospect the inside the planet shell and find a large cloud of broken planet pieces. Some of them contain valuable minerals. Xenodata on the anomaly is worth almost as much as the metal.

column2: 'We find exposed seams of valuable mineral ores on the planet surface. We could try to mine them quickly with bots (leaving the Mothership itself and crew in safe distance) although the gigantic anomaly above is menacingly circling the planet.
column3: 'We find exposed seams of valuable mineral ores on the planet surface. We could try to mine them quickly with bots (leaving the Mothership itself and crew in safe distance) although the gigantic anomaly above is menacingly circling the planet.

column2: 'Our bots are still in the middle of setting up mining facilities when we see the anomaly suddenly envelop the planet completely, and "swallow" the entirety of it! The anomaly itself then warps off through a personal Warpausgang.
column3: 'Our bots are still in the middle of setting up mining facilities when we see the anomaly suddenly envelop the planet completely, and "swallow" the entirety of it! The anomaly itself then warps off through a personal Warpausgang.

column2: 'Our bots are still prospecting the planet when we see the anomaly suddenly envelop the planet and "swallow" the entirety of it! The anomaly itself then warps off through a personal Warpausgang. Needless to say, contact is lost with the bots forever.
column3: 'Our bots are still prospecting the planet when we see the anomaly suddenly envelop the planet and "swallow" the entirety of it! The anomaly itself then warps off through a personal Warpausgang. Needless to say, contact is lost with the bots forever.

column2: 'We prospect the inside the planet shell, filled with broken planet pieces. While we don't detect any valueble minerals, the data on the anomaly was valuable.
column3: 'We prospect the inside the planet shell, filled with broken planet pieces. While we don't detect any valueble minerals, the data on the anomaly was valuable.

column2: 'Our recordings of the encounter have scientific value.
column3: 'Our recordings of the encounter have scientific value.

column1: '3 P bad vibes and superstition T.prefab

column2: 'Further reconnaissance uncovers no dangers. We also detect a good mineral profile in one of the mountains. The planet hosts early life (mostly moss) too insignificant to harvest. Despite everything, the crewmember remains unchanged that he feels this planet is dangerous.
column3: 'Further reconnaissance uncovers no dangers. We also detect a good mineral profile in one of the mountains. The planet hosts early life (mostly moss) too insignificant to harvest. Despite everything, the crewmember remains unchanged that he feels this planet is dangerous.

column2: 'No incidents. The mountains held a rich mineral profile, including an exotic crystal. We also researched samples of the local moss. You manage to resist the temptation to tell the crewmember "I told you so".
column3: 'No incidents. The mountains held a rich mineral profile, including an exotic crystal. We also researched samples of the local moss. You manage to resist the temptation to tell the crewmember "I told you so".

column2: 'Orbital scans show a young, fragile ecosystem. Low possibility of harvestable organics. One of the crewmembers tells you he's got a bad feeling about this place. Like some kind of surreal fear.
column3: 'Orbital scans show a young, fragile ecosystem. Low possibility of harvestable organics. One of the crewmembers tells you he's got a bad feeling about this place. Like some kind of surreal fear.

column2: 'No incident. The mountains contain abundant seams of silver ore. We also research samples of the local moss. You manage to resist the temptation to tell the crewmember "I told you so".
column3: 'No incident. The mountains contain abundant seams of silver ore. We also research samples of the local moss. You manage to resist the temptation to tell the crewmember "I told you so".

column2: 'This almost moon-sized microplanet has a human-breathable atmosphere and fully developed ecosphere. Massive flocks of birds were spotted flying near the surface. Most interestingly, the planet seems to have several sites which emit active warp energies, probably originating from precursor technology. Send a salvaging team to search for artifacts?
column3: 'This almost moon-sized microplanet has a human-breathable atmosphere and fully developed ecosphere. Massive flocks of birds were spotted flying near the surface. Most interestingly, the planet seems to have several sites which emit active warp energies, probably originating from precursor technology. Send a salvaging team to search for artifacts?

column2: 'Precursor technology retrieved. The birds are visibly nervous around the empty site. Perhaps they can sense their approaching extinction... Some of the crew express contempt over the barbarity of your choices.
column3: 'Precursor technology retrieved. The birds are visibly nervous around the empty site. Perhaps they can sense their approaching extinction... Some of the crew express contempt over the barbarity of your choices.

column2: 'The planet features a unique ecosystem dominated by herbivorous walking birds and almost no plant life. Apparently, Precursors have left behind an organics synthesizer which recycles all organic waste into readily edible food and generates oxygen for the entire planet. Complex eating hierarchies among the birds have evolved. Should we take the precursor technology for ourselves?
column3: 'The planet features a unique ecosystem dominated by herbivorous walking birds and almost no plant life. Apparently, Precursors have left behind an organics synthesizer which recycles all organic waste into readily edible food and generates oxygen for the entire planet. Complex eating hierarchies among the birds have evolved. Should we take the precursor technology for ourselves?

column2: 'You decide to give the planet a chance and leave it untouched, aside from taking a few scientific samples. Dependency on precursor technology remains a weakness for most of the species on the planet, but who knows what kind of paradise this ecosystem might evolve into one day.
column3: 'You decide to give the planet a chance and leave it untouched, aside from taking a few scientific samples. Dependency on precursor technology remains a weakness for most of the species on the planet, but who knows what kind of paradise this ecosystem might evolve into one day.

column2: 'Taking the synthesizers would probably result in a severe extinction event for the existing species, but the ecosystem as a whole would survive. One of the crew mentions that since a majority of the birds would die anyway, we could kill and harvest the birds. Removing organics from the planet would probably only worsen the conditions for whoever survives our visit.
column3: 'Taking the synthesizers would probably result in a severe extinction event for the existing species, but the ecosystem as a whole would survive. One of the crew mentions that since a majority of the birds would die anyway, we could kill and harvest the birds. Removing organics from the planet would probably only worsen the conditions for whoever survives our visit.

column2: 'Retrieve the technology, do not hunt the birds
column3: 'Retrieve the technology, do not hunt the birds

column2: 'Our utility bots killed hundreds of birds, old and young alike, painting the land red with patches of blood. Some of the crewmembers express their disgust over the barbarity of your choices.
column3: 'Our utility bots killed hundreds of birds, old and young alike, painting the land red with patches of blood. Some of the crewmembers express their disgust over the barbarity of your choices.

column2: 'Orbital scans show an average profit outlook. Risk of intense dust storms. We might try prospecting for mineral seams near the surface, but it will take some time and resources.
column3: 'Orbital scans show an average profit outlook. Risk of intense dust storms. We might try prospecting for mineral seams near the surface, but it will take some time and resources.

column2: 'No issues to report. The crew waiting in orbit had quality time playing sex games. We recoverd some of the synthetics used in the operation, reducing overall cost of resources.
column3: 'No issues to report. The crew waiting in orbit had quality time playing sex games. We recoverd some of the synthetics used in the operation, reducing overall cost of resources.

column2: 'We've located a deep fissure in the ground, leading down to exposed seams of valuable iridium minerals. We may install mining facilities and mine a large volume of metals from here.
column3: 'We've located a deep fissure in the ground, leading down to exposed seams of valuable iridium minerals. We may install mining facilities and mine a large volume of metals from here.

column2: 'The dust storm disrupted our operation, landlocking our crew on the surface. They had to wait for days until the storm calmed. This increased the cost of the operation considerably.
column3: 'The dust storm disrupted our operation, landlocking our crew on the surface. They had to wait for days until the storm calmed. This increased the cost of the operation considerably.

column2: 'Unexpected seismic acitivity buried our mining equipment and the entire mining team. We had to spend extra resources to dig out the crew.
column3: 'Unexpected seismic acitivity buried our mining equipment and the entire mining team. We had to spend extra resources to dig out the crew.

column2: 'Our operatives picked fruits, seeds and other plant parts that didn't endanger the life of parent organisms. We were able to collect valuable research data and harvest a significant amount of organics without killing a single individual.
column3: 'Our operatives picked fruits, seeds and other plant parts that didn't endanger the life of parent organisms. We were able to collect valuable research data and harvest a significant amount of organics without killing a single individual.

column2: 'The ecosystem on this planet has developed very similarly to the one on Earth.
column3: 'The ecosystem on this planet has developed very similarly to the one on Earth.

column2: 'Research only. This ecosystem is worth preserving.
column3: 'Research only. This ecosystem is worth preserving.

column2: 'Our bots collected numerous samples of local life resulting in science data. We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched. Would be interesting to see how this alternative Earth develops, in a few million years.
column3: 'Our bots collected numerous samples of local life resulting in science data. We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched. Would be interesting to see how this alternative Earth develops, in a few million years.

column2: 'It was easy to cut the mushrooms and leave their underground parts intact. We were able to harvest organics to max capacity without killing a single organism.
column3: 'It was easy to cut the mushrooms and leave their underground parts intact. We were able to harvest organics to max capacity without killing a single organism.

column2: 'The dominating life form on this planet is a single species of giant mushroom. This means we could carry out a large-scale biomass eco-harvest operation easily and without damaging the local diversity.
column3: 'The dominating life form on this planet is a single species of giant mushroom. This means we could carry out a large-scale biomass eco-harvest operation easily and without damaging the local diversity.

column2: 'Research only. This unique ecosystem is worth preserving.
column3: 'Research only. This unique ecosystem is worth preserving.

column2: 'We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched, except for taking small scientific samples. It would be interesting to see how a planet with such trippy visuals evolves without our intererence.
column3: 'We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched, except for taking small scientific samples. It would be interesting to see how a planet with such trippy visuals evolves without our intererence.

column2: 'This otherwise barren planet seems to be a crash-site for Credits and pieces of a fuel tanker. Some of its de-attached fuel pods are almost intact.
column3: 'This otherwise barren planet seems to be a crash-site for Credits and pieces of a fuel tanker. Some of its de-attached fuel pods are almost intact.

column2: 'Fuel and some scrap collected, no accidents reported.
column3: 'Fuel and some scrap collected, no accidents reported.

column2: 'We collected some fuel and scrap metal from the site. Interestingly, we discovered an unusually deep abyss during the operation. Our recon bots are already exploring the bottom.
column3: 'We collected some fuel and scrap metal from the site. Interestingly, we discovered an unusually deep abyss during the operation. Our recon bots are already exploring the bottom.

column2: 'Incidentally, the abyss leads to exposed veins of valuable metal ores. The planet is seismically minimally active. Print minerbots to mine down in the abyss?
column3: 'Incidentally, the abyss leads to exposed veins of valuable metal ores. The planet is seismically minimally active. Print minerbots to mine down in the abyss?

column2: 'Mining operations completed without incident. An exotic crystal was found in the ore seam.
column3: 'Mining operations completed without incident. An exotic crystal was found in the ore seam.

column2: 'Seismic activity increased rapidly during the operation, turning quickly into a full-blown earthquake. Most of the minerbots printed for this mission managed to escape in time, but a few got trapped undergound forever.
column3: 'Seismic activity increased rapidly during the operation, turning quickly into a full-blown earthquake. Most of the minerbots printed for this mission managed to escape in time, but a few got trapped undergound forever.

column2: 'This lifeless planet is covered with abundant outcroppings of valuable mineral ore. The ore could be easily processed into duranite metal. Initiate surface mining operation?
column3: 'This lifeless planet is covered with abundant outcroppings of valuable mineral ore. The ore could be easily processed into duranite metal. Initiate surface mining operation?

column2: 'Mining and processing completed successfully, no accidents reported.
column3: 'Mining and processing completed successfully, no accidents reported.

column1: '3 P mineral surface outcrops3 M, guarded by satellites m.prefab

column2: 'This lifeless planet is covered with abundant outcroppings of valuable ore. The ore could be easily processed into valuable metal. Initiate surface mining operation?
column3: 'This lifeless planet is covered with abundant outcroppings of valuable ore. The ore could be easily processed into valuable metal. Initiate surface mining operation?

column2: 'Mine & process the ore into metal [-25 fuel]
column3: 'Mine & process the ore into metal [-25 fuel]

column2: '"Warning. This planet is property of GalProspect Incorporated. Failure to respect property borders will result in attack by orbital defences."
column3: '"Warning. This planet is property of GalProspect Incorporated. Failure to respect property borders will result in attack by orbital defences."

column2: 'We managed to destroy the defence satellites.
column3: 'We managed to destroy the defence satellites.

column2: 'We send a swarm of cheaply printed long-range missiles towards the satellite network. Their weapons are too short-ranged for effective counterfire, but they manage to pick off some of our missiles before they reach the target.
column3: 'We send a swarm of cheaply printed long-range missiles towards the satellite network. Their weapons are too short-ranged for effective counterfire, but they manage to pick off some of our missiles before they reach the target.

column2: 'We were able to destroy some of the satellites, but a number of them remain intact. Next action?
column3: 'We were able to destroy some of the satellites, but a number of them remain intact. Next action?

column2: 'We close in on the planet, shooting the defence satellites with everything we got. We receive some counterfire but manage to destroy all the satellites.
column3: 'We close in on the planet, shooting the defence satellites with everything we got. We receive some counterfire but manage to destroy all the satellites.

column1: '3 P nat picturesque iron piles T.prefab

column2: 'The "iron dust" sediments turned out to be very valuable, containing traces of titanium and platinum. One of the resting crewmembers took time to manually paint a picture of the scenery before it was destroyed.
column3: 'The "iron dust" sediments turned out to be very valuable, containing traces of titanium and platinum. One of the resting crewmembers took time to manually paint a picture of the scenery before it was destroyed.

column2: 'Planet-wide iron dust storms prevent us from scanning the surface from orbit. The dust might damage some of our external equipment if we enter the atmosphere. Nothing serious to worry about.
column3: 'Planet-wide iron dust storms prevent us from scanning the surface from orbit. The dust might damage some of our external equipment if we enter the atmosphere. Nothing serious to worry about.

column2: 'We lost some external equipment on the way down. \nDespite harsh storms in the outer atmosphere, air on the surgace is very calm. The winds have blown iron dust particles into tall, picturesque piles. No signs of life.
column3: 'We lost some external equipment on the way down. \nDespite harsh storms in the outer atmosphere, air on the surgace is very calm. The winds have blown iron dust particles into tall, picturesque piles. No signs of life.

column2: 'The "iron dust" sediments contained trace amounts of exotics. One of the resting crewmembers took time to manually paint a picture of the scenery before it was destroyed.
column3: 'The "iron dust" sediments contained trace amounts of exotics. One of the resting crewmembers took time to manually paint a picture of the scenery before it was destroyed.

column1: '3 P piece of a giant starship Tm.prefab

column2: 'We've discovered an abandoned piece of a gigantic precursor spaceship. It looks like a big replacement part that did its job and was then discarded.
column3: 'We've discovered an abandoned piece of a gigantic precursor spaceship. It looks like a big replacement part that did its job and was then discarded.

column2: 'A central element in the module (because we believe it is the shell of a giant ship module) is missing. Perhaps it contained something too valuable to be left behind.
column3: 'A central element in the module (because we believe it is the shell of a giant ship module) is missing. Perhaps it contained something too valuable to be left behind.

column2: 'A central element in the module contained technology that we can use in our Mothership.
column3: 'A central element in the module contained technology that we can use in our Mothership.

column2: 'Strong electromagnetic interference prevents us from scanning the planet's surface from orbit. We can get more info only by entering the atmosphere.
column3: 'Strong electromagnetic interference prevents us from scanning the planet's surface from orbit. We can get more info only by entering the atmosphere.

column2: 'The signal is emittted from an unknown piece of self-sustainable technology. Pictographic warnings on the surface warn about not messing with the device. External research would require extensive time to record and analyze all the different wawelengths it's casting on.
column3: 'The signal is emittted from an unknown piece of self-sustainable technology. Pictographic warnings on the surface warn about not messing with the device. External research would require extensive time to record and analyze all the different wawelengths it's casting on.

column2: 'Take time for external research only [-30 organics]
column3: 'Take time for external research only [-30 organics]

column2: 'Our research concludes it is most likely a navigation or communication beacon left behind by some kind of advanced species. Its energy profile suggests the device contains a very powerful self-destruct device.
column3: 'Our research concludes it is most likely a navigation or communication beacon left behind by some kind of advanced species. Its energy profile suggests the device contains a very powerful self-destruct device.

column2: 'We detect a single and faint warp signal on the planet surface. The planet itself is lifeless.
column3: 'We detect a single and faint warp signal on the planet surface. The planet itself is lifeless.

column2: 'The device erupted in a massive explosion as our bots were attempting to open it. We had misjudged the safety distance and left our ship too close.
column3: 'The device erupted in a massive explosion as our bots were attempting to open it. We had misjudged the safety distance and left our ship too close.

column2: 'This planet is mostly covered with empty steppes and plains, native life is scarce. It was easy to notice this space ship wreckage, however.
column3: 'This planet is mostly covered with empty steppes and plains, native life is scarce. It was easy to notice this space ship wreckage, however.

column2: 'Scavenging operation completed without problems. Since the planet had a "kind of romantic look", according to the landing crew, they ended up spending a night on the planet. They came back super satisfied.
column3: 'Scavenging operation completed without problems. Since the planet had a "kind of romantic look", according to the landing crew, they ended up spending a night on the planet. They came back super satisfied.

column2: 'The ship contained a piece of intact technology.
column3: 'The ship contained a piece of intact technology.

column2: '"Warning. This planet is property of GalProspect Incorporated. Failure to respect property borders results in attack by orbital defences."
column3: '"Warning. This planet is property of GalProspect Incorporated. Failure to respect property borders results in attack by orbital defences."

column2: 'We were able to destroy some of the satellites, but a number of them still remains intact. Next action?
column3: 'We were able to destroy some of the satellites, but a number of them still remains intact. Next action?

column2: 'Fight the satellites from tactical distance [risk mothership HP]
column3: 'Fight the satellites from tactical distance [risk mothership HP]

column2: 'The planet itself is worthless. But something is broadcasting an SOS signal on the planet surface.
column3: 'The planet itself is worthless. But something is broadcasting an SOS signal on the planet surface.

column2: 'The SOS signal came from an almost intact fuel tanker. Crew inside the ship have survived by encapsulating themselves inside a biological cocoon-like shell. They join our crew after a private chat with our AI. The ship is scrapped for parts and resources.
column3: 'The SOS signal came from an almost intact fuel tanker. Crew inside the ship have survived by encapsulating themselves inside a biological cocoon-like shell. They join our crew after a private chat with our AI. The ship is scrapped for parts and resources.

column2: 'The SOS signal came from an almost intact fuel tanker. Unfortunately, the crew seems to have died while waiting for rescue.
column3: 'The SOS signal came from an almost intact fuel tanker. Unfortunately, the crew seems to have died while waiting for rescue.

column2: 'Something is broadcasting an SOS signal from the planet surface. The planet itself is worthless.
column3: 'Something is broadcasting an SOS signal from the planet surface. The planet itself is worthless.

column2: 'Something is broadcasting an SOS signal from the planet surface. The planet itself is a worthless ball of sand.
column3: 'Something is broadcasting an SOS signal from the planet surface. The planet itself is a worthless ball of sand.

column2: 'The SOS signal came from a crashlanded small shuttle. It seems the crew survived the crash and lived here for years, until being rescued a long time ago.
column3: 'The SOS signal came from a crashlanded small shuttle. It seems the crew survived the crash and lived here for years, until being rescued a long time ago.

column1: '3 P warp tree crystal and visions T.prefab

column2: 'The signal is coming from a massive crystal. It could be precursor tech... or warp life? It has a powerful warp field around it. If we are to study it or communicate, our crew must approach on foot and without any digital tech or implants. Consuming exotic drugs before the encounter might grant their brains additional protection against the warp field.
column3: 'The signal is coming from a massive crystal. It could be precursor tech... or warp life? It has a powerful warp field around it. If we are to study it or communicate, our crew must approach on foot and without any digital tech or implants. Consuming exotic drugs before the encounter might grant their brains additional protection against the warp field.

column2: 'Send crew to investigate with extra preparation [-1 exotics]
column3: 'Send crew to investigate with extra preparation [-1 exotics]

column2: 'Let's see if we can scrap anything for exotics...
column3: 'Let's see if we can scrap anything for exotics...

column2: 'Our bots carefully avoid flying too close when taking recordings of the phenomenon. We also take some samples from the soil and move on.
column3: 'Our bots carefully avoid flying too close when taking recordings of the phenomenon. We also take some samples from the soil and move on.

column2: 'The crew experience strange visions, and feel a mental link forming with the crystal. One of them fails to handle the xenotelepathic intensity and must be evacuated. The crystal is a warp organism, kind of a warp "tree". It wishes to be left alone, and our crew respects that. The team takes some quick remote recordings before returning to Motherhsip.
column3: 'The crew experience strange visions, and feel a mental link forming with the crystal. One of them fails to handle the xenotelepathic intensity and must be evacuated. The crystal is a warp organism, kind of a warp "tree". It wishes to be left alone, and our crew respects that. The team takes some quick remote recordings before returning to Motherhsip.

column2: 'The crew experience strange, psychedelic visions, and feel a mental link forming with the crystal. It is a warp organism, kind of a warp "tree". It wishes to be just left alone and contemplate the world, and our crew respects that. The landing team carries out some research and we leave quickly.
column3: 'The crew experience strange, psychedelic visions, and feel a mental link forming with the crystal. It is a warp organism, kind of a warp "tree". It wishes to be just left alone and contemplate the world, and our crew respects that. The landing team carries out some research and we leave quickly.

column2: 'A calm, sandy planet. We are picking up a strange signal from its surface. It seems very chaotic, almost random.
column3: 'A calm, sandy planet. We are picking up a strange signal from its surface. It seems very chaotic, almost random.

column2: 'We do not have the resources to print the exotic drugs.
column3: 'We do not have the resources to print the exotic drugs.

column2: 'The crew experience strange, psychedelic visions, and feel a mental link forming with the crystal. It is a warp organism, kind of a warp "tree". It communicates having contemplated this reality for thousands of years, sharing some of its wisdom with us. We are able to record all of it as valuable xenodata despite the existential and ultra-vague nature of the information received.
column3: 'The crew experience strange, psychedelic visions, and feel a mental link forming with the crystal. It is a warp organism, kind of a warp "tree". It communicates having contemplated this reality for thousands of years, sharing some of its wisdom with us. We are able to record all of it as valuable xenodata despite the existential and ultra-vague nature of the information received.

column1: '3 P wilderness reserve, O, moonMf and LRsensors.prefab

column2: 'Records of this planet exist in our database, it's a protected wilderness reserve. All the guardian satellites are destroyed.\nThe local ecosystem holds no scientific value for us as it has already been thoroughly researched & recorded.
column3: 'Records of this planet exist in our database, it's a protected wilderness reserve. All the guardian satellites are destroyed.\nThe local ecosystem holds no scientific value for us as it has already been thoroughly researched & recorded.

column2: 'Planetwide harvesting operations completed. Some local species underwent a small-scale extinction event due to our activities, but the ecosystem as a whole was not damaged.
column3: 'Planetwide harvesting operations completed. Some local species underwent a small-scale extinction event due to our activities, but the ecosystem as a whole was not damaged.

column2: 'Prospecting revealed the planet is rich in organic harvestables. Eco-harvesting is more expensive here because our harvesting equipment would need significant reconfiguration. Large-scale Biomass harvesting is easy, but would probably destroy much of the local ecosystem and kill innumerable organisms. Orders?
column3: 'Prospecting revealed the planet is rich in organic harvestables. Eco-harvesting is more expensive here because our harvesting equipment would need significant reconfiguration. Large-scale Biomass harvesting is easy, but would probably destroy much of the local ecosystem and kill innumerable organisms. Orders?

column2: 'Leave. This unique ecosystem should remain untouched
column3: 'Leave. This unique ecosystem should remain untouched

column2: 'Let's see if we can scrap anything for needed resources...
column3: 'Let's see if we can scrap anything for needed resources...

column2: 'Ecological harvesting operations completed. Some of our harvester bots broke during the operation before being recovered and some got lost in the forests. Perhaps life will evolve sentience here and discover the bot remains one day. Let them have this gift from the gods.
column3: 'Ecological harvesting operations completed. Some of our harvester bots broke during the operation before being recovered and some got lost in the forests. Perhaps life will evolve sentience here and discover the bot remains one day. Let them have this gift from the gods.

column2: 'We decide to leave the unique ecosystem of this planet completely untouched, the same way it has been for thousands of years.
column3: 'We decide to leave the unique ecosystem of this planet completely untouched, the same way it has been for thousands of years.

column2: 'Ecological harvesting operations completed. Only seeds, eggs, fruits and other elements nonlethal to parent organisms harvested. No multicellular individuals killed. No accidents reported.
column3: 'Ecological harvesting operations completed. Only seeds, eggs, fruits and other elements nonlethal to parent organisms harvested. No multicellular individuals killed. No accidents reported.

column2: 'The structure proved to be an abandoned sensor station, created to observe the wilderness reserve. There was no danger and we scavenged everything.
column3: 'The structure proved to be an abandoned sensor station, created to observe the wilderness reserve. There was no danger and we scavenged everything.

column2: 'The structure was a beacon left behing by a precursor species called the Chrysid. We disassembled it and salvaged everything of value, including information from the beacon's data core.
column3: 'The structure was a beacon left behing by a precursor species called the Chrysid. We disassembled it and salvaged everything of value, including information from the beacon's data core.

column2: 'This planet is totally worthless for our interests, but its hot moon is worth investigating. Our sensors detected dense metal mass on the surface, perhaps an artificial structure?
column3: 'This planet is totally worthless for our interests, but its hot moon is worth investigating. Our sensors detected dense metal mass on the surface, perhaps an artificial structure?

column2: 'Somebody has been using this moon as a poorly hidden storage site. We found two warehouses full of neosteel bars. There was a also a fridge with cold beverages.
column3: 'Somebody has been using this moon as a poorly hidden storage site. We found two warehouses full of neosteel bars. There was a also a fridge with cold beverages.

column2: 'The metals detected earlier were molten minerals flowing out of active volcanoes. The extraction cost would be too high to consider mining. The only way this visit affected the journey was inspiring one of the crewmembers tell another one that she finds her to be just like the planet they visited - boring, but hot.
column3: 'The metals detected earlier were molten minerals flowing out of active volcanoes. The extraction cost would be too high to consider mining. The only way this visit affected the journey was inspiring one of the crewmembers tell another one that she finds her to be just like the planet they visited - boring, but hot.

column2: 'Our sensor bots have discovered intelligent life. The planet is covered with dense cyanide jungles, dominated by carnivorous self-conscious plants who communicate with toxic airborne chemicals. Shall we contact them for science & trade?
column3: 'Our sensor bots have discovered intelligent life. The planet is covered with dense cyanide jungles, dominated by carnivorous self-conscious plants who communicate with toxic airborne chemicals. Shall we contact them for science & trade?

column2: 'The Cyanidians proved to be co-operative. After hearing of our needs, they allowed research and eco-harvesting operations as long as we promised not to kill any plant life.
column3: 'The Cyanidians proved to be co-operative. After hearing of our needs, they allowed research and eco-harvesting operations as long as we promised not to kill any plant life.

column2: 'The cyanide plants proved cooperational and excited about meeting visitors from the stars. We learned a great deal about their understanding of reality. They also gave us a hill-sized amount of half-digested dead insects, valuable organics.
column3: 'The cyanide plants proved cooperational and excited about meeting visitors from the stars. We learned a great deal about their understanding of reality. They also gave us a hill-sized amount of half-digested dead insects, valuable organics.

column2: 'Strong electromagnetic interference prevents us from scanning the planet's surface from orbit.
column3: 'Strong electromagnetic interference prevents us from scanning the planet's surface from orbit.

column2: 'After paying the agreed amount of fuel which the locals intend to consume recreationally, they lead us to a degraded wreckage. It contains an old module that can be restored to working order.
column3: 'After paying the agreed amount of fuel which the locals intend to consume recreationally, they lead us to a degraded wreckage. It contains an old module that can be restored to working order.

column2: 'We've discovered & contacted a local civilization. The Orbians seem highly intelligent despite using little technology. After having a long chat with our AI, they propose a trade. They want a battery with starfuel so they could "overcharge" themselves for pleasure. They promise an ancient piece of intact technology in return.
column3: 'We've discovered & contacted a local civilization. The Orbians seem highly intelligent despite using little technology. After having a long chat with our AI, they propose a trade. They want a battery with starfuel so they could "overcharge" themselves for pleasure. They promise an ancient piece of intact technology in return.

column2: 'After paying the agreed amount of fuel which the locals intend to consume as a drug, they lead us to a degraded defence station. It turns out the ancient technology isn't of precursor origin, but a capital missile, installed ages past by some primitive militarists.
column3: 'After paying the agreed amount of fuel which the locals intend to consume as a drug, they lead us to a degraded defence station. It turns out the ancient technology isn't of precursor origin, but a capital missile, installed ages past by some primitive militarists.

column2: 'Strong electrical storms in the atmosphere prevent us from observing the surface. Minimal chance of external damage if we enter the atmosphere.
column3: 'Strong electrical storms in the atmosphere prevent us from observing the surface. Minimal chance of external damage if we enter the atmosphere.

column2: 'The planet features ruins of a primitive invertebrate civilization. The reason for their extinction remains a mystery. Our bots also eco-harvest some organics, but the local vegetation is spread too sparsely to justify further harvesting operations.
column3: 'The planet features ruins of a primitive invertebrate civilization. The reason for their extinction remains a mystery. Our bots also eco-harvest some organics, but the local vegetation is spread too sparsely to justify further harvesting operations.

column2: 'The planet surface is almost exclusively covered with lifeless deserts. Some sand structures seem to be artificially made, suggesting a possibility of hidden intelligent life. Send an exploration team to find & contact locals? This might take time.
column3: 'The planet surface is almost exclusively covered with lifeless deserts. Some sand structures seem to be artificially made, suggesting a possibility of hidden intelligent life. Send an exploration team to find & contact locals? This might take time.

column2: 'The Taodei lead us to a cave filled with broken technology. They lead us to a large object and proclaim that it is now ours.
column3: 'The Taodei lead us to a cave filled with broken technology. They lead us to a large object and proclaim that it is now ours.

column2: 'We find the locals, a semiadvanced civilization of maggot-herders who call themselves the Taodei. It seems they have been visited by advanced species before. They are interested in trading with us. They offer advanced alien technology and ask for food and explosives.
column3: 'We find the locals, a semiadvanced civilization of maggot-herders who call themselves the Taodei. It seems they have been visited by advanced species before. They are interested in trading with us. They offer advanced alien technology and ask for food and explosives.

column2: 'The Taodei lead us to a location with some technological debris. We realize these are ancient escape pods, heavily degraded. There is not much to take, but we salvage everything.
column3: 'The Taodei lead us to a location with some technological debris. We realize these are ancient escape pods, heavily degraded. There is not much to take, but we salvage everything.

column2: 'We were are able to restore functionality to the engines.
column3: 'We were are able to restore functionality to the engines.

column2: 'The Taodei lead us to a large dune, which proves to be a huge shipwreck covered in sand. The whole thing is heavily degraded and might explode into pieces if moved. Incredibly, further analysis proves it would be possible to restore the ship's engines. The restoration works would have to be done on the spot though.
column3: 'The Taodei lead us to a large dune, which proves to be a huge shipwreck covered in sand. The whole thing is heavily degraded and might explode into pieces if moved. Incredibly, further analysis proves it would be possible to restore the ship's engines. The restoration works would have to be done on the spot though.

column2: 'We didn't find anything in this sweep, but may try searching more.
column3: 'We didn't find anything in this sweep, but may try searching more.

column2: 'As we arrive in the vicinity of the planet, a small circle of fire appears next to it. The circle starts to quickly heat the planet with the strength of a small star until the entire planet becomes a boiling rock....
column3: 'As we arrive in the vicinity of the planet, a small circle of fire appears next to it. The circle starts to quickly heat the planet with the strength of a small star until the entire planet becomes a boiling rock....

column2: 'The circle then sucks the semiliquid planet into itself and leaves through a Warpausgang. We have witnessed a mega-anomaly having a meal.
column3: 'The circle then sucks the semiliquid planet into itself and leaves through a Warpausgang. We have witnessed a mega-anomaly having a meal.

column2: 'This is a rare "Rainbow world", covered in a super-active semibiological "soup" of various chemicals. We could easily set up some extraction facilities here and get a good load of resources we need.
column3: 'This is a rare "Rainbow world", covered in a super-active semibiological "soup" of various chemicals. We could easily set up some extraction facilities here and get a good load of resources we need.

column2: 'Extraction and processing operations completed without incidents.
column3: 'Extraction and processing operations completed without incidents.

column2: 'Unexplainable chemical processes within the freshly extracted explosive elements caused them to become corrosive, damaging and ultimately dissolving our processing facilities. We scavenged some of the materials and may try to build new ones.
column3: 'Unexplainable chemical processes within the freshly extracted explosive elements caused them to become corrosive, damaging and ultimately dissolving our processing facilities. We scavenged some of the materials and may try to build new ones.

column2: 'Strong electromagnetic interference prevents us from scanning the planet's surface from orbit. We cannot see what's down there without entering the atmosphere.
column3: 'Strong electromagnetic interference prevents us from scanning the planet's surface from orbit. We cannot see what's down there without entering the atmosphere.

column1: '4 P command center with potential nuke.prefab

column2: 'Our industrial-grade energy cutters are eventually able to cut the building in half. The capital missile inside is well preserved. We are also able to scavenge a small amount of military-grade materials.
column3: 'Our industrial-grade energy cutters are eventually able to cut the building in half. The capital missile inside is well preserved. We are also able to scavenge a small amount of military-grade materials.

column2: 'We've located a single structure on the planet surface. The heavily armored outer layer suggests it is a military building. \nNo signs of life or active technology detected.
column3: 'We've located a single structure on the planet surface. The heavily armored outer layer suggests it is a military building. \nNo signs of life or active technology detected.

column2: 'Our operatives reach the center of the structure. Turns out this whole building is a military command center with a loaded missile silo in the middle. Retrieving the missile inside the silo requires us to cut the whole building in two. Heavy ceramic armor of the structure means the cutters will require a fair amount of energy.
column3: 'Our operatives reach the center of the structure. Turns out this whole building is a military command center with a loaded missile silo in the middle. Retrieving the missile inside the silo requires us to cut the whole building in two. Heavy ceramic armor of the structure means the cutters will require a fair amount of energy.

column2: '"Not enough fuel to power the cutting operation."
column3: '"Not enough fuel to power the cutting operation."

column2: 'Turns out this whole building is a military command center, together with an underground missile battery. Both are still intact, and can be repurposed into ship components.
column3: 'Turns out this whole building is a military command center, together with an underground missile battery. Both are still intact, and can be repurposed into ship components.

column2: 'Our operatives were attacked again by internal defence systems, but we were better prepared this time. We lost only bots.
column3: 'Our operatives were attacked again by internal defence systems, but we were better prepared this time. We lost only bots.

column2: 'Our operatives were attacked by primitive internal defence systems which our scanners were unable to detect. Threat neutralized. Should we press on?
column3: 'Our operatives were attacked by primitive internal defence systems which our scanners were unable to detect. Threat neutralized. Should we press on?

column2: 'The surface of this lifeless planet is covered with patches of rubium crystals, valued for their exotic properties.
column3: 'The surface of this lifeless planet is covered with patches of rubium crystals, valued for their exotic properties.

column2: 'Our operatives and mining bots were attacked by large, indigenous crystalline creatures during the mission. They remained undiscovered until too late. We managed to collect some crystals before the attack.
column3: 'Our operatives and mining bots were attacked by large, indigenous crystalline creatures during the mission. They remained undiscovered until too late. We managed to collect some crystals before the attack.

column2: 'The planet is covered with lakes of superheavy water, a potent radioactive fuel chemical. We could set up extraction facilities here and probably get a good load of the raw stuff, easily convertible into starfuel.
column3: 'The planet is covered with lakes of superheavy water, a potent radioactive fuel chemical. We could set up extraction facilities here and probably get a good load of the raw stuff, easily convertible into starfuel.

column2: 'Extraction and processing completed successfully, no accidents reported.
column3: 'Extraction and processing completed successfully, no accidents reported.

column2: 'We found a noncarbon ecosystem within the lake and took time to research it.
column3: 'We found a noncarbon ecosystem within the lake and took time to research it.

column2: 'A noncarbon organism from the fuel lake was accidentally sucked in by our harvesting bots, and discovered during standard decontamination filtration. The creature ripped our filters apart and caused some internal damage before it was killed. Turns out this planet supports life after all.
column3: 'A noncarbon organism from the fuel lake was accidentally sucked in by our harvesting bots, and discovered during standard decontamination filtration. The creature ripped our filters apart and caused some internal damage before it was killed. Turns out this planet supports life after all.

column1: '4 P hot planet with land corals M.prefab

column2: 'We've found land corals at the bottom of dry-sea beds. These hardy non-carbon organisms have learned to survive without an active water ecosystem. They cannot be harvested as organics, but researching them yielded valuable data.
column3: 'We've found land corals at the bottom of dry-sea beds. These hardy non-carbon organisms have learned to survive without an active water ecosystem. They cannot be harvested as organics, but researching them yielded valuable data.

column2: 'The crew engaged in existential discussions during the sweep. Nothing of material value was found, but many interesting thoughts were shared.
column3: 'The crew engaged in existential discussions during the sweep. Nothing of material value was found, but many interesting thoughts were shared.

column2: 'The planet is surrounded by carbon dioxide atmosphere. Dry seabeds and trace amounts of complex organics in its superthin atmosphere suggest the planet once hosted water and carbon life.
column3: 'The planet is surrounded by carbon dioxide atmosphere. Dry seabeds and trace amounts of complex organics in its superthin atmosphere suggest the planet once hosted water and carbon life.

column1: '4 P Ngani security station active TE orbital mines.prefab

column2: '"This planet holds a security outpost of True Belief Church Corporation. Others keep out or be destroyed by planetary defences." Our sensors show a large installation on the planet's otherwise desolate surface. That must be the outpost.
column3: '"This planet holds a security outpost of True Belief Church Corporation. Others keep out or be destroyed by planetary defences." Our sensors show a large installation on the planet's otherwise desolate surface. That must be the outpost.

column2: 'The ground structure proves to be a security installation, complete with multiple weapons platforms... which are firing at us. We disengage at max speed...
column3: 'The ground structure proves to be a security installation, complete with multiple weapons platforms... which are firing at us. We disengage at max speed...

column2: 'The True Belief Church Corporation outpost is abandoned, and only the warning message transmittor works. We scavenge the whole structure, covered in what looks like obvious religious lies. Its main cannon could be installed onboard Mothership.
column3: 'The True Belief Church Corporation outpost is abandoned, and only the warning message transmittor works. We scavenge the whole structure, covered in what looks like obvious religious lies. Its main cannon could be installed onboard Mothership.

column2: 'They kept firing at us even during our retreat so we shot back. The battle ended in a standoff - we managed to damage to the outpost, but its counterfire was so furious that engaging them further was not worth the risk.
column3: 'They kept firing at us even during our retreat so we shot back. The battle ended in a standoff - we managed to damage to the outpost, but its counterfire was so furious that engaging them further was not worth the risk.

column2: 'We were attacked by a swarm of mobile mines during our descent into the atmosphere, receiving minor damage.
column3: 'We were attacked by a swarm of mobile mines during our descent into the atmosphere, receiving minor damage.

column1: '4 P Ngani security station TE orbital mines.prefab

column2: '"This entire planet is an official outpost for Most True Church. Others keep out or be destroyed by planetary defences." Our data analysis reveals the message is over a hundred years old and there is no sign of activity on the planet. There's a large artificial structure on the surface.
column3: '"This entire planet is an official outpost for Most True Church. Others keep out or be destroyed by planetary defences." Our data analysis reveals the message is over a hundred years old and there is no sign of activity on the planet. There's a large artificial structure on the surface.

column2: 'The ground structure proves to be the Most True Church outpost, complete with a planetary cannon. The station contains exoskeletons of insectoid soldiers. They were probably killed by a military assault team, as the station remains haven't been looted. We scavenge the whole structure. Its planetary cannon could be installed on our ship.
column3: 'The ground structure proves to be the Most True Church outpost, complete with a planetary cannon. The station contains exoskeletons of insectoid soldiers. They were probably killed by a military assault team, as the station remains haven't been looted. We scavenge the whole structure. Its planetary cannon could be installed on our ship.

column2: 'Shortly after entering the atmosphere, we encountered a cloud of small mines.
column3: 'Shortly after entering the atmosphere, we encountered a cloud of small mines.

column2: 'The ocean was desolate. At least our crew got a good underwater swimming trip.
column3: 'The ocean was desolate. At least our crew got a good underwater swimming trip.

column2: 'This planet is covered with water but does not seem to support any life or minerals exposed on surface. Some of the crew would like to take a look underwater, however.
column3: 'This planet is covered with water but does not seem to support any life or minerals exposed on surface. Some of the crew would like to take a look underwater, however.

column2: 'Disengage, we have more important stuff to do
column3: 'Disengage, we have more important stuff to do

column2: 'The ocean was desolate but our operatives detected a metal object in one of the underwater abysses. They are currently investigating it.
column3: 'The ocean was desolate but our operatives detected a metal object in one of the underwater abysses. They are currently investigating it.

column2: 'It seems the entire abyss was created by a massive space station falling from orbit. Incredibly, some of its technology is still intact, although unusable in our ship.
column3: 'It seems the entire abyss was created by a massive space station falling from orbit. Incredibly, some of its technology is still intact, although unusable in our ship.

column2: 'A large warp worm was detected and our operatives chose to quickly retreat. Operation aborted.
column3: 'A large warp worm was detected and our operatives chose to quickly retreat. Operation aborted.

column2: 'A large warp worm appeared and ate one of our printed underwater shuttles along with the driver. Others escaped unharmed. One of the surviving crew later needed extra therapy sessions by ship AI because of this traumatic experience. Others now think she has fallen in love with the ship AI.
column3: 'A large warp worm appeared and ate one of our printed underwater shuttles along with the driver. Others escaped unharmed. One of the surviving crew later needed extra therapy sessions by ship AI because of this traumatic experience. Others now think she has fallen in love with the ship AI.

column1: '4 P ordinary sand or psy party T.prefab

column2: 'Atmospheric survey reveals the entire planet is an endless desert. There are some mineral seams under the polar caps, but it is likely they contain only low-grade metal ore. The crew suggests this would be a good place to have a wild recreational party under the stars.
column3: 'Atmospheric survey reveals the entire planet is an endless desert. There are some mineral seams under the polar caps, but it is likely they contain only low-grade metal ore. The crew suggests this would be a good place to have a wild recreational party under the stars.

column2: 'The crew enjoyed themselves until the early hours of the morning, experimenting with combinations of various recreational substances. Everybody reported max satisfaction levels the next day.
column3: 'The crew enjoyed themselves until the early hours of the morning, experimenting with combinations of various recreational substances. Everybody reported max satisfaction levels the next day.

column2: 'After lengthy digging, our bots were able to extract enough ore to make the whole operation worthwhile.
column3: 'After lengthy digging, our bots were able to extract enough ore to make the whole operation worthwhile.

column2: 'Despite systematic efforts, our prospector bots found only minor amounts of low quality metals, not worthy of setting up a mining operation.
column3: 'Despite systematic efforts, our prospector bots found only minor amounts of low quality metals, not worthy of setting up a mining operation.

column2: 'This planet seems extremely ordinary and there is nothing particulary interesting. Low chance of low-value minerals... possibly.
column3: 'This planet seems extremely ordinary and there is nothing particulary interesting. Low chance of low-value minerals... possibly.

column2: 'It will be a one-person party. Sometimes that's the best one can do.
column3: 'It will be a one-person party. Sometimes that's the best one can do.

column2: 'The crew enjoyed themselves until the early hours of the morning, experimenting with combinations of various recreational substances and (neural) sex. Everybody reported max satisfaction levels the next day.
column3: 'The crew enjoyed themselves until the early hours of the morning, experimenting with combinations of various recreational substances and (neural) sex. Everybody reported max satisfaction levels the next day.

column1: '4 P precursor tech cave MoT, good weaponsx3.prefab

column2: 'We detected faint warp energy frequencies on this planet, suggesting the presence of active precursor technology, but the atmosphere is ravaged by sandstorms so dense that our bots need to sweep large areas before we can locate it.
column3: 'We detected faint warp energy frequencies on this planet, suggesting the presence of active precursor technology, but the atmosphere is ravaged by sandstorms so dense that our bots need to sweep large areas before we can locate it.

column2: 'We have located the warp energy source. It comes from an underground facility protected by a massive external armor made of ironstone.
column3: 'We have located the warp energy source. It comes from an underground facility protected by a massive external armor made of ironstone.

column2: 'We were unable to locate the energy source, but we may keep searching.
column3: 'We were unable to locate the energy source, but we may keep searching.

column2: 'The underground complex is heavily armored. Our only option is to force our way in.
column3: 'The underground complex is heavily armored. Our only option is to force our way in.

column2: 'The structure proved to be nothing less than extraordinary. It's a precursor supply depot, full of amazing technology and resources.
column3: 'The structure proved to be nothing less than extraordinary. It's a precursor supply depot, full of amazing technology and resources.

column2: 'The explosions woke up an underground warp worm who had presumably been attracted to the location because of the warp energies. It destroyed all our bots on the site, operations aborted.
column3: 'The explosions woke up an underground warp worm who had presumably been attracted to the location because of the warp energies. It destroyed all our bots on the site, operations aborted.

column2: 'The worm is now hovering above the underground complex, threateningly looking at our Mothership in orbit. The AI is pretty sure it can sense us.
column3: 'The worm is now hovering above the underground complex, threateningly looking at our Mothership in orbit. The AI is pretty sure it can sense us.

column2: 'Fight the worm to access the underground complex
column3: 'Fight the worm to access the underground complex

column2: 'We landed again on the planet and were able to reach the underground complex, now accessible because of the earlier detonation. The contents are nothing less than extraordinary, as it turns out this is a precursor supply base.
column3: 'We landed again on the planet and were able to reach the underground complex, now accessible because of the earlier detonation. The contents are nothing less than extraordinary, as it turns out this is a precursor supply base.

column2: 'The explosion was large, but didn't manage to break the rocky armor slab. We may try cutting it or carry out another detonation. The entire structure is weakened now, and our engineers think we have a high probability of breaking the defences in our next attempt.
column3: 'The explosion was large, but didn't manage to break the rocky armor slab. We may try cutting it or carry out another detonation. The entire structure is weakened now, and our engineers think we have a high probability of breaking the defences in our next attempt.

column2: 'The worm used a personal Warpausgang to jump near the Mothership and take a large bite of it. The worm was ultimately defeatedm, but we had already received critical damage.
column3: 'The worm used a personal Warpausgang to jump near the Mothership and take a large bite of it. The worm was ultimately defeatedm, but we had already received critical damage.

column2: 'Our energy cutters managed to cut away several layers of the protection, but fuel allocated to the operation ran out before the cutting was finished. We may try cutting another round of cutting or try detonating the armor. The entire structure is weakened now, and our engineers think we have a fair probability of breaking the defences in our next attempt.
column3: 'Our energy cutters managed to cut away several layers of the protection, but fuel allocated to the operation ran out before the cutting was finished. We may try cutting another round of cutting or try detonating the armor. The entire structure is weakened now, and our engineers think we have a fair probability of breaking the defences in our next attempt.

column2: 'This lifeless planet has a definite warp energy source on it's surface. It could be precursor technology, or possibly a warp animal. Although they usually do not land on planets.
column3: 'This lifeless planet has a definite warp energy source on it's surface. It could be precursor technology, or possibly a warp animal. Although they usually do not land on planets.

column2: 'The robot does not say anything, but the entire Mothership, its shuttles, bots and landing crew are taken hold of by an invisble, gravity-like force. The force levitates all of this stuff at terrifying speed until it reaches orbit. Luckily all of the crew had suits on. Some of our utility bots broke during lift-off.
column3: 'The robot does not say anything, but the entire Mothership, its shuttles, bots and landing crew are taken hold of by an invisble, gravity-like force. The force levitates all of this stuff at terrifying speed until it reaches orbit. Luckily all of the crew had suits on. Some of our utility bots broke during lift-off.

column2: 'The robot nods simply and looks intensely at the ground in front of it. Pieces of planet surface become afloat and start to transform. In a few minutes, a fully functional weapon is formed. "TAKE, GO" the robot says and goes silent.
column3: 'The robot nods simply and looks intensely at the ground in front of it. Pieces of planet surface become afloat and start to transform. In a few minutes, a fully functional weapon is formed. "TAKE, GO" the robot says and goes silent.

column2: 'Incredibly, the warp energy emanates from a large robot. Its warp energy suggests precursor technology. As the crew approaches in a shuttle, they suddenly get the unnerving feeling that somebody is actively reading their minds. "YOU NEED MORE RAW POWER" the robot states coldly in your mind, "MAKE CHOICE". You feel as if somebody is poking three mental concepts in your head.
column3: 'Incredibly, the warp energy emanates from a large robot. Its warp energy suggests precursor technology. As the crew approaches in a shuttle, they suddenly get the unnerving feeling that somebody is actively reading their minds. "YOU NEED MORE RAW POWER" the robot states coldly in your mind, "MAKE CHOICE". You feel as if somebody is poking three mental concepts in your head.

column2: 'The robot simply nods and looks intensely at the ground in front of it. Pieces of planet surface come adrift and start to transform. In a few minutes, a fully functional weapon is formed. "TAKE, GO" the robot says and goes silent.
column3: 'The robot simply nods and looks intensely at the ground in front of it. Pieces of planet surface come adrift and start to transform. In a few minutes, a fully functional weapon is formed. "TAKE, GO" the robot says and goes silent.

column2: 'Incredibly, the warp energy emanates from a large robot. It's warp energy suggests precursor technology. As the crew approaches in a shuttle, they suddenly get the unnerving feeling that somebody is actively reading their minds."LEAVE NOW" the robot states coldly in their mind.
column3: 'Incredibly, the warp energy emanates from a large robot. It's warp energy suggests precursor technology. As the crew approaches in a shuttle, they suddenly get the unnerving feeling that somebody is actively reading their minds."LEAVE NOW" the robot states coldly in their mind.

column2: '"Why? We just want to talk. Who are you?"
column3: '"Why? We just want to talk. Who are you?"

column2: 'As we enter the atmosphere and approach the warp energy source, ours scanners reveal it to be a large robot. Suddenly, the robot attacks our ship with rays that penetrate energy shields. We opt for a fast retreat. By the looks of it, the robot was left here either by precursors or other advanced species. Fighting is not worth the risk.
column3: 'As we enter the atmosphere and approach the warp energy source, ours scanners reveal it to be a large robot. Suddenly, the robot attacks our ship with rays that penetrate energy shields. We opt for a fast retreat. By the looks of it, the robot was left here either by precursors or other advanced species. Fighting is not worth the risk.

column2: 'A skin-like membrane is covering the entire planet. Astonishingly, it seems to be a single giant organism that controls all of the local water ecology. Bubbles of sugary organics are seeping out of it to the surface... we could harvest this stuff. We could also leave this rare ecosystem totally untouched.
column3: 'A skin-like membrane is covering the entire planet. Astonishingly, it seems to be a single giant organism that controls all of the local water ecology. Bubbles of sugary organics are seeping out of it to the surface... we could harvest this stuff. We could also leave this rare ecosystem totally untouched.

column2: 'Research & harvest the skin-like organism itself [-20 fuel, -40 synthetics]
column3: 'Research & harvest the skin-like organism itself [-20 fuel, -40 synthetics]

column2: 'Research only. This organism is probably at least presentient.
column3: 'Research only. This organism is probably at least presentient.

column2: 'Extraction and processing completed successfully, no accidents reported. Keeping samples from the organism alive proved impossible (as the tissue rapidly disintegrates into toxic goo when separated), but overall documentation of such a planetwide organism is quite valuable.
column3: 'Extraction and processing completed successfully, no accidents reported. Keeping samples from the organism alive proved impossible (as the tissue rapidly disintegrates into toxic goo when separated), but overall documentation of such a planetwide organism is quite valuable.

column2: 'When we tried to cut the planet's "skin", it quickly contracted and vast areas turned into resinous and toxic goo of very little value. It seems the organism knows how to defend itself.
column3: 'When we tried to cut the planet's "skin", it quickly contracted and vast areas turned into resinous and toxic goo of very little value. It seems the organism knows how to defend itself.

column2: 'We leave this rare planetwide organism as it is. Taking live samples from the organism proved impossible (as its tissue rapidly disintegrates into toxic goo when separated), but overall documentation of such a planetwide organism is very valuable.
column3: 'We leave this rare planetwide organism as it is. Taking live samples from the organism proved impossible (as its tissue rapidly disintegrates into toxic goo when separated), but overall documentation of such a planetwide organism is very valuable.

column2: 'Strong electromagnetic interference prevents us from scanning the planet from orbit. We cannot see what's on the surface without entering the atmosphere.
column3: 'Strong electromagnetic interference prevents us from scanning the planet from orbit. We cannot see what's on the surface without entering the atmosphere.

column2: 'There is a technologically advanced beacon on this planet, protected by strong "solidified" warpfield. Tests reveal it also bends gravitational force and extends underground, effectively isolating its contents from the environment. We could try to overpower the shield with sustained fire from ray weapons, but this might cost a lot of energy.
column3: 'There is a technologically advanced beacon on this planet, protected by strong "solidified" warpfield. Tests reveal it also bends gravitational force and extends underground, effectively isolating its contents from the environment. We could try to overpower the shield with sustained fire from ray weapons, but this might cost a lot of energy.

column2: 'Sustained energy weapon fire [-50 fuel or less]
column3: 'Sustained energy weapon fire [-50 fuel or less]

column2: 'After several hours of sustained fire from all of our energy weapons and cutters, we were able to overpower the precursor shield and get to the advanced technology inside. Unfortunately, the piece of technology which made the shield inpenetrable burned up when we overpowered the shields.
column3: 'After several hours of sustained fire from all of our energy weapons and cutters, we were able to overpower the precursor shield and get to the advanced technology inside. Unfortunately, the piece of technology which made the shield inpenetrable burned up when we overpowered the shields.

column2: 'We were able to overload the shield after several hours of sustained energy cutter fire. Unfortunately, overloading the shield generator caused all the fine technology in the beacon to fry up beyond repair.
column3: 'We were able to overload the shield after several hours of sustained energy cutter fire. Unfortunately, overloading the shield generator caused all the fine technology in the beacon to fry up beyond repair.

column2: 'We didn't detect any changes in the shield strength after burning up large amounts of fuel keeping up sustained energy fire. Existence of seemingly impenetrable precursor shields has been reported before and we've decided to give up on this one. At least documentation of the attempt has scientific value.
column3: 'We didn't detect any changes in the shield strength after burning up large amounts of fuel keeping up sustained energy fire. Existence of seemingly impenetrable precursor shields has been reported before and we've decided to give up on this one. At least documentation of the attempt has scientific value.

column2: 'One of the mountains of this planet boasts an exposed seam of raw titanium ore. We could mine valuable materials here, but setting up the mining facilities and processing the ore is energy-intensive. The facilities themselves can be later recycled.
column3: 'One of the mountains of this planet boasts an exposed seam of raw titanium ore. We could mine valuable materials here, but setting up the mining facilities and processing the ore is energy-intensive. The facilities themselves can be later recycled.

column2: 'We've exhausted all the exposed mineral seams.
column3: 'We've exhausted all the exposed mineral seams.

column2: 'Mining operation completed without incidents. We may spend more fuel to mine more metal here.
column3: 'Mining operation completed without incidents. We may spend more fuel to mine more metal here.

column1: '4 P volcano planet and synthethics M.prefab

column2: 'The conditions here are harsh but unique. As streams of lava ebb and flow on the surface, they force rare elements out from the planet's core. We could extract a large volume of high-quality minerals that could be easily processed into synthetics. Operations here would carry a fair risk.
column3: 'The conditions here are harsh but unique. As streams of lava ebb and flow on the surface, they force rare elements out from the planet's core. We could extract a large volume of high-quality minerals that could be easily processed into synthetics. Operations here would carry a fair risk.

column2: 'Print ceramic equipment for surface operations [-40 synthetics]
column3: 'Print ceramic equipment for surface operations [-40 synthetics]

column2: 'Our bots documented the complex geological processes happening on the surface. Perhaps in a million years when this hell has cooled, our descendants could return.
column3: 'Our bots documented the complex geological processes happening on the surface. Perhaps in a million years when this hell has cooled, our descendants could return.

column2: 'Our unmanned mining facilities managed to extract a large volume of various minerals. These were processed into a fresh assortment of resources on the spot. We also salvaged some of the mining facilities.
