column3: 'Our unmanned mining facilities managed to extract a large volume of various minerals. These were processed into a fresh assortment of resources on the spot. We also salvaged some of the mining facilities.

column2: 'Earthquakes and volcanic eruptions claimed some of our mining facilities. We may try and rebuild them.
column3: 'Earthquakes and volcanic eruptions claimed some of our mining facilities. We may try and rebuild them.

column2: 'A rare combination of extremely high temperatures but a calm and thin atmosphere. We may descend without further cost or danger. Needless to say, carbon life here is unlikely.
column3: 'A rare combination of extremely high temperatures but a calm and thin atmosphere. We may descend without further cost or danger. Needless to say, carbon life here is unlikely.

column2: 'Enter the atmosphere to prospect surface mining possibilities
column3: 'Enter the atmosphere to prospect surface mining possibilities

column2: 'The planet is mostly covered with deserts, atmospheric analysis shows presence of life. Something on this planet is emitting warpwaves. It could be precursor technology.
column3: 'The planet is mostly covered with deserts, atmospheric analysis shows presence of life. Something on this planet is emitting warpwaves. It could be precursor technology.

column2: 'The planet is inhabited by an early civilization of insectoid tool-users. They spend most of their time gathering or hunting large amounts of food into a single huge underground temple. Incidentally, the temple seems to be a source of the warp energies.
column3: 'The planet is inhabited by an early civilization of insectoid tool-users. They spend most of their time gathering or hunting large amounts of food into a single huge underground temple. Incidentally, the temple seems to be a source of the warp energies.

column2: 'Our crewmembers left, only to return at nightfall. Using Tarn technology, they infiltrated the temple and took the Egg, replacing it with a cheap plastic replica. Unfortunately, a mechanical trap consisting of a huge granite slab in the temple crushed our operatives as they were leaving, causing critical injuries.
column3: 'Our crewmembers left, only to return at nightfall. Using Tarn technology, they infiltrated the temple and took the Egg, replacing it with a cheap plastic replica. Unfortunately, a mechanical trap consisting of a huge granite slab in the temple crushed our operatives as they were leaving, causing critical injuries.

column2: '"Hello, strange visitors. We are the Sus-Click, proud feeders of the Screaming Egg. What brings you to our land?"
column3: '"Hello, strange visitors. We are the Sus-Click, proud feeders of the Screaming Egg. What brings you to our land?"

column2: 'What is the meaning of life for Sus-click?
column3: 'What is the meaning of life for Sus-click?

column2: '"The meaning of life is to collect all the Good together and separate it from the Bad. We put this into practice by gathering good food from all over the planet into the Temple of the Screaming Egg. It then vanishes. We repeat the process. This also prevents the egg from screaming."
column3: '"The meaning of life is to collect all the Good together and separate it from the Bad. We put this into practice by gathering good food from all over the planet into the Temple of the Screaming Egg. It then vanishes. We repeat the process. This also prevents the egg from screaming."

column2: '"The Proverbial Screaming Egg was here first. It is the Egg that Did Not Break when Giving Birth to the World. Also, it eats. It eats so much. It even eats when we starve. But There is No Other Way. Our Elders have taught us that we must always feed the Egg. Otherwise it screams."
column3: '"The Proverbial Screaming Egg was here first. It is the Egg that Did Not Break when Giving Birth to the World. Also, it eats. It eats so much. It even eats when we starve. But There is No Other Way. Our Elders have taught us that we must always feed the Egg. Otherwise it screams."

column2: 'Will you let us see the egg?
column3: 'Will you let us see the egg?

column2: '"The Proverbial Screaming Egg was here first. It is the Egg that Did Not Broke when Giving Birth to the World. Also, it eats. Eats so much. It even eats when we starve. But There is No Other Way. Our Elders have taught us that we must always feed the Egg. Otherwise it screams."
column3: '"The Proverbial Screaming Egg was here first. It is the Egg that Did Not Broke when Giving Birth to the World. Also, it eats. Eats so much. It even eats when we starve. But There is No Other Way. Our Elders have taught us that we must always feed the Egg. Otherwise it screams."

column2: 'You are led into the temple and shown the Egg, closely guarded by the Sus-Click Elders. It's a precursor era technology, with a sound modulator. You suspect it just makes noises and the guarding Elders use it as an excuse to eat the gathered food.
column3: 'You are led into the temple and shown the Egg, closely guarded by the Sus-Click Elders. It's a precursor era technology, with a sound modulator. You suspect it just makes noises and the guarding Elders use it as an excuse to eat the gathered food.

column2: 'Offer to buy the egg from Sus-click
column3: 'Offer to buy the egg from Sus-click

column2: '"Sell the Proverbial Screaming Egg? Never! Even though it would grant us freedom from feeding it, giving up the Egg would discredit the Elders and possibly collapse the order of our society! No, we must always serve the Egg and the Elders!"
column3: '"Sell the Proverbial Screaming Egg? Never! Even though it would grant us freedom from feeding it, giving up the Egg would discredit the Elders and possibly collapse the order of our society! No, we must always serve the Egg and the Elders!"

column2: 'Leave, return and attempt to steal the Egg [send crew]
column3: 'Leave, return and attempt to steal the Egg [send crew]

column2: 'Our crewmembers left, only to return at nightfall. Using Tarn technology, they infiltrated the temple and took the Egg, replacing it with a cheap replica. The temple had many traps, but the crew managed to avoid them.
column3: 'Our crewmembers left, only to return at nightfall. Using Tarn technology, they infiltrated the temple and took the Egg, replacing it with a cheap replica. The temple had many traps, but the crew managed to avoid them.

column2: 'Before we leave, we mention that we would like to eco-harvest edible cacti from this planet. The Suc-click, thinking they are clever, ask "a bugs weight in gold" because, after all, it's their planet. They proceed to present you their most fat priest for measuring the weight.
column3: 'Before we leave, we mention that we would like to eco-harvest edible cacti from this planet. The Suc-click, thinking they are clever, ask "a bugs weight in gold" because, after all, it's their planet. They proceed to present you their most fat priest for measuring the weight.

column2: 'The planet features ruins of a primitive civilization long gone. Their pictographic writings refer to an ecological catastrophe. Investigation of the largest ruin uncovers a large exotic crystal.
column3: 'The planet features ruins of a primitive civilization long gone. Their pictographic writings refer to an ecological catastrophe. Investigation of the largest ruin uncovers a large exotic crystal.

column1: '4 Pi Collector trade gone bad F plus nuke.prefab

column2: 'We've discovered and contacted a primitive civilization, the Collectors. It is a species of mammals who are in the middle of the industrial age. The personal freedom in their society is very inequal, they still need to learn a lot. After a private conversation with our AI, the primitives' representatives come to terms of possible trade. They desire our advanced synthethics.
column3: 'We've discovered and contacted a primitive civilization, the Collectors. It is a species of mammals who are in the middle of the industrial age. The personal freedom in their society is very inequal, they still need to learn a lot. After a private conversation with our AI, the primitives' representatives come to terms of possible trade. They desire our advanced synthethics.

column2: 'After completing the exchange and a bit of testing, it turns out we have been delivered a much lower quality fuel than promised. When we point out the mistake, the locals tell us that their previous representatives were criminals and have already been executed. We are given some kind of poor local food as remuneration. The incident has created a large political conflict between the planet's ruling factions...
column3: 'After completing the exchange and a bit of testing, it turns out we have been delivered a much lower quality fuel than promised. When we point out the mistake, the locals tell us that their previous representatives were criminals and have already been executed. We are given some kind of poor local food as remuneration. The incident has created a large political conflict between the planet's ruling factions...

column2: 'Soon, the squabbling of local factions turns into a military conflict. Within a few days, the local leaders bring out their greatest assets, and start bombing civilian populations ruled by other leaders...with nukes. Amidst the chaos, one of the political groups tries to abduct our ambassadors, resulting in a firefight that leaves over thirty of the locals dead...
column3: 'Soon, the squabbling of local factions turns into a military conflict. Within a few days, the local leaders bring out their greatest assets, and start bombing civilian populations ruled by other leaders...with nukes. Amidst the chaos, one of the political groups tries to abduct our ambassadors, resulting in a firefight that leaves over thirty of the locals dead...

column2: 'While the conflict rages on, several factions plead with you to intervene and end the war. It seems the conflict is now mainly fought over which of the local leaders has more ethical principles.
column3: 'While the conflict rages on, several factions plead with you to intervene and end the war. It seems the conflict is now mainly fought over which of the local leaders has more ethical principles.

column2: 'Postpone intervention and observe the conflict from distance
column3: 'Postpone intervention and observe the conflict from distance

column2: 'Leave this planet. The locals need to learn the path to peace by themselves
column3: 'Leave this planet. The locals need to learn the path to peace by themselves

column2: 'We overestimated the intelligence of these mammals. The nuclear war ends only when the locals understand that onset of nuclear winter is irreversible. Only a few pockets of survivors remain now in the bunkers, and the planet's ecosystem is undergoing a major extinction event. And all we did was tell them they didn't give us enough fuel...
column3: 'We overestimated the intelligence of these mammals. The nuclear war ends only when the locals understand that onset of nuclear winter is irreversible. Only a few pockets of survivors remain now in the bunkers, and the planet's ecosystem is undergoing a major extinction event. And all we did was tell them they didn't give us enough fuel...

column2: 'After orbital group assasinations of leading warlords and strategic bombardment, the surviving leaders capitulate and disarm. The rebuilding can start but much of the planet is now a nuclear wasteland. We confiscate their last remaining nuke.
column3: 'After orbital group assasinations of leading warlords and strategic bombardment, the surviving leaders capitulate and disarm. The rebuilding can start but much of the planet is now a nuclear wasteland. We confiscate their last remaining nuke.

column2: 'Some of the warlords unite against us. They manage to use one of the bots stolen from us earlier to sneak an atomic bomb into orbit and attack the mothership. Eventually, we manage to destroy most of the local military structure and the surviving leaders capitulate, surrendering their nuclear stockpiles. The rebuilding can start but much of the planet is now a nuclear wasteland.
column3: 'Some of the warlords unite against us. They manage to use one of the bots stolen from us earlier to sneak an atomic bomb into orbit and attack the mothership. Eventually, we manage to destroy most of the local military structure and the surviving leaders capitulate, surrendering their nuclear stockpiles. The rebuilding can start but much of the planet is now a nuclear wasteland.

column2: 'Apparently, the locals even invited our AI to live with them. She must be really good. The technology received will be put to good use.
column3: 'Apparently, the locals even invited our AI to live with them. She must be really good. The technology received will be put to good use.

column2: 'We've found a Sparks colony. These highly advanced crystal beings are very secretive and reportedly never leave their cities. Their representative AI, after having a private chat with our AI, decides to support our cause by donating us some food, fuel and technology left behind by earlier visitors. They weren't using it anyway.
column3: 'We've found a Sparks colony. These highly advanced crystal beings are very secretive and reportedly never leave their cities. Their representative AI, after having a private chat with our AI, decides to support our cause by donating us some food, fuel and technology left behind by earlier visitors. They weren't using it anyway.

column2: 'We've found a Sparks colony. These advanced crystal beings are secretive and reportedly never leave their cities. After having a private chat with our AI, the Sparks decide to support our cause by donating us some supplies.
column3: 'We've found a Sparks colony. These advanced crystal beings are secretive and reportedly never leave their cities. After having a private chat with our AI, the Sparks decide to support our cause by donating us some supplies.

column2: 'We discovered the crysteel bars had been packed into edible green leaves that taste like mint and increase sexual drive. A strange, but pleasant gesture from the Sparks.
column3: 'We discovered the crysteel bars had been packed into edible green leaves that taste like mint and increase sexual drive. A strange, but pleasant gesture from the Sparks.

column2: 'We've found a Sparks colony. These crystal beings are known for never leaving their ships or cities. After a private communication with our AI, the Sparks decide to support our cause by donating us some fuel and a large amount of crysteel, the local building material they seem to own in excess.
column3: 'We've found a Sparks colony. These crystal beings are known for never leaving their ships or cities. After a private communication with our AI, the Sparks decide to support our cause by donating us some fuel and a large amount of crysteel, the local building material they seem to own in excess.

column1: '4 Pi Freetravellers colony2, FORCT trader w warp4.prefab

column2: 'The Freetravellers find our mission interesting, but with too many rules and goals for their tastes. They love free exploration, without any specific goal other than discovering new information by movement. The generous locals gave us us a load of supplies for the journey.
column3: 'The Freetravellers find our mission interesting, but with too many rules and goals for their tastes. They love free exploration, without any specific goal other than discovering new information by movement. The generous locals gave us us a load of supplies for the journey.

column2: 'This planet is colonized by an advanced civilization, a multispecies community of "Freetravellers". They are united in their love of travel and are one of the most well-spread factions. Visitors like us are a regular thing for locals and we are nonchalantly given access to their city.
column3: 'This planet is colonized by an advanced civilization, a multispecies community of "Freetravellers". They are united in their love of travel and are one of the most well-spread factions. Visitors like us are a regular thing for locals and we are nonchalantly given access to their city.

column2: 'The Freetravellers found our mission interesting, and one even decided to join us! The AI heartily welcomed the new crewmembers and in addition to the local celebrations, we held another one aboard the Mothership. The Freetravellers gave us a farewell gift of fuel, food and recreational substances. The crew felt super satisfied when we left the planet.
column3: 'The Freetravellers found our mission interesting, and one even decided to join us! The AI heartily welcomed the new crewmembers and in addition to the local celebrations, we held another one aboard the Mothership. The Freetravellers gave us a farewell gift of fuel, food and recreational substances. The crew felt super satisfied when we left the planet.

column2: 'We have arrived at a most suitable time, explains the local guide. The whole colony is about to start the celebration of Meeting Souls, intergalactically known for pleasurable connections that take place during the festival. Do you join the fun or stay out of it?
column3: 'We have arrived at a most suitable time, explains the local guide. The whole colony is about to start the celebration of Meeting Souls, intergalactically known for pleasurable connections that take place during the festival. Do you join the fun or stay out of it?

column2: 'As you are leaving the planet, you are approached by a crew of Techum traders. Their communicators produce a bunch of noise which gradually modulates itself to comprehensible "TRADE PROPOSAL, SUPERIOR WARP"
column3: 'As you are leaving the planet, you are approached by a crew of Techum traders. Their communicators produce a bunch of noise which gradually modulates itself to comprehensible "TRADE PROPOSAL, SUPERIOR WARP"

column2: 'The engine is delivered to Mothership cargo bay as promised. The trader has included a bonus to the delivery, a miniature sculpture made of crystallized starfuel and shaped like a warp worm eating its own tail.
column3: 'The engine is delivered to Mothership cargo bay as promised. The trader has included a bonus to the delivery, a miniature sculpture made of crystallized starfuel and shaped like a warp worm eating its own tail.

column2: 'The crew met many beautiful beings during the celebrations, discovering new levels of meaningfulness between creatures of different species. Some of the locals found our crew so lovely they decided to join the mission. The Freetravellers delegation also donated us some organics and fuel as a farewell gift.
column3: 'The crew met many beautiful beings during the celebrations, discovering new levels of meaningfulness between creatures of different species. Some of the locals found our crew so lovely they decided to join the mission. The Freetravellers delegation also donated us some organics and fuel as a farewell gift.

column2: 'You and the ship's crew met many beautiful beings during the celebrations, discovering new levels of meaningfulness between creatures of different species. One of our crew found the local conditions so alluring that they decided to stay forever. It is important for our AI that all crew remain volunteers. The Freetravellers gave us some food and fuel as a farewell gift when we left.
column3: 'You and the ship's crew met many beautiful beings during the celebrations, discovering new levels of meaningfulness between creatures of different species. One of our crew found the local conditions so alluring that they decided to stay forever. It is important for our AI that all crew remain volunteers. The Freetravellers gave us some food and fuel as a farewell gift when we left.

column1: '4 Pi industrial city ritual of poisons FEr.prefab

column2: 'We've discovered and contacted a civilization of industrial era invertebrates, the Crabbians. They live in a highly ritualized society and request we send an ambassador to participate in their "Ritual of Poisons" before any other interaction takes place.
column3: 'We've discovered and contacted a civilization of industrial era invertebrates, the Crabbians. They live in a highly ritualized society and request we send an ambassador to participate in their "Ritual of Poisons" before any other interaction takes place.

column2: 'Our crew is well protected. Send one.
column3: 'Our crew is well protected. Send one.

column2: 'Our ambassador participates in the ritual, wearing the full environment suit, letting it analyse all poisons given to her for playing or consuming. Turns out the locals are pretty frail. The strongest poison involved in the ritual is alcohol with the strength of a mild beer. Most of the local participants end up unconscious on the floor.
column3: 'Our ambassador participates in the ritual, wearing the full environment suit, letting it analyse all poisons given to her for playing or consuming. Turns out the locals are pretty frail. The strongest poison involved in the ritual is alcohol with the strength of a mild beer. Most of the local participants end up unconscious on the floor.

column2: 'The locals tell that surviving the poison means you are part of the good guys. The creatures are more relaxed now and you can engage in cultural and scientific exchange. Our knowledge and a few samples of advanced materials are super valuable for them. They gift us a cargo train full of metal and food in return.
column3: 'The locals tell that surviving the poison means you are part of the good guys. The creatures are more relaxed now and you can engage in cultural and scientific exchange. Our knowledge and a few samples of advanced materials are super valuable for them. They gift us a cargo train full of metal and food in return.

column1: '4 Pi Shop nukes in dark tower.prefab

column2: 'The entire planet is barren and lifeless, except for a large black building with ominous architecture. We detect an active electronic commfield around it.
column3: 'The entire planet is barren and lifeless, except for a large black building with ominous architecture. We detect an active electronic commfield around it.

column2: 'After receiving the payment, the tower releases a bot carrying something towards our ship.
column3: 'After receiving the payment, the tower releases a bot carrying something towards our ship.

column2: 'As we leave the area, we witness a nuclear explosion at the tower location, receiving further damage. Whatever this was, apparently there was somebody who had a serious disagreement with the Destruction Flower shop.
column3: 'As we leave the area, we witness a nuclear explosion at the tower location, receiving further damage. Whatever this was, apparently there was somebody who had a serious disagreement with the Destruction Flower shop.

column2: 'Suddenly, the tower, the bot and your ship come under fire from nearby hills. We disengage while laying down suppressive fire...
column3: 'Suddenly, the tower, the bot and your ship come under fire from nearby hills. We disengage while laying down suppressive fire...

column2: 'Strong electromagnetic interference prevents us from scanning the planet from orbit. We cannot observe the surface without entering the atmosphere.
column3: 'Strong electromagnetic interference prevents us from scanning the planet from orbit. We cannot observe the surface without entering the atmosphere.

column2: 'Welcome, fellow free will! We have very strict... communication regulations here. You want some truly apocalyptic flowers? An expensive flower is 450 creds, the cheap ones cost 350. We are unable to answer any questions due to... constant technical malfunctions.
column3: 'Welcome, fellow free will! We have very strict... communication regulations here. You want some truly apocalyptic flowers? An expensive flower is 450 creds, the cheap ones cost 350. We are unable to answer any questions due to... constant technical malfunctions.

column2: 'This planet has a colony of rodents who call themselves "the Family". Their species used to be an advanced one, but an internal conflict shattered their civilization into isolated colonies and deeply regressed scientific progress. The locals seem to be in a constant state of low-level warfare and aggression.
column3: 'This planet has a colony of rodents who call themselves "the Family". Their species used to be an advanced one, but an internal conflict shattered their civilization into isolated colonies and deeply regressed scientific progress. The locals seem to be in a constant state of low-level warfare and aggression.

column2: '"The Family exists to support the endeavours of the Family Head. Lately, there have been disagreements on this from local anarchists but they do not matter."
column3: '"The Family exists to support the endeavours of the Family Head. Lately, there have been disagreements on this from local anarchists but they do not matter."

column2: '"I am Claw, the leader of this forsaken planet. Our colony has been disconnected from the interstellar community due to lack of resources. In addition, my forces are bewirged by anarchist rebels who claim I'm responsible for food shortages. Will you trade me some explosives so I can protect the peace? I can only pay in organics."
column3: '"I am Claw, the leader of this forsaken planet. Our colony has been disconnected from the interstellar community due to lack of resources. In addition, my forces are bewirged by anarchist rebels who claim I'm responsible for food shortages. Will you trade me some explosives so I can protect the peace? I can only pay in organics."

column2: 'What is the meaning of life for The Family?
column3: 'What is the meaning of life for The Family?

column2: 'After seeing the analysis on the local widespread abuse of power by the rulers, some of the crew propose a bold idea that we should covertly interfere and actually help the anarchists to overthrow the Claw.
column3: 'After seeing the analysis on the local widespread abuse of power by the rulers, some of the crew propose a bold idea that we should covertly interfere and actually help the anarchists to overthrow the Claw.

column2: 'Good idea, but we can't afford to save everyone
column3: 'Good idea, but we can't afford to save everyone

column2: 'After delivering the explosives, you find out the organics delivered are cut-up corpses of local residents.\nFurther analysis of local society proves the representative you traded with is likely a tyrant ruling with violence.
column3: 'After delivering the explosives, you find out the organics delivered are cut-up corpses of local residents.\nFurther analysis of local society proves the representative you traded with is likely a tyrant ruling with violence.

column2: 'Our crew and Claw's forces are attacked by the rebels during the trade operation. The explosives we were about to deliver explode, creating a huge fireball and instantly killing one of our operatives and Claw. Some bots and other mission equipment is also destroyed.
column3: 'Our crew and Claw's forces are attacked by the rebels during the trade operation. The explosives we were about to deliver explode, creating a huge fireball and instantly killing one of our operatives and Claw. Some bots and other mission equipment is also destroyed.

column2: 'Strangely, the ruling government forces suspect you cooperated with the anarchists, launching a nuclear attack against the mothership. Their ancient missiles are easily neutralized. The war on the ground between the rulers and rebels seems to only escalate and AI makes a decision to leave this place. The Family still has a lot to learn as a civilization.
column3: 'Strangely, the ruling government forces suspect you cooperated with the anarchists, launching a nuclear attack against the mothership. Their ancient missiles are easily neutralized. The war on the ground between the rulers and rebels seems to only escalate and AI makes a decision to leave this place. The Family still has a lot to learn as a civilization.

column2: 'We need to have at least 3 crew for this operation because somebody has to stay in the Mothership. We have no other option than to leave this place.
column3: 'We need to have at least 3 crew for this operation because somebody has to stay in the Mothership. We have no other option than to leave this place.

column2: 'Two of our crew infiltrate the planet. They wear dynamic body-suits that disguise them as locals, and manage to contact the rebels. With the help of some of our advanced technology, the anarchists are able to overthrow the rulers. As part of the rebels' gratitude, we receive a shipment of organics... The contents are physical remains of the Claw supporters. Oh well.
column3: 'Two of our crew infiltrate the planet. They wear dynamic body-suits that disguise them as locals, and manage to contact the rebels. With the help of some of our advanced technology, the anarchists are able to overthrow the rulers. As part of the rebels' gratitude, we receive a shipment of organics... The contents are physical remains of the Claw supporters. Oh well.

column2: 'Two of our crew infiltrate the planet, wearing body-suits that disguise them as locals. They coordinate the revolution with rebels. The attempt to overthrow the Claw does not go smoothly as the rulers launch all their nuclear missiles against civilian targets. Our ship only manages to neutralize the missiles that would have hit the rebel headquarters housing our operatives.
column3: 'Two of our crew infiltrate the planet, wearing body-suits that disguise them as locals. They coordinate the revolution with rebels. The attempt to overthrow the Claw does not go smoothly as the rulers launch all their nuclear missiles against civilian targets. Our ship only manages to neutralize the missiles that would have hit the rebel headquarters housing our operatives.

column2: 'Much of the planet has become a nuclear wasteland. The Claw is still alive somewhere in an underground bunker, and 90% of the planet's population is dead (numbered in millions) or about to die due to destruction of infrastructure and environment. The rebels ask for your assistance in food and technology to rebuild the civilization and destroy the Claw later on.
column3: 'Much of the planet has become a nuclear wasteland. The Claw is still alive somewhere in an underground bunker, and 90% of the planet's population is dead (numbered in millions) or about to die due to destruction of infrastructure and environment. The rebels ask for your assistance in food and technology to rebuild the civilization and destroy the Claw later on.

column2: 'You give the local survivors some resources to rebuild their planet. Our covert operation almost resulted in total wipeout of an entire civilization. At least it makes kind of a good campfire story.
column3: 'You give the local survivors some resources to rebuild their planet. Our covert operation almost resulted in total wipeout of an entire civilization. At least it makes kind of a good campfire story.

column2: 'We are about to leave the planet, when a small Tarny shuttle approaches us. Turns out it's a delegation from the \n"anarchists", rebels trying to change the system. They explain the whole food problem is designed by the local rulers to keep the population under control. They plead our help to liberate the planet from tyrants.
column3: 'We are about to leave the planet, when a small Tarny shuttle approaches us. Turns out it's a delegation from the \n"anarchists", rebels trying to change the system. They explain the whole food problem is designed by the local rulers to keep the population under control. They plead our help to liberate the planet from tyrants.

column2: 'This is a colony of an advanced civilization, the Yu-Ee. The Yu-Ee are an older species described as semisolid cyborgs. It is thought they have either found true happiness as a civilization... or are just under the constant influence of some kind of euphoric drugs. A reception AI happily welcomes you to land and meet the locals.
column3: 'This is a colony of an advanced civilization, the Yu-Ee. The Yu-Ee are an older species described as semisolid cyborgs. It is thought they have either found true happiness as a civilization... or are just under the constant influence of some kind of euphoric drugs. A reception AI happily welcomes you to land and meet the locals.

column2: 'Turns out there is a human on this planet. Somebody who was found in a cryopod with a notion that they should only be waken by Terran AIs. The Yu-Ee respected that request and have kept the person frozen for decades. Our ship AI wakes the individual and has a private conversation with them. The person decides to join our mission.
column3: 'Turns out there is a human on this planet. Somebody who was found in a cryopod with a notion that they should only be waken by Terran AIs. The Yu-Ee respected that request and have kept the person frozen for decades. Our ship AI wakes the individual and has a private conversation with them. The person decides to join our mission.

column2: 'Cryopod survivor found by the Yu-Ee and kept frozen for decades. Some gaps in long-term memory.
column3: 'Cryopod survivor found by the Yu-Ee and kept frozen for decades. Some gaps in long-term memory.

column2: 'You participate in the Visitor Welcoming Celebrations and explore the colony together with your crew. Eventually you are approached by a pair of Yu-Ee adventurers. They offer a high-tech shield for a few exotics, claiming it's a very high quality device. Additionally, they point out, it is made with highest environmental protection standards.
column3: 'You participate in the Visitor Welcoming Celebrations and explore the colony together with your crew. Eventually you are approached by a pair of Yu-Ee adventurers. They offer a high-tech shield for a few exotics, claiming it's a very high quality device. Additionally, they point out, it is made with highest environmental protection standards.

column2: 'Give us a few moments to see if we can scrap anything for exotics
column3: 'Give us a few moments to see if we can scrap anything for exotics

column2: 'The module is delivered to the Mothership cargo bay as promised. The trader has included a symbolic bonus to the delivery, a silver sculpture depicting a malnourished human about to die from hunger.
column3: 'The module is delivered to the Mothership cargo bay as promised. The trader has included a symbolic bonus to the delivery, a silver sculpture depicting a malnourished human about to die from hunger.

column2: 'One of the local children requests a formal audience before you leave. She, having learned of human civilization in school, expresses her compassion. "For us, everything is free. We have no need for Credits like you. It's so sad that your civilization can build starships yet some people remain hungry. Please contribute to changing that," she says, and gives you a gift.
column3: 'One of the local children requests a formal audience before you leave. She, having learned of human civilization in school, expresses her compassion. "For us, everything is free. We have no need for Credits like you. It's so sad that your civilization can build starships yet some people remain hungry. Please contribute to changing that," she says, and gives you a gift.

column2: 'You participate in the welcoming celebrations held for you and explore the colony together with the crew. The locals seem to be mostly either scientists or artists, but definitely hedonists. You participate in several of their pleasure sessions. The sessions leave you feeling completely reinvigorated and deeply satisfied.
column3: 'You participate in the welcoming celebrations held for you and explore the colony together with the crew. The locals seem to be mostly either scientists or artists, but definitely hedonists. You participate in several of their pleasure sessions. The sessions leave you feeling completely reinvigorated and deeply satisfied.

column2: 'During the celebrations, one of the Yu-Ee made a particularly good connection with one of your crewmembers. They spend a lot of time away from the ship, until the Yu-Ee contacts you privately. "I admire one of your crew and they have agreed to stay with me!" she says. All of the crew are volunteers, so you just count it as a natural loss for the mission.
column3: 'During the celebrations, one of the Yu-Ee made a particularly good connection with one of your crewmembers. They spend a lot of time away from the ship, until the Yu-Ee contacts you privately. "I admire one of your crew and they have agreed to stay with me!" she says. All of the crew are volunteers, so you just count it as a natural loss for the mission.

column2: 'The locals are happy to hear that one of our crew has decided to stay. When we prepare to leave, the representatives of the colony bring us some fuel and euphoria-inducing local foods as a farewell gift.
column3: 'The locals are happy to hear that one of our crew has decided to stay. When we prepare to leave, the representatives of the colony bring us some fuel and euphoria-inducing local foods as a farewell gift.

column2: 'When we prepare to leave, the representatives of the colony bring us some fuel and local recreational substances as farewell gifts.
column3: 'When we prepare to leave, the representatives of the colony bring us some fuel and local recreational substances as farewell gifts.

column2: 'She scans the entire ship and repairs some cracks in the hull using a very small manually held device. The Yu-Ee have some very advanced technology indeed.
column3: 'She scans the entire ship and repairs some cracks in the hull using a very small manually held device. The Yu-Ee have some very advanced technology indeed.

column2: 'One of the local historians finds our "ancient" ship fascinating. She offers to repair some damage if we let her study it.
column3: 'One of the local historians finds our "ancient" ship fascinating. She offers to repair some damage if we let her study it.

column2: 'we may scrap modules now to get exotics... %
column3: 'we may scrap modules now to get exotics... %

column2: 'The module is delivered to the Mothership cargo bay as promised. The trader has included a symbolic bonus to the delivery, a silver figurine shaped like a display of all 23 different Yu-Ee reproductive organs.
column3: 'The module is delivered to the Mothership cargo bay as promised. The trader has included a symbolic bonus to the delivery, a silver figurine shaped like a display of all 23 different Yu-Ee reproductive organs.

column1: '4 wr blue biotech slab ship active MTo rare weapons.prefab

column2: 'It's a massive but damaged alien ship, slowly drifting in space. Its defence systems are active, but it is unresponsive to communication attempts. The biotech structure suggests an advanced level of technology.
column3: 'It's a massive but damaged alien ship, slowly drifting in space. Its defence systems are active, but it is unresponsive to communication attempts. The biotech structure suggests an advanced level of technology.

column2: 'Attempt to disable defence systems with ranged fire
column3: 'Attempt to disable defence systems with ranged fire

column2: 'Send boarding team to neutralize the ship [need at least 4 crew]
column3: 'Send boarding team to neutralize the ship [need at least 4 crew]

column2: 'We damaged the ship, but it managed to escape using warpdrives. It also fired back, damaging our hull integrity.
column3: 'We damaged the ship, but it managed to escape using warpdrives. It also fired back, damaging our hull integrity.

column2: 'The ship fired back dealing critical damage, but we managed to eventually destroy its defences, dealing collateral damage to rest of the ship. Most of it is burned biochrome now. One of our crew was wounded during the battle.
column3: 'The ship fired back dealing critical damage, but we managed to eventually destroy its defences, dealing collateral damage to rest of the ship. Most of it is burned biochrome now. One of our crew was wounded during the battle.

column2: 'Our boarding shuttles managed to dock safely, but were assaulted by numerous internal defence mechanisms biological bots spewing molecular acid. They evacuated after the assault, but one crewmember was already dead by the time they got out.
column3: 'Our boarding shuttles managed to dock safely, but were assaulted by numerous internal defence mechanisms biological bots spewing molecular acid. They evacuated after the assault, but one crewmember was already dead by the time they got out.

column2: 'Nobody else volunteers to board the ship. If we want to disable its defences now, we would need to destroy most of the ship. We could also just leave it be. Its bots were just trying to protect it.
column3: 'Nobody else volunteers to board the ship. If we want to disable its defences now, we would need to destroy most of the ship. We could also just leave it be. Its bots were just trying to protect it.

column2: 'Our boarding shuttles managed to dodge point defence fire while approaching. Once inside, the boarders encountered some kind of biological bots spewing molecular acid. The team barely managed to hold them back and are now cornered. They need additional backup or an evacuation. Which one will it be?
column3: 'Our boarding shuttles managed to dodge point defence fire while approaching. Once inside, the boarders encountered some kind of biological bots spewing molecular acid. The team barely managed to hold them back and are now cornered. They need additional backup or an evacuation. Which one will it be?

column2: 'Who knows, perhaps the wreckage has some kind of AI capable of suffering still inside? We leave the ship to its own fate.
column3: 'Who knows, perhaps the wreckage has some kind of AI capable of suffering still inside? We leave the ship to its own fate.

column2: 'We fought with the ship and managed to destroy its defences while leaving several modules intact. During the follow-up scavenging operation, a bioweapon self-destructed in the ship, destroying some of our scavenger bots and wounding crew.
column3: 'We fought with the ship and managed to destroy its defences while leaving several modules intact. During the follow-up scavenging operation, a bioweapon self-destructed in the ship, destroying some of our scavenger bots and wounding crew.

column2: 'Our evacuation shuttles were destroyed before they could reach our operatives inside the wreckage. We may print & send new ones if we have enough materials. Otherwise, we need to bring the Mothership itself up close to evacuate the crew.
column3: 'Our evacuation shuttles were destroyed before they could reach our operatives inside the wreckage. We may print & send new ones if we have enough materials. Otherwise, we need to bring the Mothership itself up close to evacuate the crew.

column2: '"We do not have enough materials needed for the task."
column3: '"We do not have enough materials needed for the task."

column2: 'Our crew was safely evacuated. Nobody else volunteers to board the ship. If we want to disable its defences now, we would need to destroy most of the ship. We could also just leave it be. Its bots were just trying to protect it.
column3: 'Our crew was safely evacuated. Nobody else volunteers to board the ship. If we want to disable its defences now, we would need to destroy most of the ship. We could also just leave it be. Its bots were just trying to protect it.

column2: 'We managed to evacuate our operatives & destroy the ship's defences in the ensuing battle, unfortunately dealing significant collateral damage to other elements of the ship. Analysing the advanced biotech remains yields scientific value.
column3: 'We managed to evacuate our operatives & destroy the ship's defences in the ensuing battle, unfortunately dealing significant collateral damage to other elements of the ship. Analysing the advanced biotech remains yields scientific value.

column2: 'Our ship closed in under fire and successfully evacuated the team. Once the crew was back on board, we destroyed their defences (dealing collateral damage to other parts of the ship) and scavenged the remains. Analysing the advanced biotech remains yields scientific value.
column3: 'Our ship closed in under fire and successfully evacuated the team. Once the crew was back on board, we destroyed their defences (dealing collateral damage to other parts of the ship) and scavenged the remains. Analysing the advanced biotech remains yields scientific value.

column2: 'Fortunately, the backup also survived the point defence crossfire of the vessel. They regrouped inside with earlier boarders and were able to overwhelm the defenders without losses. The ship and its rare technology are ours!
column3: 'Fortunately, the backup also survived the point defence crossfire of the vessel. They regrouped inside with earlier boarders and were able to overwhelm the defenders without losses. The ship and its rare technology are ours!

column2: 'The shuttle carrying backup boarders got hit by point defence fire from the biotech vessel during approach, but everybody survived. They were able to overwhelm the defenders without casualties. The ship and its rare technology are ours!
column3: 'The shuttle carrying backup boarders got hit by point defence fire from the biotech vessel during approach, but everybody survived. They were able to overwhelm the defenders without casualties. The ship and its rare technology are ours!

column2: 'Fortunately, the backup also survived the point defence crossfire of the vessel. They regrouped inside with earlier boarders and attacked the remaining defence bots. Unfortunately, they misjudged the defender numbers and got swarmed, resulting in critical wounds.
column3: 'Fortunately, the backup also survived the point defence crossfire of the vessel. They regrouped inside with earlier boarders and attacked the remaining defence bots. Unfortunately, they misjudged the defender numbers and got swarmed, resulting in critical wounds.

column1: '4 wr emper tactical, lasers or cannon.prefab

column2: 'Remains of a small cruiser. No active systems detected.
column3: 'Remains of a small cruiser. No active systems detected.

column2: 'The wreckage was untouched by other looters and contained useful tech and resources.
column3: 'The wreckage was untouched by other looters and contained useful tech and resources.

column2: 'It is a carcass of Rat fuel tanker, looted to the bones... most likely work of pirates. Clouds of fuel have been detected floating nearby. The spilled fuel is usable but collecting it might take a while.
column3: 'It is a carcass of Rat fuel tanker, looted to the bones... most likely work of pirates. Clouds of fuel have been detected floating nearby. The spilled fuel is usable but collecting it might take a while.

column2: 'Disengage, we have no space for extra fuel
column3: 'Disengage, we have no space for extra fuel

column2: 'Salvage teams have scooped up most of the fuel floating nearby.
column3: 'Salvage teams have scooped up most of the fuel floating nearby.

column2: 'It is an immense ship or station, with visible damage markings all over it. It is definitely active and aware of us. One needs truly advanced technology to hide something so vast.
column3: 'It is an immense ship or station, with visible damage markings all over it. It is definitely active and aware of us. One needs truly advanced technology to hide something so vast.

column2: 'The mysterious ship ignores our attack and smoothly shifts into warp-space using some kind of unknown technology.
column3: 'The mysterious ship ignores our attack and smoothly shifts into warp-space using some kind of unknown technology.

column2: 'The mysterious ship just vanishes as we approach, probably using some kind of completely unknown Tarn technology. Could it have been a precursor ship?
column3: 'The mysterious ship just vanishes as we approach, probably using some kind of completely unknown Tarn technology. Could it have been a precursor ship?

column2: 'The mysterious ship reflects our attacks back at our ship and then smoothly shifts into warp-space. The entire crew gets a mild telepathic message "WHY U HITTING YOURSELF?"
column3: 'The mysterious ship reflects our attacks back at our ship and then smoothly shifts into warp-space. The entire crew gets a mild telepathic message "WHY U HITTING YOURSELF?"

column2: 'The mysterious ship squirts out a large blob of pink goo and signals "FOOD". It then effortlessly shifts into warp-space. Analyzing the goo proves it to be super high quality biomass. You feel like a primitive animal who's been thrown a morsel of food to leave a more intelligent being alone.
column3: 'The mysterious ship squirts out a large blob of pink goo and signals "FOOD". It then effortlessly shifts into warp-space. Analyzing the goo proves it to be super high quality biomass. You feel like a primitive animal who's been thrown a morsel of food to leave a more intelligent being alone.

column2: 'The mysterious ship communicates with you telepathically using some kind of warp frequency. "RECEIVE TIMELESS POWER, GIVE TEMPORARY POWER?" it asks coldly in your head.
column3: 'The mysterious ship communicates with you telepathically using some kind of warp frequency. "RECEIVE TIMELESS POWER, GIVE TEMPORARY POWER?" it asks coldly in your head.

column2: 'The mysterious ship neutralizes most of our attacks but we see a few of them connecting and scorching its armor. The ship responds by shooting a few red rays at our ship. The rays go directly through our shields & armor, atomizing the fingers of the crew who used to push buttons to activate weapons. We escape at max speed.
column3: 'The mysterious ship neutralizes most of our attacks but we see a few of them connecting and scorching its armor. The ship responds by shooting a few red rays at our ship. The rays go directly through our shields & armor, atomizing the fingers of the crew who used to push buttons to activate weapons. We escape at max speed.

column2: 'The mysterious ship creates tentacle-like energy rays that connect to our ship. The whole crew starts to experience intensive psychedelic visions. The visions make you aware that sometimes, you're just an average egotist. The massive ship then vanishes. The energy-tentacles have drained much resources from the ship, but you feel much wiser now.
column3: 'The mysterious ship creates tentacle-like energy rays that connect to our ship. The whole crew starts to experience intensive psychedelic visions. The visions make you aware that sometimes, you're just an average egotist. The massive ship then vanishes. The energy-tentacles have drained much resources from the ship, but you feel much wiser now.

column2: 'One of the mountains of this planet boasts an exposed seam of raw Chobium. We could mine valuable materials here, but setting up the mining facilities costs some energy. Chobium compounds sometimes contain trace amounts of exotic matter.
column3: 'One of the mountains of this planet boasts an exposed seam of raw Chobium. We could mine valuable materials here, but setting up the mining facilities costs some energy. Chobium compounds sometimes contain trace amounts of exotic matter.

column2: 'Mining operation completed without incident. We've exhausted all the exposed mineral seams.
column3: 'Mining operation completed without incident. We've exhausted all the exposed mineral seams.

column2: 'We've detected the remains of a building on this otherwise worthless planet. Send crew & bots to check it out?
column3: 'We've detected the remains of a building on this otherwise worthless planet. Send crew & bots to check it out?

column2: 'Our bots were able to excavate the main reactor Credits from the structure. We had to spend some additional resources to synthesize coolant foam to avoid blowing up the reactor.
column3: 'Our bots were able to excavate the main reactor Credits from the structure. We had to spend some additional resources to synthesize coolant foam to avoid blowing up the reactor.

column2: 'Our AI decided the building should be scavenged layer by layer. Unfortunately, the entire structure exploded shortly after our bots started removing the external layer. There was nothing left to salvage.
column3: 'Our AI decided the building should be scavenged layer by layer. Unfortunately, the entire structure exploded shortly after our bots started removing the external layer. There was nothing left to salvage.

column2: 'Closer analysis reveals that it is indeed some kind of active nuclear reactor. It is highly unstable and any salvaging operations are too risky for the crew. The radiation level is so high that we need to modify our utility bots to be able to work in the area.
column3: 'Closer analysis reveals that it is indeed some kind of active nuclear reactor. It is highly unstable and any salvaging operations are too risky for the crew. The radiation level is so high that we need to modify our utility bots to be able to work in the area.

column2: 'One of our scavengers stepped on a piece of unexploded ordinance! Fortunately, their armored environment suit prevented serious injuries. We had to expend some organics to treat the initial concussion.
column3: 'One of our scavengers stepped on a piece of unexploded ordinance! Fortunately, their armored environment suit prevented serious injuries. We had to expend some organics to treat the initial concussion.

column2: 'There is a partially destroyed object (some kind of ship or building) on this otherwise lifeless planet. Energy readings indicate there is probably an active nuclear reactor inside.
column3: 'There is a partially destroyed object (some kind of ship or building) on this otherwise lifeless planet. Energy readings indicate there is probably an active nuclear reactor inside.

column2: 'This planet has a thin atmosphere frequented by thick dust storms. Preliminary analysis indicates low chance of life or valuable minerals.
column3: 'This planet has a thin atmosphere frequented by thick dust storms. Preliminary analysis indicates low chance of life or valuable minerals.

column2: 'We've located a seemingly abandoned military bunker on the planet surface. No life or active systems detected. Explore for salvage possibilities?
column3: 'We've located a seemingly abandoned military bunker on the planet surface. No life or active systems detected. Explore for salvage possibilities?

column2: 'Our scavenger expedition was ambushed by automated war machines hiding around the bunker. They managed to down a printed shuttle, resulting in critical injuries to crew inside. Our ship destroyed the warbots.
column3: 'Our scavenger expedition was ambushed by automated war machines hiding around the bunker. They managed to down a printed shuttle, resulting in critical injuries to crew inside. Our ship destroyed the warbots.

column2: 'We've salvaged a weapon platform from the ruins.
column3: 'We've salvaged a weapon platform from the ruins.

column2: 'We've located the remains of a destroyed building on the planet surface. Most interestingly, our sensors detect active technology within the rubble.
column3: 'We've located the remains of a destroyed building on the planet surface. Most interestingly, our sensors detect active technology within the rubble.

column2: 'We were able to salvage the technology, along with some useful materials.
column3: 'We were able to salvage the technology, along with some useful materials.

column2: 'Our AI decided the building should be scavenged layer by layer. Unfortunately, the entire structure exploded shortly after our bots started to remove the external layer. Needless to say, we lost all the printed bots involved in the operation.
column3: 'Our AI decided the building should be scavenged layer by layer. Unfortunately, the entire structure exploded shortly after our bots started to remove the external layer. Needless to say, we lost all the printed bots involved in the operation.

column2: 'Our expedition was attacked by security bots within the bunker. They destroyed a number of our printed bots and forced the team to retreat. Nobody likes the idea of going back in.
column3: 'Our expedition was attacked by security bots within the bunker. They destroyed a number of our printed bots and forced the team to retreat. Nobody likes the idea of going back in.

column2: 'Leave, this place is not worth the risk
column3: 'Leave, this place is not worth the risk

column2: 'Destroy the bunker with long-range fire, scavenge remains
column3: 'Destroy the bunker with long-range fire, scavenge remains

column2: 'Our ship opened fire at the bunker from safe distance, eventually reducing it to rubble. Freshly printed bots salvaged everything of value.
column3: 'Our ship opened fire at the bunker from safe distance, eventually reducing it to rubble. Freshly printed bots salvaged everything of value.

column2: 'We didn't want to take further chances and destoyed the bunker by firing our ship weapons from a safe distance. Freshly printed bots salvaged everything of value from the ruins.
column3: 'We didn't want to take further chances and destoyed the bunker by firing our ship weapons from a safe distance. Freshly printed bots salvaged everything of value from the ruins.

column2: 'The surface of this lifeless planet is covered with patches of biomium crystals. These crystals are actually colonies of organic but inert nanobots. They were spread around the universe by precursors thousands of years ago for unknown reasons. We could collect the nanobots and refine them to organics.
column3: 'The surface of this lifeless planet is covered with patches of biomium crystals. These crystals are actually colonies of organic but inert nanobots. They were spread around the universe by precursors thousands of years ago for unknown reasons. We could collect the nanobots and refine them to organics.

column2: 'Our crew were attacked by giant predatory animals during the operation. The feral beings emerged from underground, injuring several of our operatives and destroying most of our mining equipment. Operation abandoned.
column3: 'Our crew were attacked by giant predatory animals during the operation. The feral beings emerged from underground, injuring several of our operatives and destroying most of our mining equipment. Operation abandoned.

column2: 'The surface of this lifeless planet is covered with patches of ultrarubium crystals, valued for their exotic properties. Cutting and processing them requires a lot of energy, however.
column3: 'The surface of this lifeless planet is covered with patches of ultrarubium crystals, valued for their exotic properties. Cutting and processing them requires a lot of energy, however.

column2: 'Mining & processing completed successfully, no accidents reported. Documenting the crystal growth patterns yielded some xenodata as well.
column3: 'Mining & processing completed successfully, no accidents reported. Documenting the crystal growth patterns yielded some xenodata as well.

column2: 'Our crew and mining bots were attacked by huge, serpentine creatures during the operation. They remained undiscovered until too late, destroying our processing equipment. We were lucky to escape without crew casualties. The crew voted to leave the planet to avoid further risks.
column3: 'Our crew and mining bots were attacked by huge, serpentine creatures during the operation. They remained undiscovered until too late, destroying our processing equipment. We were lucky to escape without crew casualties. The crew voted to leave the planet to avoid further risks.

column1: '5 P exotic surface crystal mining, attacked by monsters.prefab

column2: 'The surface of this lifeless planet is covered with patches of onyxium crystals, valued for their exotic properties.
column3: 'The surface of this lifeless planet is covered with patches of onyxium crystals, valued for their exotic properties.

column2: 'Our operatives were attacked by crystalline life-forms during the mission. The feral beings injured several crewmembers and destroyed all of our mining equipment. We evacuated, managing to bring back only a single crystal.
column3: 'Our operatives were attacked by crystalline life-forms during the mission. The feral beings injured several crewmembers and destroyed all of our mining equipment. We evacuated, managing to bring back only a single crystal.

column2: 'We've located a megastructure on the planet surface. It seems to be an abandoned building, possibly an information market. The planet itself is devoid of visible ecosphere.
column3: 'We've located a megastructure on the planet surface. It seems to be an abandoned building, possibly an information market. The planet itself is devoid of visible ecosphere.

column2: 'The structure was looted long ago, however the looters were not very systematic. We even located a data core with intact information.
column3: 'The structure was looted long ago, however the looters were not very systematic. We even located a data core with intact information.

column2: 'The building was looted long ago, and the most valuable piece was its metal frame.
column3: 'The building was looted long ago, and the most valuable piece was its metal frame.

column2: 'This planet has conflicting data on possibility of life or other conditions. Something in the atmosphere creates a strong interference with our sensors. We could print reconaissance bots or investigate with our ship.
column3: 'This planet has conflicting data on possibility of life or other conditions. Something in the atmosphere creates a strong interference with our sensors. We could print reconaissance bots or investigate with our ship.

column2: 'Scouting reveals this planet is home to advanced nanobot swarms in the atmosphere, capable of disrupting technology by emitting synchronized electromagnetic waves. The nanobots have consumed all other resources on the planet. Recordings on the phenomenon has scientific value.
column3: 'Scouting reveals this planet is home to advanced nanobot swarms in the atmosphere, capable of disrupting technology by emitting synchronized electromagnetic waves. The nanobots have consumed all other resources on the planet. Recordings on the phenomenon has scientific value.

column2: 'Scouting bots were printed and entered the atmosphere. We suddenly lost contact with them before they reported anything interesting.
column3: 'Scouting bots were printed and entered the atmosphere. We suddenly lost contact with them before they reported anything interesting.

column2: 'This planet has conflicting data on possibility of life or other conditions. Something in the atmosphere creates a strong interference with our sensors. We could print reconaissance bots or check it with Mothership.
column3: 'This planet has conflicting data on possibility of life or other conditions. Something in the atmosphere creates a strong interference with our sensors. We could print reconaissance bots or check it with Mothership.

column1: '5 P precursor rings coverting exotics to fuel.prefab

column2: 'The energy source is very advanced, possibly precursor technology. The entire structure carries a warp charge, and a pictographic message on the device contains a warning not to attempt to harm it. A simple instruction shows it can be activated by shooting exotic crystals through the rings at high speeds.
column3: 'The energy source is very advanced, possibly precursor technology. The entire structure carries a warp charge, and a pictographic message on the device contains a warning not to attempt to harm it. A simple instruction shows it can be activated by shooting exotic crystals through the rings at high speeds.

column2: 'Print a device to hurl exotics through the ring [-1 exotics]
column3: 'Print a device to hurl exotics through the ring [-1 exotics]

column2: 'Attempt to deconstruct & scavenge the rings [send bots]
column3: 'Attempt to deconstruct & scavenge the rings [send bots]

column2: 'Something happened when our utility bots started cutting the rings. Some kind of warp energies from the device leaked out, flooding the sanity of everyone onboard with intense otherworldy visions. We left the planet at max speed. Biocheckup revealed some of the crew has suffered internal damage.
column3: 'Something happened when our utility bots started cutting the rings. Some kind of warp energies from the device leaked out, flooding the sanity of everyone onboard with intense otherworldy visions. We left the planet at max speed. Biocheckup revealed some of the crew has suffered internal damage.

column2: 'We shot an exotic crystal through the rings and it changed mid-air into a lump of solidified starfuel. We may repeat the process... the rings seem to be a matter convertor of sorts.
column3: 'We shot an exotic crystal through the rings and it changed mid-air into a lump of solidified starfuel. We may repeat the process... the rings seem to be a matter convertor of sorts.

column2: 'We shot an exotic crystal through the rings. Flying through the last ring, it suddenly disappeared into nothingness. Did the device consume it? Or transport it somewhere? We don't feel like risking another piece of exotic matter to find out. We record everything we can about the rings and leave.
column3: 'We shot an exotic crystal through the rings. Flying through the last ring, it suddenly disappeared into nothingness. Did the device consume it? Or transport it somewhere? We don't feel like risking another piece of exotic matter to find out. We record everything we can about the rings and leave.

column2: 'Our sensors detect a localized warp energy source on the planet. The planet itself is devoid of life.
column3: 'Our sensors detect a localized warp energy source on the planet. The planet itself is devoid of life.

column2: 'As your crew approaches in a shuttle, they suddenly get an unnerving feeling that somebody is actively reading their minds. "I NEED GIFT" the robot states coldly in your mind, "MAKE GIFT?". You feel as if somebody is poking the mental concept of explosives in your head.
column3: 'As your crew approaches in a shuttle, they suddenly get an unnerving feeling that somebody is actively reading their minds. "I NEED GIFT" the robot states coldly in your mind, "MAKE GIFT?". You feel as if somebody is poking the mental concept of explosives in your head.

column2: 'The robot nods and looks intensely at the explosives brought to it. The explosives become a cloud of dust that the precursor bot simply breathes in. "THANK YOU FOR GIFT" the robot says, and falls silent. It does not respond any more and seems to be asleep.
column3: 'The robot nods and looks intensely at the explosives brought to it. The explosives become a cloud of dust that the precursor bot simply breathes in. "THANK YOU FOR GIFT" the robot says, and falls silent. It does not respond any more and seems to be asleep.

column2: 'Somebody suggests we could try destroying and scavenging it. "Entire stellar empires have been destroyed by singular Precursor entities" the Mothership AI notes. However, we don't know if this one is a true Precursor robot. It certainly has advanced technology. But perhaps it's not even military-capable?
column3: 'Somebody suggests we could try destroying and scavenging it. "Entire stellar empires have been destroyed by singular Precursor entities" the Mothership AI notes. However, we don't know if this one is a true Precursor robot. It certainly has advanced technology. But perhaps it's not even military-capable?

column2: 'Attack the robot from a distance with everything you have
column3: 'Attack the robot from a distance with everything you have

column2: 'As soon as you mentally make the decision to try and attack the robot, something strange happens. The entire Mothership, its shuttles, bots and landing crew are taken hold of by an invisble, gravity-like force. The force expels everything into the planet's orbit. Luckily all of the crew had suits on. Some of our bots broke in the atmosphere.
column3: 'As soon as you mentally make the decision to try and attack the robot, something strange happens. The entire Mothership, its shuttles, bots and landing crew are taken hold of by an invisble, gravity-like force. The force expels everything into the planet's orbit. Luckily all of the crew had suits on. Some of our bots broke in the atmosphere.

column2: 'The robot communicates "I UNDERSTAND" and becomes silent. It does not respond any more and seems to be asleep.
column3: 'The robot communicates "I UNDERSTAND" and becomes silent. It does not respond any more and seems to be asleep.

column2: 'The robot asked for a gift, not trade, and we should not expect anything in return. Otherwise the "gift" would have been only a concealed trade offer.
column3: 'The robot asked for a gift, not trade, and we should not expect anything in return. Otherwise the "gift" would have been only a concealed trade offer.

column2: 'The planet has a delicate, cyanide-based ecosystem, so organics from here are worthless. The surface is covered with fragile cyanide plants, no animal life or sentience seems to have evolved yet. Preliminary research suggests this place might have some valuable minerals. Send probes to evaluate mining prospects?
column3: 'The planet has a delicate, cyanide-based ecosystem, so organics from here are worthless. The surface is covered with fragile cyanide plants, no animal life or sentience seems to have evolved yet. Preliminary research suggests this place might have some valuable minerals. Send probes to evaluate mining prospects?

column2: 'Planetwide mining operations completed. Our activities have created a planet-wide extinction event. Our improved estimations show over half of the species on this planet might be gone in a year.
column3: 'Planetwide mining operations completed. Our activities have created a planet-wide extinction event. Our improved estimations show over half of the species on this planet might be gone in a year.

column2: 'Prospecting the planet revealed the planet surface layers contain trace amounts of exotic elements. Ecology-preserving mining operations need extra resources. However, easy strip mining would destroy about 50% of the local ecosystem. Orders?
column3: 'Prospecting the planet revealed the planet surface layers contain trace amounts of exotic elements. Ecology-preserving mining operations need extra resources. However, easy strip mining would destroy about 50% of the local ecosystem. Orders?

column2: 'Let's take a moment to see if we can scrap anything
column3: 'Let's take a moment to see if we can scrap anything

column2: 'Our bots carefully replanted or relocated each organism on the mining site that met a specific size criteria. A few small animals were accidentally killed by the clumsy handling of our bots. Our technology is not perfect yet.
column3: 'Our bots carefully replanted or relocated each organism on the mining site that met a specific size criteria. A few small animals were accidentally killed by the clumsy handling of our bots. Our technology is not perfect yet.

column2: 'We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched. Its cyanide nature is already very special, and will hopefully result in some beautiful sentient cyanide creatures one day.
column3: 'We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched. Its cyanide nature is already very special, and will hopefully result in some beautiful sentient cyanide creatures one day.

column1: '5 P ruins and nanobot printers MTr.prefab

column2: 'Ruins of ancient, pre-industrial civilization cover this planet. Seemingly complete lack of multicellular life suggests the civilization was probably destroyed by some kind of external attack. Exploring the planet and ruins for anything valuable will take a fair amount of time.
column3: 'Ruins of ancient, pre-industrial civilization cover this planet. Seemingly complete lack of multicellular life suggests the civilization was probably destroyed by some kind of external attack. Exploring the planet and ruins for anything valuable will take a fair amount of time.

column2: 'Our operatives spent days exploring the ruins and documenting the extinct culture. The main entertainment of this mammalian civilization seemed to be painfully sacrificing fellow sentients and animals to obviously non-existent gods. Perhaps they deserved to vanish.
column3: 'Our operatives spent days exploring the ruins and documenting the extinct culture. The main entertainment of this mammalian civilization seemed to be painfully sacrificing fellow sentients and animals to obviously non-existent gods. Perhaps they deserved to vanish.

column2: 'We discovered the entire planet's atmosphere is infested with nanobots, designed to slowly kill multicellular plant life. Documenting the ruins revealed that the main tradition of this civilization seemed to be sacrificing fellow sentients and animals to obviously non-existent gods. It seems likely they were killed off by ideological Precursors who didn't like their culture of cruelty.
column3: 'We discovered the entire planet's atmosphere is infested with nanobots, designed to slowly kill multicellular plant life. Documenting the ruins revealed that the main tradition of this civilization seemed to be sacrificing fellow sentients and animals to obviously non-existent gods. It seems likely they were killed off by ideological Precursors who didn't like their culture of cruelty.

column2: 'This planet is a completely desolate ball of sand. But we've located an ancient shipwreck. We could scavenge it for materials.
column3: 'This planet is a completely desolate ball of sand. But we've located an ancient shipwreck. We could scavenge it for materials.

column2: 'Since the metal quality was good, our engineers cut the whole ship into small pieces. No trace of the wreckage remained on the planet.
column3: 'Since the metal quality was good, our engineers cut the whole ship into small pieces. No trace of the wreckage remained on the planet.

column2: 'The more valuable parts of the ship have already been looted. We were able to salvage only a minor amount of valuable materials.
column3: 'The more valuable parts of the ship have already been looted. We were able to salvage only a minor amount of valuable materials.

column2: 'The surface scanning operation was interrupted by a cloud of Tarn mines, resulting in light damage to our ship's hull. No other defence systems were discovered and the scan was finished without further incident. The purpose of the mines remains a mystery.
column3: 'The surface scanning operation was interrupted by a cloud of Tarn mines, resulting in light damage to our ship's hull. No other defence systems were discovered and the scan was finished without further incident. The purpose of the mines remains a mystery.

column1: '5 P shipwreck squid mo orbital mines.prefab

column2: 'This planet is mostly covered with vast deserts, so it was easy to notice this space shipwreck. It is a squid military transport, older model.
column3: 'This planet is mostly covered with vast deserts, so it was easy to notice this space shipwreck. It is a squid military transport, older model.

column2: 'Damage indicates the ship has been shot down and looted. There was little left to take, but we took it.
column3: 'Damage indicates the ship has been shot down and looted. There was little left to take, but we took it.

column2: 'The wreckage contained a few useful materials, including some synthethic parts and remains of the squid crew, which we recycled into universal organics.
column3: 'The wreckage contained a few useful materials, including some synthethic parts and remains of the squid crew, which we recycled into universal organics.

column2: 'Shortly after entering the atmosphere, we encountered a swarm of mines that attached themselves to our ship hull and exploded, causing minor damage. Probably remnants of an ancient battle.
column3: 'Shortly after entering the atmosphere, we encountered a swarm of mines that attached themselves to our ship hull and exploded, causing minor damage. Probably remnants of an ancient battle.

column2: 'The entire planet is a desolate ball of dirt, except for a giant fossilized tree trunk, along with a few smaller ones. Some kind of exotic moss colony seems to be living on the tree remains. We detect it's emitting trace amounts of warp enegy.
column3: 'The entire planet is a desolate ball of dirt, except for a giant fossilized tree trunk, along with a few smaller ones. Some kind of exotic moss colony seems to be living on the tree remains. We detect it's emitting trace amounts of warp enegy.

column2: 'Print bots to harvest the moss for resources & research [-30 synthethics]
column3: 'Print bots to harvest the moss for resources & research [-30 synthethics]

column2: 'Carry out closer analysis on the spot [send crew]
column3: 'Carry out closer analysis on the spot [send crew]

column2: 'Small samples were obtained from around the moss and fossilized tree stumps. We leave the planet otherwise untouched. Our research operation reveals the "moss" is a colony of all-consuming nanobots, best to avoid.
column3: 'Small samples were obtained from around the moss and fossilized tree stumps. We leave the planet otherwise untouched. Our research operation reveals the "moss" is a colony of all-consuming nanobots, best to avoid.

column2: 'It turns out the "moss colony" was a group of military grade self-replicating nanobots. Fortunately, we only lost the first bot that came into contact with these nanobots. It seems likely the planet is desolate because the nanobots have consumed all life. We recorded the nanobot structure & behaviour as xenodata.
column3: 'It turns out the "moss colony" was a group of military grade self-replicating nanobots. Fortunately, we only lost the first bot that came into contact with these nanobots. It seems likely the planet is desolate because the nanobots have consumed all life. We recorded the nanobot structure & behaviour as xenodata.

column2: 'It turns out the "moss" was self-replicating military nanobots, capable of turning almost any matter into themselves. Fortunately, our operatives realized the threat quickly and aborted the mission. It seems the nanobots have consumed all other life on the planet. We recorded the nanobot structure & behaviour as xenodata.
column3: 'It turns out the "moss" was self-replicating military nanobots, capable of turning almost any matter into themselves. Fortunately, our operatives realized the threat quickly and aborted the mission. It seems the nanobots have consumed all other life on the planet. We recorded the nanobot structure & behaviour as xenodata.

column2: 'It turns out the "moss colony" was a group of military grade self-replicating nanobots! When our bots came into contact with the them, the bots started actively disintegrating their less isolated parts. We aborted the mission and burned the contaminated bots. The nanobot structure & behaviour was recorded as xenodata.
column3: 'It turns out the "moss colony" was a group of military grade self-replicating nanobots! When our bots came into contact with the them, the bots started actively disintegrating their less isolated parts. We aborted the mission and burned the contaminated bots. The nanobot structure & behaviour was recorded as xenodata.

column2: 'Soon after starting the research, our crew biosecurity sensors alerted everybody of an active contamination hazard. It turns out the "moss colony" was a group of military grade self-replicating nanobots, capable of disrupting even our advanced environmental protection suits. Mission aborted.
