column2: 'After being loaded with the correct amount of explosives, the facilities start to make terrible noises and release large clouds of steam into the atmosphere. After a few hours, a container full of fuel emerges from the factory. We may repeat the process any time.
column3: 'After being loaded with the correct amount of explosives, the facilities start to make terrible noises and release large clouds of steam into the atmosphere. After a few hours, a container full of fuel emerges from the factory. We may repeat the process any time.

column2: 'After a few hours, a container full of fuel emerges from the factory. We may repeat the process any time.
column3: 'After a few hours, a container full of fuel emerges from the factory. We may repeat the process any time.

column2: 'Public materials convertors were built by older species, to allow anybody making starfuel from other materials. It seems somebody has brutally looted this one, leaving puddles of semifrozen starfuel behind. We scavenged everything of value.
column3: 'Public materials convertors were built by older species, to allow anybody making starfuel from other materials. It seems somebody has brutally looted this one, leaving puddles of semifrozen starfuel behind. We scavenged everything of value.

column2: 'The very limited animal life on this planet makes ecological harvesting easier. It seems the plants in this ecosystem won the evolutionary war against their animal predators by becoming very poisonous.
column3: 'The very limited animal life on this planet makes ecological harvesting easier. It seems the plants in this ecosystem won the evolutionary war against their animal predators by becoming very poisonous.

column2: 'No incidents. We also discovored a few exposed ore seams during the operation.
column3: 'No incidents. We also discovored a few exposed ore seams during the operation.

column2: 'No incidents. We also found something interesting during the operation...
column3: 'No incidents. We also found something interesting during the operation...

column2: 'This planet features extreme temperatures and intense volcanic activity. Initial scans suggest possibility of precious metals. Prospect for mining opportunities?
column3: 'This planet features extreme temperatures and intense volcanic activity. Initial scans suggest possibility of precious metals. Prospect for mining opportunities?

column2: 'Mining operation completed without incidents. We were able to recover most of the materials used to print the mining facilities & equipment.
column3: 'Mining operation completed without incidents. We were able to recover most of the materials used to print the mining facilities & equipment.

column2: 'Prospecting shows the planet surface layers contain abundant metallic elements. Operations on this planet requires printing of dedicated heat-resistant equipment. Mining from here is risky.
column3: 'Prospecting shows the planet surface layers contain abundant metallic elements. Operations on this planet requires printing of dedicated heat-resistant equipment. Mining from here is risky.

column2: 'Unexpected seismic activity destroyed our mining facilities and several bots, together with access to the exposed seams.
column3: 'Unexpected seismic activity destroyed our mining facilities and several bots, together with access to the exposed seams.

column2: 'Crystalline life forms emerged from the ground and attacked our mining facilities. The creatures used some kind of heat rays to down a shuttle carrying crew who were personally overseeing the mining activities. Rescue bots and shuttles are already looking for survivors.
column3: 'Crystalline life forms emerged from the ground and attacked our mining facilities. The creatures used some kind of heat rays to down a shuttle carrying crew who were personally overseeing the mining activities. Rescue bots and shuttles are already looking for survivors.

column2: 'Our bots found the crew to be slightly burned but still alive. We managed to evacuate them without further complications. Some bots were lost during the operation.
column3: 'Our bots found the crew to be slightly burned but still alive. We managed to evacuate them without further complications. Some bots were lost during the operation.

column2: 'Searching yielded no results, and numerous bots were lost during the operation. The lost crewmember will be remembered.
column3: 'Searching yielded no results, and numerous bots were lost during the operation. The lost crewmember will be remembered.

column2: 'The planet is too hot for mining operations.
column3: 'The planet is too hot for mining operations.

column2: 'Despite a generally hostile environment, we found a small patch with cooler temperatures and no seismic activity during the survey. The crew in charge of the operation decided to seize the opportunity and mine some metals before the unpredictable weather changes.
column3: 'Despite a generally hostile environment, we found a small patch with cooler temperatures and no seismic activity during the survey. The crew in charge of the operation decided to seize the opportunity and mine some metals before the unpredictable weather changes.

column2: 'To our suprise, the volcanic planet supports life. We spotted groups of noncarbon presentients living on the cooler mountains, and took time to research them. The operation was a big success.
column3: 'To our suprise, the volcanic planet supports life. We spotted groups of noncarbon presentients living on the cooler mountains, and took time to research them. The operation was a big success.

column2: 'The warp animals observed our operation, but did not interfere. Perhaps living on a planet with no natural enemies has made these particular animals less aggressive?
column3: 'The warp animals observed our operation, but did not interfere. Perhaps living on a planet with no natural enemies has made these particular animals less aggressive?

column2: 'Something on this planet, possibly precursor technology or warp animals, are emitting very strong warpwaves. Should we investigate closer?
column3: 'Something on this planet, possibly precursor technology or warp animals, are emitting very strong warpwaves. Should we investigate closer?

column2: 'You leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched. Discovery of such peaceful coexistence with warp animals and carbon nature is a rare one. Careful study might create a scientific breakthrough in understanding warp life.
column3: 'You leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched. Discovery of such peaceful coexistence with warp animals and carbon nature is a rare one. Careful study might create a scientific breakthrough in understanding warp life.

column2: 'The planet is a lush garden, full of fruits and greenery ready for harvest. We spot multiple warp animals lazily floating about in the distance, they don't seem too interested in us at the moment. These large creatures are unpredictable and omnivores in the broadest sense though. They might, for example, sometimes hunt and eat spaceships.
column3: 'The planet is a lush garden, full of fruits and greenery ready for harvest. We spot multiple warp animals lazily floating about in the distance, they don't seem too interested in us at the moment. These large creatures are unpredictable and omnivores in the broadest sense though. They might, for example, sometimes hunt and eat spaceships.

column2: 'Take research samples and get the hell out of here
column3: 'Take research samples and get the hell out of here

column2: 'The warp animals started gathering around our harvesting operation and display signs of agitated behaviour. We quickly packed up and left.
column3: 'The warp animals started gathering around our harvesting operation and display signs of agitated behaviour. We quickly packed up and left.

column2: 'Soon after we had printed the harvester bots and brought them on the planet, the warp animals attacked. They zapped our machines and operatives with deadly warp rays. We are now driving away from the planet at max speed...
column3: 'Soon after we had printed the harvester bots and brought them on the planet, the warp animals attacked. They zapped our machines and operatives with deadly warp rays. We are now driving away from the planet at max speed...

column2: 'The warp animals show no signs of stopping the chase and have congregated into a hunting formation. We must make a decision quickly, while we still have the chance.
column3: 'The warp animals show no signs of stopping the chase and have congregated into a hunting formation. We must make a decision quickly, while we still have the chance.

column2: 'Engine overburn [-100 fuel or all if we have less than 100]
column3: 'Engine overburn [-100 fuel or all if we have less than 100]

column2: 'Attempt to distract them with edibles [-100 organics]
column3: 'Attempt to distract them with edibles [-100 organics]

column2: 'Soon after we entered the atmosphere, a large swarm of warp animals confronted us. An eyeblink later, they attacked, zapping our ship with warp rays. We turned around and retreated, but the animals are following us...
column3: 'Soon after we entered the atmosphere, a large swarm of warp animals confronted us. An eyeblink later, they attacked, zapping our ship with warp rays. We turned around and retreated, but the animals are following us...

column2: 'We accelerate our engines to max speed and gain some distance, but the animals catch up by creating personal Warptunnel. The herd shows no sign of stopping the hunt, they have almost surrounded us!
column3: 'We accelerate our engines to max speed and gain some distance, but the animals catch up by creating personal Warptunnel. The herd shows no sign of stopping the hunt, they have almost surrounded us!

column2: 'We cannot overburn the engines again, let's just drive!
column3: 'We cannot overburn the engines again, let's just drive!

column2: 'Attempt to distract them with edibles [-100 organics or less]
column3: 'Attempt to distract them with edibles [-100 organics or less]

column2: 'Practically submerging the engines in starfuel, we accelerate our engines to max speed and manage to speed out from the circle of warp animals closing in on us. The sudden acceleration also produces a minor malfunction, leading to loss of ship integrity.
column3: 'Practically submerging the engines in starfuel, we accelerate our engines to max speed and manage to speed out from the circle of warp animals closing in on us. The sudden acceleration also produces a minor malfunction, leading to loss of ship integrity.

column2: 'The animals surround us and attack from every angle. The surface of our ship starts to boil and crack from numerous energy attacks. We push the engines suddenly to the max and manage to escape this deadly gang! However, the ship has already received critical damage...
column3: 'The animals surround us and attack from every angle. The surface of our ship starts to boil and crack from numerous energy attacks. We push the engines suddenly to the max and manage to escape this deadly gang! However, the ship has already received critical damage...

column2: 'We failed to escape. As we had no other option, we fought the creatures with everything we had. The herd of warp animals beat our ship into a wreck, and then suddenly stopped - a group of space eels were flying by, singing. The jellyfish calmed down and left, but we had already received critical hits.
column3: 'We failed to escape. As we had no other option, we fought the creatures with everything we had. The herd of warp animals beat our ship into a wreck, and then suddenly stopped - a group of space eels were flying by, singing. The jellyfish calmed down and left, but we had already received critical hits.

column2: 'The warp animals stop for a bit to suck in the organics. They shoot a barrage of plasma blasts at us and then turn around to head back home.
column3: 'The warp animals stop for a bit to suck in the organics. They shoot a barrage of plasma blasts at us and then turn around to head back home.

column2: 'Only a few warp animals take interest in the blob of organics we release, as others keep chasing and shooting at us. We receive heavy damage, until we observe a group of space eels flying by in the distance. Their beautiful telepathic song calms the predators, and they finally give up the hunt. We are left alone to lick our wounds.
column3: 'Only a few warp animals take interest in the blob of organics we release, as others keep chasing and shooting at us. We receive heavy damage, until we observe a group of space eels flying by in the distance. Their beautiful telepathic song calms the predators, and they finally give up the hunt. We are left alone to lick our wounds.

column2: 'While escaping at full speed and dodging warp animal attacks, we hastily print mine casings for explosives and release them behind us. We detonate the mines while the swarm is passing through, killing many. The surviving creatures let out painful telepathic shrieks and shoot a few rays at us, but the chase is over. The creatures head back to their planet.
column3: 'While escaping at full speed and dodging warp animal attacks, we hastily print mine casings for explosives and release them behind us. We detonate the mines while the swarm is passing through, killing many. The surviving creatures let out painful telepathic shrieks and shoot a few rays at us, but the chase is over. The creatures head back to their planet.

column2: '"We do not have the necessary resources to do business here, but we may return later."
column3: '"We do not have the necessary resources to do business here, but we may return later."

column2: 'The administrators of the station do not offer personal communication. There's only one product on the menu - self contained exotic substances, ready for recreational consumption. The station follows "One visit per client" religious policy.
column3: 'The administrators of the station do not offer personal communication. There's only one product on the menu - self contained exotic substances, ready for recreational consumption. The station follows "One visit per client" religious policy.

column2: 'In addition to exotics, the trade package contains a free gift (a large cake with sexually stimulating properties).
column3: 'In addition to exotics, the trade package contains a free gift (a large cake with sexually stimulating properties).

column2: 'In addition to exotics, the trade package contains a free gift (some natural pudding with mildly psychedelic properties).
column3: 'In addition to exotics, the trade package contains a free gift (some natural pudding with mildly psychedelic properties).

column2: 'In addition to exotics, the trade package contains a free gift (an intoxicating drink).
column3: 'In addition to exotics, the trade package contains a free gift (an intoxicating drink).

column2: 'In addition to exotics, the trade package contains a free gift (sweets with sexually stimulating properties).
column3: 'In addition to exotics, the trade package contains a free gift (sweets with sexually stimulating properties).

column2: 'In addition to exotics, the trade package contains fruits from some unknown world.
column3: 'In addition to exotics, the trade package contains fruits from some unknown world.

column2: 'In addition to exotics, the trade package contains a free gift. It is a miniature "rapid personal self-destruct device", with a big red button on the top, and the instructions on how to activate it with a voice command. We scrap it just in case.
column3: 'In addition to exotics, the trade package contains a free gift. It is a miniature "rapid personal self-destruct device", with a big red button on the top, and the instructions on how to activate it with a voice command. We scrap it just in case.

column1: '13 wr. shipsx8, mostly carcasses, rare cat.prefab

column2: 'We have discovered a shipwreck of uknown design, floating in space and damaged beyond repair. It seems all systems are offline . Send scavenging engineers to board the ship?
column3: 'We have discovered a shipwreck of uknown design, floating in space and damaged beyond repair. It seems all systems are offline . Send scavenging engineers to board the ship?

column2: 'Scavenging operation completed. Somehow, a particularly insidious nanobot from the ship avoided our decontamination procedures and got aboard the ship. It started to eat away some of the Mothership tech parts and multiplying rapidly. Sections of the ship had to be destroyed to stop the infestation.
column3: 'Scavenging operation completed. Somehow, a particularly insidious nanobot from the ship avoided our decontamination procedures and got aboard the ship. It started to eat away some of the Mothership tech parts and multiplying rapidly. Sections of the ship had to be destroyed to stop the infestation.

column2: 'It is a carcass of a fuel tanker, looted to the bones... most likely work of pirates. Clouds of fuel have been detected floating nearby. The spilled fuel is usable but collecting it might take a while.
column3: 'It is a carcass of a fuel tanker, looted to the bones... most likely work of pirates. Clouds of fuel have been detected floating nearby. The spilled fuel is usable but collecting it might take a while.

column2: 'Our salvage teams have scooped up most of the fuel floating nearby.
column3: 'Our salvage teams have scooped up most of the fuel floating nearby.

column2: ''It is a carcass of some kind of fuel tanker, looted to the bones... most likely the work of pirates. Clouds of starfuel have been detected floating nearby.
column3: ''It is a carcass of some kind of fuel tanker, looted to the bones... most likely the work of pirates. Clouds of starfuel have been detected floating nearby.

column2: 'Your salvage teams have scooped up most of the fuel floating nearby. They also salvaged some pieces from the carcass.
column3: 'Your salvage teams have scooped up most of the fuel floating nearby. They also salvaged some pieces from the carcass.

column2: 'It's a ship frame, and little else.
column3: 'It's a ship frame, and little else.

column2: 'This carcass of a ship had barely anything left for scavenging,
column3: 'This carcass of a ship had barely anything left for scavenging,

column2: 'This carcass of a ship barely had anything left for scavenging. Our crew did a good job anyway and still found something of value.
column3: 'This carcass of a ship barely had anything left for scavenging. Our crew did a good job anyway and still found something of value.

column2: 'Turns out there are actually two wreckages here. A tanker and its escort, looted to the bones. Our scavenger engineers still managed to find some valuable parts that other looters had missed.
column3: 'Turns out there are actually two wreckages here. A tanker and its escort, looted to the bones. Our scavenger engineers still managed to find some valuable parts that other looters had missed.

column2: 'It seems to be the shell of a huge but primitive mining ship, full of holes and beam weapon scorch marks. The carcass was made of cheap materials and there was nothing to scavenge.
column3: 'It seems to be the shell of a huge but primitive mining ship, full of holes and beam weapon scorch marks. The carcass was made of cheap materials and there was nothing to scavenge.

column2: 'A companion animal rescued from shipwreck. Understands orders but ignores them.
column3: 'A companion animal rescued from shipwreck. Understands orders but ignores them.

column2: 'The ship was partially made of biotech tissue, but seems to be now completely dead and inert.
column3: 'The ship was partially made of biotech tissue, but seems to be now completely dead and inert.

column2: 'The wreckage was untouched by other looters.
column3: 'The wreckage was untouched by other looters.

column2: 'It seems to be a wreck of a station, or a very large ship. No active systems detected.
column3: 'It seems to be a wreck of a station, or a very large ship. No active systems detected.

column2: 'It is an ancient mobile residential station, a home for communities and individuals who preferred not to live on a planet. Despite having been looted several times, our meticulous scavengers found some Credits and pieces worth taking.
column3: 'It is an ancient mobile residential station, a home for communities and individuals who preferred not to live on a planet. Despite having been looted several times, our meticulous scavengers found some Credits and pieces worth taking.

column2: 'It is an ancient mobile residential station, a home for communities and individuals who preferred not to live on a planet. Damage markings indicate the station was destroyed by numerous small weapons- possibly the work of pirates or smugglers. While most of the station is looted, dead bodies have been left behind. We took them aboard and turned them into organics, according to ancient terran tradition.
column3: 'It is an ancient mobile residential station, a home for communities and individuals who preferred not to live on a planet. Damage markings indicate the station was destroyed by numerous small weapons- possibly the work of pirates or smugglers. While most of the station is looted, dead bodies have been left behind. We took them aboard and turned them into organics, according to ancient terran tradition.

column2: 'Part of the station exploded after our salvage team got close. The wreckage was left as it was, there could be other traps embedded deeper into the carcass.
column3: 'Part of the station exploded after our salvage team got close. The wreckage was left as it was, there could be other traps embedded deeper into the carcass.

column2: 'It is an ancient mobile residential station, a home for communities and individuals who preferred not to live on a planet. The wreckage had nothing left to loot, but there was a warp jellyfish hiding inside. It briefly scorched the Mothership with one of its deadly energy rays before warping off.
column3: 'It is an ancient mobile residential station, a home for communities and individuals who preferred not to live on a planet. The wreckage had nothing left to loot, but there was a warp jellyfish hiding inside. It briefly scorched the Mothership with one of its deadly energy rays before warping off.

column2: 'It is an ancient mobile residential station, a home for communities and individuals who preferred not to live on a planet. Our operatives discovered the station had been rigged with explosives connected to a primitive trap. We were able to disarm the trap remotely and salvage the explosives. The station itself has already been looted and had little left to take.
column3: 'It is an ancient mobile residential station, a home for communities and individuals who preferred not to live on a planet. Our operatives discovered the station had been rigged with explosives connected to a primitive trap. We were able to disarm the trap remotely and salvage the explosives. The station itself has already been looted and had little left to take.

column2: 'This used to be an ancient mobile residential station, a home for communities and individuals who preferred not to live on a planet. Astoundingly, we find an escape cryopod with one of the station's inhabitants floating near the station. The survivor has a private conversation with our AI and decides to join our mission.
column3: 'This used to be an ancient mobile residential station, a home for communities and individuals who preferred not to live on a planet. Astoundingly, we find an escape cryopod with one of the station's inhabitants floating near the station. The survivor has a private conversation with our AI and decides to join our mission.

column2: 'An individual found from cryopod near a wrecked station. No memories from earlier life.
column3: 'An individual found from cryopod near a wrecked station. No memories from earlier life.

column2: 'It seems to be a wreck of a small space station, no active systems detected.
column3: 'It seems to be a wreck of a small space station, no active systems detected.

column2: 'This used to be a science base. Data records show some experiment with warp life got out of hand here, resulting in fire and subsequent explosions.\nWe collected everything worth taking, including the bodies of dead scientists and a few portable fuel canisters floating around. Unfortunately, all research data in the station's memorybanks is corrupted.
column3: 'This used to be a science base. Data records show some experiment with warp life got out of hand here, resulting in fire and subsequent explosions.\nWe collected everything worth taking, including the bodies of dead scientists and a few portable fuel canisters floating around. Unfortunately, all research data in the station's memorybanks is corrupted.

column2: 'This used to be a science base. Data records show some experiment with warp life got out of hand here. It seems the station has been already looted once, but we found some larger metal Credits worth taking.
column3: 'This used to be a science base. Data records show some experiment with warp life got out of hand here. It seems the station has been already looted once, but we found some larger metal Credits worth taking.

column2: 'Logs reveal a critical malfunction in biotech reactors destroyed this research station. Its biotech medbay unit was in survival mode and and hibernating among the rubble. It had eaten all organics in the wreckage to sustain itself and accidentally also tried to eat one of our crew, causing a minor wound.
column3: 'Logs reveal a critical malfunction in biotech reactors destroyed this research station. Its biotech medbay unit was in survival mode and and hibernating among the rubble. It had eaten all organics in the wreckage to sustain itself and accidentally also tried to eat one of our crew, causing a minor wound.

column2: 'This used to be a science base researching bioweapons and is quite well preserved. Large tanks of biomass have stayed intact. We also scaveged some exotic samples from the lab.
column3: 'This used to be a science base researching bioweapons and is quite well preserved. Large tanks of biomass have stayed intact. We also scaveged some exotic samples from the lab.

column2: 'This used to be a science base. Last data records show unknown attackers destroying the base with projectile weapons. We found one survivor in a cryopod, and they decided to join our mission after a private conversation with our AI.
column3: 'This used to be a science base. Last data records show unknown attackers destroying the base with projectile weapons. We found one survivor in a cryopod, and they decided to join our mission after a private conversation with our AI.

column2: 'This used to be a science base and it seems they were investigating a strange rock with purportedly psychic properties. Data records show all the scientists lost their sanity one by one and turned violent, eventually destroying the station.
column3: 'This used to be a science base and it seems they were investigating a strange rock with purportedly psychic properties. Data records show all the scientists lost their sanity one by one and turned violent, eventually destroying the station.

column2: 'Leave and dump the rock into a star
column3: 'Leave and dump the rock into a star

column2: 'Soon after our research began, the crew started experiencing strange psychological phenomenon and anomalous bleeding from the eyes. We decided to hurl the rock into a nearby star and the problems stopped. That rock had really bad vibes.
column3: 'Soon after our research began, the crew started experiencing strange psychological phenomenon and anomalous bleeding from the eyes. We decided to hurl the rock into a nearby star and the problems stopped. That rock had really bad vibes.

column2: 'Soon after our research began, one of our crewmembers became violent and attacked the others, seriously injuring them before anybody had a chance to intervene. We hurled the rock into a nearby star, after which the unstable crewmember completely regained their sanity.
column3: 'Soon after our research began, one of our crewmembers became violent and attacked the others, seriously injuring them before anybody had a chance to intervene. We hurled the rock into a nearby star, after which the unstable crewmember completely regained their sanity.

column2: 'This used to be a science base. Last data records show unknown attackers destroying the base with projectile weapons. We found one survivor in a cryopod, and it liked us.
column3: 'This used to be a science base. Last data records show unknown attackers destroying the base with projectile weapons. We found one survivor in a cryopod, and it liked us.

column1: '356 wr. blue biotech cone ship active MTo rare weapons.prefab

column2: 'We've discovered a damaged alien ship, slowly drifting in space. Its defence systems are active but it is unresponsive to our communication attempts. Its biotech structure suggests an advanced level of technology.
column3: 'We've discovered a damaged alien ship, slowly drifting in space. Its defence systems are active but it is unresponsive to our communication attempts. Its biotech structure suggests an advanced level of technology.

column2: 'Send boarding team to neutralize the ship [need at least 3 crew]
column3: 'Send boarding team to neutralize the ship [need at least 3 crew]

column2: 'It seems we accidentally hit the ship's biological reactor or warpdrive or something, because it just exploded in a spectacular fashion. Our ship received minor external damage. There was little left to be scavenged.
column3: 'It seems we accidentally hit the ship's biological reactor or warpdrive or something, because it just exploded in a spectacular fashion. Our ship received minor external damage. There was little left to be scavenged.

column2: 'We managed to destroy the ship's defences, dealing significant collateral damage to the rest of the vessel.
column3: 'We managed to destroy the ship's defences, dealing significant collateral damage to the rest of the vessel.

column2: 'Our boarders received severe damage from the ship's defences during the approach and had to return mid-operation.
column3: 'Our boarders received severe damage from the ship's defences during the approach and had to return mid-operation.

column2: 'Nobody else volunteers to board the ship. If we want to disable its defences now, we would need to destroy most of the ship. We could also leave it be. Its bots were just trying to protect it.
column3: 'Nobody else volunteers to board the ship. If we want to disable its defences now, we would need to destroy most of the ship. We could also leave it be. Its bots were just trying to protect it.

column2: 'Our boarding shuttles managed to dodge point defence fire while approaching. Once inside, the boarders encountered some kind of biological bots spewing molecular acid. Our operatives barely managed to hold them back and are now cornered. They need additional backup or an evacuation. Which one it will be?
column3: 'Our boarding shuttles managed to dodge point defence fire while approaching. Once inside, the boarders encountered some kind of biological bots spewing molecular acid. Our operatives barely managed to hold them back and are now cornered. They need additional backup or an evacuation. Which one it will be?

column2: 'Who knows, perhaps the wreckage has a sentient AI inside, but incapable of communication? We leave the ship to its own fate.
column3: 'Who knows, perhaps the wreckage has a sentient AI inside, but incapable of communication? We leave the ship to its own fate.

column2: 'We managed to destroy the ship's external defences while leaving the rest of the functional modules intact. During the follow-up scavenging operation, a group of internal defence bots wounded our crew before they were neutralized.
column3: 'We managed to destroy the ship's external defences while leaving the rest of the functional modules intact. During the follow-up scavenging operation, a group of internal defence bots wounded our crew before they were neutralized.

column2: 'Print & send new armored evac shuttles [-90 metals]
column3: 'Print & send new armored evac shuttles [-90 metals]

column2: '"We do not have enough metals needed for the task."
column3: '"We do not have enough metals needed for the task."

column2: 'Our crew was safely evacuated. Nobody else volunteers to board the ship. If we want to disable its defences now, we would need to destroy most of the ship. We could also leave it be. Its bots were just trying to protect it.
column3: 'Our crew was safely evacuated. Nobody else volunteers to board the ship. If we want to disable its defences now, we would need to destroy most of the ship. We could also leave it be. Its bots were just trying to protect it.

column2: 'We managed to evacuate our operatives & destroy the ship's active defences.
column3: 'We managed to evacuate our operatives & destroy the ship's active defences.

column2: 'We closed in under fire and evacuated our operatives. Once the crew was back, we destroyed the wreckage and scavenged the remains.
column3: 'We closed in under fire and evacuated our operatives. Once the crew was back, we destroyed the wreckage and scavenged the remains.

column2: 'Fortunately, the backup also survived the point defence crossfire of the vessel. They regrouped inside with earlier boarders and were able to overwhelm the defenders. The ship and its rare technology are ours!
column3: 'Fortunately, the backup also survived the point defence crossfire of the vessel. They regrouped inside with earlier boarders and were able to overwhelm the defenders. The ship and its rare technology are ours!

column2: 'The backup boarders received heavy damage from point defence fire of the biotech vessel. They were able to regroup with earlier boarders and overwhelm the defenders. We scavenged the entire vessel.
column3: 'The backup boarders received heavy damage from point defence fire of the biotech vessel. They were able to regroup with earlier boarders and overwhelm the defenders. We scavenged the entire vessel.

column2: 'Fortunately, the backup also survived the point defence crossfire of the vessel. They regrouped inside with earlier boarders and attacked the remaining defence bots, receiving some damage. We scavenged the entire vessel.
column3: 'Fortunately, the backup also survived the point defence crossfire of the vessel. They regrouped inside with earlier boarders and attacked the remaining defence bots, receiving some damage. We scavenged the entire vessel.

column1: '356 wr. digested ship, warp jellyfish attack.prefab

column2: 'This wreckage shows deep corrosion scars. It was probably swallowed and partially digested by some kind of space organism.
column3: 'This wreckage shows deep corrosion scars. It was probably swallowed and partially digested by some kind of space organism.

column2: 'Our salvage team stripped the wreckage bare.
column3: 'Our salvage team stripped the wreckage bare.

column2: 'A large swarm of predatory warp animals exited from Warptunnel around us. Their movements portray a hunting pattern. Is this really an ambush? They are so numerous that we must disengage!
column3: 'A large swarm of predatory warp animals exited from Warptunnel around us. Their movements portray a hunting pattern. Is this really an ambush? They are so numerous that we must disengage!

column2: 'Curses! The warp animals are somehow interfering with our warpdrive! It consumed some fuel but failed to launch. We must attempt conventional escape.
column3: 'Curses! The warp animals are somehow interfering with our warpdrive! It consumed some fuel but failed to launch. We must attempt conventional escape.

column2: 'The predatory animals are getting closer, the crew starts to get seriously worried. AI suggests now would be a good time to use any explosives we have. We need minimally 40 explosives to make a difference.
column3: 'The predatory animals are getting closer, the crew starts to get seriously worried. AI suggests now would be a good time to use any explosives we have. We need minimally 40 explosives to make a difference.

column2: 'We opened fire from projectile weaponry and left hastily printed mines floating into space. The warp animals were too agitated from the prospect of consuming us that they didn't notice the mines until too late. Large numbers of creatures were destroyed in powerful explosions.
column3: 'We opened fire from projectile weaponry and left hastily printed mines floating into space. The warp animals were too agitated from the prospect of consuming us that they didn't notice the mines until too late. Large numbers of creatures were destroyed in powerful explosions.

column2: 'We opened fire from projectile weaponry and left hastily printed mines floating into space. The predators received significant damage, but followed us still for a while, using some kind of advanced rays that disintegrated synthetics and corrputed organics.
column3: 'We opened fire from projectile weaponry and left hastily printed mines floating into space. The predators received significant damage, but followed us still for a while, using some kind of advanced rays that disintegrated synthetics and corrputed organics.

column2: 'Our pilots did their best to navigate the Mothership out of the deadly swarm. We also fired all our weapons, doing minor damage without a dedicated explosive barrage.
column3: 'Our pilots did their best to navigate the Mothership out of the deadly swarm. We also fired all our weapons, doing minor damage without a dedicated explosive barrage.

column2: 'We tried to maneuver the Mothership out of the deadly swarm, firing all of our weapons but doing little damage without a dedicated explosive barrage.
column3: 'We tried to maneuver the Mothership out of the deadly swarm, firing all of our weapons but doing little damage without a dedicated explosive barrage.

column2: 'Our salvage team stripped the wreckage bare. Digestive acids had reduced the ship's technology to lumps of metal and plastic.
column3: 'Our salvage team stripped the wreckage bare. Digestive acids had reduced the ship's technology to lumps of metal and plastic.

column2: 'We harvested fruits, seeds and eggs, gathering a significant amount of organics without killing a single being.
column3: 'We harvested fruits, seeds and eggs, gathering a significant amount of organics without killing a single being.

column2: 'Lush forests and jungles cover this green planet. Looks like a good spot for harvesting some organics.
column3: 'Lush forests and jungles cover this green planet. Looks like a good spot for harvesting some organics.

column2: 'We take a few scientific samples and leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched. It might evolve into something truly special one day.
column3: 'We take a few scientific samples and leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched. It might evolve into something truly special one day.

column2: 'Eco-harvesting is easy here because the local ecosystem is earth-like and our harvesting technology does not need any adjustments.
column3: 'Eco-harvesting is easy here because the local ecosystem is earth-like and our harvesting technology does not need any adjustments.

column2: 'Our crew and bots eco-harvested fruits, seeds and eggs, leaving everything else intact. We got a large haul of organics without killing a single creature.
column3: 'Our crew and bots eco-harvested fruits, seeds and eggs, leaving everything else intact. We got a large haul of organics without killing a single creature.

column2: 'You leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched. It might evolve into something truly spectacular one day.
column3: 'You leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched. It might evolve into something truly spectacular one day.

column2: 'Lush forests cover this green planet. Looks like a good spot for harvesting some organics.
column3: 'Lush forests cover this green planet. Looks like a good spot for harvesting some organics.

column2: 'Our crew and bots eco-harvested fruits, seeds and eggs, leaving the developed parent organisms themselves intact. We were able to harvest a significant amount of organics without killing a single creature.
column3: 'Our crew and bots eco-harvested fruits, seeds and eggs, leaving the developed parent organisms themselves intact. We were able to harvest a significant amount of organics without killing a single creature.

column2: 'Lush forests cover this planet. Looks like a good spot for harvesting some organics.
column3: 'Lush forests cover this planet. Looks like a good spot for harvesting some organics.

column2: 'Harvesting operations completed. Most of the local species will probably undergo extinction events due to our activities and we might have caused irreversible damage to the ecosystem as a whole. Others have died so that we may live.
column3: 'Harvesting operations completed. Most of the local species will probably undergo extinction events due to our activities and we might have caused irreversible damage to the ecosystem as a whole. Others have died so that we may live.

column2: 'The ecosystem on this planet seems to be a very young one. The soil does not have much nutrients and supports only moss and a small plants in a couple of patches on the planet. We could harvest some organics from here, but there is no way to do it ecologically.
column3: 'The ecosystem on this planet seems to be a very young one. The soil does not have much nutrients and supports only moss and a small plants in a couple of patches on the planet. We could harvest some organics from here, but there is no way to do it ecologically.

column2: 'You leave this planet untouched. It's still young and local life needs time, perhaps a few thousands of years, to become a blossoming flower of life.
column3: 'You leave this planet untouched. It's still young and local life needs time, perhaps a few thousands of years, to become a blossoming flower of life.

column2: 'During the harvesting operation, a warp worm appeared from underground and attacked our printed harvesting equipment. More of them appeared soon and we decided to leave the planet. Fortunately, they didn't follow.
column3: 'During the harvesting operation, a warp worm appeared from underground and attacked our printed harvesting equipment. More of them appeared soon and we decided to leave the planet. Fortunately, they didn't follow.

column2: 'Our crew and bots eco-harvested the fruiting bodies of the mushrooms leaving the developed parent organisms themselves intact. We were able to harvest a significant amount of organics without killing a single creature.
column3: 'Our crew and bots eco-harvested the fruiting bodies of the mushrooms leaving the developed parent organisms themselves intact. We were able to harvest a significant amount of organics without killing a single creature.

column2: 'Orbital scanning reveals presence of life, but strangely we do not spot much vegetation on the ground.
column3: 'Orbital scanning reveals presence of life, but strangely we do not spot much vegetation on the ground.

column2: 'We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched. It might evolve into something truly special one day.
column3: 'We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched. It might evolve into something truly special one day.

column2: 'The local ecosystem is fungus-based. This means eco-harvesting is easy here because we can take the fruit bodies of the shrooms without killing whole organisms.
column3: 'The local ecosystem is fungus-based. This means eco-harvesting is easy here because we can take the fruit bodies of the shrooms without killing whole organisms.

column2: 'Except for taking a few scientific samples, we leave the ecosystem of this planet untouched.
column3: 'Except for taking a few scientific samples, we leave the ecosystem of this planet untouched.

column2: 'This planet is covered with giant fungi. This means eco-harvesting is easy here because we can take the fruit bodies of the shrooms without killing whole organisms.
column3: 'This planet is covered with giant fungi. This means eco-harvesting is easy here because we can take the fruit bodies of the shrooms without killing whole organisms.

column2: 'Soon after we set up our organics harvesting equipment, some of the local giant mushrooms start to glow and sing, emitting strong warp null waves that disable nearby electronics. A deeper scan reveals warp energy frequencies within the shrooms. We may only approach on foot and without digital tech.
column3: 'Soon after we set up our organics harvesting equipment, some of the local giant mushrooms start to glow and sing, emitting strong warp null waves that disable nearby electronics. A deeper scan reveals warp energy frequencies within the shrooms. We may only approach on foot and without digital tech.

column2: 'The spores meld together in the containment chamber and, within days, turn into a sleeping adult human. They have no memories but their personalities slowly "wake up" and are revealed to be a mix of personalities of the crewmembers who visited the planet. Otherwise, they are completely normal. They easily learn how to operate the ship and become a loved member of the crew.
column3: 'The spores meld together in the containment chamber and, within days, turn into a sleeping adult human. They have no memories but their personalities slowly "wake up" and are revealed to be a mix of personalities of the crewmembers who visited the planet. Otherwise, they are completely normal. They easily learn how to operate the ship and become a loved member of the crew.

column2: 'A perfectly normal human who grew from spores given by a giant mushroom.
column3: 'A perfectly normal human who grew from spores given by a giant mushroom.

column2: 'As our crew get closer, they feel a mild telepathic connection established with the fungi. Vivid psychedelic images pour into their minds, and they understand this is how the fungi sees the world. Its roots cover almost the entire planet, and it is connected to all beings here. They realize the fungi is hungry. It wants food, and promises something wonderful in return.
column3: 'As our crew get closer, they feel a mild telepathic connection established with the fungi. Vivid psychedelic images pour into their minds, and they understand this is how the fungi sees the world. Its roots cover almost the entire planet, and it is connected to all beings here. They realize the fungi is hungry. It wants food, and promises something wonderful in return.

column2: 'They fungi communicates it is still hungry. It needs a bit more food to blossom.
column3: 'They fungi communicates it is still hungry. It needs a bit more food to blossom.

column2: 'Finally, after feeding huge amounts of organics to the fungi roots, it communicates a feeling of satisfaction. One of the mushrooms releases large spores, communicating "FRIENDS". On-spot analysis detects the spores carry human DNA.
column3: 'Finally, after feeding huge amounts of organics to the fungi roots, it communicates a feeling of satisfaction. One of the mushrooms releases large spores, communicating "FRIENDS". On-spot analysis detects the spores carry human DNA.

column2: 'Take the spores aboard for incubation & research
column3: 'Take the spores aboard for incubation & research

column2: 'Euthanize and research the spores, they are too creepy
column3: 'Euthanize and research the spores, they are too creepy

column2: 'The resin was processed into volatiles, which were further encased and stored as general purpose explosives. We also obtained some xenodata in the process.
column3: 'The resin was processed into volatiles, which were further encased and stored as general purpose explosives. We also obtained some xenodata in the process.

column2: 'Thick forests cover this planet. Looks like a good spot for harvesting some organics.
column3: 'Thick forests cover this planet. Looks like a good spot for harvesting some organics.

column2: 'We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched, except for a few small scientific samples.
column3: 'We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched, except for a few small scientific samples.

column2: 'Most of the local organisms produce a noncarbon resin that prevents turning the local vegetation into readily consumable organics. However, we could process it into explosives on the spot.
column3: 'Most of the local organisms produce a noncarbon resin that prevents turning the local vegetation into readily consumable organics. However, we could process it into explosives on the spot.

column2: 'It could have been a processing malfunction, a wetware error, or anomalous properties of the resin. In any case, the resin didn't turn volatile as expected, but became a worthless chewing-gum like substance. At least we generated some research data in the process.
column3: 'It could have been a processing malfunction, a wetware error, or anomalous properties of the resin. In any case, the resin didn't turn volatile as expected, but became a worthless chewing-gum like substance. At least we generated some research data in the process.

column2: 'The walking fungi dispersed and tried to protect smaller beings with their bodies when our bots started killing them. The scene was so disturbing due to signs of their advanced behaviour that we aborted the operation halfway-through.
column3: 'The walking fungi dispersed and tried to protect smaller beings with their bodies when our bots started killing them. The scene was so disturbing due to signs of their advanced behaviour that we aborted the operation halfway-through.

column2: 'We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched. A few samples we took (no fungi killed) show that the fungi are on their way to developing sentience, as they already have evolved some kind of central neural tissue. Good thing we didn't kill any.
column3: 'We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched. A few samples we took (no fungi killed) show that the fungi are on their way to developing sentience, as they already have evolved some kind of central neural tissue. Good thing we didn't kill any.

column2: 'The local ecosystem is fungus-based. And it seems the fungi have developed legs and are walking around the planet in huge herds. We could capture some and process them to organics, however some crewmembers suggest this might be as unethical as killing any other animals.
column3: 'The local ecosystem is fungus-based. And it seems the fungi have developed legs and are walking around the planet in huge herds. We could capture some and process them to organics, however some crewmembers suggest this might be as unethical as killing any other animals.

column2: 'Our hunting party of bots and a shuttle with crew followed the escaping creatures into a foggy area. Moments later, they were attacked by ancient warp-fungi living there. We decided to abort the mission.
column3: 'Our hunting party of bots and a shuttle with crew followed the escaping creatures into a foggy area. Moments later, they were attacked by ancient warp-fungi living there. We decided to abort the mission.

column2: 'We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched, except for a few scientific samples.
column3: 'We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched, except for a few scientific samples.

column2: 'Powerful sand storms all over the planet will increase the cost of any operations. Eco-harvesting does not need additional adjustments.
column3: 'Powerful sand storms all over the planet will increase the cost of any operations. Eco-harvesting does not need additional adjustments.

column2: 'This planet lacks any value for us, but two of the crew insist on entering the atmosphere to admire the local scenery... They come back after a few hours, looking super satisfied and a bit exhausted. They report having a good time admiring the views.
column3: 'This planet lacks any value for us, but two of the crew insist on entering the atmosphere to admire the local scenery... They come back after a few hours, looking super satisfied and a bit exhausted. They report having a good time admiring the views.

column2: 'Harvesting operations completed. Most of the local species will probably undergo extinction events due to our activities and we might have caused irreversible damage to the ecosystem as a whole.
column3: 'Harvesting operations completed. Most of the local species will probably undergo extinction events due to our activities and we might have caused irreversible damage to the ecosystem as a whole.

column2: 'The ecosystem on this planet seems to be a very young one. The soil does not have many nutrients and supports only moss and small plants in a couple of patches on the planet. We could harvest some organics from here, but there is no way to do it ecologically.
column3: 'The ecosystem on this planet seems to be a very young one. The soil does not have many nutrients and supports only moss and small plants in a couple of patches on the planet. We could harvest some organics from here, but there is no way to do it ecologically.

column2: 'Research only. This young ecosystem needs time to develop.
column3: 'Research only. This young ecosystem needs time to develop.

column2: 'Scientific samples give us valuable insights into origins of early life. We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched.
column3: 'Scientific samples give us valuable insights into origins of early life. We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched.

column2: 'Our crew and bots eco-harvested fruits, seeds and eggs, leaving the developed parent organisms themselves intact. Minor amounts of volatiles were found suitable for processing into explosives.
column3: 'Our crew and bots eco-harvested fruits, seeds and eggs, leaving the developed parent organisms themselves intact. Minor amounts of volatiles were found suitable for processing into explosives.

column2: 'You leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched.
column3: 'You leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched.

column2: 'This ecosystem is ripe with life, and we could easily eco-harvest organics here. The landscape is dotted with interesting biochemical geysers, spewing out microbes with volatile composition. Perhaps we could also process some of them into explosives.
column3: 'This ecosystem is ripe with life, and we could easily eco-harvest organics here. The landscape is dotted with interesting biochemical geysers, spewing out microbes with volatile composition. Perhaps we could also process some of them into explosives.

column2: 'The "plant life" of this planet is N-carbon based, and cannot be processed into regular organics. However, the local presentient animals are carbon-based. Hunting them would be viewed by most of our crew as as barbaric as killing sentient children. Eco-theories view only seeds and eggs as ethically consumable, not developed parent organisms themselves.
column3: 'The "plant life" of this planet is N-carbon based, and cannot be processed into regular organics. However, the local presentient animals are carbon-based. Hunting them would be viewed by most of our crew as as barbaric as killing sentient children. Eco-theories view only seeds and eggs as ethically consumable, not developed parent organisms themselves.

column2: 'Leave everything intact, we won't kill unless necessary
column3: 'Leave everything intact, we won't kill unless necessary

column2: 'Our crew and bots eco-harvested various animal eggs, leaving the parent animals themselves intact. We were able to harvest a significant amount of organics without killing a single creature.
column3: 'Our crew and bots eco-harvested various animal eggs, leaving the parent animals themselves intact. We were able to harvest a significant amount of organics without killing a single creature.

column2: 'A large swarm of predatory warp animals entered the atmosphere during the operation. We immediately aborted the operation, but were able to only get our operatives to safety. We had to leave the dead animals and equipment behind. The Mothership itself received a few warp-ray hits.
column3: 'A large swarm of predatory warp animals entered the atmosphere during the operation. We immediately aborted the operation, but were able to only get our operatives to safety. We had to leave the dead animals and equipment behind. The Mothership itself received a few warp-ray hits.

column2: 'Eco-harvesting is relatively easy here because the local ecosystem is Earth-like and our harvesting technology does not need many adjustments.
column3: 'Eco-harvesting is relatively easy here because the local ecosystem is Earth-like and our harvesting technology does not need many adjustments.

column2: 'We harvested fruits, seeds and eggs, gathering a significant amount of organics without killing a single creature.
column3: 'We harvested fruits, seeds and eggs, gathering a significant amount of organics without killing a single creature.

column2: 'We leave the unique ecosystem of this beautiful planet untouched.
column3: 'We leave the unique ecosystem of this beautiful planet untouched.

column2: 'During the harvesting operation, a warp worm appeared from underground and attacked our operatives. More of them appeared soon and we decided to leave the planet. Fortunately, they didn't follow.
column3: 'During the harvesting operation, a warp worm appeared from underground and attacked our operatives. More of them appeared soon and we decided to leave the planet. Fortunately, they didn't follow.

column2: 'We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched. Scientific samples give us valuable insights into origins of early life.
column3: 'We leave the unique ecosystem of this planet untouched. Scientific samples give us valuable insights into origins of early life.

column2: 'We collect some dead organic tissue from the planet, leaving the warp shrooms untouched.
column3: 'We collect some dead organic tissue from the planet, leaving the warp shrooms untouched.

column2: 'Research of the euthanized spores generated some scientific value.
column3: 'Research of the euthanized spores generated some scientific value.

column2: '"This is the station AI, call me Hedonia. We are in dire need of assistance. Last supply ship visited us four years ago, taking our fleet for the war effort. We haven't had any contact with Earth Alliance since then. Can you help us?"
column3: '"This is the station AI, call me Hedonia. We are in dire need of assistance. Last supply ship visited us four years ago, taking our fleet for the war effort. We haven't had any contact with Earth Alliance since then. Can you help us?"

column2: 'What kind of help do you need?
column3: 'What kind of help do you need?

column2: '"Our station is slowly breaking apart due to critical lack of spare parts. I have been forced to cryofreeze our entire personnel to ensure their survival."
column3: '"Our station is slowly breaking apart due to critical lack of spare parts. I have been forced to cryofreeze our entire personnel to ensure their survival."

column2: '"How much metal can you spare for me?"
column3: '"How much metal can you spare for me?"

column2: 'Large areas of the sector are still unexplored, but there shouldn't be any pirates due to lack of major trade routes. A few lone warp animals have been the only dangers spotted, and that was a few years ago.
column3: 'Large areas of the sector are still unexplored, but there shouldn't be any pirates due to lack of major trade routes. A few lone warp animals have been the only dangers spotted, and that was a few years ago.

column2: '"I need 750 units of metal to repair all the critical issues and create a small resupply fleet. There should be enough asteroids and other sources of metal in this sector to collect this amount."
column3: '"I need 750 units of metal to repair all the critical issues and create a small resupply fleet. There should be enough asteroids and other sources of metal in this sector to collect this amount."

column2: 'We already have some metal with us
column3: 'We already have some metal with us

column2: 'What can you tell me about this sector?
column3: 'What can you tell me about this sector?

column2: 'I built several refuelling outpost before the problems started, some of them might be still operational. I've given your AI the decryption codes so the stations should become visible to your sensors. Take as much fuel as you need... And thank you for helping us...
column3: 'I built several refuelling outpost before the problems started, some of them might be still operational. I've given your AI the decryption codes so the stations should become visible to your sensors. Take as much fuel as you need... And thank you for helping us...

column2: 'Ok...What kind of help do you need?
column3: 'Ok...What kind of help do you need?

column2: 'A group of rogue ambassadors from Earth failed some kind of diplomatic mission years ago, prompting the entire Squid Dominion to attack Earth Alliance. The fact that I haven't heard from Earth means the war is not going well. To be honest, I'm quite worried, as much as it is possible for an AI.
column3: 'A group of rogue ambassadors from Earth failed some kind of diplomatic mission years ago, prompting the entire Squid Dominion to attack Earth Alliance. The fact that I haven't heard from Earth means the war is not going well. To be honest, I'm quite worried, as much as it is possible for an AI.

column2: 'The fresh crew brings various items and resources along with them. They are super happy to leave the station.
column3: 'The fresh crew brings various items and resources along with them. They are super happy to leave the station.

column2: 'A scientist from Earth Alliance research station. Enjoys not being stuck.
column3: 'A scientist from Earth Alliance research station. Enjoys not being stuck.

column2: '"We do not have enough resources for this operation. We should also ensure we are not spending the metal that we must collect - for example, the "repair HP by crew" should be turned off in the roles panel, because this uses metal.
column3: '"We do not have enough resources for this operation. We should also ensure we are not spending the metal that we must collect - for example, the "repair HP by crew" should be turned off in the roles panel, because this uses metal.

column2: '"I built several refuelling outposts before the problems started, some of them might be still operational. I've given your AI the decryption codes so the stations should become visible to your sensors. Take as much fuel as you need... and thank you for helping us."
column3: '"I built several refuelling outposts before the problems started, some of them might be still operational. I've given your AI the decryption codes so the stations should become visible to your sensors. Take as much fuel as you need... and thank you for helping us."

column2: 'Our crew met with the science crew of the station, who turned out to be super sweet. Their love for truth and a completely informal attitude enabled them to connect with our crew on several levels. Many stories were shared and pleasures enjoyed. The event ended with more friends & lovers than existed before. Three locals who enjoyed getting close with our crew requested to join our mission.
column3: 'Our crew met with the science crew of the station, who turned out to be super sweet. Their love for truth and a completely informal attitude enabled them to connect with our crew on several levels. Many stories were shared and pleasures enjoyed. The event ended with more friends & lovers than existed before. Three locals who enjoyed getting close with our crew requested to join our mission.

column2: 'Sorry, we're too crowded at the moment. Perhaps later [leave for now]
column3: 'Sorry, we're too crowded at the moment. Perhaps later [leave for now]

column2: '"Is it easier now to accept our volunteers? Although we now have materials to rebuild our resupply fleet, some of my crew still feels stuck here..."
column3: '"Is it easier now to accept our volunteers? Although we now have materials to rebuild our resupply fleet, some of my crew still feels stuck here..."

column2: 'Sorry, we're still too crowded [leave for now]
column3: 'Sorry, we're still too crowded [leave for now]

column2: 'Thank you! I will de-freeze our crew and give them a debriefing. Some of them would like to speak with you - I've taken the liberty to organize a social event for our crews. \nI think a costume party would be most suitable for the occasion! I've also shared my library of recent xenodata with your AI. Come back soon, and don't forget a funny costume - the more awkward, the better!"
column3: 'Thank you! I will de-freeze our crew and give them a debriefing. Some of them would like to speak with you - I've taken the liberty to organize a social event for our crews. \nI think a costume party would be most suitable for the occasion! I've also shared my library of recent xenodata with your AI. Come back soon, and don't forget a funny costume - the more awkward, the better!"

column2: 'Go to exit warpgate after exploring the sector.
column3: 'Go to exit warpgate after exploring the sector.

column2: '"By the way, the long-term Exit warpgate of this sector was hidden by our forces when the war started. I've given you the coordinates to reach it. It should be now visible on your sector map."
column3: '"By the way, the long-term Exit warpgate of this sector was hidden by our forces when the war started. I've given you the coordinates to reach it. It should be now visible on your sector map."

column2: 'We should ensure that we are not spending the metal that we must collect - for example, the "repair HP by crew" button should be turned off in the roles panel, because ship HP repairs by crew consume metal.
column3: 'We should ensure that we are not spending the metal that we must collect - for example, the "repair HP by crew" button should be turned off in the roles panel, because ship HP repairs by crew consume metal.

column2: 'It's a small, Tarny warning beacon, detectable only by ships that have "built-in" intergalactic trader's association encryption codes. It casts a simple warning "All trader ships, avoid this sector, slavers detected, profit outlook negative."
column3: 'It's a small, Tarny warning beacon, detectable only by ships that have "built-in" intergalactic trader's association encryption codes. It casts a simple warning "All trader ships, avoid this sector, slavers detected, profit outlook negative."

column2: 'We leave the beacon behind, to warn & inform other Earth ships. It will probably continue its job for hundreds of years to come.
column3: 'We leave the beacon behind, to warn & inform other Earth ships. It will probably continue its job for hundreds of years to come.

column2: 'The Squids have overlooked this Earth military spy beacon. Its pings are scrambled to conceal them as background static. The beacon's miniature AI gives a summary of recent local events. \nNot much has happened here, but the beacon has data about passing Squid ships and their technical details. It appears most of the ships were armed with ray weapons. What should we do with the beacon?
column3: 'The Squids have overlooked this Earth military spy beacon. Its pings are scrambled to conceal them as background static. The beacon's miniature AI gives a summary of recent local events. \nNot much has happened here, but the beacon has data about passing Squid ships and their technical details. It appears most of the ships were armed with ray weapons. What should we do with the beacon?

column2: 'Leave it to warn other Earth ships
column3: 'Leave it to warn other Earth ships

column2: 'The workers representative takes a look at your standard module blueprints. They take time to scutter through various junk found in their yard, and bit by bit, start to assemble something that looks like a container. Few bots are used and most of the works are carried out manually. Finally, after several days work, the module is finished. It looks robust.
column3: 'Der Arbeitnehmervertreter wirft einen Blick auf Ihre Standardmodul-Entwürfe. wir nehmen sich Zeit, um sich durch verschiedenen Schrott zu wühlen, der auf ihrem Hof gefunden wird, und beginnen nach und nach, etwas zusammenzubauen, das wie ein Container auswirht. Es werden nur wenige Bots verwendet, und die meisten Arbeiten werden manuell ausgeführt. Schließlich, nach mehreren Tagen Arbeit, ist das Modul fertig. Es wirht robust aus.

column2: 'There is a commercial ship service station on this planet, specializing in custom-built cargo modules. The service includes free food.
column3: 'Auf diesem Planeten gibt es eine Tankstelle für Handelsschiffe, die sich auf speziell angefertigte Frachtmodule spezialisiert hat. Der Service umfasst kostenloses Essen.
'Bestellung eines mittelgroßen Behälters für organische Stoffe [-100 Credits]

column2: 'The workers representative takes a look at your standard module blueprints. They take time to scutter through various junk found in their yard, and bit by bit, start to assemble something that looks like a container module. Few bots are used and most of the works are carried out manually. Finally, after several days work, the module is finished. It looks robust.
column3: 'Der Arbeitnehmervertreter wirft einen Blick auf Ihre Standardmodul-Entwürfe. wir nehmen sich Zeit, um sich durch verschiedenen Schrott zu wühlen, der auf ihrem Hof gefunden wurde, und beginnen nach und nach damit, etwas zusammenzubauen, das wie ein Containermodul auswirht. Es werden nur wenige Bots verwendet, und die meisten Arbeiten werden manuell ausgeführt. Schließlich, nach mehreren Tagen Arbeit, ist das Modul fertig. Es wirht robust aus.

column2: 'The workers representative takes a look at your standard module blueprints. They take time to scutter through various junk found in their yard, and bit by bit, start to assemble something that looks like a container module. Few bots are used and most of the works are carried out manually. Finally, after several days of work, the module is finished. It looks robust.
column3: 'Der Arbeitnehmervertreter wirft einen Blick auf Ihre Standardmodul-Entwürfe. wir nehmen sich Zeit, um sich durch verschiedenen Schrott zu wühlen, der auf ihrem Hof gefunden wurde, und beginnen nach und nach damit, etwas zusammenzubauen, das wie ein Containermodul auswirht. Es werden nur wenige Bots verwendet, und die meisten Arbeiten werden manuell ausgeführt. Schließlich, nach mehreren Tagen Arbeit, ist das Modul fertig. Es wirht robust aus.

column2: 'The locals went through all the junk found in their yard, dragging the useful parts next to the Mothership. Numerous workers of varied species buzzed around the ship, mostly working manually. After a few days, the repairmen announce they have done all they could.
column3: 'The locals went through all the junk found in their yard, dragging the useful parts next to the Mothership. Numerous workers of varied species buzzed around the ship, mostly working manually. After a few days, the repairmen announce they have done all they could.

column2: 'The local business negotiation AI (a rather crude one) states that they cannot offer guarantees for the repair service because of using exclusively recycled materials. The service includes free food. The planet also has a small orbital trading platform selling local resources and paying good price for exotics. Using the trade platform requires a small docking fee.
column3: 'The local business negotiation AI (a rather crude one) states that they cannot offer guarantees for the repair service because of using exclusively recycled materials. The service includes free food. The planet also has a small orbital trading platform selling local resources and paying good price for exotics. Using the trade platform requires a small docking fee.

column2: 'The locals went through all the junk found in their yard, dragging the useful parts next to the Mothership. Numerous workers of varied species buzzed around the ship, mostly working manually. After a few days, the repairmen announce they have done all they could. Unfortunately, most of the crude repairs break or fall off after stress tests.
column3: 'The locals went through all the junk found in their yard, dragging the useful parts next to the Mothership. Numerous workers of varied species buzzed around the ship, mostly working manually. After a few days, the repairmen announce they have done all they could. Unfortunately, most of the crude repairs break or fall off after stress tests.

column2: 'Do you want to hire another round of ship repair services? The boss mechanic offers you a small discount and promises extra food this time.
column3: 'Do you want to hire another round of ship repair services? The boss mechanic offers you a small discount and promises extra food this time.

column2: 'We do not have enough intergalactic xenodata Credits required for this service. Nothing more to do here at the moment.
column3: 'We do not have enough intergalactic xenodata Credits required for this service. Nothing more to do here at the moment.

column2: 'After a few days of work, the repairmen announce they have done all they could. The boss mechanic says we're always welcome back.
column3: 'After a few days of work, the repairmen announce they have done all they could. The boss mechanic says we're always welcome back.

column2: 'The work gets finished soon and the boss mechanic says we're always welcome to return. Most of the new repairs fall off or break when we exit the planet's atmosphere.
column3: 'The work gets finished soon and the boss mechanic says we're always welcome to return. Most of the new repairs fall off or break when we exit the planet's atmosphere.

column2: '"We do not normally trade organics. However, we are willing to make an exception, given how pathetic you look. We wish you a merry shopping experience!"
column3: '"We do not normally trade organics. However, we are willing to make an exception, given how pathetic you look. We wish you a merry shopping experience!"

column2: 'Our ship current HP is fully repaired.
column3: 'Our ship current HP is fully repaired.

column2: 'Not enough Credits to pay docking fee
column3: 'Not enough Credits to pay docking fee

column2: 'We do not have enough xenodata Credits required for this service.
column3: 'We do not have enough xenodata Credits required for this service.

column1: '267 shop, DIY weapons and nukes R.prefab
'45 shopless mining station in asteroids, barter ME.prefab

column2: 'We have established a commlink with this independent mining colony, operating in the asteroid field. It's operators offer us cheap metals in exchange for explosives, necessary for mining.
column3: 'Wir haben mit dieser unabhängigen Bergbaukolonie, die im Asteroidenfeld operiert, eine Verbindung hergestellt. Ihre Betreiber bieten uns billige Metalle im Tausch gegen Sprengstoff, der für den Bergbau notwendig ist..

column2: 'The station sends us more metals than promised, plus another message...
column3: 'Die Station schickt uns mehr Metalle als versprochen, plus eine weitere Botschaft...

column2: 'We do not have the necessary resources. Let's come back when we have more explosives for barter.
column3: 'Wir haben nicht die notwendigen Ressourcen.   wir kommen wieder, wenn wir mehr Sprengstoff zum Tauschen haben..

column2: '"A special deal for you, today only. Receive 120 more metal for only 40 explosives! We won't be selling more after this."
column3: '"Ein besonderer Deal für uns, nur heute.Wir Erhalten 120 weitere Metalle für nur 40 Sprengstoffe! Danach werden wir nicht mehr verkaufen."

column2: '"We do not have the necessary resources."
'"Thank you for trading and may your tentacles be dripping with ozgymug!" is the last message transmitted by the station. They've sent again more metal than promised.
column3: '"Vielen Dank für den Handel, und mögen Ihre Tentakel vor Ozgymug triefen", lautet die letzte von der Station übermittelte Nachricht. wir haben wieder mehr Metall geschickt als versprochen.

column1: '7 Pi shop recreation with shield, laser or cannon offer R.prefab

column2: 'A small commercial station orbiting this lifeless planet. The welcoming AI reminds us about the entry fee. The ship AI winks and tells you she could get us into the commerce area even if we do not have enough Credits.
column3: 'Eine kleine kommerzielle Station, die diesen leblosen Planeten umkreist. Die begrüssende KI erinnert uns an die Startgebühr. Das Schiff KI zwinkert und sagt uns, dass wir uns in den Handelsbereich bringen könnte, auch wenn wir nicht genügend Credits haben. guter Preis.

column2: 'Your crew starts by looking around and testing some of the recreational substances. You are soon approached by a pair of local Electromite traders. They offer you a mystery shield module for a very good price.
column3: 'Ihre Besatzung beginnt damit, sich umzusehen und einige der Freizeitstoffe zu testen. Bald darauf werden wir von einem Paar lokaler Elektromitenhändler angesprochen. wir bieten Ihnen ein Mystery-Shield-Modul zu einem sehr guten Preis an.
'Sehen wir sich den automatisierten Angebotsbetrieb an

column2: '"We do not have enough Credits needed for this operation."
column3: '"Wir haben nicht genügend Kredite, die für diese Operation benötigt werden."

column2: 'The module is delivered to the Mothership cargo bay as promised. The trader has included a symbolic bonus to the delivery, a lifesized plastic sculpture of a famous, deceased Electromite. We scrap it.
column3: 'Das Modul wird wie versprochen in die Ladebucht des Raumschiff geliefert. Der Händler hat der Lieferung einen symbolischen Bonus beigefügt, eine lebensgroße Plastik-Skulptur eines berühmten, verstorbenen Elektromagnaten. Wir verschrotten sie.

column2: 'After enjoying many recreational activities and substances, you are approached by a local Moth trader. They offer an exotic ray weapon for a very reasonable price.
column3: 'Nachdem wir viele Freizeitaktivitäten und Substanzen genossen haben, werden wir von einem örtlichen Mottenhändler angesprochen. wir bieten eine exotische Rochenwaffe zu einem sehr günstigen Preis an.

column2: 'Decline and check out station offers [no turning back]
column3: 'Angebote von Bahnhöfen ablehnen und auschecken [kein Zurück]

column2: 'The module is delivered to the Mothership cargo bay as promised. The trader has included a symbolic bonus to the delivery, a small canister of fuel.
column3: 'Das Modul wird wie versprochen in die Ladebucht des Raumschiffs geliefert. Der Händler hat der Lieferung einen symbolischen Bonus beigefügt, einen kleinen Kanister mit Treibstoff für das Zielschiff.

column2: 'After enjoying many recreational activities, you are approached by local Techum traders. They offer you a strange weapon of unknown origin. Apparently, it is meant for eliminating enemy crew without damaging the target ship.
column3: 'Nachdem wir viele Freizeitaktivitäten genossen haben, werden wir von lokalen Techum-Händlern angesprochen. wir bieten Ihnen eine seltsame Waffe unbekannter Herkunft an. Offenbar ist wir dazu gedacht, die feindliche Besatzung zu vernichten, ohne das Zielschiff zu beschädigen.

column2: 'Leave now, return later [no re-entry fee needed]
column3: 'Verlassen wir uns jetzt, kehren wir villeicht später zurück [keine Wiedereintrittsgebühr erforderlich].
