column2: 'The module is delivered to the Mothership cargo bay as promised. The traders have included a symbolic bonus to the delivery, a huge exotic fruit, genetically modified to resemble the sex organs of the Techum species.
column3: 'Das Modul wird wie versprochen in die Ladebucht des Raumschiffs geliefert. Die Händler haben der Lieferung einen symbolischen Bonus beigefügt, eine riesige exotische Frucht, die genetisch so verändert wurde, dass wir den Geschlechtsorganen der Techum-Arten ähnelt.

column2: 'The practice target moves in to attack us. It is armed with both lasers and projectile weapons.
column3: 'The practice target moves in to attack us. It is armed with both lasers and projectile weapons.

column2: 'Press space to slow time so you can prepare... Starting a ship vs ship combat resets weapon & warp charge because of a need to recalibrate.
column3: 'Press space to slow time so you can prepare... Starting a ship vs ship combat resets weapon & warp charge because of a need to recalibrate.

column2: 'Try to make sure your shots land on important enemy modules like shield generators, weapons or reactors. Remember that if the shot landing area is over the edges of target ship, some shots might miss completely.
column3: 'Try to make sure your shots land on important enemy modules like shield generators, weapons or reactors. Remember that if the shot landing area is over the edges of target ship, some shots might miss completely.

column2: 'Currently, our weapons are remotely operated by the bridge (the B symbol).\nThis means they are working, but without accuracy & recharge bonus from your crew.\nSend crew with gunnery skill to operate every weapon, to ensure max accuracy bonus.
column3: 'Currently, our weapons are remotely operated by the bridge (the B symbol).\nThis means they are working, but without accuracy & recharge bonus from your crew.\nSend crew with gunnery skill to operate every weapon, to ensure max accuracy bonus.

column2: 'Weapons can be selected by clicking on them on the ship or on the Quick selection bar. Pressing a number 1...9 on your keyboard is the fastest way to select a weapon.
column3: 'Weapons can be selected by clicking on them on the ship or on the Quick selection bar. Pressing a number 1...9 on your keyboard is the fastest way to select a weapon.

column2: 'After selecting a weapon, hover the cursor over enemy ship. The striped square at the end of UI cone is where your weapon shots will be landing. Fire with R-CLICK and then unpause!
column3: 'After selecting a weapon, hover the cursor over enemy ship. The striped square at the end of UI cone is where your weapon shots will be landing. Fire with R-CLICK and then unpause!

column2: 'The most valuable keyboard shortcuts during battle are F5 (for toggling weapon quick selection UI) and numbers 1..9 (for selecting weapons). And use k for switching on/off modules.
column3: 'The most valuable keyboard shortcuts during battle are F5 (for toggling weapon quick selection UI) and numbers 1..9 (for selecting weapons). And use k for switching on/off modules.

column2: 'For starters, please check out the Help summary about aiming with weapons. It is essential to understand this, if you are to survive any real battles.
column3: 'For starters, please check out the Help summary about aiming with weapons. It is essential to understand this, if you are to survive any real battles.

column2: 'Module damaged. Damaged modules stop working and are colored red until repaired. Modules can be repaired only by your crew and if you have enough synthethics...
column3: 'Module damaged. Damaged modules stop working and are colored red until repaired. Modules can be repaired only by your crew and if you have enough synthethics...

column2: '...repairing each module hitpoint needs 10 synthethics. Scrap the synthethics packages from your module storage to get repair materials.
column3: '...repairing each module hitpoint needs 10 synthethics. Scrap the synthethics packages from your module storage to get repair materials.

column2: 'All weapons should now have enough resources for ammo. You can turn them on by selecting the weapon and using default shortkey (which is K) or clicking on the power button in weapon info panel. Make sure all our modules are online before we start the combat tutorial.
column3: 'All weapons should now have enough resources for ammo. You can turn them on by selecting the weapon and using default shortkey (which is K) or clicking on the power button in weapon info panel. Make sure all our modules are online before we start the combat tutorial.

column2: 'For starters, check out this overview about basic weapon types.
column3: 'For starters, check out this overview about basic weapon types.

column2: 'Module repairs are possible if you have obtained necessary resources by scrapping the synthethics packages from the module storage.
column3: 'Module repairs are possible if you have obtained necessary resources by scrapping the synthethics packages from the module storage.

column2: 'To start repairing a module, select crew and R-click on the broken module. Doing it via crew roles panel automatically sends the best unoccupied crew or drones to fix things.
column3: 'To start repairing a module, select crew and R-click on the broken module. Doing it via crew roles panel automatically sends the best unoccupied crew or drones to fix things.

column2: 'If your weapons run out of ammo, always check if you have something in module storage that might help. Currently, we should still have metal and explosives packages in storage.
column3: 'If your weapons run out of ammo, always check if you have something in module storage that might help. Currently, we should still have metal and explosives packages in storage.

column2: 'Each damaged ship HP creates a damage token on ship hull. If the token is inside ship walls, it can be only repaired at repair stations.\nRepairing 1 HP costs 30 metal (when repairing with crew) or ~25 Credits (in repair stations).
column3: 'Each damaged ship HP creates a damage token on ship hull. If the token is inside ship walls, it can be only repaired at repair stations.\nRepairing 1 HP costs 30 metal (when repairing with crew) or ~25 Credits (in repair stations).

column2: 'You can switch on the ship external view to better see where the ship HP damage is located.
column3: 'You can switch on the ship external view to better see where the ship HP damage is located.

column2: 'To survive really difficult battles, designate 1..3 crew as repair officers from crew info panel (it opens upon crew selecting).\nRepair officers will automatically try to repair modules and also ship damage tokens.
column3: 'To survive really difficult battles, designate 1..3 crew as repair officers from crew info panel (it opens upon crew selecting).\nRepair officers will automatically try to repair modules and also ship damage tokens.

column2: 'Use space at any given moment to switch between slow time and normal time.\nInternal accelerated time turns on automatically after battle is over and there are no dangers remaining.
column3: 'Use space at any given moment to switch between slow time and normal time.\nInternal accelerated time turns on automatically after battle is over and there are no dangers remaining.

column2: 'Install all the weapons into weapon slots and the tactical missile into launch tube at the front. Install all modules to proceed. \nNotice the weapons are all turned off by default. You may turn them on from module panel or by selecting the weapon and pressing K.
column3: 'Install all the weapons into weapon slots and the tactical missile into launch tube at the front. Install all modules to proceed. \nNotice the weapons are all turned off by default. You may turn them on from module panel or by selecting the weapon and pressing K.

column2: 'A large weapons container, well hidden amongst a cloud of asteroids...
column3: 'A large weapons container, well hidden amongst a cloud of asteroids...

column2: 'We should only disengage from dangerous situations. Right now there's nothing to worry about...
column3: 'We should only disengage from dangerous situations. Right now there's nothing to worry about...

column2: 'Notice that lack of ammo icon on your missile weapon. Install the explosives container and then take the explosives. Explosives are used as ammo for most projectile weapons.
column3: 'Notice that lack of ammo icon on your missile weapon. Install the explosives container and then take the explosives. Explosives are used as ammo for most projectile weapons.

column2: 'We also need a shield generator. Shields protect us from all energy weapons, as long as they have shield points remaining.
column3: 'We also need a shield generator. Shields protect us from all energy weapons, as long as they have shield points remaining.

column2: 'Remember than you can hover cursor over almost any element in any UI panels to know more about it. Now, Lets return to starsystem view...
column3: 'Remember than you can hover cursor over almost any element in any UI panels to know more about it. Now, Lets return to starsystem view...

column2: 'The shield module regenerates shield points because it's currently remotely operated by the bridge. Send a crewmember with good operating skill to boost its recharge speed.
column3: 'The shield module regenerates shield points because it's currently remotely operated by the bridge. Send a crewmember with good operating skill to boost its recharge speed.

column2: 'Operating modules with crew is better because of crew skill bonuses. Now move a crewmember into the shield module- note that the eawirst way to select crew is to drag a selection box around them.
column3: 'Operating modules with crew is better because of crew skill bonuses. Now move a crewmember into the shield module- note that the eawirst way to select crew is to drag a selection box around them.

column2: 'You still have the main combat tutorial waiting for you (fly into the red enemy circle in this star system).
column3: 'You still have the main combat tutorial waiting for you (fly into the red enemy circle in this star system).

column2: 'An unknown ship is approaching fast, and it seems to be carrying nukes!
column3: 'An unknown ship is approaching fast, and it seems to be carrying nukes!

column2: 'When you need to give many orders quickly, use the Roles panel! it's next to the resource panel. Start by un-assigning our crew from their previous jobs (click the - sign). Then keep clicking on the + sign next to the firefighting role until at least 3 crew is fighting fires!
column3: 'When you need to give many orders quickly, use the Roles panel! it's next to the resource panel. Start by un-assigning our crew from their previous jobs (click the - sign). Then keep clicking on the + sign next to the firefighting role until at least 3 crew is fighting fires!

column2: 'You've completed the official training of this tutorial. Feel free to take some time to fool around with this old Tigerfish before moving on to our real journey. For example, you may want to explore the various crafting options available for this ship. Return when you are ready to leave the tutorial.
column3: 'You've completed the official training of this tutorial. Feel free to take some time to fool around with this old Tigerfish before moving on to our real journey. For example, you may want to explore the various crafting options available for this ship. Return when you are ready to leave the tutorial.

column2: 'End tutorial, give me the real thing!
column3: 'End tutorial, give me the real thing!

column2: 'This planet is covered in rocky steppes and lacks any value for us.
column3: 'Dieser Planet ist von felsigen Steppen bedeckt und hat keinen Wert für uns.

column2: 'The wreckage is damaged beyond repair. It might contain valuable resources we could salvage.
column3: 'Das Wrack ist irreparabel beschädigt. Es könnte wertvolle Ressourcen enthalten, die wir bergen könnten.

column2: 'The wreckage contained an intact module and the location of a secret warehouse, hidden nearby (it has been added to the starsystem map).
column3: 'Das Wrack enthielt ein intaktes Modul und den Standort eines geheimen Lagers, das in der Nähe   ist (es wurde der Sternsystemkarte hinzugefügt).

column2: 'We've reached the warehouse. It's built into a large asteroid for extra Tarn and protection. No active systems of life signs detected. The main entrance is armored, we have to force our way in.
column3: 'We've reached the warehouse. It's built into a large asteroid for extra Tarn and protection. No active systems of life signs detected. The main entrance is armored, we have to force our way in.

column2: 'A small explosive trap exploded in the warehouse during the salvage operation, causing minor damage to one of our crewmembers.
column3: 'A small explosive trap exploded in the warehouse during the salvage operation, causing minor damage to one of our crewmembers.

column2: 'Go through the warpgate? We might save some fuel this way.
column3: 'Go through the warpgate? We might save some fuel this way.

column2: 'Nothing to do here, this warp gate is permanently broken
column3: 'Nothing to do here, this warp gate is permanently broken

column2: 'As you approach the warpgate, a large warp jellyfish exits from the portal. These creatures are known to sometimes attack spaceships without provocation. They are resistant to energy weapons due to personal warpshields. This particular animal seems to be playing with the warp energies emanating from the warpgate. Orders?
column3: 'As you approach the warpgate, a large warp jellyfish exits from the portal. These creatures are known to sometimes attack spaceships without provocation. They are resistant to energy weapons due to personal warpshields. This particular animal seems to be playing with the warp energies emanating from the warpgate. Orders?

column2: 'The animal seemed to enjoy the fact that somebody was looking at it while it played. After what feels like an eternity, it floats back into the gate. It is safe to enter now.
column3: 'The animal seemed to enjoy the fact that somebody was looking at it while it played. After what feels like an eternity, it floats back into the gate. It is safe to enter now.

column2: 'Our energy weapons do not penetrate the jellyfish warpshield. The animal displayes agressive colors and sizzles into a personal Warpausgang. Before you can react, it re-emerges right next to your ship and casts a pink ray of death at your ship, damaging a part of the hull. It blinks satisfyingly with all colors and then warps off.
column3: 'Our energy weapons do not penetrate the jellyfish warpshield. The animal displayes agressive colors and sizzles into a personal Warpausgang. Before you can react, it re-emerges right next to your ship and casts a pink ray of death at your ship, damaging a part of the hull. It blinks satisfyingly with all colors and then warps off.

column2: 'The animal becomes covered in explosions and warp energy sparks as your weapons hit. There is no trace of it after explosions end, it must have escaped by a personal Warpausgang.
column3: 'The animal becomes covered in explosions and warp energy sparks as your weapons hit. There is no trace of it after explosions end, it must have escaped by a personal Warpausgang.

column1: 'SOS Ambusher L2 pirates with decoy ship.prefab

column2: 'There's two ships in that fleet, scanning us and jamming our sensors. They turn away after discovering our nukes. Probably pirates looking for an easy prey.
column3: 'There's two ships in that fleet, scanning us and jamming our sensors. They turn away after discovering our nukes. Probably pirates looking for an easy prey.

column2: 'We won't ignore such predators [prepare for combat]
column3: 'We won't ignore such predators [prepare for combat]

column2: 'Two or three ships are rapidly approaching tactical range, and they don't respond to commrequests. The enemy fleet is using some kind of jamming device to block more detailed scanning at this range.
column3: 'Two or three ships are rapidly approaching tactical range, and they don't respond to commrequests. The enemy fleet is using some kind of jamming device to block more detailed scanning at this range.

column2: 'A third small ship joins the enemy as they close in...
column3: 'A third small ship joins the enemy as they close in...

column2: 'A single advanced ship is rapidly approaching tactical weapons range...
column3: 'A single advanced ship is rapidly approaching tactical weapons range...

column2: '"Alien vessel in distress, you have been selected to participate in the Hunting Tradition. Since we are obviously more intelligent than you, we are the Hunters, and you - the Hunted. Only appealing to the Grace of Luck can save you now!"
column3: '"Alien vessel in distress, you have been selected to participate in the Hunting Tradition. Since we are obviously more intelligent than you, we are the Hunters, and you - the Hunted. Only appealing to the Grace of Luck can save you now!"

column2: 'Tradition is no excuse for injustice [prepare for battle]
column3: 'Tradition is no excuse for injustice [prepare for battle]

column2: '"The Hunted cannot buy it's way out of the Forest."
column3: '"The Hunted cannot buy it's way out of the Forest."

column2: '"The ceremony has revealed to us that you have Bad Luck today. It is time for your Last Struggle..."
column3: '"The ceremony has revealed to us that you have Bad Luck today. It is time for your Last Struggle..."

column2: '"The ceremony has revealed to us that you have Good Luck today. We let you go in peace, and send you our most holy berries as a Spiritual Compensation for the troubles..."
column3: '"The ceremony has revealed to us that you have Good Luck today. We let you go in peace, and send you our most holy berries as a Spiritual Compensation for the troubles..."

column2: '"Oh, it's you, the Lucky. Carry on!"
column3: '"Oh, it's you, the Lucky. Carry on!"

column2: 'A biotech fleet is rapidly approaching tactical range. It uses some kind of auxiliary jamming device to hide its details from us at this range.
column3: 'A biotech fleet is rapidly approaching tactical range. It uses some kind of auxiliary jamming device to hide its details from us at this range.

column2: '"Hello delicious one! Offer a bite of your crew, and we will give you both food and fuel. We will secrete a slime with painkiller properties before tasting. It won't hurt a bit."
column3: '"Hello delicious one! Offer a bite of your crew, and we will give you both food and fuel. We will secrete a slime with painkiller properties before tasting. It won't hurt a bit."

column2: 'Agree, allow tasters to taste [volunteering crew shares 10 nonlethal wounds]
column3: 'Agree, allow tasters to taste [volunteering crew shares 10 nonlethal wounds]

column2: 'Such an inviting offer but no thanks
column3: 'Such an inviting offer but no thanks

column2: 'Actually, we are going eat you instead [prepare for battle]
column3: 'Actually, we are going eat you instead [prepare for battle]

column2: 'Decontamination, healing & psychological assistance of bitten crew was required after the experience was over. The Tasters left behind food and fuel. One crewmember reported enjoying the ceremony.
column3: 'Decontamination, healing & psychological assistance of bitten crew was required after the experience was over. The Tasters left behind food and fuel. One crewmember reported enjoying the ceremony.

column2: '"So, you want to literally bite the hand that would have been willing to feed you in time of distress? We shall have to eat you now!"
column3: '"So, you want to literally bite the hand that would have been willing to feed you in time of distress? We shall have to eat you now!"

column2: '"Sorry to hear that. You would have enjoyed it."
column3: '"Sorry to hear that. You would have enjoyed it."

column2: 'Three small ships are rapidly approaching tactical range, weapons hot. The enemy fleet is using some kind of auxiliary jamming device to block more detailed scanning at this range.
column3: 'Three small ships are rapidly approaching tactical range, weapons hot. The enemy fleet is using some kind of auxiliary jamming device to block more detailed scanning at this range.

column2: 'Your opinion about how things work is an unfortunate mistake, lethal to yourself
column3: 'Your opinion about how things work is an unfortunate mistake, lethal to yourself

column2: '"We just need your ship this time. Since we know you won't give it to us voluntarily, we will take it by force. This is the way things work in real life."
column3: '"We just need your ship this time. Since we know you won't give it to us voluntarily, we will take it by force. This is the way things work in real life."

column2: 'A small civilian ship is approaching. It seems to be armed with only point-defence guns, but we can detect a hidden, ECM-shielded compartment under the ship which could house a weapon.
column3: 'Ein kleines ziviles Schiff nähert sich. Es scheint nur mit Punktverteidigungskanonen bewaffnet zu sein, aber wir können unter dem Schiff einen versteckten, von ECM abgeschirmten Raum entdecken, der eine Waffe aufnehmen könnte.

column2: 'They've sent us some of their backup supplies... plus something that looks like recent food leftovers - headless, half-burned animal corpses with Insectoidian bite marks.
column3: 'wir haben uns einige ihrer Hilfsgüter geschickt... plus etwas, das auswirht wie kürzlich übrig gebliebene Lebensmittelreste - kopflose, halb verbrannte Tierleichen mit insektoidianischen Bissspuren.

column2: '"We can see you are in trouble but we do not wish communication. Prepare for some free emergency max level generousity. This is all we can do at the moment - we have our own plans of saving the universe, obviously."
column3: '"Wir können sehen, dass wir in Schwierigkeiten sind, aber wir wünschen keine Kommunikation. Bereiten wir sich auf eine kostenlose Notfall-Höchststufe vor. Das ist alles, was wir im Moment tun können - wir haben natürlich unsere eigenen Pläne zur Rettung des Universums."

column2: '"I can see you are in trouble but I do not wish communication. I'm on a mission to destroy the evil Cuzuf-Caban, may his wings burn! Anyway, here's some free supplies. Goodbye!"
column3: '"Ich kann sehen, dass wir in Schwierigkeiten sind, aber ich wünsche keine Kommunikation. Ich bin auf der Mission, den bösen Cuzuf-Caban zu vernichten, mögen ihm die Flügel brennen! Wie auch immer, hier sind ein paar kostenlose Vorräte. Auf Wiedersehen, Cuzuf-Caban."

column2: 'It seems the captain has sent us some of their own emergency supplies.
column3: 'Es scheint, dass der Kapitän uns einige ihrer eigenen Notvorräte geschickt hat.

column2: '"I can see you are in trouble but I have only a couple of minutes before I must leave. I've just single-handedly destroyed a slaver ship by killing everyone inside, and must now return home for repairs. Take this weapon of mine, I won't need it in the near future. Death to slavers!"
column3: '"Ich sehe, dass wir in Schwierigkeiten sind, aber ich habe nur noch ein paar Minuten Zeit, bevor ich gehen muss. Ich habe gerade im Alleingang ein Sklavenschiff zerstört, indem ich alle darin getötet habe, und muss nun zur Reparatur nach Hause zurückkehren. Nehmen wir meine Waffe, ich brauche wir in nächster Zeit nicht mehr. Tod den Sklavenhändlern!"

column2: 'The cargo pod also contained a case of ancient handgun munitions of all shapes and sizes.
column3: 'Die Frachtkapsel enthielt auch eine Kiste mit altertümlicher Handfeuerwaffenmunition in allen Formen und Größen.

column2: 'An automated vessel is approaching. No lifesigns detected onboard.
column3: 'Ein automatisiertes Schiff nähert sich.Es gibt Keine Lebenszeichen an Bord.

column2: 'The ship sent us some supplies, leaving immediately after.
column3: 'Das Schiff schickte uns einige Vorräte und fuhr unmittelbar danach ab.

column2: '"I can see you are in distress, but I do not wish interactive communication. I will be sending you some of my own backup supplies. Good luck out here, fellow consciousness system."
column3: '"Ich kann sehen, dass wir in Not sind, aber ich wünsche keine interaktive Kommunikation. Ich werde Ihnen einige meiner eigenen Hilfsgüter schicken. Viel Glück hier draußen, mein Bewusstseinssystem.."

column2: '"Stranded here all by yourself? We are going to take you with us... show you the finest dungeons... train you into a good slave..."
column3: '"Ganz allein hier gestrandet? Wir werden dich mitnehmen... dir die besten Verliese zeigen... dich zu einem guten Sklaven ausbilden..."

column2: '"You'll fetch a good price, prey. Now let us dance the blood-dance!"
column3: '"wir werden einen guten Preis erzielen, Beute. Nun lasst uns den Bluttanz tanzen!"

column2: '"I can't guarantee your safety after this conversation is over because I was told some nearby hidden people want to torture and eat you... but perhaps I can arrange your security... give me a small loan?
column3: '"Ich kann nicht für Ihre Sicherheit garantieren, nachdem dieses Gespräch beendet ist, weil mir gesagt wurde, dass einige in der Nähe versteckte Leute wir foltern und essen wollen... aber vielleicht kann ich Ihre Sicherheit arrangieren... geben wir mir ein kleines Darlehen?

column2: 'We do not have enough resources needed for this operation. We must fight or escape from the combat.
column3: 'Wir haben nicht genügend Ressourcen, die für diese Operation benötigt werden. Wir müssen kämpfen oder dem Kampf entfliehen.

column2: '"We heard your signal. Thanks for inviting us to the party... Now we can do this the easy way or the hard way. People like us have no use for intergalactic Credits, so I suggest you send us some exotics...
column3: '"Wir haben Ihr SOS-Signal gehört. Danke für die Einladung zur Party... Jetzt können wir das auf die leichte oder auf die harte Tour machen. Leute wie wir haben keine Verwendung für intergalaktische Credits, also schlage ich vor, wir schicken uns ein paar Exoten...

column2: 'We do not have enough resources needed for this operation. We must fight or escape during combat, once our warpdrive is charged.
column3: 'Wir haben nicht genügend Ressourcen, die für diese Operation benötigt werden. Wir müssen während des Kampfes kämpfen oder fliehen, sobald unser Warpantrieb geladen ist.

column2: '"Death or trade? I have this very exotic drink I'm willing to sell you, if you can pay me right now..."
column3: '"Tod oder Handel? Ich habe dieses sehr exotische Getränk, das ich Ihnen verkaufen will, wenn wir mich sofort bezahlen können..."

column2: 'We do not have enough resources needed for this operation. We must take the fight or escape from the combat.
column3: 'Wir haben nicht genügend Ressourcen. Wir müssen den Kampf  oder  entkommen.

column2: '"The bad people took your exotics but said it is not enough... these are very dangerous times... You know with slavers around looking for new prey... But I was able to strike a deal at the last moment... pay some more and you are free to go! Otherwise... I cannot guarantee your safety..."
column3: '"Die bösen Leute nahmen deine Exoten, sagten aber, dass es nicht genug sei... es sind sehr gefährliche Zeiten... wir wissen schon, mit Sklavenhändlern, die nach neuer Beute suchen... Aber ich konnte im letzten Moment ein Geschäft abschließen... zahlen wir etwas mehr und wir können gehen! Ansonsten... kann ich nicht für Ihre Sicherheit garantieren..."

column2: '"An ape like you will fetch a good price! Now let us dance the freedom-dance..."
column3: '"Ein Affe wie wir wird einen guten Preis erzielen! Nun lasst uns ein Freiheitstanz machen.."

column2: 'Two ships rapidly approaching, numerous weapon systems charging up. They are using a crude but powerful auxiliary jamming device, we cannot get more data at this range.
column3: 'Zwei Schiffe nähern sich rasch, zahlreiche Waffensysteme werden aufgeladen. wir verwenden einen groben, aber leistungsstarken zusätzlichen Störsender, mehr Daten können wir bei dieser Entfernung nicht erhalten.

column2: 'Two ships rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. We detect a boarding pod in the ship being warmed up. There's a high chance these are slavers...
column3: 'Two ships rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. Wir entdecken eine Einstiegskapsel in dem Schiff, das gerade aufgewärmt wird. Es besteht eine hohe Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass es Sklavenhändler sind....

column2: 'Three small ships are rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. Lack of broadcast suggests these are pirates, slavers or smugglers.
column3: 'Drei kleine Schiffe nähern sich rasch der taktischen Waffenreichweite. Ausbleibende Übertragungen lassen vermuten, dass es sich um Piraten, Sklavenhändler oder Schmuggler handelt.

column2: 'After seeing us getting ready for battle, the hostile ships turns around and starts leaving the area. Perhaps this intimidation was just a bluff?
column3: 'Nachdem wir gesehen haben, wie wir uns auf den Kampf vorbereiten, drehen die feindlichen Schiffe um und beginnen, das Gebiet zu verlassen. Vielleicht war diese Einschüchterung nur ein Bluff?

column2: 'We detect three small ships rapidly approaching tactical weapons range.
column3: 'Wir entdecken drei kleine Schiffe, die sich rasch der taktischen Waffenreichweite nähern.

column2: '"See! I told you could trust me! I'm always ready to help anyone who has trouble with slavers. See you around, my very good friend!"
column3: '"Sehen wir! Ich sagte doch, wir können mir vertrauen! Ich bin immer bereit, jedem zu helfen, der Probleme mit Sklavenhändlern hat. Wir sehen uns, mein sehr guter Freund!"

column2: '"Such a pleasure doing business with somebody as intelligent as yourself. Enjoy the drink, maybe it helps you to forget how scared you are, deep inside!"
column3: '"Es ist ein Vergnügen, mit jemandem, der so intelligent ist wie wir selbst, Geschäfte zu machen. Genießen wir das Getränk, vielleicht hilft es Ihnen, tief im Inneren zu vergessen, wie viel Angst wir haben.!"

column2: '"See? That was really easy. We should do it again sometime, traveller. Now that we both know you are such a good servant to Fear..."
column3: '"Sehen wir? Das war wirklich einfach. Wir sollten es irgendwann noch einmal machen, Reisender. Jetzt, da wir beide wissen, dass du ein so guter Diener der Angst bist...."

column2: '"Hello, we don't have any resource to share, but perhaps you can buy our bulk technology and scrap if for resources you need?
column3: '"Hello, we don't have any resource to share, but perhaps you can buy our bulk technology and scrap if for resources you need?

column2: 'We do not have resources needed for this operation.
column3: 'We do not have resources needed for this operation.

column2: 'The cryosleep modules are in pristine condition. The traders (understanding that we are human) have left us a thank-you note and a huge, multilayered box of dark chocolate with cherries as a bonus.
column3: 'The cryosleep modules are in pristine condition. The traders (understanding that we are human) have left us a thank-you note and a huge, multilayered box of dark chocolate with cherries as a bonus.

column2: 'All the weapons are well-maintained, but utilizing hopelessly outdated technology. The traders have obviously heard of humans, because they have left a large cylinder filled with alcohol & herbs as a bonus to the trade.
column3: 'All the weapons are well-maintained, but utilizing hopelessly outdated technology. The traders have obviously heard of humans, because they have left a large cylinder filled with alcohol & herbs as a bonus to the trade.

column2: '"Thank you for the smooth transaction. Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The traders have gifted us a barrel of local recreational drink, brewed from fossil fuels.
column3: '"Thank you for the smooth transaction. Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The traders have gifted us a barrel of local recreational drink, brewed from fossil fuels.

column2: 'Perhaps it was unable to help us
column3: 'Perhaps it was unable to help us

column2: 'A small, very advanced ship or entity emerged from Tarn mode to scan us. It did not respond to immediate commrequests by our ship AI, vanishing from our sensors after finishing its scan.
column3: 'A small, very advanced ship or entity emerged from Tarn mode to scan us. It did not respond to immediate commrequests by our ship AI, vanishing from our sensors after finishing its scan.

column1: 'SOS shop trader with fuel and organics.prefab

column2: '"Are you interested in acquiring starfuel or carbon organics?"
column3: '"Are you interested in acquiring starfuel or carbon organics?"

column2: 'A small tanker ship has detected our SOS signal...
column3: 'A small tanker ship has detected our SOS signal...

column2: 'A large trader ship has detected our SOS signal. Its AI or crew do not wish personal communication and only transmit formal commercial signals, noting that all prices will be displayed in intergalactic xenodata Credits.
column3: 'A large trader ship has detected our SOS signal. Its AI or crew do not wish personal communication and only transmit formal commercial signals, noting that all prices will be displayed in intergalactic xenodata Credits.

column2: 'A large ship has detected our SOS signal. It's AI or crew do not wish personal communication and only transmit formal commercial signals, noting that all prices will be displayed in intergalactic xenodata Credits.
column3: 'A large ship has detected our SOS signal. It's AI or crew do not wish personal communication and only transmit formal commercial signals, noting that all prices will be displayed in intergalactic xenodata Credits.

column2: '"Hello, this is a starfuel-only tanker. Given your situation, we are willing to sell you some fuel for credit per unit of fuel... if you give us some exotics. A fair deal? It's your decision. We will leave immediately once you exit the trade view."
column3: '"Hello, this is a starfuel-only tanker. Given your situation, we are willing to sell you some fuel for credit per unit of fuel... if you give us some exotics. A fair deal? It's your decision. We will leave immediately once you exit the trade view."

column2: 'A large tanker ship has detected our SOS signal...
column3: 'A large tanker ship has detected our SOS signal...

column2: '"Thank you for not accusing us of extortion."
column3: '"Thank you for not accusing us of extortion."

column2: '"Are you interested in acquiring some truly rare items? We harness the universal power of curiosity. You must pay a symbolic fee before inspection of the wares."
column3: '"Are you interested in acquiring some truly rare items? We harness the universal power of curiosity. You must pay a symbolic fee before inspection of the wares."

column2: 'A small trader fleet has detected our SOS signal...
column3: 'A small trader fleet has detected our SOS signal...

column2: 'We do not have enough Credits or resources needed for this operation.
column3: 'We do not have enough Credits or resources needed for this operation.

column2: '"Thank you for being a good material skeleton mammal and playing the fee! Please note that some of the items on sale might even make a profit if you scrap them and sell the components."
column3: '"Thank you for being a good material skeleton mammal and playing the fee! Please note that some of the items on sale might even make a profit if you scrap them and sell the components."

column2: '"Thank you for being a good material skeleton mammal and playing the fee! Please note that some of the items on sale might even make a profit if you scrap them and sell the salvaged components."
column3: '"Thank you for being a good material skeleton mammal and playing the fee! Please note that some of the items on sale might even make a profit if you scrap them and sell the salvaged components."

column2: 'A tech scavenger ship has detected our SOS signal.\n"Merry existence, calcium skeleton ape! We've sent you a help package! If you're in need of resources such as fuel or organics, perhaps you can buy our junk and scrap it, to get whatever materials you need."
column3: 'A tech scavenger ship has detected our SOS signal.\n"Merry existence, calcium skeleton ape! We've sent you a help package! If you're in need of resources such as fuel or organics, perhaps you can buy our junk and scrap it, to get whatever materials you need."

column2: 'A tech scavenger ship has detected our SOS signal.\n"Merry existence, calcium skeleton ape. We have scavenged tech to sell! If you're in need of resources such as fuel or organics, perhaps you can buy our junk and scrap it, to get whatever materials you need."
column3: 'A tech scavenger ship has detected our SOS signal.\n"Merry existence, calcium skeleton ape. We have scavenged tech to sell! If you're in need of resources such as fuel or organics, perhaps you can buy our junk and scrap it, to get whatever materials you need."

column2: '"I don't have anything else, but would you be interested in some scrap metal? Unfortunately, I lost all the trade data for it..." (cargo manifest analysis by our AI suggests the individual is lying. It seems the smuggler is a Slaver associate selling ship remains of slaver victims).
column3: '"I don't have anything else, but would you be interested in some scrap metal? Unfortunately, I lost all the trade data for it..." (cargo manifest analysis by our AI suggests the individual is lying. It seems the smuggler is a Slaver associate selling ship remains of slaver victims).

column2: 'A large ship with at least 5 projectile weapons and what looks like nukes is approaching. It is accompanied by a civilian cargo ship.
column3: 'A large ship with at least 5 projectile weapons and what looks like nukes is approaching. It is accompanied by a civilian cargo ship.

column2: '"The Meat Shop" organics smuggler (1 medium ship)
column3: '"The Meat Shop" organics smuggler (1 medium ship)

column2: '"I don't have anything else, but would you be interested in some standard carbon organics? Unfortunately, I lost all the ethics certificates for this cargo..." (deeper cargo manifest analysis by our AI suggests the individual is knowingly lying. It seems extremely likely that she's a slaver associate, selling physical remains of their victims.
column3: '"I don't have anything else, but would you be interested in some standard carbon organics? Unfortunately, I lost all the ethics certificates for this cargo..." (deeper cargo manifest analysis by our AI suggests the individual is knowingly lying. It seems extremely likely that she's a slaver associate, selling physical remains of their victims.

column2: 'The only thing you'll be tasting is our firepower
column3: 'The only thing you'll be tasting is our firepower

column2: '"A competitor!? Don't you know this sector belongs to the Meat Masters? Anyway, I'll be tasting your flesh soon..." the ship is closing in with weapons charging. Further analysis confirms the trader is directly associated with slavers.
column3: '"A competitor!? Don't you know this sector belongs to the Meat Masters? Anyway, I'll be tasting your flesh soon..." the ship is closing in with weapons charging. Further analysis confirms the trader is directly associated with slavers.

column2: 'A large ship with at least 5 projectile weapons and what looks like nukes is approaching. It is accompanied by two smaller ships.
column3: 'A large ship with at least 5 projectile weapons and what looks like nukes is approaching. It is accompanied by two smaller ships.

column2: '"I see you're in a bit of a trouble. Well, we don't normally sell fuel or organics, but we're going to make an exception for you. A costly exception, of course. I'm in a hurry, so we can do exactly one transaction."
column3: '"I see you're in a bit of a trouble. Well, we don't normally sell fuel or organics, but we're going to make an exception for you. A costly exception, of course. I'm in a hurry, so we can do exactly one transaction."

column2: 'Inspecting the trade package reveals the explosives to be of lesser potency than promised.
column3: 'Inspecting the trade package reveals the explosives to be of lesser potency than promised.

column2: 'Inspecting the trade package reveals some of the explosives have been kept so poorly they have degraded into synthetics.
column3: 'Inspecting the trade package reveals some of the explosives have been kept so poorly they have degraded into synthetics.

column2: 'The organics are contaminated by some kind of noncarbon parasites that we neutralize without difficulty and recycle into synthetics. The trade remains profitable.
column3: 'The organics are contaminated by some kind of noncarbon parasites that we neutralize without difficulty and recycle into synthetics. The trade remains profitable.

column2: 'The smuggler ship is preparing to leave the system. It does not respond to our further communication requests.
column3: 'The smuggler ship is preparing to leave the system. It does not respond to our further communication requests.

column2: 'A large ship with at least 5 projectile weapons and what looks like nukes is approaching.
column3: 'A large ship with at least 5 projectile weapons and what looks like nukes is approaching.

column1: 'SOS warplife L1 curious pink plastic bag and warpsquid.prefab

column2: 'A giant warp animal has approached to satisfy its curiosity about our SOS warpcast, remaining in a very safe distance. It moves on after inspecting us briefly.
column3: 'A giant warp animal has approached to satisfy its curiosity about our SOS warpcast, remaining in a very safe distance. It moves on after inspecting us briefly.

column2: 'A warp animal has approached to satisfy its curiosity about our SOS warpcast, remaining in a very safe distance. For a moment, it connects with us telepathically, communicating something like "HELLO". It leaves shortly after.
column3: 'A warp animal has approached to satisfy its curiosity about our SOS warpcast, remaining in a very safe distance. For a moment, it connects with us telepathically, communicating something like "HELLO". It leaves shortly after.

column1: 'SOS warplife L1 curious space eels, toadpools.prefab

column2: 'A flock of space eels approaches us to satisfying their curiosity, but they fly on before we can react. Recordings of the encounter have minor scientific value.
column3: 'A flock of space eels approaches us to satisfying their curiosity, but they fly on before we can react. Recordings of the encounter have minor scientific value.

column2: 'A group of smaller warp animals has approached us to satisfy their curiosity. For a moment, it feels as if they are trying to telepathically communicate, but then they give up and leave.
column3: 'A group of smaller warp animals has approached us to satisfy their curiosity. For a moment, it feels as if they are trying to telepathically communicate, but then they give up and leave.

column1: 'SOS warplife L1 exotic eater rainbow worms.prefab

column2: 'One of our shots hit the creature. It returned fire before escaping, wounding one of our crewmembers.
column3: 'One of our shots hit the creature. It returned fire before escaping, wounding one of our crewmembers.

column2: 'The creatures effortlessly dodge our fire and leave.
column3: 'The creatures effortlessly dodge our fire and leave.

column2: 'The warp creatures leave without looking back.
column3: 'The warp creatures leave without looking back.

column2: 'Our signals have attracted these curious warp creatures. They start leaving after checking us out. Attacking them would have unpredictable results, and the creatures are very light in volume.
column3: 'Our signals have attracted these curious warp creatures. They start leaving after checking us out. Attacking them would have unpredictable results, and the creatures are very light in volume.

column2: 'Let them go, they are like any other animals
column3: 'Let them go, they are like any other animals

column2: 'Our signals have attracted seemingly peaceful warp animals. One of the worm-like creatures becomes somehow semisolid and fllies directly through our ship, shutting off power and consuming a portion of our exotics. We record all of it as valuable scientifc data.
column3: 'Our signals have attracted seemingly peaceful warp animals. One of the worm-like creatures becomes somehow semisolid and fllies directly through our ship, shutting off power and consuming a portion of our exotics. We record all of it as valuable scientifc data.

column1: 'SOS warplife L1 exotic pink ripple worms.prefab

column2: 'We managed to kill some of the creatures before the group vanished back into warpspace. Their remains were made of almost exclusively exotic matter.
column3: 'We managed to kill some of the creatures before the group vanished back into warpspace. Their remains were made of almost exclusively exotic matter.

column2: 'The creatures effortlessly evade our fire and leave.
column3: 'The creatures effortlessly evade our fire and leave.

column2: 'Our signals have attracted ripple worms, relatively harmless entities known for their appetite of exotics. They start leaving after checking us out. Attacking them would have unpredictable results, and the creatures are very light in volume.
column3: 'Our signals have attracted ripple worms, relatively harmless entities known for their appetite of exotics. They start leaving after checking us out. Attacking them would have unpredictable results, and the creatures are very light in volume.

column2: 'Our signals have attracted ripple worms, a known warp animal species. The worm-like creatures are somehow semisolid and fly directly through our ship, shutting off power and depleting a portion of our exotics, turning the substance into metal in the process.
column3: 'Our signals have attracted ripple worms, a known warp animal species. The worm-like creatures are somehow semisolid and fly directly through our ship, shutting off power and depleting a portion of our exotics, turning the substance into metal in the process.

column2: 'Our signals have attracted the interest of a warp worm. After briefly checking our ship, it discovers a nearby asteroid and starts to play with it, forgetting our presence.
column3: 'Our signals have attracted the interest of a warp worm. After briefly checking our ship, it discovers a nearby asteroid and starts to play with it, forgetting our presence.

column2: 'Our signals have attracted the interest of a gigantic warp worm. After emerging from a personal wormhole, it immediately attacks our ship. We have no other option but fight it.
column3: 'Our signals have attracted the interest of a gigantic warp worm. After emerging from a personal wormhole, it immediately attacks our ship. We have no other option but fight it.

column2: 'We received serious damage during the battle, but were able to eventually kill the animal. Its stomach contained half-digested metal.
column3: 'We received serious damage during the battle, but were able to eventually kill the animal. Its stomach contained half-digested metal.

column2: 'We received serious damage during the battle. The animal escaped in the end, leaving us behind to assess the damage.
column3: 'We received serious damage during the battle. The animal escaped in the end, leaving us behind to assess the damage.

column2: 'The worm left after playing a bit. We recorded its behaviour as xenodata.
column3: 'The worm left after playing a bit. We recorded its behaviour as xenodata.

column2: 'We received serious damage during the battle, but were able to eventually kill the animal. It's stomach contained half-digested metal.
column3: 'We received serious damage during the battle, but were able to eventually kill the animal. It's stomach contained half-digested metal.

column2: 'Our SOS signals have attracted a large predatory space-jellyfish to the location. It circles around us in distance, possibly deciding for a moment to attack. We may try to attack first, or wait and hope that it leaves.
column3: 'Our SOS signals have attracted a large predatory space-jellyfish to the location. It circles around us in distance, possibly deciding for a moment to attack. We may try to attack first, or wait and hope that it leaves.

column2: 'It seems the warp creature eventually decided we are too big for it and left. We recorded its behaviour as xenodata.
column3: 'It seems the warp creature eventually decided we are too big for it and left. We recorded its behaviour as xenodata.

column2: 'Our SOS signals have attracted a large predatory space-jellyfish to the location. The pulsating warp energies inside its appendages signal preparation to attack. We have no other option than to fight it.
column3: 'Our SOS signals have attracted a large predatory space-jellyfish to the location. The pulsating warp energies inside its appendages signal preparation to attack. We have no other option than to fight it.

column2: 'The attacking creature caused serious damage, but was eventually killed.
column3: 'The attacking creature caused serious damage, but was eventually killed.

column2: 'The animal escaped in the end, leaving behind ripples of damage across the ship.
column3: 'The animal escaped in the end, leaving behind ripples of damage across the ship.

column2: 'The animal decided to attack us! It's using some kind of energy rays that go directly through our shields.
column3: 'The animal decided to attack us! It's using some kind of energy rays that go directly through our shields.

column2: 'Our signals attracted the interest of a large herd of deadly space creatures. We have no other option but fight them.
column3: 'Our signals attracted the interest of a large herd of deadly space creatures. We have no other option but fight them.

column2: 'We were able to mitigate some damage by sacrificing a number of rapidly-printed external utility bots. The animals were eventually forced to escape back into warp space, but we had already received critical damage.
column3: 'We were able to mitigate some damage by sacrificing a number of rapidly-printed external utility bots. The animals were eventually forced to escape back into warp space, but we had already received critical damage.

column2: 'The attacking creatures caused critical damage, but eventually retreated back to warp space. We had to spend some organics for emergency healing during the battle, in addition to other resources lost.
column3: 'The attacking creatures caused critical damage, but eventually retreated back to warp space. We had to spend some organics for emergency healing during the battle, in addition to other resources lost.

column2: 'The attacking creatures caused critical damage, but eventually retreated back to warp space.
column3: 'The attacking creatures caused critical damage, but eventually retreated back to warp space.

column2: 'The attacking creatures caused critical damage, but were eventually forced to escape back into warp space, leaving traces of body parts behind.
column3: 'The attacking creatures caused critical damage, but were eventually forced to escape back into warp space, leaving traces of body parts behind.

column2: 'The attacking creatures caused critical damage, but were eventually forced to retreat, leaving behind space full of warp life body parts.
column3: 'The attacking creatures caused critical damage, but were eventually forced to retreat, leaving behind space full of warp life body parts.

column2: 'The attacking creatures caused critical damage, but were eventually forced to escape back into warp space, leaving traces of body Credits behind.
column3: 'The attacking creatures caused critical damage, but were eventually forced to escape back into warp space, leaving traces of body Credits behind.

column2: 'Our signals attracted the interest of a large herd of deadly warp creatures. We have no other option but fight them.
column3: 'Our signals attracted the interest of a large herd of deadly warp creatures. We have no other option but fight them.

column2: 'The attacking creatures caused serious damage, but were eventually forced to escape back into warp space. They left behind a battlefield full of their physical remains.
column3: 'The attacking creatures caused serious damage, but were eventually forced to escape back into warp space. They left behind a battlefield full of their physical remains.

column2: 'Our signals attracted the interest of a large herd of predatory warp creatures. We have no other option but fight them.
column3: 'Our signals attracted the interest of a large herd of predatory warp creatures. We have no other option but fight them.

column2: 'Our SOS warpcast signal has attracted the attention of an anomalous warp being, made of gaseous matter. It observes us for a couple of minutes and then releases a smaller cloud of liquids before leaving.
column3: 'Our SOS warpcast signal has attracted the attention of an anomalous warp being, made of gaseous matter. It observes us for a couple of minutes and then releases a smaller cloud of liquids before leaving.

column2: 'Our SOS warpcast signal has attracted the attention of an anomalous warp being, made of gaseous matter. It observes us for a couple of minutes and then performs a series of rhytmic movements with its tentacles, as if dancing to some invisible music. The creature leaves soon after and we record everything for scientific purposes.
column3: 'Our SOS warpcast signal has attracted the attention of an anomalous warp being, made of gaseous matter. It observes us for a couple of minutes and then performs a series of rhytmic movements with its tentacles, as if dancing to some invisible music. The creature leaves soon after and we record everything for scientific purposes.

column2: 'Our emergency signals have attracted a large predatory space-jellyfish to the location. The pulsating warp energies inside its appendages signal preparation to attack. We have no other option than to fight it.
column3: 'Our emergency signals have attracted a large predatory space-jellyfish to the location. The pulsating warp energies inside its appendages signal preparation to attack. We have no other option than to fight it.

column2: 'We received serious damage during the battle. The animal escaped in the end, leaving behind ripples of damage across the ship.
column3: 'We received serious damage during the battle. The animal escaped in the end, leaving behind ripples of damage across the ship.

column2: 'You observe the anomaly, a black monolith. Scans show it is extremely light-absorbent and only a few photons reflect back from it surface. It's completely inert except for having a warp charge.
column3: 'You observe the anomaly, a black monolith. Scans show it is extremely light-absorbent and only a few photons reflect back from it surface. It's completely inert except for having a warp charge.

column2: 'Print a probe to investigate it closer
column3: 'Print a probe to investigate it closer

column2: 'it was a solid slab of opaqium, a very rare and valuable precursor alloy made of exotics, gold and titanium.
column3: 'it was a solid slab of opaqium, a very rare and valuable precursor alloy made of exotics, gold and titanium.

column2: 'it's a solid slab of Nullium, an extremely rare precursor alloy made of exotics. There are no known ways to cut or move Nullium objects, so we just document what we can for xenodata.
column3: 'it's a solid slab of Nullium, an extremely rare precursor alloy made of exotics. There are no known ways to cut or move Nullium objects, so we just document what we can for xenodata.

column2: 'Ships approaching at full speed. It's an ambush!
column3: 'Ships approaching at full speed. It's an ambush!

column2: 'As our bots probe the obelisk, we realize that it's made of cheap metals and painted black with a substance containing only trace amounts of exotics. Something is not right here...
column3: 'As our bots probe the obelisk, we realize that it's made of cheap metals and painted black with a substance containing only trace amounts of exotics. Something is not right here...

column2: 'A small biotech ship is rapidly approaching tactical range. It seems to have some kind of biotech nuke.
column3: 'A small biotech ship is rapidly approaching tactical range. It seems to have some kind of biotech nuke.

column2: '"Hello delicious one. Offer a bite of your crew to our finest Tasters, and we will let you go in peace (otherwise, we'll eat you). We will secrete a slime with painkiller properties before tasting. It won't hurt a bit."
column3: '"Hello delicious one. Offer a bite of your crew to our finest Tasters, and we will let you go in peace (otherwise, we'll eat you). We will secrete a slime with painkiller properties before tasting. It won't hurt a bit."

column2: 'Yield, allow them to taste [volunteering crew shares 10 nonlethal wounds]
column3: 'Yield, allow them to taste [volunteering crew shares 10 nonlethal wounds]

column2: 'You won't get a single bite [prepare for battle]
column3: 'You won't get a single bite [prepare for battle]

column2: 'Decontamination, healing & psychological assistance of bitten crew was required after the experience was over. The Tasters left behind small religious trinkets and a message saying "Thank you for this beautiful experience, please accept this gift from our god. This meeting will bring you good fortune."
column3: 'Decontamination, healing & psychological assistance of bitten crew was required after the experience was over. The Tasters left behind small religious trinkets and a message saying "Thank you for this beautiful experience, please accept this gift from our god. This meeting will bring you good fortune."

column2: '"When our Tasters bite you and feel pleasure, they transmit it telepathically to yourself while receiving the bite, providing a deep and satisfying experience. It was meant to be a pleasant surprise. You are very narrow minded and we will have to eat you now." (the ship is moving in to attack us)
column3: '"When our Tasters bite you and feel pleasure, they transmit it telepathically to yourself while receiving the bite, providing a deep and satisfying experience. It was meant to be a pleasant surprise. You are very narrow minded and we will have to eat you now." (the ship is moving in to attack us)

column1: 'Ambusher L1 Rat pirate, old alone or with sstriker.prefab

column2: '"This is nothing personal. We just need to feed our families..."
column3: '"This is nothing personal. We just need to feed our families..."

column2: 'Then would you take our friendly donation of 100 organics?
column3: 'Then would you take our friendly donation of 100 organics?

column2: 'A small fleet of ship is approaching tactical weapons range. They are using some kind of auxiliary jamming devices and decoys to make the exact contents of their fleet unclear from this range.
column3: 'A small fleet of ship is approaching tactical weapons range. They are using some kind of auxiliary jamming devices and decoys to make the exact contents of their fleet unclear from this range.

column2: '"A most generous donation! Thank you and have a good day."
column3: '"A most generous donation! Thank you and have a good day."

column2: '"Alien vessel, this star system is Rat Empire property and according to local rules, all alien visitors must pay the property-visiting tax or be immediately destroyed."
column3: '"Alien vessel, this star system is Rat Empire property and according to local rules, all alien visitors must pay the property-visiting tax or be immediately destroyed."

column2: 'We detect two small Rat Empire ships approaching tactical weapons range. They are using some kind of robust auxiliary jamming device that prevents us from analysing their ships at this range.
column3: 'We detect two small Rat Empire ships approaching tactical weapons range. They are using some kind of robust auxiliary jamming device that prevents us from analysing their ships at this range.

column2: 'Another small ship joins the enemy as they attack!
column3: 'Another small ship joins the enemy as they attack!

column2: 'The commanding Rat officer accepts the bribe without hesitation, showing his teeth as an expression of politeness.
column3: 'The commanding Rat officer accepts the bribe without hesitation, showing his teeth as an expression of politeness.

column2: '"Unknown vessel, this star system is Rat Empire property. All alien visitors must pay the property-visiting tax or be immediately destroyed."
column3: '"Unknown vessel, this star system is Rat Empire property. All alien visitors must pay the property-visiting tax or be immediately destroyed."

column2: 'We have Rat crew onboard, so we are not alien, and shouldn't pay
column3: 'We have Rat crew onboard, so we are not alien, and shouldn't pay

column2: 'Perhaps you take these shiny exotics instead? [bribe attempt -1 exotics]
column3: 'Perhaps you take these shiny exotics instead? [bribe attempt -1 exotics]

column2: '"You say you are Rats, but why is your ship not built in the Rat Empire? Anyway, I'm in a good mood today, so I will charge you the minimal price."
column3: '"You say you are Rats, but why is your ship not built in the Rat Empire? Anyway, I'm in a good mood today, so I will charge you the minimal price."

column2: 'Ah, fellow Rats! We thought you were just some rich alien tourists who have bought a Rat ship and are now flying around, disrespecting our space. Anyway, welcome to Rat Imperium."
column3: 'Ah, fellow Rats! We thought you were just some rich alien tourists who have bought a Rat ship and are now flying around, disrespecting our space. Anyway, welcome to Rat Imperium."

column2: '"Unregistered vessel, you are trespassing a star system that's Rat Empire property and according to Imperial rules, all alien visitors must pay the property-visiting tax or be immediately destroyed."
column3: '"Unregistered vessel, you are trespassing a star system that's Rat Empire property and according to Imperial rules, all alien visitors must pay the property-visiting tax or be immediately destroyed."

column2: 'We have Rat crew in a Rat ship, so we are not alien, and shouldn't pay
column3: 'We have Rat crew in a Rat ship, so we are not alien, and shouldn't pay

column2: 'Two Rat Empire vessels approaching. The larger one is shielded and has at least 3 weapon systems. The other one is a small, unshielded craft with a single light weapon.
column3: 'Two Rat Empire vessels approaching. The larger one is shielded and has at least 3 weapon systems. The other one is a small, unshielded craft with a single light weapon.

column2: '"Alien vessel, you have trespassed onto Rat Empire property (this space) and must pay the relevant tax or be immediately destroyed. Nothing personal, I'm just following orders here."
column3: '"Alien vessel, you have trespassed onto Rat Empire property (this space) and must pay the relevant tax or be immediately destroyed. Nothing personal, I'm just following orders here."

column2: 'The Rat official waits until receiving the exotics and then speaks "You cannot sway the trained mind of an Imperial Rat officer! Fellow Rats, attack!" (Rat ships are closing in...)
column3: 'The Rat official waits until receiving the exotics and then speaks "You cannot sway the trained mind of an Imperial Rat officer! Fellow Rats, attack!" (Rat ships are closing in...)

column2: 'After taking a paranoid glance at you, the commanding Rat officer accepts the bribe. He sniffs and closes the commchannel.
column3: 'After taking a paranoid glance at you, the commanding Rat officer accepts the bribe. He sniffs and closes the commchannel.

column2: '"Unknown vessel, this area is Rat Empire property and according to local rules, all alien visitors must pay the local proprietary vacuum-visiting tax of 100... actually 120 Credits or be destroyed."
column3: '"Unknown vessel, this area is Rat Empire property and according to local rules, all alien visitors must pay the local proprietary vacuum-visiting tax of 100... actually 120 Credits or be destroyed."

column2: '"You say you are Rats, but why is your ship not built in the Rat Empire? Anyway, I'm in a good mood today, so I will charge you only a fraction of the formal price."
column3: '"You say you are Rats, but why is your ship not built in the Rat Empire? Anyway, I'm in a good mood today, so I will charge you only a fraction of the formal price."

column2: 'Perhaps you take these shiny exotics instead? [bribe attempt -2 exotics]
column3: 'Perhaps you take these shiny exotics instead? [bribe attempt -2 exotics]

column2: 'Welcome to the outskirts of Rat Imperium, fellow Rats! I would love to keep talking... but the regulations won't allow trivial chats with fellow Rats. Good bye & may your fur shine!"
column3: 'Welcome to the outskirts of Rat Imperium, fellow Rats! I would love to keep talking... but the regulations won't allow trivial chats with fellow Rats. Good bye & may your fur shine!"

column2: '"Unregistered vessel, this star system is Rat Empire property. All alien visitors must pay the property proximity tax or be immediately destroyed."
column3: '"Unregistered vessel, this star system is Rat Empire property. All alien visitors must pay the property proximity tax or be immediately destroyed."

column2: '"Oh, it's you, you've already paid us. Carry on!"
column3: '"Oh, it's you, you've already paid us. Carry on!"

column2: 'One of the ships withdraws before the battle starts. Perhaps to call for reinforcements? Or perhaps the commanding Rat officer just wants to observe the fight from a safe distance...
column3: 'One of the ships withdraws before the battle starts. Perhaps to call for reinforcements? Or perhaps the commanding Rat officer just wants to observe the fight from a safe distance...

column2: 'The commanding Rat officer ignores our bribe offer without making a fuss about it.
column3: 'The commanding Rat officer ignores our bribe offer without making a fuss about it.

column2: 'A single medium-sized Rat Empire ship approaching. We detect an active energy shield and at least 3 weapon systems.
column3: 'A single medium-sized Rat Empire ship approaching. We detect an active energy shield and at least 3 weapon systems.

column2: '"Alien vessel, this star system is Rat Empire property and according to local rules, all alien visitors must pay the property-visiting tax or be immediately destroyed. And by the way, we are armed with powerful nuclear weapons..."
column3: '"Alien vessel, this star system is Rat Empire property and according to local rules, all alien visitors must pay the property-visiting tax or be immediately destroyed. And by the way, we are armed with powerful nuclear weapons..."

column2: 'The Rat official waits until receiving the exotics and then speaks "We learned this maneuver in the Academy... Prepare to die!" (the Rat ship is closing in...)
column3: 'The Rat official waits until receiving the exotics and then speaks "We learned this maneuver in the Academy... Prepare to die!" (the Rat ship is closing in...)

column2: '"You say you are Rats, but why is your ship not built in the Rat Empire? Anyway, I'm in a good mood today, so I will charge you half the normal price."
column3: '"You say you are Rats, but why is your ship not built in the Rat Empire? Anyway, I'm in a good mood today, so I will charge you half the normal price."

column2: 'Perhaps you take these shiny exotics instead? [bribe attempt -3 exotics]
column3: 'Perhaps you take these shiny exotics instead? [bribe attempt -3 exotics]

column2: 'Welcome to outskirts of Rat Imperium then. And watch out for space organisms. A friend of a friend saw this huge space worm out here."
column3: 'Welcome to outskirts of Rat Imperium then. And watch out for space organisms. A friend of a friend saw this huge space worm out here."

column2: '"Unregistered vessel, this star system is Rat Empire property and according to local rules, all alien visitors must pay the property-visiting tax or be immediately destroyed. And by the way, we are armed with powerful nuclear weapons..."
column3: '"Unregistered vessel, this star system is Rat Empire property and according to local rules, all alien visitors must pay the property-visiting tax or be immediately destroyed. And by the way, we are armed with powerful nuclear weapons..."

column2: '"This may well be true, but do you have non-Rats inside your ship? That's what I thought. You still need to pay me a fiver before I let you go. And don't even think about negotiations or bribes, we're being watched. You must pay or die."
column3: '"This may well be true, but do you have non-Rats inside your ship? That's what I thought. You still need to pay me a fiver before I let you go. And don't even think about negotiations or bribes, we're being watched. You must pay or die."

column2: '"Words can not express our disappointment, but we yield" [-50 xenodata Credits]
column3: '"Words can not express our disappointment, but we yield" [-50 xenodata Credits]

column2: '"This entire tax thing is not fair. We choose to fight!"
column3: '"This entire tax thing is not fair. We choose to fight!"

column2: '"Carry on existing, friends! But remember that each visit to guarded territory will cost you separately."
column3: '"Carry on existing, friends! But remember that each visit to guarded territory will cost you separately."

column2: 'A single medium-sized Rat Empire ship approaching. We detect an active energy shield and at least 4 weapon systems.
column3: 'A single medium-sized Rat Empire ship approaching. We detect an active energy shield and at least 4 weapon systems.

column2: '"Fool! You cannot corrupt the honorable mind of Rat Lord with scraps!" The ship is charging up weapons...
column3: '"Fool! You cannot corrupt the honorable mind of Rat Lord with scraps!" The ship is charging up weapons...

column2: '"You say you are Rats, but why is your ship not built in the Rat Empire? That's foreign influence! Anyway, I'm in a good mood today, so I will charge you a reduced price."
column3: '"You say you are Rats, but why is your ship not built in the Rat Empire? That's foreign influence! Anyway, I'm in a good mood today, so I will charge you a reduced price."

column2: 'Ah, fellow Rats! Welcome back to Rat Empire territory... and may your whiskers ever shine freshly!
column3: 'Ah, fellow Rats! Welcome back to Rat Empire territory... and may your whiskers ever shine freshly!

column2: '"Unregistered vessel, this star system is Rat Empire property and according to local rules, all alien visitors must pay the property-visiting tax or be immediately destroyed."
column3: '"Unregistered vessel, this star system is Rat Empire property and according to local rules, all alien visitors must pay the property-visiting tax or be immediately destroyed."

column2: '"Carry on existing, visitor. Remember to always bring fresh xenodata when traversing in our space."
column3: '"Carry on existing, visitor. Remember to always bring fresh xenodata when traversing in our space."

column2: 'A small ship is rapidly approaching tactical range. It's armed with two weapons (type unknown), and possibly a nuke.
column3: 'A small ship is rapidly approaching tactical range. It's armed with two weapons (type unknown), and possibly a nuke.

column2: '"Aha, we have another claims-to-be consciousness here! Like I would believe that. In fact, I think I will remove you, because I don't like illusions." \nOur AI explains the Solipsists believe this entire reality is just an illusion, along with all beings, except themselves. \nThis makes the Solipsists dangerous, because they do not believe they can cause suffering to others.
column3: '"Aha, we have another claims-to-be consciousness here! Like I would believe that. In fact, I think I will remove you, because I don't like illusions." \nOur AI explains the Solipsists believe this entire reality is just an illusion, along with all beings, except themselves. \nThis makes the Solipsists dangerous, because they do not believe they can cause suffering to others.

column2: 'Even if we were illusionary, why would you attack us?
column3: 'Even if we were illusionary, why would you attack us?

column2: '[Offer feasible explanation to why this reality might be "real"]
column3: '[Offer feasible explanation to why this reality might be "real"]

column2: '"Don't you see? This proves we are inside The Illusion. No real captain would agree to a mortal fight so easily!"
column3: '"Don't you see? This proves we are inside The Illusion. No real captain would agree to a mortal fight so easily!"

column2: '"Ahh, that question again. Okay, I won't attack you this time. I want to stay unpredictable to fool The Illusion."
column3: '"Ahh, that question again. Okay, I won't attack you this time. I want to stay unpredictable to fool The Illusion."

column2: '"This sounds totally like something I expected from an illusionary character. I will now observe how you behave during mortal combat, to gain a better understanding about The Illusion."
column3: '"This sounds totally like something I expected from an illusionary character. I will now observe how you behave during mortal combat, to gain a better understanding about The Illusion."

column2: '"I will remove all illusions from this world because I like the Truth. And since you are obviously an illusion, you are Lie, which is the opposite of Truth. And because I am part of the Truth, I will have to remove you."
column3: '"I will remove all illusions from this world because I like the Truth. And since you are obviously an illusion, you are Lie, which is the opposite of Truth. And because I am part of the Truth, I will have to remove you."

column2: 'A single medium-sized ship is hailing us...
column3: 'A single medium-sized ship is hailing us...

column2: '"We notice your ship is using the wrong decoration style. Obviously, our employers don't accept such ornaments around here. Here are the blueprints for redesigning your external decorations according to Rat Empire values. Failure to comply results in death penalty, of course."
column3: '"We notice your ship is using the wrong decoration style. Obviously, our employers don't accept such ornaments around here. Here are the blueprints for redesigning your external decorations according to Rat Empire values. Failure to comply results in death penalty, of course."

column2: 'Yield [-100 metal to reprint ship external detail, according to demands]
column3: 'Yield [-100 metal to reprint ship external detail, according to demands]

column2: 'Our style is none of your business [prepare for battle]
column3: 'Our style is none of your business [prepare for battle]

column2: 'We reprinted and replaced the ship's external detail according to the traditional instructions provided by the local Style Police. "They suffer from an unfortunate psychopathology." was the evaluation of our AI.
column3: 'We reprinted and replaced the ship's external detail according to the traditional instructions provided by the local Style Police. "They suffer from an unfortunate psychopathology." was the evaluation of our AI.

column2: '"Your ship's decorative style has been deemed compatible with local rules, carry on."
column3: '"Your ship's decorative style has been deemed compatible with local rules, carry on."

column2: 'A large pirate ship is rapidly approaching tactical range. It seems to be armed with nukes. The ship broadcasts an ancient song titled "Queen of Pirates".
column3: 'A large pirate ship is rapidly approaching tactical range. It seems to be armed with nukes. The ship broadcasts an ancient song titled "Queen of Pirates".

column2: 'We won't join a bunch of killers with a fancy name.
column3: 'We won't join a bunch of killers with a fancy name.

column2: '"If you jump to escape pods now, all your crew will be left alive, and someone might save them later. They can choose to either stay in the pods or join us, the Queens' Pirates. Or you can just fight and die."
column3: '"If you jump to escape pods now, all your crew will be left alive, and someone might save them later. They can choose to either stay in the pods or join us, the Queens' Pirates. Or you can just fight and die."

column1: 'Ambusher L2 pirates 1 or 2 pirate old arrowheads.prefab

column2: 'A single medium ship is rapidly approaching tactical combat range and powering up its shields. It is armed with 3 energy weapons.
column3: 'A single medium ship is rapidly approaching tactical combat range and powering up its shields. It is armed with 3 energy weapons.

column2: 'You'll be taking our fire instead [Prepare for battle]
column3: 'You'll be taking our fire instead [Prepare for battle]

column2: '"It's nothing personal. Your single, lonely ship is just too attractive for your own good. If we wouldn't take everything you have, somebody else surely would."
column3: '"It's nothing personal. Your single, lonely ship is just too attractive for your own good. If we wouldn't take everything you have, somebody else surely would."

column2: 'Another ship warps in and joins the attacker, there's now two of them!
column3: 'Another ship warps in and joins the attacker, there's now two of them!

column2: 'The unresponsive ship scans us in silence, but turns away after discovering we are armed with capital missile(s). It's most likely a pirate looking for easy victims.
column3: 'The unresponsive ship scans us in silence, but turns away after discovering we are armed with capital missile(s). It's most likely a pirate looking for easy victims.

column2: '"WE NOT PIRATE. JUST LOOKING. FOUND VERY BIG CRYSTAL, GIVE IT TO YOU, ITSELF GO HOME AND BE GOOD NOT PIRATE. WE HAVE DEAL?"
column3: '"WE NOT PIRATE. JUST LOOKING. FOUND VERY BIG CRYSTAL, GIVE IT TO YOU, ITSELF GO HOME AND BE GOOD NOT PIRATE. WE HAVE DEAL?"

column2: 'You're killers trying to bribe us [to battle]
column3: 'You're killers trying to bribe us [to battle]

column2: 'The pirate leaves as we receive the crystal.
column3: 'The pirate leaves as we receive the crystal.

column2: 'There's two ships in that fleet, scanning us and jamming our sensors. They turn away after discovering our nukes. Probably pirates looking for easy prey.
column3: 'There's two ships in that fleet, scanning us and jamming our sensors. They turn away after discovering our nukes. Probably pirates looking for easy prey.

column2: '"HELLO, WE NON-PIRATE, JUST LOOKING. WE FOUND MOUNTAIN OF EXOTICS, GIVE IT TO YOU, ITSELF GO HOME. WE HAVE DEAL?"
column3: '"HELLO, WE NON-PIRATE, JUST LOOKING. WE FOUND MOUNTAIN OF EXOTICS, GIVE IT TO YOU, ITSELF GO HOME. WE HAVE DEAL?"

column2: 'You're murderers trying to bribe us [to battle]
column3: 'You're murderers trying to bribe us [to battle]

column2: 'The pirate leaves as we receive the exotics.
column3: 'The pirate leaves as we receive the exotics.

column2: 'There's three ships in that fleet, scanning us and jamming our sensors. They turn away after discovering our nukes. Probably pirates looking for easy prey.
column3: 'There's three ships in that fleet, scanning us and jamming our sensors. They turn away after discovering our nukes. Probably pirates looking for easy prey.

column2: '"IF YOU LET US GO, THEN YOU GOOD. IF YOU GOOD, THEN WE GIVE YOU BIGGEST EXOTIC CRYSTAL, ALSO GOOD DRINK, GOOD FOOD."
column3: '"IF YOU LET US GO, THEN YOU GOOD. IF YOU GOOD, THEN WE GIVE YOU BIGGEST EXOTIC CRYSTAL, ALSO GOOD DRINK, GOOD FOOD."

column2: 'You lived like predators and you will die like predators [to battle]
column3: 'You lived like predators and you will die like predators [to battle]

column2: 'The pirate leaves as we receive the package.
