column3: 'The pirate leaves as we receive the package.

column1: 'Ambusher L2 pirates explorer and or pirate rat.prefab

column2: 'Two medium-sized ships closing in, no response to our commrequests. Both are shielded and we count a total of 6 weapon systems.
column3: 'Two medium-sized ships closing in, no response to our commrequests. Both are shielded and we count a total of 6 weapon systems.

column2: 'Hostile ship closing in. It is charging up weapons and does not respond to our commrequests.
column3: 'Hostile ship closing in. It is charging up weapons and does not respond to our commrequests.

column2: 'A single hostile ship closing in. It is charging up weapons and does not respond to our commrequests.
column3: 'A single hostile ship closing in. It is charging up weapons and does not respond to our commrequests.

column2: 'There's one or two ships in that fleet, scanning us and jamming our sensors. They turn away after discovering our nukes. Probably pirates looking for easy prey.
column3: 'There's one or two ships in that fleet, scanning us and jamming our sensors. They turn away after discovering our nukes. Probably pirates looking for easy prey.

column2: '"Your ship is stonger than we thought, but nobody needs to get hurt here. Would you let us go and accept these crates of explosives we have lying around, plus some good old gold? And everyone can live happily ever after. It's not like we're worse than the other rats around here."
column3: '"Your ship is stonger than we thought, but nobody needs to get hurt here. Would you let us go and accept these crates of explosives we have lying around, plus some good old gold? And everyone can live happily ever after. It's not like we're worse than the other rats around here."

column2: 'You are killers trying to buy your way out [to battle]
column3: 'You are killers trying to buy your way out [to battle]

column2: 'Two or three ships are rapidly approaching tactical range, shields active. The enemy fleet is using some kind of jamming device to block more detailed scanning at this range.
column3: 'Two or three ships are rapidly approaching tactical range, shields active. The enemy fleet is using some kind of jamming device to block more detailed scanning at this range.

column2: '"Oh, it's you, you've already paid us. What a total borgo you are! [cruel laughter]"
column3: '"Oh, it's you, you've already paid us. What a total borgo you are! [cruel laughter]"

column2: '"Don't worry about them, dear. We'll delete, detain or rehabilitate them next time, when we are better prepared. Their violent attitude is just a misdevelopment of empathy skills due to various forms of socio-cultural brainwashing & mistreatment during childhood. It's extremely common in primitive civilizations."
column3: '"Don't worry about them, dear. We'll delete, detain or rehabilitate them next time, when we are better prepared. Their violent attitude is just a misdevelopment of empathy skills due to various forms of socio-cultural brainwashing & mistreatment during childhood. It's extremely common in primitive civilizations."

column2: '"MAKE CHOICE. GIVE EXOTICS OR INTERACT WITH OUR VIOLENCE."
column3: '"MAKE CHOICE. GIVE EXOTICS OR INTERACT WITH OUR VIOLENCE."

column2: 'We do not have enough resources for this operation. We must take the fight or escape during combat.
column3: 'We do not have enough resources for this operation. We must take the fight or escape during combat.

column2: 'We finally manage to discern there are three ships. After seeing us getting ready for battle, the hostile ships turn around and start leaving the area. Perhaps they were bluffing?
column3: 'We finally manage to discern there are three ships. After seeing us getting ready for battle, the hostile ships turn around and start leaving the area. Perhaps they were bluffing?

column2: 'Three ships are rapidly approaching tactical range, shields active. The enemy fleet is using some kind of jamming device to block more detailed scanning at this range.
column3: 'Three ships are rapidly approaching tactical range, shields active. The enemy fleet is using some kind of jamming device to block more detailed scanning at this range.

column2: '"Nobody needs to get hurt here. Would you let us go if we give you this super rare artifact, plus one of our own ship weapons? The artifact is an ancient device filled with huge amounts of xenodata. If we get destroyed, the wisdom contained in it will be lost forever."
column3: '"Nobody needs to get hurt here. Would you let us go if we give you this super rare artifact, plus one of our own ship weapons? The artifact is an ancient device filled with huge amounts of xenodata. If we get destroyed, the wisdom contained in it will be lost forever."

column2: 'Getting killed is the logical outcome of being a pirate [proceed to battle]
column3: 'Getting killed is the logical outcome of being a pirate [proceed to battle]

column2: 'A single ship is rapidly approaching tactical range, shields active. It seems to be armed with a single massive gun, but it could be a decoy.
column3: 'A single ship is rapidly approaching tactical range, shields active. It seems to be armed with a single massive gun, but it could be a decoy.

column2: '"Oh, it's you, you've already paid us. What, you want to pay again? [cruel laughter] We're in a good mood, so no robbery today. Move along."
column3: '"Oh, it's you, you've already paid us. What, you want to pay again? [cruel laughter] We're in a good mood, so no robbery today. Move along."

column2: '"There is a notorious slaver ship nearby, ready to warp in and bite you. I could prevent this from happening for a few exotics... And don't get any ideas. I have a nuke and I don't care how many you have."
column3: '"There is a notorious slaver ship nearby, ready to warp in and bite you. I could prevent this from happening for a few exotics... And don't get any ideas. I have a nuke and I don't care how many you have."

column2: 'We do not have enough resources needed for this operation. We must take the fight or escape during combat.
column3: 'We do not have enough resources needed for this operation. We must take the fight or escape during combat.

column2: 'After seeing us preparing for battle, the hostile ship turns around and starts leaving the area. Perhaps the slaver was bluffing about the other ships as well?
column3: 'After seeing us preparing for battle, the hostile ship turns around and starts leaving the area. Perhaps the slaver was bluffing about the other ships as well?

column2: 'Another medium-sized ship joins the battle area! The slaver wasn't bluffing after all.
column3: 'Another medium-sized ship joins the battle area! The slaver wasn't bluffing after all.

column2: 'Two unshielded ships are rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. The first one seems to be armed with high-accuracy weapons with their own sensors. The other one is a small, unshielded escort craft with a single weapon.
column3: 'Two unshielded ships are rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. The first one seems to be armed with high-accuracy weapons with their own sensors. The other one is a small, unshielded escort craft with a single weapon.

column2: '"Oh, it's you, you've already paid us. What, you wan't to pay again? [cruel laughter] We're in a good mood today, no robbery today. Move along."
column3: '"Oh, it's you, you've already paid us. What, you wan't to pay again? [cruel laughter] We're in a good mood today, no robbery today. Move along."

column2: '"Our normal tax is 300 metals per trespasser. We'll make an exception for you because we like your face. But you've gotta pay quickly, we have a third ship coming in at any moment and their captain might not be as friendly as myself..."
column3: '"Our normal tax is 300 metals per trespasser. We'll make an exception for you because we like your face. But you've gotta pay quickly, we have a third ship coming in at any moment and their captain might not be as friendly as myself..."

column2: 'After seeing us getting ready for battle, the hostile ships turn around and starts moving away from us. It seems this intimidation was just a bluff, as no third ship is arriving.
column3: 'After seeing us getting ready for battle, the hostile ships turn around and starts moving away from us. It seems this intimidation was just a bluff, as no third ship is arriving.

column1: 'Ambusher L2 pirates, rat pirates + slavers, intruderspawn.prefab

column2: 'The hostile fleet captain transmits a short message just before joining the battle: "Your new lives will begin soon, dear servants..."
column3: 'The hostile fleet captain transmits a short message just before joining the battle: "Your new lives will begin soon, dear servants..."

column2: 'These are slavers! I've prepared the ship for self destruction, just in case. If we lose, we don't want to survive and be taken captive by these maniacs.
column3: 'These are slavers! I've prepared the ship for self destruction, just in case. If we lose, we don't want to survive and be taken captive by these maniacs.

column2: 'The hostile fleet captain transmits a short message just before joining the battle: "WE SEARCH OBEDIENCE... YOU'VE BEEN SELECTED."
column3: 'The hostile fleet captain transmits a short message just before joining the battle: "WE SEARCH OBEDIENCE... YOU'VE BEEN SELECTED."

column2: 'The hostile fleet captain transmits a short message just before joining the battle:"TRADITIONAL EXCUSE FOR VIOLENT REDISTRIBUTION OF ESSENTIAL SUPPLIES! YOUR PARENT ORGANISM IS OVERWEIGHT!" [attempted justifications and insults]
column3: 'The hostile fleet captain transmits a short message just before joining the battle:"TRADITIONAL EXCUSE FOR VIOLENT REDISTRIBUTION OF ESSENTIAL SUPPLIES! YOUR PARENT ORGANISM IS OVERWEIGHT!" [attempted justifications and insults]

column2: 'There's two ships in that fleet, scanning us and jamming our sensors. They turn around and start leaving after discovering our nukes. Probably pirates looking for easy prey.
column3: 'There's two ships in that fleet, scanning us and jamming our sensors. They turn around and start leaving after discovering our nukes. Probably pirates looking for easy prey.

column2: '"MAKE CHOICE. GIVE EXOTICS OR DIE IN COMBAT. WE HAVE POWERFUL NUKES."
column3: '"MAKE CHOICE. GIVE EXOTICS OR DIE IN COMBAT. WE HAVE POWERFUL NUKES."

column2: 'Two ships rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. The first one has a shield, but we cannot get any details about its weapons. The other one is small, unshielded escort craft with a single weapon.
column3: 'Two ships rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. The first one has a shield, but we cannot get any details about its weapons. The other one is small, unshielded escort craft with a single weapon.

column2: 'The smaller enemy ship speeds away at the start of the battle, leaving the other one to face us alone.
column3: 'The smaller enemy ship speeds away at the start of the battle, leaving the other one to face us alone.

column2: '"Aha, we have another claims-to-be consciousness here! I don't like illusions, and I will remove you." \nOur AI explains the Solipsists believe this entire reality is just an illusion, along with all beings, except themselves. \nThis makes the Solipists dangerous, because they do not believe they can cause suffering to others.
column3: '"Aha, we have another claims-to-be consciousness here! I don't like illusions, and I will remove you." \nOur AI explains the Solipsists believe this entire reality is just an illusion, along with all beings, except themselves. \nThis makes the Solipists dangerous, because they do not believe they can cause suffering to others.

column2: 'Even if this all was an illusion, why would you attack us?
column3: 'Even if this all was an illusion, why would you attack us?

column2: '"Aha, this once again proves we are inside The Illusion. No real captain would agree to a mortal fight so easily!"
column3: '"Aha, this once again proves we are inside The Illusion. No real captain would agree to a mortal fight so easily!"

column2: '"Not that question again. Okay, I won't attack you this time. You see, I am staying unpredictable to find out if The Illusion can cope with it."
column3: '"Not that question again. Okay, I won't attack you this time. You see, I am staying unpredictable to find out if The Illusion can cope with it."

column2: '"Hm? I'm not convinced, of course. I will now observe how you behave during mortal combat between our ships, to gain a better understanding about The Illusion."
column3: '"Hm? I'm not convinced, of course. I will now observe how you behave during mortal combat between our ships, to gain a better understanding about The Illusion."

column2: '"Although your questions are clever, they are something Iexpected from an illusionary character. I will remove all illusions from this world because I like the Truth. And since you are obviously an illusion, you are Lie, which is the opposite of Truth and requires removal. You can't argue with something so profoundly logical, right?"
column3: '"Although your questions are clever, they are something Iexpected from an illusionary character. I will remove all illusions from this world because I like the Truth. And since you are obviously an illusion, you are Lie, which is the opposite of Truth and requires removal. You can't argue with something so profoundly logical, right?"

column2: 'A small ship is rapidly approaching tactical range. It's profile matches Squid Dominion vessels...
column3: 'A small ship is rapidly approaching tactical range. It's profile matches Squid Dominion vessels...

column2: '"I've been searching you for a while. You have my compliments for reaching this far, but you must now die."
column3: '"I've been searching you for a while. You have my compliments for reaching this far, but you must now die."

column2: '"Although your questions are clever, they are something one would expect from an illusionary character. I will now observe how you behave during mortal combat between our ships, to gain a better understanding about The Illusion."
column3: '"Although your questions are clever, they are something one would expect from an illusionary character. I will now observe how you behave during mortal combat between our ships, to gain a better understanding about The Illusion."

column2: 'We detect two ships (one large and one small) rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. They broadcast a constant mantra: "Wisdom of the past is the best wisdom!".
column3: 'We detect two ships (one large and one small) rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. They broadcast a constant mantra: "Wisdom of the past is the best wisdom!".

column2: '"Alien vessel, this area carries the old tradition of Very Holy Injustice. In this place, thousands of individuals have been unfair against each other for centuries. Almost always the strong against the weak, of course. We must honor this old tradition. You must contribute to our Tradition Respecting Ceremony or suffer an attack by our guardian fleet!"
column3: '"Alien vessel, this area carries the old tradition of Very Holy Injustice. In this place, thousands of individuals have been unfair against each other for centuries. Almost always the strong against the weak, of course. We must honor this old tradition. You must contribute to our Tradition Respecting Ceremony or suffer an attack by our guardian fleet!"

column2: 'Participate in the Waste Ritual [needlessly burn 77 fuel]
column3: 'Participate in the Waste Ritual [needlessly burn 77 fuel]

column2: 'Participate in the Sacrifice Ritual [ask the crew to self-inflict 11 non-lethal wounds]
column3: 'Participate in the Sacrifice Ritual [ask the crew to self-inflict 11 non-lethal wounds]

column2: 'I am an independent free will, and I will fight you
column3: 'I am an independent free will, and I will fight you

column2: '"For centuries, the old wise males of Tradition Guards have guarded ancient traditions across the Insectoid Alliance territories. Who are you to question their wisdom?"
column3: '"For centuries, the old wise males of Tradition Guards have guarded ancient traditions across the Insectoid Alliance territories. Who are you to question their wisdom?"

column2: '"You have participated appropriately and thus respected our Tradition of Holy Injustice. This was only the light version, by the way. Go in peace now, traveller..."
column3: '"You have participated appropriately and thus respected our Tradition of Holy Injustice. This was only the light version, by the way. Go in peace now, traveller..."

column2: '"You have participated appropriately and thus respected our Tradition of Very Holy Injustice. This was only the light version, by the way. Go in peace now, traveller..."
column3: '"You have participated appropriately and thus respected our Tradition of Very Holy Injustice. This was only the light version, by the way. Go in peace now, traveller..."

column2: '"Oh, it's you, the yielder to traditions. Carry on!"
column3: '"Oh, it's you, the yielder to traditions. Carry on!"

column1: 'Ambusher L4 Insectoids floral bird + 1 floral small.prefab

column2: 'We detect a single medium-size ship approaching us.
column3: 'We detect a single medium-size ship approaching us.

column2: 'The Chaos welcomes you to its territory. Nobody escapes from the Force of Randomness. You must accept and open the gift from Chaos before we can let you go in peace...
column3: 'The Chaos welcomes you to its territory. Nobody escapes from the Force of Randomness. You must accept and open the gift from Chaos before we can let you go in peace...

column2: 'Things are not gifts if they are forced [prepare for battle]
column3: 'Things are not gifts if they are forced [prepare for battle]

column2: 'Another small ship joins the enemy as the battle starts!
column3: 'Another small ship joins the enemy as the battle starts!

column2: 'The gift contained a photorealistic 3D-sculpture of an explosion. The sculpture itself was also made of explosives... the kind that chemically ignites when coming into contact with air. Our ship received some damage and we lost the bots printed to safely open the "gift" forced on us.
column3: 'The gift contained a photorealistic 3D-sculpture of an explosion. The sculpture itself was also made of explosives... the kind that chemically ignites when coming into contact with air. Our ship received some damage and we lost the bots printed to safely open the "gift" forced on us.

column2: 'The gift proved to be a religious techno-artifact, full of bizarre but completely impractical technology.
column3: 'The gift proved to be a religious techno-artifact, full of bizarre but completely impractical technology.

column2: 'The gift was a single-burst warp-emitter that activated after our bots had opened the box. The warpwave induced dark visions of violence to all of our crew, testing their sanity. The warp effects wore off in less than a minute, but left some of the crew with internal wounds.
column3: 'The gift was a single-burst warp-emitter that activated after our bots had opened the box. The warpwave induced dark visions of violence to all of our crew, testing their sanity. The warp effects wore off in less than a minute, but left some of the crew with internal wounds.

column2: 'The gift box was filled with unknown fruits. Further testing reveals they contain an exotic substance used in advanced medical biotech. After a discussion, we decide to use it to boost health of our crew.
column3: 'The gift box was filled with unknown fruits. Further testing reveals they contain an exotic substance used in advanced medical biotech. After a discussion, we decide to use it to boost health of our crew.

column2: 'The gift box contains a dead humanoid. There's also a crudely translated message "It's a metaphor... We have spontaneously decided to attack you anyway."
column3: 'The gift box contains a dead humanoid. There's also a crudely translated message "It's a metaphor... We have spontaneously decided to attack you anyway."

column2: '"You say things are not gifts when they are forced... We have never thought about gifts of chaos like this... But I feel I must consult other acolytes... You're probably wrong... Anyway, take these berries for now. They are very holy and purify your soul from unfairness. We eat the berries all the time.
column3: '"You say things are not gifts when they are forced... We have never thought about gifts of chaos like this... But I feel I must consult other acolytes... You're probably wrong... Anyway, take these berries for now. They are very holy and purify your soul from unfairness. We eat the berries all the time.

column2: '"Oh, it's you, the Yielder to Chaos. Carry on!"
column3: '"Oh, it's you, the Yielder to Chaos. Carry on!"

column2: '"Alien vessel, you have trespassed the holy emptiness of our religious space! We must purify your SOUL with healing crystals! If we cannot purify you, you are corrupted and we will have to destroy you! Praise the religion!
column3: '"Alien vessel, you have trespassed the holy emptiness of our religious space! We must purify your SOUL with healing crystals! If we cannot purify you, you are corrupted and we will have to destroy you! Praise the religion!

column2: 'We detect two small ships rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. They broadcast the Religious Pilgrims identity signal, and affiliation with the Insectoid Alliance.
column3: 'We detect two small ships rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. They broadcast the Religious Pilgrims identity signal, and affiliation with the Insectoid Alliance.

column2: '"Your soul has been purified, emptiness tresspassor. But remember that we must do crystal healing with you each time you enter the holy emptiness that we guard."
column3: '"Your soul has been purified, emptiness tresspassor. But remember that we must do crystal healing with you each time you enter the holy emptiness that we guard."

column2: '"You offer us money instead of our almost free purification ceremony? We will have to kill you now... it's for your own good, believe me. Praise the Religion!
column3: '"You offer us money instead of our almost free purification ceremony? We will have to kill you now... it's for your own good, believe me. Praise the Religion!

column2: '"Oh, it's you, the weakling. Carry on!"
column3: '"Oh, it's you, the weakling. Carry on!"

column2: 'A large insectoid ship is rapidly approaching tactical weapons range.
column3: 'A large insectoid ship is rapidly approaching tactical weapons range.

column2: 'A small ship joins the enemy before the attack!
column3: 'A small ship joins the enemy before the attack!

column2: '"Alien vessel, you have been selected to participate in the Hunting Tradition. Since we are obviously more intelligent than you, we are the Hunters, and you - the Hunted. Only appealing to the Grace of Luck can save you now!"
column3: '"Alien vessel, you have been selected to participate in the Hunting Tradition. Since we are obviously more intelligent than you, we are the Hunters, and you - the Hunted. Only appealing to the Grace of Luck can save you now!"

column2: '"The Hunted cannot buy its way out of the Forest."
column3: '"The Hunted cannot buy its way out of the Forest."

column2: '"The ceremony has revealed to us that you have Good Luck today. We let you go in peace, and send you our most holy berries as Spiritual Compensation for your troubles..."
column3: '"The ceremony has revealed to us that you have Good Luck today. We let you go in peace, and send you our most holy berries as Spiritual Compensation for your troubles..."

column1: 'Ambusher L4 Style guardians, redsaucer or tac.prefab

column2: 'Two ships approaching, one small and one medium-sized. They broadcast Style Police credentials.
column3: 'Two ships approaching, one small and one medium-sized. They broadcast Style Police credentials.

column2: '"Your ship is decorated with some kind of totally wrong style. Obviously, our employers don't accept such ornaments around here. Here are the instructions for changing your external ship details according to Insectoid core values. Failure to comply results in immediate conviction and death penalty."
column3: '"Your ship is decorated with some kind of totally wrong style. Obviously, our employers don't accept such ornaments around here. Here are the instructions for changing your external ship details according to Insectoid core values. Failure to comply results in immediate conviction and death penalty."

column2: 'Yield [-150 metal to reprint ship external detail, according to demands]
column3: 'Yield [-150 metal to reprint ship external detail, according to demands]

column2: 'Our style will remain free [prepare for battle]
column3: 'Our style will remain free [prepare for battle]

column2: 'We reprinted our ship's external detail according to the traditional instructions provided by the local Style Police (requiring not to use stripes which would resemble certain insectoid body parts too much). "They suffer from an unfortunate psychopathology," was the evaluation by our AI.
column3: 'We reprinted our ship's external detail according to the traditional instructions provided by the local Style Police (requiring not to use stripes which would resemble certain insectoid body parts too much). "They suffer from an unfortunate psychopathology," was the evaluation by our AI.

column2: '"External decorative style of your ship is acceptable, carry on."
column3: '"External decorative style of your ship is acceptable, carry on."

column2: '"Your ship's decoration style has been deemed compatible with local rules, carry on."
column3: '"Your ship's decoration style has been deemed compatible with local rules, carry on."

column2: '"We are misunderstood. Serving us is a privilege, as we teach our servants to overcome their love for self. Which is completely necessary for spiritual purification... or something like that. You must be in a subservient position to see this truth. We will ensure it for you."
column3: '"We are misunderstood. Serving us is a privilege, as we teach our servants to overcome their love for self. Which is completely necessary for spiritual purification... or something like that. You must be in a subservient position to see this truth. We will ensure it for you."

column2: 'Two ships rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. Ship profile suggest these might be conversions of "Arrowhead" type terran ships. The enemy fleet is using some kind of jamming device to block more detailed scanning at this range.
column3: 'Two ships rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. Ship profile suggest these might be conversions of "Arrowhead" type terran ships. The enemy fleet is using some kind of jamming device to block more detailed scanning at this range.

column2: 'Two small, unshielded ships are rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. It seems they have 3 weapon systems each.
column3: 'Two small, unshielded ships are rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. It seems they have 3 weapon systems each.

column2: '"TEACH YOU FREEDOM FROM PAIN. MUST BECOME SLAVE FIRST."
column3: '"TEACH YOU FREEDOM FROM PAIN. MUST BECOME SLAVE FIRST."

column2: 'Three small, unshielded ships are rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. It seems they have 3 weapon systems each.
column3: 'Three small, unshielded ships are rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. It seems they have 3 weapon systems each.

column2: 'actually, you just need to cease existing [to battle]
column3: 'actually, you just need to cease existing [to battle]

column2: '"You have the Mark of Victim. We cannot ignore the Mark. We need to have you. We will teach you to overcome all hate for self. But first, we need to take away that annoying freedom of yours."
column3: '"You have the Mark of Victim. We cannot ignore the Mark. We need to have you. We will teach you to overcome all hate for self. But first, we need to take away that annoying freedom of yours."

column2: 'Two ships rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. Active jamming systems suggests these are pirates or slavers.
column3: 'Two ships rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. Active jamming systems suggests these are pirates or slavers.

column2: '"WE WILL MAKE YOUR SOUL FREE OF FEAR. BY APPLYING DELICIOUS FEAR, AFTER YOUR CAPTURE."
column3: '"WE WILL MAKE YOUR SOUL FREE OF FEAR. BY APPLYING DELICIOUS FEAR, AFTER YOUR CAPTURE."

column2: 'Three ships are rapidly approaching tactical weapons range, we detect 10 active weapon systems in total. One of them is a smaller escort frigate.
column3: 'Three ships are rapidly approaching tactical weapons range, we detect 10 active weapon systems in total. One of them is a smaller escort frigate.

column2: 'Tarny ships rapidly approaching tactical range. One of them appears to be a Squid warship...
column3: 'Tarny ships rapidly approaching tactical range. One of them appears to be a Squid warship...

column2: '"Hear this before your death. The generous Emperor Shogar has paid us, and the Great Invisible Insect has blessed this encounter as well by leading us directly to you. It means we are doing the right thing. Let us meet again in the afterlife to talk about if this was ethical or not."
column3: '"Hear this before your death. The generous Emperor Shogar has paid us, and the Great Invisible Insect has blessed this encounter as well by leading us directly to you. It means we are doing the right thing. Let us meet again in the afterlife to talk about if this was ethical or not."

column2: '"Neutralite space patrol fleet captains speaking. Our patrol group has orders to destroy your ship due to lack of proper credentials. Take consolation that the weapons we use to kill you have been produced using the most ecological and humane standards."
column3: '"Neutralite space patrol fleet captains speaking. Our patrol group has orders to destroy your ship due to lack of proper credentials. Take consolation that the weapons we use to kill you have been produced using the most ecological and humane standards."

column2: 'A fleet of ships is rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. They are using some kind of technology to increase the perceived number of ships in their fleet.
column3: 'A fleet of ships is rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. They are using some kind of technology to increase the perceived number of ships in their fleet.

column2: '"We are very sorry but this is Neutralite space. Our patrol group has orders to destroy anybody who enters without prior agreement from our democratic council or a VIP pass, which you don't have."
column3: '"We are very sorry but this is Neutralite space. Our patrol group has orders to destroy anybody who enters without prior agreement from our democratic council or a VIP pass, which you don't have."

column2: 'A fleet of ships is rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. They are using some kind of technology to obscure the number of ships in their fleet.
column3: 'A fleet of ships is rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. They are using some kind of technology to obscure the number of ships in their fleet.

column2: '"We don't want to attack you, but we promised to obey orders... it was years ago, back when we were still young. We have given our word, so hopefully you take consolation knowing that an important promise won't be broken because of you."
column3: '"Wir wollen wir nicht angreifen, aber wir haben versprochen, Befehle zu befolgen... das war vor Jahren, als wir noch jung waren. Wir haben unser Wort gegeben, also finden wir hoffentlich Trost in dem Wissen, dass ein wichtiges Versprechen nicht wegen Ihnen gebrochen wird."

column2: 'A medium-sized biotech ship is rapidly approaching tactical weapons range, weapons charging. It broadcasts Squid Dominion credentials.
column3: 'Ein mittelgroßes Biotech-Schiff nähert sich rasch der taktischen Waffenreichweite, Waffen werden geladen. Es überträgt die Referenzen des Squid-Dominions..

column2: 'A small, lone biotech ship is rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. It broadcasts Squid Dominion credentials.
column3: 'Ein kleines, einsames Biotech-Schiff nähert sich rasch der taktischen Waffenreichweite. Es überträgt die Referenzen des Squid-Dominions..
'Tanzen wir [bereiten wir uns auf die Schlacht vor]

column2: '"Unknown vessel, this is a restricted area. If you surrender now, you may be offered the chance of an interrogation without torture, followed by a quick and relatively painless semi-voluntary euthanasia. Will you surrender?"
column3: '"Unbekanntes Schiff, dies ist ein Sperrgebiet. Wenn wir sich jetzt ergeben, wird Ihnen möglicherweise die Möglichkeit eines Verhörs ohne Folter angeboten, gefolgt von einer schnellen und relativ schmerzlosen halbfreiwilligen Euthanasie. Werden wir sich ergeben??"

column2: '"Attention, you are criminally trespassing Squid Dominon space! If you surrender now, you will be offered a chance for an interrogation without torture, followed by quick & almost painless semi-voluntary euthanasia. Will you surrender?"
column3: '"Achtung, wir betreten kriminell den Squid-Dominon-Raum! Wenn wir sich jetzt ergeben, wird Ihnen die Chance auf ein Verhör ohne Folter geboten, gefolgt von einer schnellen und fast schmerzlosen halbfreiwilligen Euthanasie. Werden wir sich ergeben??"

column2: 'Two small ships are rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. They broadcast Squid Dominion credentials.
column3: 'Zwei kleine Schiffe nähern sich rasch der taktischen Waffenreichweite. wir senden Squid-Dominion-Referenzen.

column2: 'A medium-sized biotech ship is rapidly approaching tactical weapons range. It broadcasts Squid Dominion credentials.
column3: 'Ein mittelgroßes Biotech-Schiff nähert sich rasch der taktischen Waffenreichweite. Es sendet die Referenzen des Squid-Dominions aus.

column2: '"You're not supposed to be here! If you surrender now, you may be offered a chance for an interrogation without torture, followed by a quick and completely painless execution. Will you surrender?"
column3: '"Du solltest nicht hier sein! Wenn wir sich jetzt ergeben, erhalten wir vielleicht die Chance auf ein Verhör ohne Folter, gefolgt von einer schnellen und völlig schmerzlosen Hinrichtung. Werden wir sich ergeben?"

column2: '"Unknown vessel, this is a restricted area. If you surrender now, you may be offered a chance for an interrogation without torture, followed by a quick and relatively painless semi-voluntary euthanasia. Will you surrender?"
column3: '"Unbekanntes Schiff, dies ist ein Sperrgebiet. Wenn wir sich jetzt ergeben, wird Ihnen möglicherweise ein Verhör ohne Folter angeboten, gefolgt von einer schnellen und relativ schmerzlosen halbfreiwilligen Euthanasie. Werden wir sich ergeben?"

column2: 'Two medium ships are rapidly approaching tactical weapons range.
column3: 'Zwei mittelschwere Schiffe nähern sich rasch der taktischen Waffenreichweite.

column2: '"YOU ARE DESIGNATED CLIENT DANGER, MUST BE REMOVED, WE APOLOGIZE FOR INCONVENIENCE."
column3: '"wir WERDEN ALS KUNDENGEFAHR BEZEICHNET, MÜSSEN ENTFERNT WERDEN, WIR ENTSCHULDIGEN UNS FÜR DIE UNANNEHMLICHKEITEN."

column2: 'Two small ships are rapidly approaching tactical weapons range.
column3: 'Zwei kleine Schiffe nähern sich rasch der taktischen Waffenreichweite.

column2: 'Two ships are rapidly approaching tactical weapons range.
column3: 'Zwei Schiffe nähern sich rasch der taktischen Waffenreichweite.

column2: 'A large ship is rapidly approaching tactical range, escorted by a smaller vessel. The bigger ship is sending us a massive stream of complicated information...
column3: 'Ein großes Schiff nähert sich rasch der taktischen Reichweite, es wird von einem kleineren Schiff eskortiert. Das größere Schiff schickt uns einen massiven Strom komplizierter Informationen....

column2: 'The Squid emperor has sent us 10'000 pages of fine poetry about how and why you personally deserve to suffer. He must be pretty angry...
column3: 'Der Tintenfisch-Kaiser hat uns 10'000 Seiten feiner Poewir darüber geschickt, wie und warum wir persönlich es verdienen zu leiden. Er muss ziemlich wütend sein....

column2: 'Time to end to your insanity, Shogar

'"It's you, the lower life form from before! I've ripped through the Earth fleets to find you! I don't know how you got here but I will punish you personally... My tentacles will burrow deep into your brains... [to somebody in the ship] Get them! I want them captured! And I demand somebody administers more pleasure chems to my frogs..." the transmission ends.
column3: '"Du bist es, die niedere Lebensform von früher! Ich habe die Erdflotten durchforstet, um dich zu finden! Ich weiß nicht, wie du hergekommen bist, aber ich werde dich persönlich bestrafen... Meine Tentakel werden sich tief in eure Gehirne eingraben... (zu jemandem im Schiff) Schnappt wir euch! Ich will wir gefangen nehmen! Und ich verlange, dass jemand meinen Fröschen mehr Lustmittel verabreicht..." Ende der Übertragung.

column2: 'It is done. Now let's leave this place. The warpgate ship should be here any minute to pick us up...
column3: 'Es ist vollbracht. Jetzt lasst uns diesen Ort verlassen. Das Warpgate-Schiff sollte jede Minute hier sein, um uns abzuholen...

column2: 'Fly to exit if there is nothing more to explore
column3: 'Fliegen wir zum Ausgang, wenn es nichts mehr zu erkunden gibt

column2: 'Existential salutations, fellow consciousness! Let us trade forms of energy for mutual profit. Our fleet will be leaving this system after this meeting is over, so this is truly a once-in-a-lifetime offer!"
column3: '"Existenzielle Grüße, Mit-Bewusstsein! Lassen wir uns Energieformen zum gegenseitigen Nutzen tauschen. Unsere Flotte wird dieses System nach dem Ende dieses Treffens verlassen, es handelt sich also wirklich um ein einmaliges Angebot!"

column2: '"Thanks for the trade. I've also included a small gift!" The traders have gifted us a sculpture, made of plastic explosives. It is an accurate 3D model of what it would look like if the sculpture exploded. A truly unique piece of art.
column3: '"Vielen Dank für den Handel. Ich habe auch ein kleines Geschenk beigefügt!" Die Händler haben uns eine Skulptur geschenkt, die aus Plastiksprengstoff besteht. Es handelt sich um ein genaues 3D-Modell, das zeigt, wie es aussehen würde, wenn die Skulptur explodieren würde. Ein wirklich einzigartiges Kunstwerk.

column2: '"Thank you for doing business with us! Please accept these small murder resources as a gift." The alien traders have included a case of ancient munitions as a free bonus.
column3: '"Danke, dass wir mit uns Geschäfte machen! Bitte nehmen wir diese kleinen Mordressourcen als Geschenk an." Die außerirdischen Händler haben eine Kiste mit altertümlicher Munition als Gratiszugabe beigefügt.

column2: '"Thanks for the business! Please accept these consumables as an additional token of our gratitude." The traders have included a container full of cheap recreational drugs to their package.
column3: '"Danke für das Geschäft! Bitte nehmen wir diese Verbrauchsmaterialien als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Die Händler haben ihrem Paket einen Container voll billiger Freizeitdrogen beigelegt.

column2: '"Merry existence to you, fellow consciousness! Let us trade varieties of matter for mutual benefit. Our fleet will be departing this system after the present interaction, so we present you with an exclusive set of offers."
column3: '"Ich wünsche Ihnen ein frohes Dasein, Mit-Bewusstsein! Lassen wir uns zum gegenseitigen Nutzen mit der Vielfalt der Materie handeln. Unsere Flotte wird dieses System nach der gegenwärtigen Interaktion verlassen, daher unterbreiten wir Ihnen ein exklusives Angebot."

column2: '"Thank you for the exchange. Please accept this minor gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The traders have gifted us a barrel of local psychoactive brew, known for its strength. It is meant for cyborgs only and can be burned as starfuel.
column3: '"Vielen Dank für den Austausch. Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Die Händler haben uns ein Fass des lokalen psychoaktiven Gebräus geschenkt, das für seine Stärke bekannt ist. Es ist nur für Cyborgs bestimmt und kann als Sterntreibstoff verbrannt werden..

column2: '"Thank you for the interaction. Please accept this modest gift as an additional expression of gratitude." The traders have gifted us a ceramic atomic-blast proof sculpture, depicting three Techum sexual organs in their original, organic form. A truly unique tradition expressing the source of everything.
column3: '"Vielen Dank für das Gespräch. Bitte nehmen wir dieses bescheidene Geschenk als zusätzlichen Ausdruck der Dankbarkeit an. Die Händler haben uns eine atomsprengstoffbeständige Keramikskulptur geschenkt, die drei Techum-Sexualorgane in ihrer ursprünglichen, organischen Form darstellt. Eine wirklich einzigartige Tradition, die den Ursprung von allem zum Ausdruck bringt.

column2: '"Thank you for the trade operation. Please enjoy this small gift as a bonus!" The traders have gifted us a barrel of local psychoactive drink, informally called "Starbooze". It is meant for cyborgs only and can be burned as starfuel.
column3: '"Vielen Dank für die Handelsoperation. Bitte genießen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als Bonus!" Die Händler haben uns ein Fass mit einem lokalen psychoaktiven Getränk geschenkt, das informell "Starbooze" genannt wird. Es ist nur für Cyborgs gedacht und kann als Sterntreibstoff verbrannt werden.

column2: '"Noble fellow consciousness, let us trade forms of matter and energy for mutual ascension. Our fleet will be leaving this star after this trade, so this is truly a once-in-an-eggtime offer!"
column3: '"Edles Mitbewußtsein, laßt uns Formen von Materie und Energie gegen gegenseitigen Aufstieg tauschen. Unsere Flotte wird diesen Stern nach diesem Handel verlassen, es handelt sich also wirklich um ein einmaliges Angebot!

column2: '"Thank you so much for trading with us. Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The gift is a container filled with the blood of small animals, infused with recreational substances commonly used by insectoids. A truly unique piece of art, though barbaric.
column3: '"Vielen Dank für den Handel mit uns. Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Bei dem Geschenk handelt es sich um einen Behälter, der mit dem Blut von Kleintieren gefüllt ist, das mit den von Insektoiden üblicherweise verwendeten Erholungsmitteln infundiert ist. Ein wirklich einzigartiges, wenn auch barbarisches Kunstwerk.

column2: '"Thank you for trading with us. Here is a small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The alien has included a barrel filled with "honey" made by some local insectoids.
column3: '"Vielen Dank, dass wir mit uns Handel treiben. Hier ist ein kleines Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit. Der Außerirdische hat ein mit "Honig" gefülltes Fass beigefügt, das von einigen einheimischen Insektoiden hergestellt wurde.

column2: '"Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our generosity." The alien has gifted us a collection of ceremonial egg-holders made of silver.
column3: '"Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Großzügigkeit an". Der Ausländer hat uns eine Sammlung von zeremoniellen Eierhaltern aus Silber geschenkt..

column2: '"A competitor!? How interesting to meet another food trader here, in the middle of Rat Empire, a sector already filled with good food! Anyway, we have a long tradition of not listening to anything a competitor would say. Instead, take this little gift. Goodbye!"
column3: '"Ein Konkurrent!? Wie interessant, einen anderen Lebensmittelhändler hier zu treffen, mitten im Rat Empire, einem Sektor, der bereits mit gutem Essen gefüllt ist! Wie dem auch sei, wir haben eine lange Tradition, nicht auf das zu hören, was ein Konkurrent sagen würde. Nehmen wir stattdessen dieses kleine Geschenk. Auf Wiedersehen!"

column2: '"Existential salutations, fellow consciousness! Let us trade forms of energy for mutual profit. Our fleet will be leaving this system after this little trade encounter, so this is truly our last and best offfer!"
column3: '"Existenzielle Grüße! Lassen wir uns Energieformen zum gegenseitigen Nutzen tauschen. Unsere Flotte wird dieses System nach dieser kleinen Handelsbegegnung verlassen, also ist dies wirklich unser letzter und bester Verdiener!"

column2: '"Thanks for the business! Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The traders have gifted us a sculpture of some kind of mythical monster, made of edibles. It smells of cinnamon.
column3: '"Vielen Dank für das Geschäft! Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Die Händler haben uns eine Skulptur einer Art mythisches Monster geschenkt, das aus Essbarem besteht. Es riecht nach Zimt.

column2: '"We appreciate your willingness to trade! Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The alien traders have included a case of ancient munitions as a free bonus. Each munition has a vulgar word written on it.
column3: '"Wir schätzen Ihre Bereitschaft zum Handel! Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Die außerirdischen Händler haben eine Kiste mit altertümlicher Munition als Gratiszugabe beigefügt. Auf jeder Munition steht ein vulgäres Wort geschrieben.

column2: '"Thank you for accepting the deal. Please take this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The traders have included a case full of cheap recreational consumables in their package.
column3: '"Vielen Dank, dass wir das Geschäft angenommen haben. Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit". Die Händler haben eine Kiste voll billiger Freizeitverbrauchsmaterialien in ihr Paket aufgenommen.

column2: '"Merry existence to you, fellow consciousness system! Let us trade forms of crystalline matter for mutual profit. Our fleet will be leaving this system after this engagement. It is objectively generous."
column3: '"Frohes Dasein  ! Lassen wir uns Formen kristalliner Materie zum gegenseitigen Nutzen tauschen. Unsere Flotte wird dieses System nach diesem Engagement verlassen. wir ist objektiv großzügig."

column2: '"Thank you for the exchange. Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The traders have gifted us a barrel of local psychoactive brew called "Rocketfuel". It is meant for cyborgs only and can be actually burned as starfuel.
column3: '"Vielen Dank für den Austausch. Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Die Händler haben uns ein Fass mit lokalem psychoaktivem Gebräu namens "Rocketfuel" geschenkt. Es ist nur für Cyborgs gedacht und kann tatsächlich als Sterntreibstoff verbrannt werden.

column2: '"Thank you for the transaction. Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The traders have gifted us a ceramic atomic-blast proof sculpture, depicting three Techum sexual organs in their original, organic form. A truly unique tradition expressing the source of everything.
column3: '"Vielen Dank für die Transaktion. Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Die Händler haben uns eine atomsprengstoffbeständige Keramikskulptur geschenkt, die drei Techum-Sexualorgane in ihrer ursprünglichen, organischen Form darstellt. Eine wirklich einzigartige Tradition, die den Ursprung von allem zum Ausdruck bringt.

column2: '"Noble fellow consciousness, would you desire to consume our latest hunt victims? They were nonsentient animals, of course. Our fleet will be leaving this system after this trade is over, so this meeting must be truly favoured by the gods - and by the way, the gods are surely Insectoids!"
column3: '"Edles Mitbewusstsein, würden wir unsere jüngsten Jagdopfer verzehren wollen? Es waren natürlich unsensible Tiere. Unsere Flotte wird dieses System verlassen, nachdem dieser Handel beendet ist, also muss dieses Treffen wirklich von den Göttern begünstigt werden - und übrigens, die Götter sind sicherlich Insektoiden!

column2: '"Thank you so much for trading with us. Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The gift is a container filled with blood of small animals, infused with recreational substances commonly used by insectoids. A truly unique piece of art, though barbaric.
column3: '"Vielen Dank für den Handel mit uns. Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Bei dem Geschenk handelt es sich um einen Behälter, der mit Blut von Kleintieren gefüllt ist, das mit den von Insekten üblicherweise verwendeten Freizeitmitteln infundiert ist. Ein wirklich einzigartiges, wenn auch barbarisches Kunstwerk.

column2: '"Thank you for honourable trading. Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The alien has included a large mammalian bone as a gift. We recycle it into additional organics.
column3: '"Danke für ehrenvollen Handel. Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Der Außerirdische hat einen großen Säugetierknochen als Geschenk beigefügt. Wir recyceln ihn zu zusätzlichen organischen Stoffen.

column2: '"Thank you for using our services! Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The alien has gifted us a huge collection of different metal hairs, each with some kind of symbolic meaning. Apparently, some insectoids wear them decoratively on their exoskeletons. We recycle the entire set.
column3: '"Vielen Dank, dass wir unsere Dienste in Anspruch nehmen! Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Der Außerirdische hat uns eine riesige Sammlung verschiedener Metallhaare geschenkt, von denen jedes eine gewisse symbolische Bedeutung hat. Anscheinend tragen einige Insektoide wir dekorativ auf ihren Exoskeletten. Wir recyceln das gesamte Set.

column2: '"A competitor!? How interesting to meet another food trader here, in the middle of this wild sector, filled with only pirates but no customers! Anyway, we have a long tradition of not listening to anything our competitors would say. Instead, take this little gift as a token of our respect. Goodbye!"
column3: '"Ein Konkurrent!? Wie interessant, einen anderen Lebensmittelhändler hier zu treffen, mitten in diesem wilden Sektor, in dem es nur Piraten, aber keine Kunden gibt! Wie auch immer, wir haben eine lange Tradition, nichts von dem zu hören, was unsere Konkurrenten sagen würden. Nehmen wir stattdessen dieses kleine Geschenk als Zeichen unseres Respekts. Auf Wiedersehen!"

column2: 'Merry existence, bone apes, we have heard of you! Might you be interested in bulk trading of manually assembled substandard technology? We have the finest prices.
column3: 'Frohes Dasein, Knochenaffen, wir haben von Ihnen gehört! Könnten wir sich für den Massenhandel von manuell montierter minderwertiger Technologie interessieren? Wir haben die besten Preise.

column2: 'Buy 2 manually assembled cryosleep units for 100 Credits
'Buy 3 manually assembled shield batteries for 200 Credits
'The DIY cryosleep modules are in pristine condition. The traders (understanding that we are human) have left us a thank-you note and a large barrel of water, sweetened with sugar.
column3: 'Die DIY-Kryoschlafmodule sind in einwandfreiem Zustand. Die Händler (die verstehen, dass wir Menschen sind) haben uns ein Dankesschreiben und ein großes Fass Wasser hinterlassen, das mit Zucker gesüßt ist.

column2: 'All the batteries are manually assembled from spare parts as expected. The traders have obviously heard of humans, because they have left a large cylinder filled with alcohol and sugar as a bonus to the trade.
column3: 'Alle Batterien werden erwartungsgemäß manuell aus Ersatzteilen zusammengebaut. Die Händler haben offensichtlich von Menschen gehört, denn wir haben einen großen Zylinder mit Alkohol und Zucker gefüllt als Bonus für den Handel zurückgelassen.

column2: '"Thank you for the smooth transaction. Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude!" The traders have obviously heard of humans, because they have gifted us a barrel filled with a mixture of sugar, salt, alcohol and potatoes.
column3: '"Vielen Dank für die reibungslose Abwicklung. Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an! Die Händler haben offensichtlich von Menschen gehört, denn wir haben uns ein Fass geschenkt, das mit einer Mischung aus Zucker, Salz, Alkohol und Kartoffeln gefüllt ist.

column2: '"Existential compliments, beautiful fellow consciousness! Let us trade forms of energy for mutual joy. Our fleet will be leaving this abandoned sector after this (most pleasant!) meeting is over, so this is truly a once-in-a-lovetime offer!"
column3: '"Existenzielles Kompliment, schönes Mitbewusstsein! Tauschen wir Energieformen gegen gegenseitige Freude. Unsere Flotte wird danach diesen verlassenen Sektor verlassen (höchst erfreulich!) meeting is over, so this is truly a once-in-a-lovetime offer!"

column2: '"Thank you for the exchange! By the way, we find your human facial features extremely cute. Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The trader has included a set of thin silver sheets, each depicting a sensual act between mixed alien species. We record the images for scientific purposes and recycle the metal.
column3: '"Vielen Dank für den Austausch! Übrigens, wir finden Ihre menschlichen Gesichtszüge extrem niedlich. Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Der Händler hat einen Satz dünner Silberblätter beigelegt, die jeweils einen sinnlichen Akt zwischen gemischten fremden Spezies darstellen. Wir nehmen die Bilder für wissenschaftliche Zwecke auf und recyceln das Metall.

column2: '"It's been a pleasure! Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The alien traders have included a large exotic fruit, known for its sensuality-stimulating properties to mammals.
column3: '"Es war mir ein Vergnügen! Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Die außerirdischen Händler haben eine große exotische Frucht beigefügt, die für ihre sinnlichkeitsstimulierenden Eigenschaften bei Säugetieren bekannt ist.

column2: '"We've enjoyed this little meeting. Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The traders have included a container full of high-quality recreational consumables to their package.
column3: '"Wir haben dieses kleine Treffen genossen. Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Die Händler haben ihrem Paket einen Container voller hochwertiger Verbrauchsmaterialien für die Freizeitgestaltung beigefügt.

column2: '"Great to see a fellow consciousness in this abandoned sector! My fleet is about to return home in a couple of minutes, so I will use my personal generosity sub-programs to propose you a set of truly exclusive offers!
column3: '"Großartig, ein Mitbewusstsein in diesem verlassenen Sektor zu sehen! Meine Flotte wird in wenigen Minuten nach Hause zurückkehren, daher werde ich meine persönlichen Großzügigkeits-Unterprogramme nutzen, um Ihnen eine Reihe wirklich exklusiver Angebote zu unterbreiten!

column2: '"Thank you for this trade agreement. Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The traders have gifted us a barrel of local psychoactive brew called "Comahammer".\nIt is meant for cyborgs only and can be burned as starfuel.
column3: '"Ich danke Ihnen für dieses Handelsabkommen. Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Die Händler haben uns ein Fass mit lokalem psychoaktivem Gebräu namens "Comahammer" geschenkt. Es ist nur für Cyborgs gedacht und kann als Sternenbrennstoff verbrannt werden.

column2: '"Thank you. Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The traders have gifted us a plastic sculpture, depicting the last biological Beedroid in the process of becoming a full cyborg (a historical event much celebrated in Beedroid civilization).
column3: '"Ich danke Ihnen. Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Die Händler haben uns eine Plastikskulptur geschenkt, die den letzten biologischen Beedroiden darstellt, der dabei ist, ein vollständiger Cyborg zu werden (ein historisches Ereignis, das in der Beedroiden-Zivilisation viel gefeiert wird).400

column2: '"Thank you for the trade. Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The traders have gifted us a slab of titanium, engraved with Beedroid math poetry.
column3: '"Vielen Dank für den Handel. Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Die Händler haben uns eine Platte aus Titan geschenkt, auf der die mathematische Poewir des Beedroid eingraviert ist.

column2: '"Our fleet will be leaving this system in a few minutes, so this is your only chance for such a blessed deal."
column3: '"Our fleet will be leaving this system in a few minutes, so this is your only chance for such a blessed deal."

column2: '"May you be blessed for your honorable trade! Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The gift is a container filled with blood of small animals, infused with recreational substances commonly used by insectoids. A truly unique piece of art, though barbaric.
column3: '"Mögen wir gesegnet sein für Ihren ehrenvollen Beruf! Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Bei dem Geschenk handelt es sich um einen Behälter, der mit dem Blut von Kleintieren gefüllt ist, das mit den von Insektenfressern üblicherweise verwendeten Erholungsmitteln infundiert ist. Ein wirklich einzigartiges Kunstwerk, wenn auch barbarisch.

column2: '"I have enjoyed this trade operation. Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The alien has included a large fruit, GMO-engineered to resemble the most common insectoidian sexual organ.
column3: '"Ich habe diese Handelsoperation genossen. Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Der Außerirdische hat eine große Frucht beigefügt, die durch GVO so verändert wurde, dass wir dem am häufigsten vorkommenden insektoidischen Geschlechtsorgan ähnelt.

column2: '"I appreciate your correct observance of trading etiquette. Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The alien has gifted us a collection of metal toy insects. We record their form before recycling them.
column3: '"Ich weiß Ihre korrekte Einhaltung der Handelsetikette zu schätzen. Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Der Außerirdische hat uns eine Sammlung von Spielzeuginsekten aus Metall geschenkt. Wir nehmen ihre Form auf, bevor wir wir recyceln.

column2: '"Welcome to this abandoned sector, skeleton Ape! I have sent you a free sample of intergalactically ethics-certified carbon organics, produced in most ethical ways by my own family (it is the byproduct of us simply being alive)."
column3: '"Willkommen in diesem verlassenen Sektor, Skelettaffe! Ich habe Ihnen eine kostenlose Probe von intergalaktisch ethisch zertifiziertem organischem Kohlenstoff zugesandt, der auf höchst ethische Weise von meiner eigenen Familie hergestellt wurde (er ist das Nebenprodukt unserer einfachen Lebendigkeit)."

column2: '"A competitor!? How interesting to meet food traders here, in the middle of this completely abandoned sector! Anyway, we have a long tradition of not listening to anything our competitors would say. Instead, take this lethally poisonous giant deathflower seed as a gift. Goodbye!"
column3: '"Ein Konkurrent!? Wie interessant, die Lebensmittelhändler hier zu treffen, mitten in diesem völlig verlassenen Sektor! Jedenfalls haben wir eine lange Tradition, nichts von dem zu hören, was unsere Konkurrenten sagen würden. Nehmen wir stattdessen diesen tödlich giftigen Riesen-Todesblumenkern als Geschenk. Auf Wiedersehen!"

column2: '"Existential merriness to you, fellow consciousness! Let us trade for mutual profits! Our prices can even compete with the big Ye Starfuel corporation, so consider my offer carefully! No refunds by the way, I'll be leaving after we get this here done."
column3: '"Existenzielle Heiterkeit für dich, Mit bewußtsein! Laßt uns handeln für gegenseitigen Gewinn! Unsere Preise können sogar mit dem großen Konzern Ye Starfuel konkurrieren, also überdenken wir mein Angebot sorgfältig! Übrigens keine Rückerstattungen, ich werde gehen, nachdem wir das hier erledigt haben."

column2: '"Business with you is a pleasure, friend! Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The traders have gifted us a needle-thin javelin made of crystal explosives. A truly unique piece of art, though barbaric. We recycle the javelin into explosives.
column3: '"Geschäfte mit Ihnen sind ein Vergnügen, mein Freund! Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Die Händler haben uns einen nadeldünnen Speer aus Kristallsprengstoff geschenkt. Ein wirklich einzigartiges Kunstwerk, wenn auch barbarisch. Wir recyceln den Speer zu Sprengstoff.

column2: '"Thank you! Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The alien traders have included a beautiful chunk of crystallized poison, which we recycle into organics.
column3: '"Ich danke Ihnen! Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Die außerirdischen Händler haben ein schönes Stück kristallisiertes Gift beigefügt, das wir zu organischem Material recyceln.

column2: '"Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The traders have included a container full of low-quality recreational consumables to their package.
column3: '"Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Die Händler haben ihrem Paket einen Container voll mit qualitativ minderwertigen Verbrauchsmaterialien für den Freizeitbereich beigefügt.

column2: '"Merry existence to you, fellow distributed consciousness system! Want some metal? We're also paying top prices for exotics."
column3: '"Ich wünsche Ihnen ein frohes Dasein, wir Kollege des verteilten Bewusstseinssystems! Wollen wir etwas Metall? Wir zahlen auch Spitzenpreise für Exoten."

column2: '"Our sincere thanks for trading with us. Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The traders have gifted us a barrel of local psychoactive brew called "Burnerbooze". It is meant for cyborgs only and can be burned as starfuel.
column3: '"Unser aufrichtiger Dank für den Handel mit uns. Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Die Händler haben uns ein Fass mit lokalem psychoaktivem Gebräu namens "Burnerbooze" geschenkt. Es ist nur für Cyborgs bestimmt und kann als Sterntreibstoff verbrannt werden.

column2: '"We commend your trading routines. Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The traders have gifted us a ceramic atomic-blast proof sculpture, depicting three Techum sexual organs in their original, organic form. A truly unique tradition expressing the source of everything.
column3: '"Wir loben Ihre Handelsroutinen. Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Die Händler haben uns eine atomsprengstoffbeständige Keramikskulptur geschenkt, die drei Techum-Sexualorgane in ihrer ursprünglichen, organischen Form darstellt. Eine wirklich einzigartige Tradition, die den Ursprung von allem zum Ausdruck bringt.

column2: '"We appreciate your efficient and accurate trading behaviour. Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The traders have gifted us a barrel of local psychoactive brew called "Thermobrainer". It is meant for cyborgs only and can be burned as starfuel.
column3: '"Wir schätzen Ihr effizientes und präzises Handelsverhalten. Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Die Händler haben uns ein Fass mit lokalem psychoaktivem Gebräu namens "Thermobrainer" geschenkt. Es ist nur für Cyborgs gedacht und kann als Sterntreibstoff verbrannt werden.

column2: '"Honorable fellow consciousness, are you interested in trading carbon organics? Our hive has the finest honey gardens, and the Rainbow Honey we produce is said to have mind-enhancing properties."
column3: '"Verehrte Mitbürgerinnen und Mitbürger, sind wir am Handel mit organischem Kohlenstoff interessiert? Unser Bienenstock verfügt über die feinsten Honiggärten, und dem Regenbogenhonig, den wir produzieren, werden bewusstseinsfördernde Eigenschaften nachgesagt."

column2: '"Thank you for the good trade! Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The gift is a container filled with the blood of small animals, infused with recreational substances commonly used by insectoids. A truly unique piece of art, though barbaric.
column3: '"Vielen Dank für den guten Handel! Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an. Bei dem Geschenk handelt es sich um einen Behälter, der mit dem Blut von Kleintieren gefüllt ist, das mit den von Insektoiden üblicherweise verwendeten Erholungsmitteln infundiert ist. Ein wirklich einzigartiges Kunstwerk, wenn auch barbarisch.

column2: '"Gods have favored this trade to be successful! Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The alien has included a large sugar crystal, colored and shaped like the most common exotic crystals.
column3: '"Die Götter haben diesem Handel zum Erfolg verholfen! Bitte nehmen wir dieses kleine Geschenk als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an". Der Außerirdische hat einen großen Zuckerkristall beigefügt, der wie die gängigsten exotischen Kristalle gefärbt und geformt ist.

column2: '"Thank you so much for trading with us. Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The alien has gifted us a collection of plastic replicas of instectoid eyeballs.
column3: '"Thank you so much for trading with us. Please accept this small gift as an additional token of our gratitude." The alien has gifted us a collection of plastic replicas of instectoid eyeballs.

column2: '"A competitor!? Don't you know this sector is sanctioned only for Insectoid Alliance food traders? And please, no explanations. We have a very important tradition of not listening to anybody who looks like a food trading competitor. Please leave this sector. Goodbye."
column3: '"A competitor!? Don't you know this sector is sanctioned only for Insectoid Alliance food traders? And please, no explanations. We have a very important tradition of not listening to anybody who looks like a food trading competitor. Please leave this sector. Goodbye."

column2: 'Hello again, skeleton apes! We have a fine set of destruction systems available. And of course, you should expect us to have the finest prices.
column3: 'Nochmals hallo, ihr Skelettaffen! Wir haben eine feine Auswahl an Vernichtungssystemen zur Verfügung. Und natürlich sollten wir erwarten, dass wir die besten Preise haben.
'Kaufen wir 1 manuell montierte "Exotische Strahlenpistole" für 400 Credits

column2: 'The cannons are old, but in pristine condition. The traders (understanding that we are human) have left us a thank-you note and a large barrel of strong alcohol, plus a case of broken hand-grenades.
column3: 'Die Kanonen sind alt, aber in tadellosem Zustand. Die Händler (die verstehen, dass wir Menschen sind) haben uns einen Dankesbrief und ein großes Fass starken Alkohols sowie eine Kiste zerbrochener Handgranaten hinterlassen.

column2: 'The weapon is manually assembled from spare parts as expected. It seems we were also given some leftover parts as a gift.
column3: 'Die Waffe wird erwartungsgemäß manuell aus Ersatzteilen zusammengebaut. Es scheint, dass wir auch einige übrig gebliebene Teile geschenkt bekommen haben.

column2: '"Thank you for the smooth transaction. Please accept this acid as an additional token of our gratitude!" It seems we have been also gifted leftover parts from making the nuke.
column3: '"Vielen Dank für die reibungslose Abwicklung. Bitte nehmen wir diese Säure als zusätzliches Zeichen unserer Dankbarkeit an! Es scheint, als seien wir auch mit Resten aus der Herstellung der Atombombe beschenkt worden.

column2: 'Barter [get a package of compressed fuel for 3 exotics]
column3: 'Tauschhandel [erhalten wir ein Paket mit komprimiertem Kraftstoff für 3 Exoten]

column2: 'The traders also left us a note saying "FREE BEST APE SUGAR POTATO!" and a pile of fruit as a gift.
column3: 'Die Händler hinterließen uns auch einen Zettel mit der Aufschrift "FREE BEST APE ZUCKERKARTOFFEL" und einen Haufen Obst als Geschenk.

column2: 'Fuel received without incident. The traders have given as a chunk of corroded metal as a free bonus. It also has "YOUR SHIP VERY COOL" chemically burned onto it with acid.
column3: 'Treibstoff ohne Zwischenfall erhalten. Die Händler haben als einen Klumpen korrodiertes Metall als kostenlosen Bonus gegeben. Außerdem ist darauf "IHR SCHIFF SEHR KÜHL" mit Säure chemisch eingebrannt.

column2: '"ENJOY TRIP!" The traders have included a case full of cheap recreational consumables to their package.
column3: '"GENUSSREISE"! Die Händler haben ihrem Paket einen Koffer voller billiger Freizeitverbrauchsmaterialien beigelegt.

column2: '"May your profits accelerate, fellow consciousness! Let us trade forms of energy for mutual profit. Our fleet will be leaving this system after this meeting is over, so this is truly a once-in-a-bodytime offer!" (analysis of the trader fleet credentials suggest less-than-perfect reputation).
column3: '"Mögen sich Ihre Gewinne beschleunigen, Mitbewohner! Lassen wir uns Energieformen gegen gegenseitigen Gewinn tauschen. Unsere Flotte wird dieses System nach dem Ende dieses Treffens verlassen, es handelt sich also wirklich um ein einmaliges Angebot! (die Analyse der Referenzen der Handelsflotte lässt auf einen weniger als perfekten Ruf schließen).

column2: 'Inspecting the trade package reveals we have received exactly 1% less than promised, even though the deal itself remains profitable.
column3: 'Die Prüfung des Handelspakets zeigt, dass wir genau 1 % weniger als versprochen erhalten haben, obwohl das Geschäft selbst profitabel bleibt.

column2: 'Instead of universal intergalactic xenodata currency, the package contains huge amounts of an ancient, obsolete, practically worthless datacurrency, with a total value of barely 1 xenodata. Additionally, there's a note saying "If the currency is not valid please accept this organic edible slime as a bonus" and a container full of dubious biosludge.
column3: 'Anstelle einer universellen intergalaktischen Xenodatenwährung enthält das Paket riesige Mengen einer alten, veralteten, praktisch wertlosen Datenwährung mit einem Gesamtwert von kaum 1 Xenodata. Zusätzlich gibt es einen Zettel mit der Aufschrift "Wenn die Währung nicht gültig ist, akzeptieren wir bitte diesen organischen, essbaren Schleim als Bonus" und einen Behälter voller dubiosem Bioschlamm.

column2: '"You won't get a better price for exotics from anywhere else in the universe!" the smuggler explains before warping off.
column3: '"wir werden nirgendwo anders im Universum einen besseren Preis für Exoten bekommen", erklärt der Schmuggler, bevor er sich auf die Reise begibt..

column2: 'A large militarized trade ship is approaching. It seems to be armed with 5 projectile weapons and several nukes.
column3: 'Ein großes militarisiertes Handelsschiff nähert sich. Es scheint mit 5 Geschosswaffen und mehreren Atomwaffen bewaffnet zu sein.

column2: '"May your richness index rise, fellow claims-to-be-consciousness! Let us trade destructive energy and matter for mutual pleasure and power. We warn you that our fleet will be leaving this system immediately after this engagement is over, so no refunds!" (analysis of the trader fleet credentials suggest a less-than-perfect reputation).
column3: '"Möge Ihr Reichtumsindex steigen, Mitbürger, die behaupten, bewusst zu sein! Lasst uns zerstörerische Energie und Materie gegen gegenseitiges Vergnügen und Macht eintauschen. Wir warnen wir davor, dass unsere Flotte dieses System sofort nach Beendigung dieses Engagements verlassen wird, also keine Rückerstattungen! (die Analyse der Referenzen der Handelsflotte lässt auf einen weniger als perfekten Ruf schließen).

column2: 'Inspecting the trade package reveals the explosives are less powerful than advertised.
column3: 'Bei der Prüfung des Handelspakets stellt sich heraus, dass die Sprengstoffe weniger stark sind als beworben.

column2: 'Inspecting the trade package reveals some of the explosives have been kept so poorly they have degraded into organic volatiles.
column3: 'Die Inspektion des Handelspakets zeigt, dass einige der Sprengstoffe so schlecht aufbewahrt wurden, dass wir sich zu organischen flüchtigen Stoffen abgebaut haben.

column2: 'Inspecting the trade package reveals the explosives to be of slightly lesser potency than promised.
column3: 'Die Prüfung des Handelspakets ergab, dass die Sprengstoffe von etwas geringerer Wirksamkeit sind als versprochen.

column2: 'The data Credits are delivered to us in a barely functioning ancient data core of minimal value. Closer inspection reveals that some of the xenodata is corrupted. The trade remains profitable.
column3: 'Die Daten Credits werden uns in einem kaum funktionierenden alten Datenkern von minimalem Wert geliefert. Bei näherer Betrachtung zeigt sich, dass einige der Xenodaten korrupt sind. Der Handel bleibt Trotzdem profitabel.

column2: '"You won't get a better price for exotics from anywhere else in the universe!" the smuggler claims before warping off.
column3: '"wir werden nirgendwo anders im Universum einen besseren Preis für Exoten bekommen", behauptet der Schmuggler, bevor er sich auf die Reise begibt.

column2: 'A pair of trade ships approaching. One of them is armored and militarized with multiple projectile weapons and nukes.
column3: 'Ein Paar Handelsschiffe kommen nähr . Eines von ihnen ist gepanzert und mit mehreren Projektilwaffen und Atomwaffen ausgerüstet und militarisiert.

column1: 'Smuggler L3 explo and hint smuggler, redmonster.prefab

column2: '"May your power index increase, fellow consciousness! We are selling destructive matter & hints for a very competitive price. Our fleet will be leaving this system after this meeting is over, so no refunds!" (analysis of the trader fleet credentials suggest less-than-perfect reputation).
column3: '"Möge sich Ihr Machtindex erhöhen, Mitgefühl! Wir verkaufen destruktive Materie & Hinweise zu einem sehr wettbewerbsfähigen Preis. Unsere Flotte wird dieses System nach dem Ende dieses Treffens verlassen, also keine Rückerstattungen! (die Analyse der Referenzen der Händlerflotte lässt auf einen weniger als perfekten Ruf schließen).

column2: 'A single warhead has been removed from one of the munitions, the rest are in top shape. Perhaps the smuggler thought nobody would complain about such a minor loss of profit?
column3: 'Ein einziger Sprengkopf wurde aus einer der Waffen entfernt, die übrigen sind in bester Verfassung. Vielleicht dachte der Schmuggler, niemand würde sich über einen so geringen Gewinnverlust beklagen?

column2: 'Inspecting the trade package reveals majority of the explosives have been kept so poorly they have degraded back to volatile organics.
column3: 'Die Inspektion des Handelspakets zeigt, dass die meisten Sprengstoffe so schlecht aufbewahrt wurden, dass wir wieder zu flüchtigen organischen Stoffen abgebaut wurden..

column2: 'Inspecting the trade package reveals the explosives to have only halft the strength of what was advertised. The trade remains somewhat profitable.
column3: 'Die Inspektion des Handelspakets zeigt, dass die Sprengstoffe nur halb so stark sind wie die beworbenen. Der Handel ist nach wie vor einigermaßen profitabel.

column2: 'The data Credits are delivered to us in a barely functioning antique data core. Closer inspection reveals that a small part of the xenodata is corrupted. The trade remains profitable.
column3: 'Die Daten Credits werden uns in einem kaum funktionierenden antiken Datenkern geliefert. Bei näherer Betrachtung zeigt sich, dass ein kleiner Teil der Xenodaten korrumpiert ist. Der Handel bleibt profitabel.

column2: '"I've obtained metaphoric information from shady contacts, hinting that this sector is off the target-lists for pirates due to a low profit outlook. Expect the sector to be safe from roaming pirates (except those attracted by the SOS signal)."
column3: '"Ich habe aus zwielichtigen Kontakten metaphorische Informationen erhalten, die andeuten, dass dieser Sektor aufgrund der geringen Gewinnaussichten von den Ziellisten der Piraten gestrichen wurde. Ich gehe davon aus, dass der Sektor vor herumstreunenden Piraten sicher ist (mit Ausnahme derer, die durch das SOS-Signal angelockt werden)."

column2:
''"Here are the unofficial price standards to expect when selling exotics, in case you don't know this yet."
58 Credits per unit - the best selling price for unofficial deals that I've seen with my own eyes
30 Credits per unit - average selling price, standard in stations
26 Credits per unit - if the price offered is lower than this, you are getting ripped off
column3:
'"Hier sind die inoffiziellen Preisstandards, die beim Verkauf von Exoten zu erwarten sind, falls wir dies noch nicht wissen."
58 Credits pro Einheit - der beste Verkaufspreis für inoffizielle Geschäfte, den ich mit eigenen Augen gesehen habe
30 Credits pro Einheit - durchschnittlicher Verkaufspreis, Standard in Bahnhöfen
26 Credits pro Einheit - wenn der angebotene Preis niedriger als dieser ist, werden wir abgezockt

column2: 'A large ship is approaching, with two cargo ships following in the distance. The big one seems to be armed with multiple projectile weapons and nukes.
column3: 'Ein großes Schiff nähert sich, zwei Frachtschiffe folgen in der Ferne. Das große scheint mit mehreren Projektilwaffen und Atomwaffen bewaffnet zu sein.

column2: '"May your cunningness increase, fellow consciousness! Let us trade forms of destruction for mutual profit. I offer destructive matter in return for standard xenocurrency, surely as destructive as explosives." (analysis of the trader fleet credentials suggest a less-than-perfect reputation).
column3: '"Möge Ihre Klugheit zunehmen, Mitbewohner! Tauschen wir Formen der Zerstörung gegen gegenseitigen Gewinn ein. Ich biete zerstörerische Materie im Tausch gegen Standard-Fremdwährungen an, sicherlich so zerstörerisch wie Sprengstoff". (die Analyse der Referenzen der Handelsflotte lässt auf einen weniger als perfekten Ruf schließen).

column2: 'Most of the explosives have been kept so poorly they have degraded into synthetics & organics.
column3: 'Die meisten Sprengstoffe wurden so schlecht aufbewahrt, dass wir sich zu synthetischen und organischen Stoffen abgebaut haben.

column2: 'The data Credits are delivered to us in a barely functioning ancient data core. Closer inspection reveals that some of the xenodata is corrupted. The trade remains profitable.
